1a1(phal chen): @#/ /phal chen ca pa bzhugs so//
1b1(phal chen): shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba/
1b2(phal chen): bam po brgyad cu lnga pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems
1b3(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub la 'dug pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig
1b4(phal chen): rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu bskyod cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po
2a1(phal chen): byang chub la 'khod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byed cing / byang
2a2(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed
2a3(phal chen): cing | byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams
2a4(phal chen): cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis rlob cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la
2a5(phal chen): 'khod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan seng ge'i khri la rnam par lta zhing / byang chub sems
2b1(phal chen): dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /yid nam mkha' dang mnyam pa la rnam par mi rtog cing / byang chub sems
2b2(phal chen): dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /ji ltar mthun pa'i lus dang spyod lam yongs su ston cing / byang chub
2b3(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /rdo rje'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs par byed cing / byang chub
2b4(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs rnam par dag
2b5(phal chen): pa'i gnas yang dag par len cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /bdag gi
2b6(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus 'gro ba thams cad byin gyis rlob cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang
3a1(phal chen): chub la 'khod do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po
3a2(phal chen): byang chub la 'dug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub kyi mchog la 'khod
3a3(phal chen): nas kyang / ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bcu 'byung ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de la snying po byang
3a4(phal chen): c hub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de
3a5(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis zhal mngon par bstan te/ phyag
3a6(phal chen): g.yas pa brkyang zhing / kye ded dpon chen po/ rgyal bar gyur cig/ rgyal bar gyur cig /ces gsung brjod de/
3b1(phal chen): 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dang po'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad
3b2(phal chen): dgongs pa dang / byin gyis rlob pa yang dag par mdzad de/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gnyis pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub
3b3(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams la sngon lhan cig tu spyod spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'ongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la kun nas bskor cing mchod pa'i las rnam par phye ba
3b4(phal chen): rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa ste/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gsum pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
3b5(phal chen): la| 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rtswa dang / gel pa dang / sdong po dang / nags tshal thams cad kyang bsam pa yod ko lta ste/ snying po byang chub gang na ba der 'dud cing phyag
3b6(phal chen): 'tshal te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bzhi pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba'i tshe yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'byed pa
3b7(phal chen): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar
4a1(phal chen): rmad du byung ba'i chos lnga pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ rgya mtsho mchog gi dam pa dri ma med cing kun nas snang la 'od gsal ba'i sa'i snying po la
4a2(phal chen): 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin chen po kun nas yog par 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos
4a3(phal chen): drug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gror bya ba
4a4(phal chen): shin tu rgya chen po rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad du 'byung ste/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung
4a5(phal chen): ba'i chos bdun pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ye shes mchog gis sems can thams cad kyi bsam
4a6(phal chen): pa dang / dbang po dang / spyod pa mngon du 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos brgyad pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang
4a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams la blo shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu nam mkha'i dbyings tshad med pa
4b1(phal chen): dang | dus gsum rgyas par 'gengs pa'i lus kun nas gnas par 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dgu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ snying po byang chub mchog la
4b2(phal chen): 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus kyi las dus thams cad la yang dag par gzhol zhing / ye shes chen po chags pa med pa rdul dang bral ba'i snang ba dang ldan
4b3(phal chen): par 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnams
4b4(phal chen): te| byang chub sems dpa' snying po byang chub mchog la gnas pa rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag go / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ don rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gi dbang yang dag par
4b5(phal chen): mthong nas/ snying po byang chub mchog la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
4b6(phal chen): 'byams klas pa na 'thab mo dang / g.yul la mos pa'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi che ba nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
4b7(phal chen): dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /yid gnyis dang / the tshom du gyur pa'i mi dang / lha rnams kyi yid gnyis dang / the tshom gcad pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /bdud kyi sde
5a1(phal chen): yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /'thab mo dang / g.yul la mos pa'i lha dang / mi rnams kun nas bsdu ba dang / kun
5a2(phal chen): nas 'dus pa'i lha dang mi rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mthu la thub pa med pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba
5a3(phal chen): ston to/ /sems can gzhan mos shing spro bar bya ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /snying po byang chub kyi
5a4(phal chen): bar gyi bdud kyi las yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi lam thams cad las 'das pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /nyon mongs
5a5(phal chen): pa'i stobs kyis nyams smad cing stobs med par byas pa yongs su bstan pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod pa dang / byams pa'i stobs yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir bdud
5a6(phal chen): 'dul ba ston to/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa dag tu chos nyid rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba
5a7(phal chen): ston to/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ don bcu po de dag gi dbang mngon pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/
5b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams
5b2(phal chen): bdud dang / las dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad las 'das shing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
5b3(phal chen): gyi sgo thams cad la rnam par rtse ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan 'byams klas pa thams cad dang ldan pa yin/ chos dkar po'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par
5b4(phal chen): bsags pa yin/ chos snang ba rnam par dpyad par bya ba thams cad shin tu rnam par phye ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i lus dang ldan pa yin/ sems can
5b5(phal chen): thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems dang / dbyangs su ldan pa yin/ byin gyi rlabs thams cad kyis rab mchog por byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da
5b6(phal chen): ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rnam par mi rtog pa thob pa yin/ skad cig gcig gis dus gsum rnam par 'tshang rgya ba yin/
5b7(phal chen): shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin kyang rab tu thob pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin te/ 'di ltar gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i
6a1(phal chen): stobs dang ldan pa yin/ zag pa zad pa shes pa'i bar gyi stobs dang ldan pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems
6a2(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste/ stobs bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni/ de bzhin
6a3(phal chen): gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ltar mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
6a4(phal chen): rgyas ni/ chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rnam pa bcu bskor te/ rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar mi 'jigs pas shin tu sbyangs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang / tha dad pa yang
6a5(phal chen): dag par shes pa bzhi'i sgra rjes su bsgrags pa dang / bden pa bzhi'i tshul gyis shin tu brtags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pa'i rjes su
6a6(phal chen): song ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / thogs pa med cing blta bar dka' la yo ba med cing / sdug bsngal gyi gsal shing 'byin pa
6a7(phal chen): dang | sngon gyi snying rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du grags pa dang / bskal pa grangs med par chos ston pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /
6b1(phal chen): dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / legs par spyad pas bskor
6b2(phal chen): ba'o| |kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sgo rnam pa bcu po de dag la sogs pa rnam pa tshad med pa de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin gshegs pa
6b3(phal chen): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo de ni sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcus thogs pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur te/
6b4(phal chen): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar smon lam thams cad kyi stobs kyi shugs dang / snying rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs dang / sems
6b5(phal chen): can gyi khams thams cad mi gtong ba dang / ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang / dus la bab par thob par byed pa dang / rigs pa'i tshul
6b6(phal chen): bzhin du mi 'khrul ba dang / dus gsum shes par bya ba rab tu rtogs pa dang / lus kyi dbang zil gyis mi non pa dang / tshig gi dbang dmigs par dka' ba dang / ye shes
6b7(phal chen): kyi dbang tshig bzhin du khong du chud par byed pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcu po de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
7a1(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la thogs pa med pa dang / mngon par med par 'gyur bar 'gyur
7a2(phal chen): ro| |kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rdzogs par mdzad zin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni don bcu'i dbang
7a3(phal chen): gzigs nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po ston te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'du byed mi rtag pa yongs su bstan pa dang / 'dus byas
7a4(phal chen): thams cad yid brtan du mi rung bar bstan pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyogs bde bar 'gro bas 'jigs pa dang / bag tsha ba thams cad dang 'bral ba yang dag par bstan
7a5(phal chen): pa dang / gzugs kyi lus la zhen pa'i lha dang mi rnams la gzugs kyi lus mi rtag pa nyid du yang dag par bstan pa dang / chos kyi sku la yang dag par sbyar ba dang / rnam
7a6(phal chen): par 'gyur ba'i mthus phyir mi ldog par yongs su bstan pa dang / 'du byed thams cad 'dod dgur mi rung zhing dbang bsgyur du med pa yongs su bstan pa dang / sa gsum
7a7(phal chen): gyi 'khor ba thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bur yongs su bstan pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni snying po dam pa ste/ mi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid du yang dag par bstan pa
7b1(phal chen): dang | kun 'byung zhing 'jigs pas 'bral bar 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pa dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos nyid kyis kyang de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas kyi
7b2(phal chen): 'phrin las thams cad rdzogs par mdzad de/ dgongs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu bskor te/ 'dul ba thams cad shin tu dul nas/ byang chub
7b3(phal chen): sems dpa' thams cad shin tu lung bstan par 'gyur te/ mnyam pa med pa'i go 'phang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen por yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i
7b4(phal chen): sras| don bcu po de dag yang dag par gzigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyam pa med pa'i go 'phang yongs su mya
7b5(phal chen): ngan las 'das pa chen po yongs su ston to/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo ste/ yang dag par
7b6(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang pos gsungs pa'o/ /don tshad med pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba'o/ /mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
7b7(phal chen): spyod pa dang / smon lam chen po rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa'o/ /sems can gang gis 'di thos par gyur te/ thos nas kyang mos par byed pa dang / mos par gyur nas kyang nan
8a1(phal chen): t an gyis yang dag par bsgrub pa de dag thams cad myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
8a2(phal chen): ro| |kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' nan tan lhur byed pa rnams kyis 'grub kyi/ nan tan dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /
8a3(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nan tan la gnas pas/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u byang chub sems dpa'i
8a4(phal chen): spyod pa dang / yon tan gyi 'byung gnas/ don rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog/ chos kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba/ ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa/ 'jig
8a5(phal chen): rten gyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba/ 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa/ chos
8a6(phal chen): thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di/ rim gror byas te/
8a7(phal chen): mnyan par bya'o/ /blang bar bya'o/ /yongs su gzung bar bya'o/ /yongs su bzung nas kyang nges pas rtogs pa'i sgos yongs su sbyang ba dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrub
8b1(phal chen): pa la brtson par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dkon pa ma yin no/ /'jig
8b2(phal chen): rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u chos thams cad kyi sgor yang dag par gzhol ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / chos kyi rnam grangs
8b3(phal chen): 'di'i chos nyid thob pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa rnams rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams g.yos par gyur pa de dag thams
8b4(phal chen): cad kyang snang ba chen pos rgyas shing gsal bar gyur to/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang dgyes par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la zhal bstan
8b5(phal chen): nas gsung brjod pa/ kye rgyal ba'i bu/ legs so/ /legs so/ /ji ltar khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i
8b6(phal chen): le'u byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / yon tan gyi 'byung gnas don rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog chos kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag gzhol ba/ ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug
8b7(phal chen): pa| 'jig rten gyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba/ 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa/
9a1(phal chen): chos thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa
9a2(phal chen): 'di bstan pa ni rgyal ba'i bu khyod chos 'di dag la legs par bslabs pas shin tu byang ba ste/ rgyal ba'i bu khyod kyis chos kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / mthus mos pa'i chos kyi rnam
9a3(phal chen): grangs 'di legs par bshad de/ nged kyis kyang mngon par bsngags so/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang mngon par bsngags so/ /kye rgyal ba'i bu/
9a4(phal chen): khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma thos pa'i chos thos par bya ba'i phyir/ nged kyis byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do//
9a5(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur bltas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la bltas
9a6(phal chen): nas chos kyi dbyings thams cad la bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gang rnams de dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du brtul zhugs dka' spyad pa//
9a7(phal chen): gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong las byung ba'i chos kyi sras/ /gang rnams de dag sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong rnams byang chub rab 'god pa/ /dpe
9b1(phal chen): zla med pa de dag rnams kyi spyod pa bshad kyi rtse cig mnyan par byos/ /gang dag sangs rgyas khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod kyang bdag ni sangs rgyas mi gnas pa/ /gang dag nyon mongs
9b2(phal chen): bcings pa'i 'gro ba thar byed sems can 'du shes mi gnas dang / /gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas yon tan rtag tu tshol yang yon tan mi gnas pa/ /de dag 'jig rten rab tu dga'
9b3(phal chen): bar byed pa'i spyod mchog mdzes pa brjod par bya/ /gang rnams de dag srid pa gsum na las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi dbang song snang / /gang rnams de dag 'phags pa'i yon tan ldan
9b4(phal chen): zhing khyu mchog spyod pa ston pa po/ /gang rnams de dag gti mug nyon mongs nyes bral bsam pa zhi zhing rab zhi ba/ /'gro ba rnams la spyod pa'i rim pa ston pa de dag yon tan brjod par
9b5(phal chen): bya| |gang rnams de dag bdud g.yo 'gro ba kun las brgal te thams cad dbang byed pa/ /'gro ba thams cad dag la sprul pa sna tshogs tha dad mtha' yas rab tu ston/ /sems
9b6(phal chen): bskyed gyur ma thag tu gnas dang 'jig pa'i bya ba thams cad ston byed pa/ /de dag yon tan sna tshogs mdzes pa sems can dga' bar byed pa brjod par bya/ /srid pa'i rgyud na
9b7(phal chen): sems can sdug bsngal nyen cing skye dang rga bas gzir ba dang / /'chi dang mya ngan dag gis gtses shing gnod byas nyon mongs kun tu gzir mthong nas/ /de dag thar bar bya phyir
10a1(phal chen): snying rje rgya chen bskyed nas ye shes mchog 'god pa/ /de dag yon tan shin tu dge ba phyogs tsam bshad kyi rtse cig mnyan par byos/ /sbyin dang
10a2(phal chen): tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dga' bar bsam gtan la yang rnam par rtsen/ /shes rab thabs kyi pha rol phyin cing byams dang snying rje lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / /dga'
10a3(phal chen): ba'i chos la brtson zhing btang snyoms dga' bas bskal pa brgyar yang spyod spyad pa/ /de dag spyod ldan yon tan ldan pa rnams kyi yon tan bstan gyi de dag nyon/ /gang rnams
10a4(phal chen): de dag byang chub gnyer phyir bye ba khrag khrig stong gi lus skem pa/ /gang rnams byang chub zhi ba tshol phyir srog la lta ba med par gyur pa dang / /gang rnams de dag sems can
10a5(phal chen): phan phyir rtag brtson bdag gi bde ba mi tshol ba/ /byams dang snying rje'i sems ldan thub pa de dag kun gyi spyod mchog brjod par bya/ /rgya mtsho'i chu thigs bgrangs pa re
10a6(phal chen): res thams cad zad par bya bar rung srid kyi/ /de dag yon tan bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig du ma stong du brjod byas kyang / /dpe tsam bya bar mi nus legs par brjod cing bstan
10a7(phal chen): par mi nus 'on kyang go/ sems can phan pa'i don du sangs rgyas yul rnams bstan par bya ba mnyan par byos/ /gang dag 'gro ba rnams kyi don phyir dge ba kun 'dzin dkar
10b1(phal chen): po 'phel byed kyang / /mtho bar mi sems dma' bar sems med mi dman chos tshol ngoms par yong mi 'gyur/ /'gro ba kun nas don gnyer chu klung ye shes mtsho chen shes rab shing
10b2(phal chen): sdong ste/ /ston pa'i mkhas pa de dag rnams ni sa ltar 'gro ba thams cad 'tsho ba yin/ /byams pa rlan yin snying rje rtsa ba dga' ba sdong po brtan pa sdom pa ste/ /ze ba ye shes dri ni
10b3(phal chen): tshul khrims bzang po lo ma me tog yon tan can/ /sangs rgyas 'od kyis rab tu rgyas byas blo gros ldan pa sems can dga' byed pa/ /de dang de dag pad+mo lta bur 'dus byas ma gos
10b4(phal chen): 'gro ba rnams la snang / /sa bon mos pa sa gzhi bsam pa byams dang snying rje dang ni rtsa ba ste/ /sdong po shes rab thabs ni yal ga lcug ma dag ni pha rol phyin rab lnga/ /bsam
10b5(phal chen): gtan shes rab mngon shes me tog rgyas pa kun mkhyen ye shes 'bras bu ste/ /chos kyi shing mchog rdzu 'phrul bya 'khod de dang des ni 'jig rten gsum po khebs/ /rim gyis
10b6(phal chen): dkar yangs yongs su spel ba lus yin bden pa rnams ni rkang pa ste/ /dran pa mgrin pa spyod mchog shes rab mgo yin ral pa rnam par grol ba dge/ stong pa don dam sul
10b7(phal chen): dang phug yin byams dang snying rje dag ni mig gnyis te/ /de dag seng ge lta bur bdag med sgra 'byin bdud sde rab tu skrag par byed/ /'gro ba ma lus rnams ni 'khor ba'i 'brog
11a1(phal chen): dgon nyon mongs mi bzad 'khyams gyur te/ /bdud kyi bya ma rta dang rkun por bcas pas zin cing gti mug mdongs gyur pa/ /lam ni rab stor mi mkhas
11a2(phal chen): sems can mthong nas ded dpon mkhas pa de dag ni/ /lam gyi mthar khrid 'jigs pa med pa'i grong khyer dam pa mchog la rab tu 'god/ /'gro ba dag ni 'dod chags zhe sdang mun
11a3(phal chen): pa nyon mongs sna tshogs nad btab cing / /yun ring nas ni 'dus byas sdug bsngal dag la gzhol zhing sdug bsngal rab 'bar ba/ /sems can mthong nas snying rje bskyed de nyon mongs pa
11a4(phal chen): yi nad pa kun gso zhing / /nad rnams zhi bar byed pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dam pa dag kyang ston/ /rgyal po lta bu de dang de dag 'khor rnams dgar byed 'gro la chos ston pa/ /sdig
11a5(phal chen): pa spong la dge la bsnyen cing sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyang tshol cig ces/ /rkang gnyis dbang po'i chos kyi yul la kun mkhyen ye shes dbang por dbang bskur ba/ /rgya chen byang
11a6(phal chen): chub yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas de dag 'gro ba'i 'phags pa'i nor/ /tshul khrims lte ba ting 'dzin mu khyud brgyan pa'i ye shes 'od dang shes rab mtshon/ /ye shes rno ba'i
11a7(phal chen): gzhu can nyon mongs 'joms zhing bdud kyi sde rnams dkrug byed pa/ /chos kyi sgron ma che 'byin mchog rnams de dang de dag sangs rgyas bskor ba yin/ /'khor lo mchog rnams
11b1(phal chen): bskor zhing pha rol rgol ba dag dang mu stegs thams cad 'joms/ /ye shes chu ni zab cing mi zad shin tu rgya chen chos kyi ro dang ldan/ /byang chub yan lag de bzhin bsam gtan rin chen
11b2(phal chen): gang ba 'gro kun shes par dka'/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas kyi mtha' rlabs mtha' yas yul rnams dag cing lhag bsam dge /de dang de dag ye shes rgya mtsho mtshungs med
11b3(phal chen): bstan pas zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten rab 'phags rtag tu yul gyis mi gos 'gro ba rnams kyi gnas gyur pa/ /bsam gtan mngon shes rab 'phel ye shes rtse mo lhag pa'i
11b4(phal chen): bsam pa mi sgul ba/ /gang dag de dang nyer phrad shes rab ye shes mchog gis rab tu 'dra bar 'gyur/ /de dang de dag yon tan ri rab shes rab rab brtan 'gro ba kun gyis bltas/ /
11b5(phal chen): lhag pa'i bsam pa mchog ni rdo rje mtshungs shing 'dra ste brtul zhugs thams cad brtan/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yas bsam pa mi phyed de/ /
11b6(phal chen): bdud dang sems can nyon mongs 'jig rten rlung dag gis ni mi bskyod rab brtan pa/ /de dang de dag 'jig rten dam pa nyon mongs 'bar ba dag las zlog par byed/ /byams pa'i sprin
11b7(phal chen): rnams kun 'dus snying rje stug po rig pa'i glog chen rgyu zhing ldog / thub pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gnas bzhi dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra 'byin cing rab tu sgrog/ tha dad yang dag shes dang
12a1(phal chen): tshul khrims yan lag brgyad ldan chu yi char 'bebs pa/ /de dang de dag sprin chen nyon mongs zhi byed sems can don phyir mngon par 'phags/ /shes
12a2(phal chen): rab dga' dang khrel yod dag ni 'obs te chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng / /ye shes shing thags yin te thar pa'i sgo phye dran pa de dag sgo ba yin/ /bden pa rnams ni lam chen bzhi ste
12a3(phal chen): shin tu dge ba'i rdzu 'phrul rab brgyan pa/ /srid pa gsum na bdud sde dag gis mi thul grong khyer chos nyid dag tu ston/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems mchog shing la rab
12a4(phal chen): 'dug rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i rkang pa brtan/ /gshog pa thabs kyi stobs te pha rol gnon mthu byams dang snying rje mig gnyis yin/ /ston pa de dag 'gro ba kun na thub med mkha'
12a5(phal chen): lding dbang po'i drag shul 'dra/ /srid pa'i mtsho nas 'don cing lha mi rnams kyang mya ngan 'da' ba'i mchog la 'god/ /tshul khrims dkyil 'khor rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shugs
12a6(phal chen): ldan ye shes 'od zer phreng ba mdzes/ /'od snang kun 'char nyon mongs 'joms shing srid pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu skem par byed/ /stobs dang dbang po dge ba'i sman 'phel sems
12a7(phal chen): can pad+mo yongs su rgyas byed pa/ /de dang de dag snang byed chos kyi nyi ma'i khyu mchog 'gro ba kun du 'byung / /chos dbyings rnam par dag pa dkyil 'khor 'gro ba kun gyis blta na
12b1(phal chen): mdzes pa ste/ /nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyi tshogs mang skar ma 'dra ba dag ni zil gyis mnan/ /sems kyi rgyud rnams mthong nas srid pa gsum du 'phel dang 'grib pa rnam par stan/ /
12b2(phal chen): de dang de dag ye shes zla ba 'gro la 'char zhing mkhas pa nam mkha'i mtha'/ /chos kyi dbang po 'gro ba kun la dbang byed gzugs dang yon tan dag gis brgyan/ /ye shes rdo rje mnga' ba
12b3(phal chen): thabs ni mig ste chos la dbang chen bsgyur gnas pa/ /lus dang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs kun gyis blta ba'i dbang po ste/ /chos kyis 'gro ba kun las rgyal ba de dang de dag
12b4(phal chen): chos kyi dbang po yin/ /srid pa gsum na 'dod pa'i 'dam dang nyon mongs las las rab 'das kun dbang po/ /byams pa snang dang thugs rje bsam gtan dga' dang btang snyoms rnams
12b5(phal chen): la mos/ /srid pa gsum po kun du tha dad lus ston chos kyi sgras kyang go 'byed pa/ /de dang de dag tshangs pa lta bur rnam dag mos shing lta ba'i rnam pa sel/ /'khor las rab tu 'das
12b6(phal chen): shing rnam dag yul dang ldan pa bdag po chos kyi dbang / /phyir ldog mi 'gyur blo gros che 'chang gang rnams theg pa dma' dang tha dad la/ /chos kyi dbang por dbang bskur 'jig rten
12b7(phal chen): dam pa ye shes phyir ldog mi 'gyur ba/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan dbang phyug grags chen de dang de dag 'jig rten dbang / /nam mkha'i mkha' dbyings lta bur dngos dang
13a1(phal chen): rnam bral dmigs pa thams cad rnam bsal ba/ /'gro ba kun tu bya ba nyams len khyu mchog ci la'ang gnas pa med pa ste/ /'gro ba kun tu spyod pa
13a2(phal chen): dkar zhugs mkhas pa de dag rab tu mi gnas pa/ /de dang de dag ye shes dge zhing dag pas shes rab nam mkha'i dbyings dang 'dra/ /de dang de dag shin tu rgya chen thabs ldan sa lhar
13a3(phal chen): 'gro ba kun gyi gsos/ /chu 'dra de dang de dag byams dang snying rje nyon mongs me ni rab tu sel/ /de dang de dag ye shes mes ni nyon mongs sreg cing bag chags bcas pa bsal/ /ston
13a4(phal chen): pa de dag mi gnas rlung dang 'dra bar srid pa gsum na rab tu rgyu/ /de dang de dag rin chen 'dra ste shin tu dkon zhing 'gro bar dbul yang sel/ /de dang de dag rdo rje lta bur srid pa gsum
13a5(phal chen): na lta ba kun tu 'joms/ /de dang de dag yon tan kun gyi phreng ba sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum mdzes byed/ /ston pa de dag nor bu rin chen mtshungs 'dra spyod pa kun gyi gtsug tu phyin//
13a6(phal chen): de dang de dag me tog lta bur yon tan rab rgyas byang chub yan lag rtse/ /phreng ba lta bur de dang de dag smon lam bcings shing 'jig rten mgon la gnas/ /de dang de dag tshul
13a7(phal chen): khrims ma nyams skyon med rnam dag dri ni dri rab zhim/ /de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum na chos dang ye shes kyis ni bag chags dag/ gdugs 'dra de dang de dag stobs kyi bla
13b1(phal chen): res nyon mongs rdul las skyob par byed/ /ye shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i thugs mnga' de dang de dag nga rgyal mtshan snyol/ /de dang de dag spyod pa'i ba dan sna tshogs yid 'ong ye
13b2(phal chen): shes kun tu 'phags/ /gos 'dra de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul yon tan 'gro ba kun la khebs par byed/ /theg pa 'dra ba khyu mchog mtha' yas de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum las 'byin//
13b3(phal chen): de dang de dag rab dul glang po lta bur yid kyis rtag tu dul la gnas/ /de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul rtas ni khal chen khyer zhing 'jig rten gsum las 'da'/ /klu yi dbang po lta bu de dang de dag
13b4(phal chen): sems kyi yul du chos char 'bebs/ /de dang de dag 'gro ba kun la me tog u dum war mtshungs 'dra shin tu dkon/ /dpa' bo lta bu de dang de dag nyon mongs 'joms shing bdud kyi
13b5(phal chen): sde rnams 'khrugs/ /mi ldog 'khor lo lta bu de dang de dag 'dren pa rnams kyis rab tu btsud/ /de dang de dag sgron ma lta bur mun pa sel cing sems can thams cad lam yang ston/ /de
13b6(phal chen): dang de dag chu klung lta bur yon tan ded cing lam rgyun rjes su 'gro / de dang de dag zam pa lta bur ngal ba med par rtag tu 'gro ba sgrol/ /gru dang gru chen lta bur smon lam rab btab ye shes
13b7(phal chen): gangs chen mtsho thob byed/ /de dang de dag mnyan pa lta bur 'gro ba ye shes thang chen mchog la 'god/ /de dag skyed mos tshal gyi dga' brtse zhing 'gro la yang dag spyod pa ston/ /de
14a1(phal chen): dag chos kyi rnam thar mngon shes me tog ye shes gzhal med khang dag pa/ /mkhas pa de dang de dag sman ltar nad zhi byed cing nyon mongs rab tu sel/ /
14a2(phal chen): sman gyis rgyas pa'i gangs ri lta bur de dang de dag ye shes 'byung gnas so/ /de dag sangs rgyas lta bur ye shes kyis ni 'gro ba gnyid log mun pa sel/ /yang dag sangs rgyas lta
14a3(phal chen): bur gzhan min yid kyis 'gro ba yang dag rtogs par byed/ /de dang de dag rgyal ba ci 'dra de ltar 'ongs te mkhas pa de nyid gnas/ /de dag thams cad mkhyen pa lta bur ye shes
14a4(phal chen): 'byung gnas kun nas sgor yang zhugs/ /zhi ba skyed pa de dang de dag ston pas rab bsngags 'gro ba kun la ston/ /de dang de dag rang gi ye shes yul dang thams cad mkhyen gyi spyod
14a5(phal chen): yul shes/ /de dang de dag tshad med dpung dang 'dra bar 'gro ba kun na thub pa med/ /de dag ye shes mi 'jigs blo gros 'chang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyang shes/ /gang na
14a6(phal chen): gang dag 'gro ba kun gyi gzugs dang ming rnams ji snyed snang yod pa/ /kun tu gzugs snyoms gzugs kyi rjes su song zhing ming dbyangs rjes su song ba yin/ /gzugs rnams
14a7(phal chen): kun las 'das shing ming dang rnam par bral yang bya ba thams cad ston/ /de dag mthu ni 'gro ba rnams kyis rnam pa kun du brjod par mi nus so/ /gang dag 'di 'dra'i yon tan
14b1(phal chen): thob cing dngos bral dngos po med pa'i chos gnas shing / /yod dang med pa'i mdud pa thams cad bral ba mkhas pa ye shes mngon sum can/ /thams cad shes kyang ye shes rten pa
14b2(phal chen): ma yin ye shes de la gnas pa min/ /de dag spyod la 'jug pa yid 'ong 'jig rten dga' bar byed pa bshad par bya/ /chos kyi tshul ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dngos po dben pa lta bur rab
14b3(phal chen): rtogs nas/ /mkhas pas sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyis smon lam thabs dang snying rje dag kyang byed/ /sprul pa'i ye shes sgo dang ldan pas khyu mchog bya ba sna tshogs rab ston pa'i/ /
14b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' ma nor yid can rtse gcig mnyam pa med pa legs par grags/ /lus gcig la ni mtha' yas lus dang rgya chen lus rnams tha dad rab tu ston/ /sems
14b5(phal chen): med yid med sems kyi yul med 'on kyang 'gro ba kun du de dag ston/ /khyu mchog brjod pa'i pha rol phyin pa de dag dbyangs gcig rnam par rjod byed kyang / /'gro ba dag gis sgra skad
14b6(phal chen): ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu rjod/ /nyon mongs rgyud byung lus dang bral yang sems can rnams kyi lus la dbang bsgyur te/ /brjod du med pa'i tshul gyis zhi ba rtogs shing
14b7(phal chen): sgra rnams thams cad rab tu ston/ /de dag sems kyi rang bzhin zhi zhing 'od gsal nam mkha' mtshungs par yang dag shes/ /'gro ba kun la bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs sgo nas 'jig
15a1(phal chen): rten sna tshogs ston/ /de dag lus rnams gang la'ang gnas pa med de lus kyang de dag ston pa byed/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi ni skye ba dag dang rgyu mthun gnas
15a2(phal chen): pa ji snyed pa/ /thams cad kun du skye ba'i lus dang ldan yang skye ba dag la gnas pa med/ /rang gi lus la mkha' 'dra dngos bral sems can sems la sna tshogs rnam pa ste/ /mkhas
15a3(phal chen): pa kun la dbang bsgyur de dag lus ni mtha' yas kun tu ston byed cing / /me tog dri dang byug pa phye ma sil snyan gdugs dang ba dan rgyal mtshan rnams/ /thams cad mkhyen la mchod
15a4(phal chen): pas rkang gnyis gtso bo 'jig rten mchog la mchod byed cing / /mkhas pa bsam pa thag pas lus kyi 'du byed mchod pa dam pa kun du ston/ /mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba zhabs kyi
15a5(phal chen): drung 'khod rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /'khor rnams kun na snang zhing mtshungs med de dag zhu ba kun kyang zhu ba byed/ /chos kyi dam pa thos nas ting 'dzin re re mtha' yas sgo ldan thob
15a6(phal chen): gyur cing / /blo gros ldan pa de snyed rnam par ldang ba ston pa byed kyang zad pa med/ /'gro ba sgyu ma lta bur rtogs nas shes rab ye shes thabs kyi pha rol phyin/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i chos
15a7(phal chen): dang gzugs spos mtha' yas dang ba 'gro ba kun la ston/ /sna tshogs gzugs dang sgra rnams mtha' yas shin tu rgya che sems kyang rab tu ston/ /'gro ba thams cad la ni
15b1(phal chen): 'du shes dra ba 'jug pa ston kyang gnas pa med/ /'gro don rjes 'gro de dag la la dag tu thog ma'i sems su 'gro ba ston/ /la lar 'gro ba kun la byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas rgya chen dag
15b2(phal chen): kyang ston/ /la lar sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab rnams/ /la lar tshangs pa'i lam sdud kha cig tu ni spyod pa mchog kyang rab tu ston/ /mkhas pa
15b3(phal chen): rtogs med de dag la lar spyod pa rdzogs shing bzod pa thob pa ston/ /la lar skye ba gcig gis thogs par nges shing la lar rgyal bas dbang bskur ba/ /la lar nyan thos gzugs su
15b4(phal chen): gyur cing la la dag tu rang rgyal gzugs su gyur/ /bye ba khrag khrig mang po'i zhing du mya ngan 'da' bas spyod las ldog pa med/ /de dag la lar lha dbang brgya byin lha dang bcas pa la lar
15b5(phal chen): tshangs par 'gyur/ /de dag la lar lha yi bu mo brgyas bskor la lar gcig pu spyod pa ston/ /la lar dge slong rab tu zhi zhing yid zhi la lar rgyal po dbang phyug 'gyur/ /la lar
15b6(phal chen): chos kyi dra bar 'jug pa'i ye shes khyu mchog gzugs kyang rab tu ston/ /la lar bud med sgyu rtsal pha rol rab phyin la lar dka' thub can du 'gyur/ /la lar 'dod pa'i longs
15b7(phal chen): spyod rgya chen ston cing la lar bsam gtan thub pa byed/ /la lar mya ngan 'da' dang tshe yis dang la lar rgan dang byis par ston/ /de dag spyod pa bsams na skye bo myos par 'gyur
16a1(phal chen): te yid gnyis rnyed par 'gyur/ /la lar lha dang 'grogs shing la lar shi 'pho la lar mngal 'gro gnas pa ston/ /la lar mngal zhugs la lar
16a2(phal chen): rnam par sangs rgyas la lar 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /la lar skye ba la lar mya ngan 'das pa la lar bzo yang rab tu slob/ /la lar bud med tshogs kyi dbus gnas la lar ting
16a3(phal chen): 'dzin la lar mngon par 'byung / /la lar khyu mchog byang chub dam par sangs rgyas byang chub shing gi drung na bzhugs/ /la lar 'khor lo rab tu bskor zhing la lar sna tshogs
16a4(phal chen): chos rnams yongs su tshol/ /la lar sangs rgyas gyur cing zhing rnams bye ba brgyar khyab 'gro bar ston byed kyang / /byang chub don du spyod pa dag gis tshogs rnams las kyang phyir
16a5(phal chen): ldog ma yin no/ /bskal pa'i grangs la 'jug pa'i pha rol phyin pas bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya dag /khyu mchog sems gcig nang ston sems gcig bskal pa brgyar yang de
16a6(phal chen): bzhin ston pa byed/ /'gro ba thams cad la yang rtog dang mi rtog rtog pa'i yul rnams thams cad ston/ /gsog pa med cing phyogs la gnas med spyod pa de dag kun kyang
16a7(phal chen): rab tu ston/ /gang phyir rgyal ba nye rgyal de dag nyi tshe'i phyogs med kun na bzhugs pas na/ /'gro ba kun gyi rgyal ba ji snyed pa dag thams cad rdul gcig steng du mthong / /
16b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsgrubs dang sems can yul dang chos kyi rgyu tshul rnams kyang mthong / /de ltar brtson pas bskal pa khrag khrig brtson byed 'on kyang cha shas zad mi 'gyur/ /de
16b2(phal chen): ltar 'gro ba kun gyi sems can tshul rnams mtha' yas rgya chen rab tu shes/ /sems can gcig la mtha' yas lus dang rgyu dang bye ba khrag khrig yod pa rnams/ /de dag 'gro ba
16b3(phal chen): gcig dang ma lus thams cad dag la rnam pa kun du ston pa byed/ /bslab pa 'di yi phyogs la pha rol phyin te ma bslabs rnams ni ston pa byed/ /dbang po rnon po dang ni 'bring dang gang
16b4(phal chen): dag dbang po rtul ba'ang rab shes nas/ /'gro bar skal ba yod dang skal ba med pa'i dbang po'i 'khor lo skor ba byed/ /dbang po re re la yang dbang po thams cad rnam pa phan tshun
16b5(phal chen): gnas pa dang / /dbang po'i dngos po phra ba'i tshul dang gang dag dbang po brtan pa'ang rab tu shes/ /de ltar khams dang mos dang bsam pa spyod dang nyon mongs bag chags rnams kyang
16b6(phal chen): shes| |sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yi sems spyod da ltar byung ba'ang de bzhin te/ /sems can kun gyi spyod pa'i pha rol phyin kyang 'ong dang 'gro ba yod ma yin/ /ma nor spyod pa
16b7(phal chen): shes nas 'gro ba kun la chos kyi dam pa ston pa byed/ /de ltar sems kyi sems spyod sna tshogs kun nas nyon mongs med pa dag /sems gcig la ni khong du chud nas byang chub
17a1(phal chen): mchog tu kun mkhyen rnam sangs rgya/ /sems kyi skad cig gcig gis 'gro ba rnams phye rang gi shes pas rtogs gyur nas/ /sems kyi tshul shes
17a2(phal chen): sems med rab tu gzhol bas ye shes mchog la kun kyang 'god/ /rdzu 'phrul mchog thob ye shes khyu mchog mngon par shes pa kun gyis rab tu 'phags/ /sems
17a3(phal chen): bskyed gcig gis khrag khrig mtha' yas zhing dang phyogs rnams thams cad du'ang 'gro/ de ltar ye shes dbang bsgyur 'gro zhing bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig zad byed kyang / /skra
17a4(phal chen): rgyud shin tu phra ba gcig la zhugs par gnas las gar yang 'pho ba med/ /'tsho ba'i don du sgyu mkhan gzugs rnams sna tshogs 'gro ba kun la ston byed kyang / /sgyu ma kun
17a5(phal chen): btsal gzugs su mi dmigs gzugs yod ma yin par yang dmigs pa med/ /de ltar mkhas pa ye shes thabs dang shes rab rgya chen sgyu mar zhugs pa rnams/ /sprul
17a6(phal chen): pa phun sum tshogs pas 'jig rten phal chen khyab par byas shing rab tu ston/ /nyi ma zla ba mkha' la rgyu zhing mdzes la shin tu 'phags pa'i rnams/ /ma rnyogs chu rnams
17a7(phal chen): ji snyed dag tu snang yang de ni chu dang 'dres ma yin/ /de ltar chos nyid dag pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog la shes pas shin tu 'phags pa'i rnams/ /'gro ba dag pa'i sems kyi
17b1(phal chen): yul la snang yang 'gro ba dag dang 'dres ma yin/ /la la gnyid log rmi lam dag na bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad byed/ /lo ni bye ba khrag khrig mang po zad par rmis kyang mtshan mo de ma
17b2(phal chen): zad| |de ltar chos nyid rang bzhin mtshungs par rjes rtogs bya ba sna tshogs kun ston te/ /skad cig gcig la bskal pa bye ba zad byed de dag ye shes zad mi 'gyur/ /ri yi dbang po'i
17b3(phal chen): ri sul gnas pa 'jig rten dag dang mnyam du thos pa'i sgra/ /kun nas sgra yi sgra brnyan de dang 'dra bar brjod kyang rtog cing g.yo ba med/ /de bzhin chos kyi rang bzhin shes pa'i khyu
17b4(phal chen): mchog byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dag / rtog pa med par sems can sgra rnams ji snyed par ni chos dang spyod pa ston/ /dpyid zla dag gi smig rgyu g.yos la ji ltar sems can chur
17b5(phal chen): ni 'du shes nas/ /de nas chu rnyed mi 'gyur btung du med cing je bas je skom rnams 'phel ba/ /de ltar mkhas pa thar la zhugs pa sems can dag gi nyon mongs g.yo ba'i rnams/ /
17b6(phal chen): shes pas rtog nas sems can 'du shes bya med phyir zhing bya ba rnam par 'phel/ /gzugs ni dbu ba lta bur khyu mchog ston te tshor ba chu yi chu bur 'dra/ /'du shes thams cad
17b7(phal chen): smig rgyu lta bur rag las 'dus byas chu skyes shing dang 'dra/ /sems ni sgyu 'dra bsgrub bya skyed byed de bzhin bya ba sna tshogs rab tu ston/ /de ltar phung po dgod pa ston kyang dbang
18a1(phal chen): bsgyur dag ni de la gnas pa med/ /skye mched stong pa'i rang bzhin dbang med 'khrul 'khor bya ba kun du 'byin byed dang / /khams ni chos kyi dbyings
18a2(phal chen): mtshungs dngos po dag dang bral bar 'gro ba rnams la ston/ /dam pa'i don tshul zhi ba las ni bden pa sna tshogs rnams kyang rab tu ston/ /de ltar de dag chos tshul rnam par
18a3(phal chen): dgod pa ston pa byed kyang gnas pa med/ /'ong ba med cing phyogs su 'gro ba med la rgyud du gnas pa med pa yi/ /nyon mongs rgyu las byung ba'i las dang las las sdug
18a4(phal chen): bsngal de ltar lam gsum du/ /rkyen la rag las 'byung ba rnams dang yod dang med las rab tu 'das pa yi/ /yang dag don dam dbu ma'i lam ni dngos po med la gnas
18a5(phal chen): pa rab tu ston/ /skad cig gcig la dus gsum khong du chud kyang skad cig sna tshogs rnams kyang ston/ /'dod dang gzugs med khams kyi yul dang bya ba sna tshogs ston par
18a6(phal chen): byed| |sdom pa gsum gyi spyod dang rab tu ldan zhing thar pa gsum yang rab tu ston/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gcig la theg pa gsum du rnam par dgod pa de bzhin
18a7(phal chen): ston| |gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rab tu dbye ba'i chos dang dbang po pha rol phyin/ /khams dang mos pa dag dang nyon mongs rnam 'byed kun du 'gro ba thob gyur pa/ /mig
18b1(phal chen): gi yul gyur sngon gyi gnas pa dran zhing nyon mongs zhi bar mkhas pa dag / sangs rgyas stobs bcu dag gis ye shes shin tu yangs kyang stobs la dmigs pa med/ /sangs rgyas
18b2(phal chen): thams cad rjes su dpog stong 'gro ba kun du mngon sum chos bzhed de/ /nyon mongs zag pa lhan cig skyes pa mi mnga' byang ba'ang brnyes par gyur pa med/ /'byung ba thugs su chud
18b3(phal chen): pa'i ye shes rgya chen des ni 'gro ba 'don pa mdzad/ /'di yi gnas la rgyal sras 'jigs pa med cing 'on kyang zhi bar spyod pa med/ /'khrul pa mi mnga' lam las g.yo ba'ang mi
18b4(phal chen): mnga' dgongs pa nyams pa'ang mi mnga' ste/ /mos dang brtson 'grus ting 'dzin shes rab rnam par 'byed pa ye shes gang du'ang nyams pa med pa/ /thams cad mkhyen pa mdzad sdom pa
18b5(phal chen): gsum mdzad dus gsum kun la mngon sum mkhyen mnga' ba/ /'gro ba kun gyis ma thob byams pa'i chos nyid mi 'phrogs chags pa med brnyes pa/ /chos sgo gang dag gis ni spyod pa
18b6(phal chen): 'di dag rab tu thob pa smra ba'i mchog / de dag yon tan mang po don gyis brgyan pa'i phyogs tsam bdag gis brjod par bya/ /de dag spyod pa bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu brjod kyang zad
18b7(phal chen): par mi nus te/ /'on kyang ji ltar sa la sa rdul 'dra ye shes spyod pa phyogs tsam brjod par bya/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rten ldan bsam pa thob pas ngo mtshar 'du shes gnas pa
19a1(phal chen): rnams/ /spyod pa mchog dang ldan zhing byams pa'i rjes song brtson 'grus brtan pas rnam gnon cing / /tshul khrims mi g.yo dbugs phyin de dag 'gro ba
19a2(phal chen): thams cad yongs su smin par byed/ /lung bstan rab tu thob nas rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa tshul bzhin thob par byed/ /sangs rgyas yon tan dag la zhugs kyang sems can
19a3(phal chen): sems dang zhing la sems pa byed/ /bskal pa'i dus la 'jug pa'i ye shes ldan zhing mkhas pa skyo ba'i 'du shes med/ /gzungs kyi tshul dang yang dag tha dad stobs rnams
19a4(phal chen): thob cing yang dag don gyis rgyal/ /bstan pa mtshungs med sems kyis mkhas pa byang chub zhi ba rnam par 'tshang yang rgya/ /sems kyi spyod pa thams cad bzang po'i yon tan
19a5(phal chen): spyod pa'i mchog tu smon pa byed/ /snying rje'i rkyen dang byams pa mchog rten byang chub dam pa sbyong bar byed dang ldan/ /brtson pas pha rol phyin rtogs rab tu mkhas shing skyo ba'i
19a6(phal chen): pha rol phyin gyur pas/ /khyu mchog mos dang rab tu rtogs pa'i stobs thob byang chub dam pa mngon 'tshang rgya/ /mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa thob cing ye shes tshul gyis
19a7(phal chen): chos mchog ston byed pa/ /yon tan thob byed spobs dang ldan pa de dag chos kyi dbang phyug mchog tu 'gyur/ /dbang la gnas kyang gnas pa med pas mnyam pa med
19b1(phal chen): pa'i sems kyi 'brug sgra sgrogs/ /ye shes mchog dang de bzhin gshegs sprul sgrub cing byang chub zhi ba nye bar 'gro /mkhas pa de dag bskal pa 'byams klas byin rlabs shes pas
19b2(phal chen): dbugs phyin rab tu thob/ /zab la gnas pas brtan par 'gro na gnas shing nem nur bsal bas mkhas pa rnams/ /ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi dgongs pa mkhas shing
19b3(phal chen): rnam phye pha rol phyin/ /snyoms par 'jug pa'i ye shes yul la zhugs nas thams cad mkhyen par 'tshang yang rgya/ /ye shes rnam thar kun gyi pha rol phyin cing mngon par shes pas
19b4(phal chen): rnam par rtsen/ /rig pa'i snang ldan rnam grol nyon mongs bral bas 'gro la skyed mos tshal dang 'dra/ /gang la dkar ba'i spyod pa'i gzhal med khang mdzes sna tshogs spyod pa ston pa
19b5(phal chen): po| |'gro ba kun la rgyan rnams du ma rab tu ston kyang sems las g.yo ba med/ /bsam pa shin tu shes pas bstan pa rab tu mkhas shing pha rol phyin 'gyur bas/ /mkhas pa
19b6(phal chen): dag ni dag cing sbyangs ba'i byang chub phyag rgya snang ba'i ye shes kyis/ /'gro ba dag dang mi mtshungs zhum med khyu mchog lhag pa'i bsam pa ri bo 'dra/ /ye shes rgya mtsho 'dra
19b7(phal chen): dang yon tan mi zad don du spyod pa chen po spyod/ /de dag rin chen 'dra ba'i gnas la rdo rje lta bu'i go cha bgos pas gnas/ /shin tu rgya chen rtsom la rab tu mkhas shing 'gro
20a1(phal chen): ba kun na thub pa med/ /byang chub mchog tu lung bstan skyon med khong du chud pa'i rgya chen sems la gnas/ /sangs rgyas gter mchog mi zad thob
20a2(phal chen): nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'tshang rgya'o/ /rtag tu kun rdzob shes pas dbang 'gyur rnam par 'phrul ba rnams la mkhas pas na/ /zhing rnams kun dang chos kyi yul la
20a3(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes rgyud la gnas/ /lus dang smon lam spyod yul ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa la yang de bzhin te/ /'gro ba dag la rnam par rtse ba bye ba khrag khrig du ma
20a4(phal chen): mang po ston/ /mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis rnam par 'phrul zhing nges par rnam par rtse/ /khyu mchog de dag sangs rgyas yul la stobs thob 'gro ba kun gyis
20a5(phal chen): thub pa med/ /mkhas pa 'jigs pa med dang bag tsha med dang ma 'dres rnams kyis shin tu brgyan/ /sangs rgyas sras dag las rnams thams cad byed cing shin tu mdzes
20a6(phal chen): pa'i lus dang ldan/ /de dag lus kyi las kyi dngos po shin tu rgya che dag kyang dag cing dge /de yang 'byin pa'i tshe na rgyal bas byin gyis brlabs shing las ni mchog kyang
20a7(phal chen): byed| |dam pa de dag sems bskyed gcig la sems rgyas byed pa'i sems kyang rab tu ston/ /rgyal ba'i dbang po thob pas rtag tu dbang po'i ting 'dzin dbang la rab tu
20b1(phal chen): gnas/ /bsam bdag cing g.yo rgyu rnams dang bral te lhag pa'i bsam pa mngon sum gyur/ /mos pa'i 'jug pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad 'gro ba dag la rab tu ston/ /bag chags
20b2(phal chen): thams cad spangs nas spyod pa dam pa rab tu 'dzin/ /nan tan bya ba grub pa'i ye shes mkhas pas thams cad mkhyen par 'tshang yang rgya/ /bsam pa rnam par spangs nas de dag
20b3(phal chen): skyon med gnas pa zhi ba mchog kyang 'thob/ /mkhas pa 'di lam shin tu bslabs pa de dag ming ni yon tan sgo nas grags/ /mtha' yas sems kyi yul ldan gnas pa
20b4(phal chen): med par lam rnams yang du sgom pa byed/ /ye shes tshul la gnas shing 'gro ba rnams la lam gyi rgyan rnams shin tu ston/ /spyod pa lag pa lta bu dag dang ldan pa lto yin
20b5(phal chen): snying po ye shes mchog / snying ni rdo rje lta bu snying rje'i go bgos ye shes gdab pa'i mtshon cha yin/ /shes rab mgo ste chos rtogs mig yin byang chub spyod pa yang ni rna ba
20b6(phal chen): yin| |tshul khrims dag cing nyon mongs med la gtsang ste mun bzhi byed sna yin te/ /spobs pa lce yin lus ni rig pa yin te sems ni ye shes dam pa yin/ /spyod pa rgyu
20b7(phal chen): ba yin te byang chub shing gnas seng ge'i khri ni 'dug pa yin/ /tshangs pa'i lam rnams dag ni lam yin stong pa chags med dam pa spyod yul lo/ /gang gis de dag
21a1(phal chen): snang bar 'gyur ba'i snang ba bde bar gshegs kyi ye shes yul/ /sems can spyod la rnam par lta ba ye shes mchog ste rnam pa sna tshogs bsgyings//
21a2(phal chen): sems can dben zhing chags dang bral ba'i sbyin pa bsnyems pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / /bzod pa mi 'khrugs brtson 'grus mi ldog dbang bsgyur ba ni bsam gtan dam
21a3(phal chen): pa yin| |rgyu ba med cing nam mkha' 'dra ba shes rab byams pa sems can rnam par 'dren/ /skyo ba med snying rje rnam dag chos ni dga' ba nyon mongs gnas las btang yang
21a4(phal chen): snyoms/ /don ni zhi ba chos kyi yul la nye bar 'gro ba bsod nams 'gro la bsngos/ /ye shes tshogs ni ral gri rnon po lta bu snang ba chen po rig pa ste/ /'gro ba rnams la
21a5(phal chen): thos pa ston pas mi ngoms bskal par 'dren kyang 'jigs pa med/ /nan tan byed la gnas te bdud rnams btul nas bdud kyi lam yang rab tu bcad/ /rgyal ba rnams
21a6(phal chen): kyi 'phrin las gang yin ye shes spyod pa lhag pa'i bsam pas 'dzin/ /nga rgyal las rnams rnam par spangs te rtag tu ye shes kyi yang bya ba byed/ /bdud rnams byin
21a7(phal chen): gyis brlabs bcom mkhas pa de dag sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyis 'phags/ /chos kyi byin gyi rlabs thob blo gros chen po 'chang ba lha yi gnas su 'dong / /lha rnams
21b1(phal chen): byas te 'chi 'phos song nas mchog gi mngal ni shin tu phra bar 'gro/ skye ba mchog ni nye bar bstan nas mchog gi gom pa bdun ni 'dor bar byed/ /mkhas pa de dag sems can kun la
21b2(phal chen): bzo dang spyod dang btsun mo'i 'khor kyang ston/ /chags pa med par mngon par byung nas byang chub shing drung chos kyi rgyan kyang byed/ /stong pa stan las 'od zer dra ba yangs pa skye zhing yang
21b3(phal chen): dag bskul ba byed/ /bdud rnams btul te byang chub go 'phang sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /sangs rgyas sa yang rab tu bstan nas 'dren pa de dag mtshungs pa med par
21b4(phal chen): bzhud/ /gang gis mkhas pa bskal pa bye bar rnam par rtse zhing yang dag byung gyur nas/ /sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma sangs rgyas yon tan rab 'god kyang / /rnam pa kun du
21b5(phal chen): sems can mi gnas chos la ma yin spyod la ma yin pa'i/ /de dag gi ni spyod pa 'di 'dra mtha' yas shin tu rgya chen mdor bstan te/ /de 'dra'i spyod dang ldan pa'i ye shes khyu mchog rdzu
21b6(phal chen): 'phrul dag gis rnam par rtse/ /zhing rnams bye ba stong yang skra rtse gcig la bskal pa khrag khrig brgyar 'dzin te/ /lag tu khyer te zhing rnams bye bar 'gro yang lus la'ang ngal dub gang
21b7(phal chen): yang med/ /mkhas pas khyer nas ji lta'i gnas su bkod kyang 'gro ba dag la gnod pa med/ /'jig rten mkhyen pa'i zhing gi rgyan rnams ji snyed rnam pa tha dad bstan pa dag/ kun kyang ba
22a1(phal chen): sbu gcig gi bu gar khyu mchog de dag yang dag rab tu ston/ /mkhas pa ba spu'i bu gar rgya mtsho chu rnams ma lus khong chud rab ston kyang / /'phel
22a2(phal chen): zhing 'grib med 'gro ba dag la gnod par 'gyur med bya ba de yang ston/ /khor yug khrag khrig shin tu phra ba'i rdul byas lag gis bsdus khyer zhing / /zhing rnams khrag khrig bye ma
22a3(phal chen): snyed du 'dor byed gcig tu gnyis kyang gzhog mi byed/ /zhing rnams de dag rdul du byas te de bzhin gzhan yang rnam par 'jig byed de/ /de 'dra'i rjes su dang ba zad par gyur kyang
22a4(phal chen): 'jug pa de dag mi zad do/ /'jig rten kun gyi nyi ma zla ba skar ma gang dag stong rnams ji snyed dang / /gang yang nor bu'i 'od dang me yi 'od dang gang na gang rnams lha dbang 'od/ /
22a5(phal chen): mang po de dag rab tu 'das pa'i 'od zer khrag khrig spu gcig khung nas 'gyed/ /'jig rten kun gyi ngan song sdug bsngal zhi bar byed cing chos kyi dam pa ston/ /'gro ba ma
22a6(phal chen): lus sgra yi rnam pa sna tshogs skad rnams thams cad ji snyed pa/ /sku mchog de dag tshig gcig rab tu brjod pas sgra rnams thams cad tshang bar brjod/ /srog chags bye ba
22a7(phal chen): rnams kyis yid du 'ong ba'i sgra thob dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur/ /rgyal bas bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam pa ji snyed thams cad de las thos par 'gyur/ /gang yang ji snyed
22b1(phal chen): 'das pa'i bskal pa yod pa de dag ma 'ongs bskal par ston/ /gang yang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ji snyed de dag 'das par ston/ /khyu mchog dag ni zhing rnams 'tshig dang
22b2(phal chen): gnas pa rnam pa tha dad ston pa byed/ /'gro ba ji snyed thams cad mkhas pa de dag skra rtse gcig la rab tu 'god/ /'das dang ma byon pa dang phyogs bcu kun na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba ji
22b3(phal chen): snyed pa/ /de dag thams cad rang gi lus las ma nor dbang bsgyur rnam par 'phrul pa ston/ /sprul pa'i byin gyi rlabs la shes pa'i mkhas pa de dag 'gro ba ji snyed sems/ /de
22b4(phal chen): snyed lus rnams rdul dang bral ba ston kyang lus la gnas pa gang yang med/ /lam rgyud drug po gang rnams ji snyed yod pa'i 'gro ba kun gyi lus bsdus shing / /brgya byin tshangs
22b5(phal chen): pa'i 'jig rten mgon po rnams dang de bzhin lha dang mi yi rnams/ /gang yang nyan thos rang rgyal rnams la dad cing sangs rgyas sku la mos pa la/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub
22b6(phal chen): pa'i spyod pa dag dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa ston/ /'gro ba kun gyi 'du shes dra ba rab dang 'bring dang tha mar 'jug pa rnams/ /thams cad shes shing byin rlob byang chub 'tshang
22b7(phal chen): rgya zhing rnams kun kyang rab tu ston/ /'du shes dra ba rnams bsgoms blo ldan 'jig rten 'du shes rnams la dbang bsgyur ba/ /bya ba dang ni sbyor ba ji snyed pa dang kun mchog byang
23a1(phal chen): chub spyod pa sten/ /de dag de dang rnam par 'phrul pa shin tu rgya chen dam pa gzhan yang ston/ /de dag gang la 'jig rten sa min pa dang yul min de dag
23a2(phal chen): bya ba ston/ /ston kyang bya ba lhur len ma yin gzhan yang phyir zhing gong du ston pa byed/ /de dag sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji bzhin spyod pa ci bzhin yang dag 'jug /lus
23a3(phal chen): ni nam mkha' lta bu dag dang yid la chags med 'jig rten gsum gyi gtso/ /tshul khrims spos kyi byug pa rab tu zhi ba gos yin yon tan sna tshogs rgyan/ /chos kyi go 'phang
23a4(phal chen): skyon med thob cing thams cad mkhyen pa yid bzhin nor bu ste/ /bde gshegs kun gyi ye shes dbang bskur thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal po'i thabs la gnas/ /pha rol
23a5(phal chen): phyin pa rtag 'byung 'khor lo yin te glang po mngon par shes pa mchog / ye shes rdzu 'phrul rta ste chags pa med 'gro shes rab nor bu dam pa yin/ /spyod pa btsun mo bzang mo
23a6(phal chen): bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi po khyim bdag dam pa'o/ /thabs la shin tu mkhas pa blon po yin te mkhas pa de dag 'khor los bsgyur/ /stong pa khyim ste ting 'dzin grong khyer mchog
23a7(phal chen): yin byams dang snying rje'i go cha'o/ /shes rab ral gri yin te dran pa gzhu mdzes dbang po rno ba mda' yang yin/ /'jig rten mkhyen pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs ni gdugs te/
23b1(phal chen): ye shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng / /de dang de dag bzod pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi dpung dang sde rnams 'dus pa 'joms/ /gzungs ni sa ste byang chub spyod pa chu klung ye shes lu ma shes rab
23b2(phal chen): shing | |me tog byang chub yan lag ting nge 'dzin ni rta ste rdzu 'phrul rnam par brgyan/ /stong pa rnam thar brgyan pa rdzing bu yin te rnam par dpyod pa bzang po btsun mo yin/ /thar pa bdud rtsi
23b3(phal chen): bza' ba yin te chos ni btung ba theg pa gsum gyis rtse/ /de dag spyod pa de 'dra yid 'ongs khyad par 'phags te de bas gong du mang / /gang gi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du skyo ba
23b4(phal chen): yongs su mi skyo bar/ /ston pa mchod cing rnam dag zhing la brtson pas 'gro ba ye shes mchog la 'god/ /kha na ma tho kun med ye shes rab gnas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rgyas
23b5(phal chen): byed| |zhing rnams rdul gyi 'brur blags re re nas kyang 'grang zhing brtsi bar nus 'gyur la/ /bar snang mkha' chen 'di yang skra yis gzhal te zad par bya bar nus srid de/ /skad
23b6(phal chen): cig gcig la 'gro ba rnams kyi sems ni bgrang tshul shes par nus srid kyi/ /sangs rgyas sras rnams spyod pa dag ni bskal pa brgyar brjod zad par mi nus so/ /gang zhig yon
23b7(phal chen): tan rnam dag 'di dag 'thob par 'dod cing gong du gzhan 'dod dang / /gang zhig sdug bsngal rnams las 'gro ba thar byas bde la dgod par 'dod pa dang / /gang zhig bde bar
24a1(phal chen): gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs dang mnyam du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag / des ni rdo rje lta bu brtan pa'i sems su gyis te yon tan bslab par byos/ /
24a2(phal chen): shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //bam po brgyad cu drug
24a3(phal chen): pa| bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal/ skyabs med pa la zas sbyin pa'i kun dga' ra ba'i nang / pho brang brtsegs pa bkod pa rgya chen po can na/ byang chub sems
24a4(phal chen): dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes pa dam pa'i ye shes dang / brtan pa dam pa'i ye shes
24a5(phal chen): dang | chags med dam pa'i ye shes dang / me tog dam pa'i ye shes dang / nyi ma dam pa'i ye shes dang / zla ba dam pa'i ye shes dang / dri med dam pa'i ye shes dang /
24a6(phal chen): rdo rje dam pa'i ye shes dang / rdul med dam pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad dam pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i
24a7(phal chen): rgyal mtshan dang / ri rab rgyal mtshan dang / rin chen rgyal mtshan dang / chags med rgyal mtshan dang / me tog rgyal mtshan dang / dri med rgyal mtshan dang / nyi ma'i rgyal
24b1(phal chen): mtshan dang / mdzes pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / rdul med rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen gzi brjid
24b2(phal chen): dang / blo gros chen po'i gzi brjid dang / ye shes rdo rje'i gzi brjid dang / dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid dang / chos kyi nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang / bsod nams ri bo'i gzi brjid dang / ye
24b3(phal chen): shes snang ba'i gzi brjid dang / kun nas dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / kun nas 'od dpal gzi brjid dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu snang bas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gzi
24b4(phal chen): brjid dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / pad+mo'i snying po dang / rin po che'i snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / yon tan rnam dag snying po dang /
24b5(phal chen): chos rgya mtsho'i snying po dang / rnam par snang ba'i snying po dang / gtsug gi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' pad+mo'i dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i mig
24b6(phal chen): dang / rnam par dag pa'i mig dang / dri ma med pa'i mig dang / chags pa med pa'i mig dang / kun nas blta ba'i mig dang / shin tu rnam par blta ba'i mig dang / ut+pa la'i mig
24b7(phal chen): dang | rdo rje'i mig dang / rin po che'i mig dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mig dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan dang / chos kyi dbyings snang ba'i blo gros
25a1(phal chen): cod pan dang / byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i cod pan dang / phyogs rnam par snang ba'i cod pan dang / sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par byung
25a2(phal chen): ba'i snying po'i cod pan dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i cod pan dang / kun nas rnam par snang ba'i cod pan dang / zil gyis non pa med pa'i cod pan
25a3(phal chen): dang | de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng ge'i khri 'dzin pa'i cod pan dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' kun nas snang ba'i cod pan dang / byang chub
25a4(phal chen): sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gtsug phud dang / klu'i dbang po'i gtsug phud dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa snang ba'i gtsug phud dang / byang chub dam
25a5(phal chen): pa'i gtsug phud dang / smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu sgrogs pa'i rin chen rgyal po'i gtsug phud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
25a6(phal chen): rab tu 'gyed pa'i nor bu rin chen 'brug sgra'i gtsug phud dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad tha mi dad par rnam par dmigs pa'i rin chen rgyal pos brgyan pa'i gtsug
25a7(phal chen): phud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa snang ba'i rgyal mtshan rin po che'i rgyal po dra bas kun nas yog pa'i gtsug phud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
25b1(phal chen): thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sgrog pa'i gtsug phud dang / byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum gyi ming thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i gtsug phud dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya
25b2(phal chen): chen po'i 'od dang / gzi brjid dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / rin po che'i 'od dang / rdul dang bral ba'i 'od dang / skar ma'i 'od dang / chos kyi 'od dang / zhi ba'i 'od dang / nyi ma'i 'od
25b3(phal chen): dang | rnam par 'phrul ba'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dpal dang / ye shes dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / mngon
25b4(phal chen): par shes pa'i dpal dang / 'od kyi dpal dang / me tog dpal dang / rin po che'i dpal dang / byang chub kyi dpal dang / tshangs pa'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas snang
25b5(phal chen): ba'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang / sa sgra'i dbyangs dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i dbyangs dang / ri dbang rgyal po 'thab
25b6(phal chen): pa'i dbyangs dang / chos kyi dbyings kun tu rgyas pa'i dbyangs dang / chos rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'dul
25b7(phal chen): ba'i dbyangs dang / snying rje chen po'i tshul gyi sprin rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya bas dbugs 'byin
26a1(phal chen): pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'phags pa dang / khyad par gyis 'phags pa dang / ye shes kyis 'phags pa dang / bsod nams
26a2(phal chen): ri bos 'phags pa dang / yon tan gyi tshogs kyis 'phags pa dang / grags pas 'phags pa dang / kun du snang bas 'phags pa dang / byams pa chen pos 'phags pa dang / ye
26a3(phal chen): shes rgya mtshos 'phags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud kyi gdung gis 'phags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi dpal dang / mchog gi
26a4(phal chen): dpal dang / kun tu 'phags pa'i dpal dang / rnam par snang ba'i dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / zla ba'i dpal dang / nam mkha'i dpal dang / rin po che'i dpal dang /
26a5(phal chen): dpal gyi dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / chos kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / 'gro ba'i dbang
26a6(phal chen): po'i rgyal po dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / tshogs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / lha'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / zhi pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / mi g.yo ba'i dbang
26a7(phal chen): po'i rgyal po dang / khyu mchog dbang po'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang / chags pa
26b1(phal chen): med pa'i sgra dang / sa'i dbyangs kyi sgra dang / rgya mtsho'i 'brug gi sgra dang / sprin gyi dbyangs kyi sgra dang / chos snang ba'i sgra dang / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi sgra dang / sems can kun gyi dge
26b2(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba rab tu sgrogs pa'i sgra dang / sngon gyi smon lam yongs su bskul ba'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor bcom zhing med par byed pa'i sgra dang / byang
26b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rin po che'i blo dang / ye shes ri bo'i blo dang / nam mkha'i blo dang / dri ma med pa'i blo dang / chags pa med pa'i blo dang / rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i blo dang / dus
26b4(phal chen): gsum snang ba'i blo dang / yangs pa'i blo dang / kun du snang ba'i blo dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su snang ba'i blo dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga
26b5(phal chen): stong tsam ste/ kun kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'geng pa chags pa med pa'i spyod yul
26b6(phal chen): can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong bas lus mtha' yas pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa/ rnam
26b7(phal chen): par dmigs par bya ba la bsgribs pa med pa'i mig gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i tshe/ nye bar 'dong pa rgyun mi
27a1(phal chen): gcod pas tshad med par phyin pa/ chos rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pas snang ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa/ tha dad pa yang
27a2(phal chen): dag par shes pa rnam par dag pas/ bskal pa mtha' yas par shin tu ston pa mi zad pa/ 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs kyi lus yongs su ston pas/ nam
27a3(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul rnam par dag cing mi gnas pa/ sems can gyi khams sems can med pa dang / srog med pa yongs su shes pas rab
27a4(phal chen): rib med pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'od zer gyi dra bas rgyas par 'gengs pas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /nyan thos rdzu 'phrul
27a5(phal chen): chen po dang ldan pa lnga brgya ste/ thams cad kyang bden pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin mngon par khong du chud pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du gyur pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin la
27a6(phal chen): zhugs pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho las gyen du 'phags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs su 'gyur ba'i spyod yul can kun nas sbyor ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / bcings
27a7(phal chen): pa rnam par bzlog pa/ chags pa med pa'i gnas la brten pa nam mkha' ltar zhi ba la rnam par spyod pa/ sangs rgyas la the tshom dang / nem nur dang yid gnyis yongs su
27b1(phal chen): chad pa| sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la mos pa'i lam du zhugs pa sha stag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don
27b2(phal chen): du zhugs pa/ gsol ba ma btab par dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa/ sems can gzhan bsrung ba la zhugs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i
27b3(phal chen): ye shes kyi sgo la zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i spyod yul la byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs
27b4(phal chen): pa'i bstan pa yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs yang dag par gzung ba'i smon lam gyis yang dag par skyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung gi rgyud du 'byung ba
27b5(phal chen): mngon du gyur pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par mos pa sha stag dang yang thabs gcig go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa de dag dang / nyan thos rdzu 'phrul
27b6(phal chen): chen po dang ldan pa de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa de dag 'di snyam du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod
27b7(phal chen): yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi bsnyengs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
28a1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnga' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs
28a2(phal chen): dang | de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang / sngon legs par spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
28a3(phal chen): ba dang | dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi skyabs dang / dad pa'i mig yongs su dag pa dang / rgya chen po la mos pa'i snang bar rab tu thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam
28a4(phal chen): pa rnam par dag pa dang / bsam pa thag pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon cing / yang dag par zhugs pa ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'jug pa'am/
28a5(phal chen): khong du chud pa'am/ yid ches pa'am/ yongs su shes pa'am/ rnam par rtogs pa'am/ gzung ba'am/ rnam par dpyad pa'am/ rnam par bsgom pa'am/ rnam par dbye
28a6(phal chen): ba'am| rnam par grol ba'am/ rab tu brjod pa'am/ sems can pha rol gyi rgyud du phyin par bya bar ni mi nus na/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'
28a7(phal chen): rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba dang / sems can bsam pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / mos pa sna tshogs dang / shes pa sna tshogs kyi tshig dang brda sna tshogs su gyur pa/ dbang
28b1(phal chen): bsgyur ba'i sa gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/ dbang po sna tshogs su rnam par dag pa/ bsam pa dang sbyor ba rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan can/ sems dang bsam pa'i yul gzhan
28b2(phal chen): dang gzhan can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/ chos bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan la mos pa dag la/ sngon thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs
28b3(phal chen): pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin
28b4(phal chen): pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su mnan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /
28b5(phal chen): sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrubs pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshul
28b6(phal chen): mngon par bsgrubs pa rnam par phye ba'i snang ba lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi bkod pa yongs su dag par mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par
28b7(phal chen): bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrubs pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrub
29a1(phal chen): pa dang | rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho lta'ang yang
29a2(phal chen): dag par bstan grang / mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgos rnam par 'phrul ba lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor
29a3(phal chen): pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / khyu mchog gi mthu lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par 'phrul ba lta'ang
29a4(phal chen): yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can gyi khams gdul ba'i thabs kyi sgo lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen
29a5(phal chen): pa nyid kyi chos kyi grong khyer la mnga' mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi lam snang bar mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par
29a6(phal chen): bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gshegs shing / rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs
29a7(phal chen): pa sems can thams cad kyi yon bzhes pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams dang / yon ston pa'i cho
29b1(phal chen): 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi tshul la/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan dmigs pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang
29b2(phal chen): dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can
29b3(phal chen): thams cad la yongs su bstan pa dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ting nge
29b4(phal chen): 'dzin gyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi
29b5(phal chen): sems kyi yongs su rtogs pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nam mkha' dang mnyam pas dpe med pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du rnam par
29b6(phal chen): snang ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ thugs rje chen po'i sgo'i rang bzhin can/ thugs rje chen po'i sgo dang ldan pa/ thugs rje chen po'i sngon du 'gro ba/ thugs rje chen po'i chos can la mnyam
29b7(phal chen): par bzhag go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ pho brang brtsegs pa rgyan chen po can yang mtha' dang dbus med par yangs shing / rdo rje thub pa med pa'i
30a1(phal chen): rgyan mtshan gyis sa'i gzhi rab tu brgyan pa dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dra ba kun du bkram pa/ rin po che du ma'i me tog sil mas
30a2(phal chen): chal par gang ba/ nor bu rin po che dam pa mdzes par bkram pa dang / bai DUR+Ya'i ka bas mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba rnam par snang bas rgyan shin tu rnam par phye
30a3(phal chen): ba dang / rin po che bzang po mang po dang ldan pa'i nor bu rin po che/ 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi phung pos shin tu brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad las sgo gang dang / rta babs
30a4(phal chen): dang | pu shu dang / skar khung byas shing / khri 'phang grangs med pa rnam par dag pas brgyan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad dang 'dra ba'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyan
30a5(phal chen): dang ldan pa dang / 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i nor bu rin po che rnam par phye ba dang / nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan rab tu bsgreng ba
30a6(phal chen): dang | sgo dang / rta babs thams cad las 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par 'gengs pa rab tu 'byung bas rnam par mdzes par byas pa dang / phyi rol gyi 'khor gyi dkyil
30a7(phal chen): 'khor gyi sa'i gzhi stegs bu brjod du med pas brgyan pa dang / phyogs kun nas them skabs kyi phreng ba nor bu rin po ches brtsegs shing / shin tu rnam par phye bas rab tu mdzes
30b1(phal chen): par kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /dze ta'i tshal thams cad kyang / chu zheng gab par shin tu yangs shing rgya che bar kun nas gnas par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi
30b2(phal chen): zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang / chu zheng kun du rgya che zhing yangs pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / sa'i
30b3(phal chen): gzhi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs brjod du med pas kun nas grub pa dang / nor bu rin po che grangs med pa'i rwa bas kun nas bskor ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing ta la'i phreng bas
30b4(phal chen): mdzes pas brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na spos chu'i chu klung tshad med pa klong mtha' yas par 'khyil ba'i spos kyi chus yongs su gang ba/ rin
30b5(phal chen): po che sna tshogs kyi me tog mang po dang 'dres par gyur la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil zhing 'bab pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dbyangs su sgrog pas rab tu brgyan pa dag kyang kun
30b6(phal chen): nas gnas par gyur to/ /rin po che'i me tog puN+Da ri ka'i phreng ba dang / rin po che'i shing gam yo rin po che thams cad kyi pad+mo rab tu rgyas shing / shin tu 'phags pas mdzes par
30b7(phal chen): bkod pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i phreng ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa/ nor bu rin po che grangs med pa'i
31a1(phal chen): dra ba kun du snang bas brgyan cing mdzes pa dang / nor bu rin po che'i gzhal med khang nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa grangs med pa/ spos
31a2(phal chen): thams cad kyi ngad kun nas 'byung ba/ bdug spos kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang ldan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /rin po che'i rgyal mtshan grangs med pa dang / gos kyi rgyal mtshan
31a3(phal chen): dang / ba dan gyi rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i snam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / me tog gi rgyal mtshan dang / rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan dang / phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che sna tshogs
31a4(phal chen): kyi dril bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i rgyal po'i gdugs kyi rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che snang bas kun du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i
31a5(phal chen): rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i dbyangs rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /
31a6(phal chen): nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang
31a7(phal chen): ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan rnam par phye ba thams cad phyogs kun nas rgyan du gyur pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /dze ta'i tshal gyi nam mkha'i dbyings
31b1(phal chen): thams cad kyang lha'i gzhal med khang gi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /dze ta'i tshal nyid kyang spos sna tshogs kyi shing grangs med pa'i sprin
31b2(phal chen): byis kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / brjod du med pa'i rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyis kun nas 'khor cing bkod pa dang / rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba brjod du med
31b3(phal chen): pa'i sprin las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa'i dbyangs dang / nga ro snyan pa 'byung bas kun nas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i pad+mo brjod du med pa'i sprin
31b4(phal chen): gyis kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i seng ge'i khri brjod du med pa'i steng lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan bting ba la byang chub sems dpa' 'khod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa
31b5(phal chen): la bstod pa'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'byin pa'i sprin gyis kun nas brgyan pa dang / lha'i dbang po brjod du med pa'i gzugs brnyan mngon par 'byung ba'i nor bu rin po che'i 'bru'i sprin gyis
31b6(phal chen): kun nas brgyan pa dang / mu tig dkar po'i dra ba'i sprin brjod du med pas kun nas brgyan pa dang / mu tig dmar po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin brjod du med pas kun nas yog cing
31b7(phal chen): brgyan pa dang / rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i mu tig gi sprin brjod du med pa'i char mngon par 'bab pas rab tu brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de bzhin
32a1(phal chen): gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dkar po'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de
32a2(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang / byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gcig 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas
32a3(phal chen): par 'gengs pa rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gcig tu zhugs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par phye ba thams
32a4(phal chen): cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byin gyi rlabs yongs su ston pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi dbyings
32a5(phal chen): thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par yongs su ston par mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ba spu'i bu ga gcig tu sngon
32a6(phal chen): gyi mtha' de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yongs su ston par mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'od zer gcig
32a7(phal chen): gi sgo nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa snang bar 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ba spu'i rtse mo gcig las sprul pa'i
32b1(phal chen): sprin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
32b2(phal chen): ba spu'i sgo gcig nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'du ba dang / 'jig pa'i bskal pa yongs su ston pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /ji ltar dze ta'i tshal de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
