32b3(phal chen): su dag pas yongs su dag par kun nas gnas par gyur pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams
32b4(phal chen): cad kyang yongs su dag par kun nas gnas shing rab tu brgyan pa dang / shin tu spud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yongs su rgyas pa dang / dze ta'i tshal du yang dag par
32b5(phal chen): gzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpas yongs su rgyas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang / rgyan thams cad kyi sprin
32b6(phal chen): gyi char mngon par 'bab pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kyis rab tu snang ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / zhing
32b7(phal chen): thams cad kyi bkod pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog par brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi lus thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad
33a1(phal chen): kyi sprin shin tu rgyas pa'i lhun gyis kun tu rgyas shing brgyan pa dang / gos thams cad kyi shing gi sprin gyi mdzod nas gos kha dog sna tshogs su mdzes
33a2(phal chen): pa'i char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / phreng ba dang / lda ldi dang / se mo do'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang /
33a3(phal chen): spos sna tshogs kyi bdug spos phyogs kun nas 'thul ba'i sprin dang / na bun gyi char thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs ltar mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / rin po che
33a4(phal chen): thams cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i sprin las rin po che'i rgyal po'i phye ma zhib bu'i char rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'bab pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
33a5(phal chen): gyi sprin lha'i bu mo'i lag na khyer ba/ nam mkha'i dbyings kun du rgyu zhing 'khor bas brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'dab ma'i dkyil 'khor
33a6(phal chen): can| chu ba mthon po dang ldan pa'i ze ba la rol mo bkod pa/ kun nas sgra 'byin cing dbyangs snyan par sgrog pas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i 'bru sna tshogs kyi dra ba dang /
33a7(phal chen): rin po che seng ge'i dra ba sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i phreng ba dang / se mo dos brgyan par kun nas gnas shing snang bar gyur to/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
33b1(phal chen): gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med
33b2(phal chen): pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams/ gser gyi sprin sgron ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal
33b3(phal chen): po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i smon lam gyi gtsug gi 'od zer snang ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med
33b4(phal chen): pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ nam mkha'i dbyings rgyan sna tshogs kyi sprin
33b5(phal chen): gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin gyi char rab tu dgye ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i pad+mo'i sprin gyi char mngon
33b6(phal chen): par gtor ba dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i sprin gyi char rab tu btang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi sprin gyi char mngon
33b7(phal chen): par gtor ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bsgrub pa dang / kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad cing shin tu phra ba'i lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin gyi char mngon
34a1(phal chen): par dbab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyi sprin nam mkha'i dbyings las byin gyi rlabs pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin
34a2(phal chen): gyi rgyan yid du 'ong bas nam mkha'i dbyings rgyas par 'gengs par byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong
34a3(phal chen): ste| 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ shar phyogs su brten te khang pa brtsegs pa rgyan kun dang ldan zhing / nor bu rin po che'i dra bas kun nas
34a4(phal chen): khyab pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che phyogs rab tu snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i dra ba'i rgyan gyis
34a5(phal chen): kun nas brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi
34a6(phal chen): zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi snying po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po kun nas snang ba'i
34a7(phal chen): rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi shugs thub par dka' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'
34b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ 'jig rten gyi
34b2(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho thams cad spos kyi lda ldi dang dra bas kun du 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lda ldi dang //
34b3(phal chen): dra ba chen pos kun du 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud thams cad me tog thams cad kyi lda ldi dang / phreng ba'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis
34b4(phal chen): brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'khor thams cad phreng ba dang / lda ldi dang / se mo do'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyi brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi dkyil
34b5(phal chen): 'khor thams cad 'og gi gzhi rten rdo rje thams cad kyi phreng bas yongs su gzung bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshul thams cad nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra
34b6(phal chen): bas kun nas 'brel bas byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gos sna tshogs kyi lda ldis kun nas yongs su blangs shing gzung bar byin gyis brlab pa dang /
34b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lus kyi phreng ba dang / lda ldi mang po'i dra ba kun nas 'brel bar mngon par bsgrub pa dang / zhing thams cad nor bu rin po che
35a1(phal chen): dpal gyi 'od zer gyi lda ldi dang phreng ba'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che rnam par snang
35a2(phal chen): ba'i lda ldi dang dra bas kun du 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gzhi nor bu rin po che seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i phreng ba dang lda ldi'i dra
35a3(phal chen): bas yongs su gzung bar byin gyis brlab pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas
35a4(phal chen): pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ lho phyogs su brten te/ nor bu rin po che 'gro ba la rnam par snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che
35a5(phal chen): phyogs kun tu snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i rgyan gyis kun nas brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus
35a6(phal chen): su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha
35a7(phal chen): rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i ri rab rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan mar me zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes sgron ma'i sangs rgyas kyi
35b1(phal chen): zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' dpal kun nas 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang
35b2(phal chen): lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad bdug spos kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs su
35b3(phal chen): ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i
35b4(phal chen): ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad bdug spos kha dog dang dri du mar ldan pa'i ri rab
35b5(phal chen): kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/
35b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mdangs 'byung ba/ sa thams
35b7(phal chen): cad kyi rdul gyi kha dog dang 'dra ba'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor
36a1(phal chen): bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi bkod pa dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i
36a2(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje'i snying po kha dog sna tshogs can/ bkod pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i
36a3(phal chen): yul dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin
36a4(phal chen): po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba'i yul dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba
36a5(phal chen): snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs
36a6(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas khyab par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sems can gyi khams kyi yul thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de
36a7(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rab tu snang ba'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos
36b1(phal chen): kyi dbyings thams cad kyi nam mkha' rin po che'i rgyal po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu snang bar yongs su ston cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgra
36b2(phal chen): 'byin pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / phyogs bcu thams cad rin po che'i rgyal po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
36b3(phal chen): cad kyi snying po byang chub rab tu snang ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig
36b4(phal chen): rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas nub phyogs su brten te/ khang pa brtsegs pa
36b5(phal chen): spos kyi rgyal po thams cad kyi lhun dang ldan pa/ mu tig gi dra bas kun nas khyab pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che lha'i dbang po rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon
36b6(phal chen): par sprul nas/ rin po che gser gyi dra bas kun nas brgyan pa dang / yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te
36b7(phal chen): 'khod do/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams/ rin po che'i gos yongs su snang ba zhes bya ba/
37a1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dpal rnam par snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po
37a2(phal chen): zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho
37a3(phal chen): de nas 'phags te/ nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i snam bu'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos kha dog ser po dang / mdog
37a4(phal chen): ser po'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos/ spos sna tshogs kyis dri zhim por byas pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan
37a5(phal chen): gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nor
37a6(phal chen): bu rin po che gser gyi mdog shin tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyis rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che 'bar ba'i gos kyis sprin gyi rgyan gyis
37a7(phal chen): brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che skar ma thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyis sna tshogs su gyur ba'i gos kyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab
37b1(phal chen): pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas/ nor bu rin po che snam bu khra bo'i rdo ltar snang ba'i sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas
37b2(phal chen): rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i dpal rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas nor
37b3(phal chen): bu'i rgyal po snang ba shin tu gsal bas phyogs kyi dbyings rnam par snang ba'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i
37b4(phal chen): rgyan gyi gos kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas
37b5(phal chen): pa bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang phyogs su brten te/ rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho yongs su 'byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri bai DUR+Ya'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par
37b6(phal chen): sprul nas/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge mdzes pa'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan mgo la thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs
37b7(phal chen): nas| skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol
38a1(phal chen): gyi 'jig rten gyi khams sa chen po thams cad du mdzes pa'i rin po che'i 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs pa'i
38a2(phal chen): spyan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su shin tu 'phrul ba'i smon lam zla ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod
38a3(phal chen): du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad rin po
38a4(phal chen): che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par
38a5(phal chen): byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad bdug spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab
38a6(phal chen): 'byams thams cad tsan dan gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa'i
38a7(phal chen): sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa
38b1(phal chen): dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad
38b2(phal chen): gser gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad gos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas
38b3(phal chen): khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad pad+mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing / mi mjed
38b4(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ byang dang shar gyi phyogs
38b5(phal chen): mtshams su brten te/ nor bu rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa sgo chos kyi dbyings thams cad la mngon par lta ba dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po spos mtshungs pa med pa'i pad+mo'i snying
38b6(phal chen): po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che'i rgyal po'i me tog gi dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po mdzod sna tshogs kyi dra ba'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems
38b7(phal chen): dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i
39a1(phal chen): r dul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi sprin bkod pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbang rgyal po'i
39a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i
39a3(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'od kyi dkyil
39a4(phal chen): 'khor gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i sprin gyi kha dog kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis
39a5(phal chen): kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod spu'i kha dog gi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam
39a6(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad pad+mo'i snying po'i
39a7(phal chen): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad nor bu'i rgyal po/ rin po che'i shing gi yal ga'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i 'od
39b1(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya
39b2(phal chen): ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad nyi
39b3(phal chen): ma'i kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad zla ba dang / skar ma'i tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin
39b4(phal chen): gyis kun tu khyab par byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag
39b5(phal chen): 'tshal nas/ shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams su brten te/ rin po che rdul dang bral zhing rnam par snang ba phun sum tshogs pa'i me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin
39b6(phal chen): po che seng ge rdo rje'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus
39b7(phal chen): su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin
40a1(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i nyi ma rab tu snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i ye
40a2(phal chen): shes kun tu snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ byang
40a3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de
40a4(phal chen): nas 'phags te/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas me tog 'od 'phro ba'i sprin/ nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rol mo 'od 'phro
40a5(phal chen): ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye
40a6(phal chen): ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rin po che'i gos 'od 'phro ba/ spos dang bdug spos sna tshogs kyis rnam par bdug pa'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye
40a7(phal chen): ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas klus rnam par sprul pa'i glog 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu
40b1(phal chen): rin po che rnam par snang ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che gser rab tu 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings
40b2(phal chen): ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rin po che'i rgyal po dpal gyi snying po 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i
40b3(phal chen): b u ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa rgya mtsho ltar dus gsum gyi rgyud rab tu snang ba'i tshul dang ldan pa 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings
40b4(phal chen): ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas
40b5(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams su brtan te/ nor bu rin po che chen po 'od zer gyi dra ba phyogs kun tu mngon par gzhol ba'i thig
40b6(phal chen): les chos kyis dbyings thams cad du rab tu snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che spos kyi sgron ma'i 'od 'phro ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul
40b7(phal chen): nas| rin po che'i rgyal po dri ma med pa'i snying po'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po sems can thams cad rab tu 'dzud pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa'i cod
41a1(phal chen): pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
41a2(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa
41a3(phal chen): dpal gyi ri bo kun nas rnam par snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i smon lam ye shes dpal zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'
41a4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ mtshan
41a5(phal chen): dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gzugs brnyan
41a6(phal chen): gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
41a7(phal chen): thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum
41b1(phal chen): du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /
41b2(phal chen): ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul ba'i tshogs kyi gzugs brnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan
41b3(phal chen): dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba'i gzugs
41b4(phal chen): brnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang
41b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du
41b6(phal chen): gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub dang / byang chub kyi shing gi gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun du dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po
41b7(phal chen): thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i gzugs brnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu
42a1(phal chen): dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i 'jig rten
42a2(phal chen): gyi dbang po thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas
42a3(phal chen): d us gsum du byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye bas skad cig skad cig tu nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rgyas par
42a4(phal chen): 'gengs shing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal
42a5(phal chen): nas| nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams su brtan te/ rin po che'i rgyal po phyogs kun nas rnam par snang ba'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri rin po che 'gro ba rnam par snang ba'i pad+mo'i
42a6(phal chen): snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ mu tig 'od thub pa med pa'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che 'od kun tu snang ba'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus
42a7(phal chen): su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha
42b1(phal chen): rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med
42b2(phal chen): pa'i dpal gyi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bsgribs pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba/ byang
42b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas
42b4(phal chen): 'phags te/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad dang / sgra dang / dbyangs dang / nges pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrubs pa rgya mtsho rab tu brjod pa dang / dus gsum gyi
42b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra rab tu bsgrags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i tshul rgya
42b6(phal chen): mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis sgra rab tu
42b7(phal chen): bsgrags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor zhing thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pa dang / byang chub
43a1(phal chen): sems dpa' thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
43a2(phal chen): thams cad byang chub pa'i snying por gshegs pa dang / bdud kyi dkrugs ma rnam par 'thor ba dang / byang chub pa'i snying por rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad
43a3(phal chen): pa'i dbyangs rgya mtsho rab tu bsgrag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mdo sde'i tshul dang / ming rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra
43a4(phal chen): bsgrag pa dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba thams cad dus la bab pa'i 'khor los 'dul ba'i chos kyi tshul dang thabs kyi sgra rab tu bsgrag pa dang / ye shes thams cad khong du chud par bya
43a5(phal chen): ba'i phyir/ smon lam ji ltar btab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i khyad par dang / dus dang / thabs dang / chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi
43a6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'og gi phyogs su brtan
43a7(phal chen): te| de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzhal med khang gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba'i rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi mdzod kyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin
43b1(phal chen): po che thams cad kyi gzugs kyi pad+mo'i snying po yongs su bzung ba dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che'i snying po byang chub thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan
43b2(phal chen): gyi cod pan mgo la bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas
43b3(phal chen): kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa shin tu ston pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi
43b4(phal chen): dkyil 'khor kun tu snang ba'i dbyings kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi smon lam gyi gzhi rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'
43b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ mtshan
43b6(phal chen): dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang / tshig gi lam thams cad dang / gos dang /
43b7(phal chen): smad g.yogs thams cad nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang / sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs
44a1(phal chen): pa 'das pa thams cad dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa dang / lung ma bstan pa dang /
44a2(phal chen): ma byon pa thams cad dang / da ltar byung ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byams thams cad na bzhugs pa rnams kyi sngon sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
44a3(phal chen): pa mdzad pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dang / len pa dang / sbyin pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang /
44a4(phal chen): ba spu'i sgo dang / lus thams cad dang / yan lag dang / nying lag dang / tshig gi lam dang / gos dang / smad g.yogs thams cad la rab tu snang bar
44a5(phal chen): gyur par rnam par bstan pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu snang bar yongs su bstan pa
44a6(phal chen): dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa/ yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad 'thub pa rab tu bstan pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho
44a7(phal chen): rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus dang / drag shul dang / rnam par gnon pa dang
44b1(phal chen): ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam gtan rgya mtsho yongs su tshol
44b2(phal chen): zhing rab tu bsgrub pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi
44b3(phal chen): 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul yongs su bsgrub cing chos yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing / shin tu zhe non pa'i
44b4(phal chen): lus dang / ngo'i gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par bya bas sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
44b5(phal chen): pa thams cad mthong zhing dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lam la 'gro ba thams cad mngon par mos par byed pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya
44b6(phal chen): mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho mngon par grub pa'i sgo yongs su dag pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i
44b7(phal chen): sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu grub pa dang / rnam par mngon pa dang /
45a1(phal chen): rnam par dag par byas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rgya chen
45a2(phal chen): po rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyi sprin gyis rgyas par bkang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang
45a3(phal chen): bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom
45a4(phal chen): ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ steng gi phyogs su brten te/ rdo rje dbang po sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan gyi snying po can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rdo rje dang / in+d+ra nI
45a5(phal chen): la'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che thams cad rab tu 'bar ba'i dra bas kun nas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po dus gsum gyi
45a6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang dbyangs su sgrog pa'i phreng ba rab tu 'phyang ba dang / mgo la rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs
45a7(phal chen): nas| skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ / //ba ma po brgyad cu bdun pa/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'khor dang bcas par/ byang chub
45b1(phal chen): sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyis byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas zhal du lta ba ye shes yongs su dag pa'i mig dang ldan pa/ de
45b2(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang / mdo sde'i tshul gyis gsung rgya mtsho la rna ba yongs su gzhol ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang rab tu thob
45b3(phal chen): par bya ba la pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong ba/ skad cig skad cig tu yongs su bstan par rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba/ 'jig
45b4(phal chen): rten gyi khams thams cad lus gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba'i yul dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du lus su mngon par 'byung zhing /
45b5(phal chen): rnam par snang ba rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khams gcig tu snang zhing khongs su chud par yang dag par ston pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad
45b6(phal chen): yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i dus la sdod par gzhol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rab tu
45b7(phal chen): sgrog pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pa rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mig yor lta bur khong du chud pa/
46a1(phal chen): srid pa'i rgyud du skye ba thams cad rmi lam lta bu shes par byung ba/ las dang rnam par smin pa thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bur shes pas
46a2(phal chen): rnam par dag pa/ ye shes mngon par grub pa thams cad smig rgyu lta bur mngon par shes pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad sprul pa lta bur khong
46a3(phal chen): du chud pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa'i khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ros rnam par gnon pa/ tha dad
46a4(phal chen): pa yang dag par shes pa/ mi zad pa'i rgya mtshor zhugs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho dang / chos kyi nges pa'i tshig gi ye shes rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings
46a5(phal chen): dang nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
46a6(phal chen): thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par dkrug pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ dus gsum
46a7(phal chen): thams cad shes pa'i stobs la rab tu gnas pa/ chos thams cad la ye shes bsgribs pa med pa rab tu thob pa/ gnas med pas nam mkha'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ thams
46b1(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa'i sa len pa med pa/ nam mkha' lta bu'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ srid pa thams cad mi dmigs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul can/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshul rgya
46b2(phal chen): mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyi sgor zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gcig nas gcig tu gzung ba'i
46b3(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad du skyes pa'i lus yongs su ston pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dbyibs phra ba dang / rgya che ba dang / yangs
46b4(phal chen): pa dang / dog pa sna tshogs rab tu tshogs pa/ shin tu phra zhing rgya chen po yang dag par gzud pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa/ dmigs pa rgya chen po shin tu phra bar shes pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas
46b5(phal chen): thams cad dang sems kyi skad cig la 'grogs pa rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams
46b6(phal chen): cad du mgo rmongs pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa/ sems kyi skad cig gis phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par 'gengs pa sha stag ste/ de bzhin
46b7(phal chen): g shegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de lta bu'i yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag gis dze ta'i tshal thams cad yongs su rgyas par gyur
47a1(phal chen): kyang | nyan thos chen po shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu dang / 'od srung chen po dang / nam gru dang / rab 'byor dang / 'gag
47a2(phal chen): med dang / mos pa dang / ka t+ya'i bu dang / byams gang gi bu la sogs pas dze ta'i tshal na 'khod bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag
47a3(phal chen): ma mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul dang / sangs
47a4(phal chen): rgyas kyi mnga' chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
47a5(phal chen): su dag pa yang ma mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
47a6(phal chen): kun nas 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas tshogs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' nye bar 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang
47a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs su 'khod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i seng
47b1(phal chen): ge'i khri bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khang pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
47b2(phal chen): rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bsgyings pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang /
47b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su smin par gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon du 'dor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi
47b4(phal chen): lus rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus yongs su rdzogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi lus rnam par dmigs pa dang / byang
47b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kha dog
47b6(phal chen): mtha' yas pa'i bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa'i sprin kun tu 'gyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs kyi dra ba
47b7(phal chen): rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sprul pa yang ma mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mi mtshungs ba'i phyir te/ de dag gis ni sngon
48a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags so/ /de dag la ni sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
48a2(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan dang / rgyan yongs su dag pa yang dag par bstan pa ma mdzad do/ /de dag la ni sangs rgyas bcom
48a3(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag brjod pa ma mdzad do/ /de dag gis ni sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag
48a4(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba ma byas so/ /de dag gis ni gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rab tu bzhag pa ma byas so/ /de dag gis
48a5(phal chen): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin no/ /de dag gis ni sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir brtson pa ma yin no/ /de dag gis
48a6(phal chen): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba ma byas so/ /de dag gis ni sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags
48a7(phal chen): pa'i ye shes kyi sa la dmigs pa ma byas so/ /de dag gis ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar bsags pa ma byas so/ /de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs
48b1(phal chen): pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma bsgrubs so/ /de dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa'i mngon par shes pa khong du
48b2(phal chen): ma chud do/ /de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i mig gi lam gyis rnam par dmigs par bya ba 'jig rten las 'das pa thun mong ma yin pa'i byang chub tu dmigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
48b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam chen po las byung ba khong du chud do/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kun gyis ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyi mig gi lam
48b4(phal chen): gyis rnam par dmigs pa thun mong ma yin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs las byung ba'i sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyis grub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes sna tshogs
48b5(phal chen): yongs su 'dzin pa byin gyis rlob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba'i shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa khong du ma chud do/ /de bas na nyan thos chen po mchog gi zung dang /
48b6(phal chen): bzang po'i zung la sogs pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba de mi mthong ngo / /mi thos so/ /mi shes so/ /khong du mi chud do/ /mi rtogs so/ /mi rig go /yid
48b7(phal chen): mi ches so/ /mi sems so/ /rnam par mi lta'o/ /rtogs par mi lta'o/ /nges par mi lta'o/ /nye bar mi sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul te/ nyan thos kyi spyod
49a1(phal chen): yul ma yin no/ /de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mi mthong ste/ de dag la de dang
49a2(phal chen): mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba med do/ /de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong du/ de lta bu'i ye shes kyi mig rnam par ma dag go /dmigs pa chung ngu la rgya chen po'i byin gyi
49a3(phal chen): rlabs kyis 'jug tu ting nge 'dzin de lta bu med do/ /de dag shes pa dang / lta ba'am/ khong du chud par bya ba'am/ rtogs par bya ba'am/ rgyas par dgang bar bya ba'am/ 'jug par bya
49a4(phal chen): ba'am/ rnam par blta ba'am/ nyams su myong bar bya ba'am/ gnan ba'am/ rnam par mnan pa'am/ gzhan gyis thos par bya ba'am/ bstan par bya ba'am/ smos par bya
49a5(phal chen): ba'am/ yang dag par bstan par bya ba'am/ bstab par bya ba'am/ sbyin par bya ba'am/ de la sems can rnams yongs su bskul bar bya ba'am/ sbyar bar bya ba'am/ rab
49a6(phal chen): tu dgod par bya ba'am/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos nyid la sems can dgod par bya bar yang de dag la de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa med do/ /de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul
49a7(phal chen): med do/ /de lta bu khyu mchog gi mthu med do/ /de lta bu'i stobs med do/ /de lta bu'i dbang med do/ /de lta bu'i gnas med do/ /de lta bu'i 'du shes med do/ /de lta bu'i mig gi mthu
49b1(phal chen): med do/ /de lta bu'i ye shes med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni de ltar nyan thos kyi theg pas byung ba/ nyan thos kyi lam gyis yongs su grub pa/ nyan thos kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs
49b2(phal chen): su rdzogs pa/ nyan thos kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa/ bden pa snang ba shes pas nges par rtogs pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa/ shin tu zhi ba'i mthar thug pa/ snying rje chen po'i
49b3(phal chen): bsam pa med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad la mi lta mi sdod pa/ rang gi don grub pa dag ste/ de dag ni dze ta'i tshal de nyid du kun nas 'dus te 'khod la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga dang /
49b4(phal chen): g.yas g.yon dang / snam logs na bcom ldan 'das la mngon du lta bar gnas kyang / dze ta'i tshal der sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong bar ma gyur to/ /de ci'i phyir
49b5(phal chen): zhe na| thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ma bsgrubs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ma bsdus pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la yang
49b6(phal chen): dag par ma zhugs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la smon lam yang dag par ma btab pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par ma bsgrubs pa dang / thams cad
49b7(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su ma bsgoms pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma sbyangs pa de dag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa de la 'jug
50a1(phal chen): cing rtogs par bya ba'am/ blta zhing khong du chud par bya bar mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' rigs dang ldan pa rnams kyi mig
50a2(phal chen): gi lam gyis blta ba yin gyi/ nyan thos kyi mig gis blta ba ma yin no/ /de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul
50a3(phal chen): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa'ang mthong bar ma gyur to/ /de 'ang 'di lta ste/ dper
50a4(phal chen): na| gang+gA'i chu klung chen po'i ngogs pha rol tshu rol du yi dwags bkres pa dang / skom pas rab tu mnar ba/ gcer ba/ gos med pa/ lus kyi mdog dang / kha dog tshig cing 'chums
50a5(phal chen): pa dang / rlung dang nyi mas bskams pa/ bya rog mang pos gtse ba/ spyang ki dang / was mtho btsam pa brgya stong mang po kun nas 'dus kyang / gang+gA'i chu klung chen po mi mthong ste/
50a6(phal chen): sgrib pa'i las kyis bsgribs pa'i phyir/ la las ni bskams te chu med par mthong ngo / /la las ni thal bas yongs su gang bar mthong ngo / /de bzhin du nyan thos chen po gnas brtan
50a7(phal chen): de dag dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma rig pa'i ling rtog gis mig kun nas khebs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
50b1(phal chen): kyi sa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus yongs su ma bzung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong / ma shes so/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'dun ma chen po 'dus pa'i skye bo
50b2(phal chen): mang po dbus su/ mi la la zhig gnyid kyis myos te log par gyur nas/ de gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du gnas de nyid na/ lha'i grong rdal brgya byin gyi gnas blta na mdzes pa dang / ri rab kyi
50b3(phal chen): steng shing dang bcas pa/ bza' shing gi ra ba'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis gang ba/ lha'i bu khrag khrig brgya phrag stong snyed gnas pa/ lha'i me tog sna
50b4(phal chen): tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / yid bzhin gyi shing lha rdzas kyi gos dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / se mo do sna tshogs mang po 'byin pa dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan rnam pa sna
50b5(phal chen): tshogs rlung gis yongs su bskyod cing / sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong la snyan pa 'byin pa'i sil snyan gyi shing mang po dang / dga' ba'i rtsed mo'i bkod pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs mthong bar gyur
50b6(phal chen): la| lha'i bu mo mang pos glu blangs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo byas pa'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa thos par gyur te/ bdag nyid kyang de na 'dug pa snyam byed la/ lha rdzas kyi bkod pas
50b7(phal chen): klubs pa'i gnas de dag thams cad mthong bar gyur kyang / skye bo'i tshogs mang po de dag gis gnas de nyid na 'khod bzhin du mi mthong / mi shes/ khong du mi chud do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
51a1(phal chen): de ni skyes bu gnyid kyis log pa de nyid kyi rmi lam gyis blta ba yin gyi/ gnas de nyid na 'khod kyang skye bo mang po de dag gis blta ba ma yin no/ /de bzhin du
51a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po byang chub la mngon par mos pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs rgya chen po dang / rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs ma nor
51a3(phal chen): bar shin tu bsags pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam shin tu mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad la shin tu zhugs pa dang /
51a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i lam bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa la shin tu gnas pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi chos nyid dang / yan lag rnam pa thams cad du shin tu
51a5(phal chen): rdzogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams
51a6(phal chen): cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su non pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par spyod pa thams cad la rnam par rtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye
51a7(phal chen): shes kyi spyod yul thams cad la chags pa med par rnam par spyod pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol
51b1(phal chen): pa de dag mthong zhing khong du chud la/ nyams su myong bar gyur kyang / nyan thos chen po mchog gi zung dang / bzang po'i zung la sogs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i mig med pas mthong
51b2(phal chen): bar ma gyur/ shes par ma gyur to/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri'i rgyal po kha ba can/ sman gyi 'byung gnas kyis gang ba la/ sngags dang / rig sngags dang / sman gyi tshul dang / blang
51b3(phal chen): ba'i rgyus shes shing / rig sngags grub pa'i skyes bu gnas pa/ sman gyi cho ga thams cad shes pa/ sman blang ba'i las byed kyang / ri bo'i dbang po de nyid la gnas pa'i phyugs dang /
51b4(phal chen): ba lang dang / ra lug 'tsho ba dang / rngon pa dang / de ma yin pa'i mi sman gyi tshul mi shes pa gzhan dag gis sman de dag gi cho ga dang / sman gyi ro dang / mthu dang / yon tan dang / byin
51b5(phal chen): dang / thabs dang / 'phrod pa mi shes so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul
51b6(phal chen): ba'i yul gyis byung ba/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i yul de dag mthong yang / nyan thos chen po mchog gi zung dang / bzang po'i zung la
51b7(phal chen): sogs pa rang gi dgos pas tshim par gyur pa/ gzhan gyi dgos pa yal bar gzhog pa/ btang snyoms can de dag dze ta'i tshal de nyid na gnas kyang / tshe 'di la bde bar spyod pas
52a1(phal chen): bde zhing dga' bar gnas pa las/ phar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul de dag khong du mi chud do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/
52a2(phal chen): sa chen po rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas phun sum tshogs pa/ gter brgya stong du mas gang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su gang ba 'di la'ang rin po che'i
52a3(phal chen): 'byung gnas dang / gter gyi rgyus la mkhas shing byang ba'i mi/ rin po che brtag pa'i gtsug lag gi blo shin tu byang ba/ gter gyi gtsug lag dang / rgyus dang / dan rtags gya
52a4(phal chen): nom par lobs pa/ bsod nams rgya chen po'i stobs kyis bstan pa dag /de las rin po che ci 'dong bar blangs shing bdag kyang yongs su tshim par byed/ pha dang ma la
52a5(phal chen): yang legs par rim gro byed/ bu pho smos kyang legs par gso bar byed cing / de ma yin pa'i sems can rga ba dang / na ba dang / dbul ba dang / nyam nyes pa dang / kha
52a6(phal chen): zas dang / gos kyis mi 'byor pa rnams la btud cing khyad par bgo bsha' byed pa/ nor gyi dga' ba sna tshogs nyams su myong bar byed kyang sems can rin po che'i 'byung
52a7(phal chen): gnas dang / gter gyi rgyus mi shes pa/ bsod nams ma byas pa/ rin po che la shes pa'i mig yongs su ma dag pa/ de dag de nyid na 'khod kyang rin po che'i 'byung gnas de dag
52b1(phal chen): dang | rin po che'i gter de dag khong du mi chud mi shes pas/ rin po che yang blang du med do/ /rin po che'i don kyang byar med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs
52b2(phal chen): pa'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ye shes kyi mig shin tu rnam par dag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pa de dag dze ta'i tshal na 'khod
52b3(phal chen): cing | sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong la/ chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug cing / ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya yongs su sgrub ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa dang / rim
52b4(phal chen): gro la brtson zhing / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la mngon par brtson te/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can de dag yongs su sdud kyang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs
52b5(phal chen): pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po kun nas 'dus pa de lta bu yang ma mthong / ma shes so/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig mig gnyis
52b6(phal chen): gos kyi bkab ste/ rin po che'i gling du phyin par gyur na/ des rin po che'i gling der phan tshun 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba byas kyang rin po che'i 'byung gnas mi
52b7(phal chen): mthong ngo / /rin po che'i shing dang / gos kyi rin po che dang / spos kyi rin po che dang / rin po che thams cad kyang mi mthong la/ rin po che de dag gi spyod yul lam/ rin thang ngam/ yongs
53a1(phal chen): su spyad pa'i rgyus kyang mi shes pas/ de ni rin po che de dag len kyang mi len la/ rin po che'i don kyang nyams su myong bar mi byed do/ /gang gi mig la bsgribs
53a2(phal chen): pa med pa de dag gis ni de dag thams cad mthong zhing shes so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos rin po che'i gling chen por phyin pa de dag gis/ bla na med pa'i de bzhin
53a3(phal chen): gshegs pa'i rin po che/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur pa mngon du gyur te/ dze ta'i tshal na bzhugs shing / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa
53a4(phal chen): yongs su ston pa mthong yang / nyan thos chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung de nyid na gnas shing spyod kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul
53a5(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul de dag ma mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mang po de lta bu'i rin po che'i 'byung gnas chen po yang mthong par ma gyur to/ /de ci'i
53a6(phal chen): phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag bltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mi mthun
53a7(phal chen): pa'i phyogs kyi ma rig pa'i gos kyis ye shes kyi mig bkab pa de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mig yongs su dag pa de lta bu med do/ /de dag gis chos kyi
53b1(phal chen): dbyings gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug pa de lta bu khong du ma chud do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ mig yongs su dag pa rdul dang bral bas rab tu snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba/ rab
53b2(phal chen): rib dang / mun pa thams cad dang mi 'grogs pa yod de/ de mi la la zhig gis thob par gyur na/ de rdul dang bral bas rab tu snang ba dang ldan pa'i mig yongs su dag pa dang ldan pas
53b3(phal chen): mtshan mo mun pa'i mun nag shin tu gnag par gyur pa'i nang na/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kun nas 'dus pa dang / cho ga dang / spyod lam rnam par sna tshogs dang ldan zhing /
53b4(phal chen): mun pa'i rab rib kyis mig yongs su 'khrugs par gyur pa'i mi'i khrod na 'dug cing / rnam par rgyu la phan tshun 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spyod
53b5(phal chen): kyang | mi de dag gis skyes bu spyod lam sna tshogs kyis spyod pa de mi mthong / mi shes so/ /skyes bu des ni 'gro ba'i tshogs chen po/ spyod lam dang cho ga sna tshogs kyis rnam par spyod
53b6(phal chen): pa| phyogs tha dad du mngon par bltas pa/ dbyibs kyi rnam pa tha dad pa/ kha dog gi rnam pa tha dad pa/ dmigs pa'i tshul tha dad pa thams cad kyang mi mthong ba med do/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa byang
53b7(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor mnga' ba/ rnam par dag cing chags pa mi mnga' ba'i spyan dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin
54a1(phal chen): gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa mdzad kyang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis
54a2(phal chen): rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul chen po de dag mthong bar ma gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs chen po de lta bu yang mthong bar ma gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dge slong la la zhig skye
54a3(phal chen): bo mang po'i tshogs kyi dbus su sas khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs sam/ chus khyab pa'am/ mes khyab pa'am/ rlung gis khyab pa'am/ sngon pos khyab pa'am/ ser
54a4(phal chen): pos khyab pa'am/ dmar pos khyab pa'am/ dkar pos khyab pa'am/ lhas khyab pa'am/ sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyis khyab pa'am/ sgra dang dbyangs kun gyis khyab
54a5(phal chen): pa'am| dmigs pa thams cad kyis khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ 'gro ba mang po'i tshogs de dag gis chu'i phung po de mi mthong ngo / /me'i snang ba de yang
54a6(phal chen): mi mthong ngo / /sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyis khyab pa dang / dmigs pa thams cad kyis khyab pa'i bar du yang mi mthong ste/ ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shing /
54a7(phal chen): rnam par spyod pa rnams ni ma gtogs so/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis yul gyi rnam par sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag yongs su
54b1(phal chen): bstan pa mdzad na/ nyan thos chen po de dag gis mthong zhing shes par ma gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam la zhugs pa de dag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs
54b2(phal chen): pa'i yul de dag mthong ngo / /khong du chud do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ sku ba grub pa'i mi ni mig gnyis bskus ma thag tu/ skye bo mang po thams cad kyis lus mi mthong ngo / /des ni 'gro
54b3(phal chen): 'am| 'dug gam/ 'greng yang rung ste/ skye bo mang po thams cad mthong ngo / /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi yul las yongs su
54b4(phal chen): 'das pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul du zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mig gis shes par bya ba des 'gro ba thams cad gzigs kyang / nyan thos chen
54b5(phal chen): po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ngo / /'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi'i tsher 'grogs pa'i lha rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba ni des mi de mthong yang /
54b6(phal chen): mis lha de mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kun nas 'dus pa chen po'i dbus
54b7(phal chen): su| sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yongs su bstan pa mdzad kyang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po dang /
55a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang ma mthong / ma shes so/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ dge slong sems thams
55a2(phal chen): cad la dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/ shes pa med la tshor ba med pas dbang po drug gis
55a3(phal chen): kyang bya ba gang yang nyams su mi myong ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma yin la/ 'jig rten gyi rnam par spyod pa thams cad gnas de na yod kyang / snyoms par zhugs pa de nyid kyi byin
55a4(phal chen): gyi rlabs dang mthus des mi shes/ mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du nyan thos chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal de na yang rnam par spyod la/ de dag la dbang po drug kyang yod de/ de bzhin gshegs
55a5(phal chen): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / cho 'phrul de dag mthong bar ma gyur/ khong du chud par ma gyur/ shes par ma gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i cho
55a6(phal chen): 'phrul chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang khong du ma chud/ ma mthong / ma shes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni zab cing
55a7(phal chen): yangs la tshad med de/ blta bar dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ste/ khong du chud par dka' la 'jig rten thams cad las yongs su 'das pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis
55b1(phal chen): mi khyab pa ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'dus pa'o/ /de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod cing / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs kyi
55b2(phal chen): drung na spyod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de dag kyang ma mthong ngo / /dze ta'i tshal 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa/
55b3(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dag pa'i yon tan dang / bkod pa yongs su 'dus pa de yang ma mthong ma shes te/ de ni snod du ma gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam
55b4(phal chen): par snang mdzad kyi smon lam gyi gtsug gi 'od zer rab tu snang bas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /ltos shig sems can dam pa
55b5(phal chen): yi| |sangs rgyas byang chub bsam mi khyab/ /rgyal bas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa/ /dze ta'i rgyal mtshan 'di bstan to/ /rang byung rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs/ /bgrang du med par
55b6(phal chen): 'byung ba la/ /sangs rgyas chos tshul mi shes pa'i/ /'jig rten kun kyang mgo rmongs so/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i cho 'phrul dag /tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab cing / /shin tu zab
55b7(phal chen): pa 'byung ba ni/ /de la 'jig rten 'babs mi nus/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kha dog mdog/ mtshan gyis shin tu rnam par klubs/ /yang dag sangs rgyas bskyed pa yi/ /chos rab de dag
56a1(phal chen): mtshan nyid med/ /rnam 'phrul mtha' dang dbus med pa/ /tshig gi lam gyis brjod dka' ba'i/ /rnam 'phrul shin tu zab pa dag /rgyal bas dze
56a2(phal chen): ta'i tshal du bstan/ /rgyal sras bdag nyid che ba'i rnams/ /zhing rnams bsam yas bye ba nas/ /rgyal ba'i zhal ltar mos dga' ste/ /kun nas 'dus pa'i tshogs la ltos/ /
56a3(phal chen): smon lam yongs su phun sum tshogs/ /spyod lam spyod pa chags med pa/ /de dag bsam pa shes par ni/ /'jig rten kun gyis mi nus so/ /de dag sems dang spyod yul
56a4(phal chen): dang / /spyod pa dag kyang nyan thos dang / /rang rgyal thams cad yongs kyis kyang / /rnam pa kun tu shes mi nus/ /rgyal sras shes rab chen po'i rnams/ /gzhan gyis thub
56a5(phal chen): dka' pham bya la/ /dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan ma 'dres shing / /ye shes sa la gzhol gyur pa/ /ting 'dzin dpag tu tshad med la/ /grags chen mnyam par bzhag pa
56a6(phal chen): rnams| / chos dbyings thams cad rgyas bkang zhing / /rnam par 'phrul pa kun kyang ston/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' thub par dka' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs kyi
56a7(phal chen): rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bsod nams snying po shes rab che/ /byang chub
56b1(phal chen): spyod pa'i tshul rtogs shing / /'jig rten kun la bde byed pa'i/ /bde gshegs sku las skyes pa ltos/ /yid gzhungs blo gros mtha' yas shing / /shin tu mnyam gzhag sems ldan
56b2(phal chen): pa| |mtha' dang dbus med zab pa yi/ /ye shes rgya chen spyod yul can/ /rgyan rab mang pos mdzes byas pa'i/ /dze ta'i nags tshal rgya che ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun rgyas shing / /
56b3(phal chen): bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i gnas gyur par/ /gnas med mi gnas gyur pa rnams/ /phyogs rnams bcu nas kun 'dus te/ /pad+mo'i stan la 'khod pa dag /rgya mtsho mang la lta ba gyis//
56b4(phal chen): gnas med len pa med pa rnams/ /spros pa med cing mi rten la/ /rdul bral chags pa'i sems med pa/ /chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba dang / /ye shes rgyal mtshan rab dpa' ba/ /rdo rje'i
56b5(phal chen): sems ni mi g.yo zhing / /grub pa med pa'i chos rnams la/ /mya ngan 'da' bar gang ston pa/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing mang bye ba rnams/ /grangs kyis mi chod kun nas 'dus/ /yang dag sangs
56b6(phal chen): rgyas drung du lhags/ /gnyis kyi 'du shes rnam par spangs/ /rang byung shAkya seng ge yi/ /rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag mthong / /de yi byin rlabs dam pa yis/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di
56b7(phal chen): dag lhags/ /sangs rgyas chos la 'byed pa med/ /chos dbyings gzhi la'ang de bzhin te/ /spyod pa tsam du yongs 'byed pa'i/ /pha rol phyin pa rgyal ba'i sras/ /chos kyi dbyings la dbyer
57a1(phal chen): med pa'i/ /mtha' la thug pa de dag gnas/ /tshig rnams yongs su zad med pas/ /chos la dbye ba'ang rab tu byed/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
57a2(phal chen): dpal kun nas 'phags pa'i gzi brjid rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /ltos shig
57a3(phal chen): sems can dam pa yi/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs/ /dus dang dus min mkhyen mdzad cing / /sems can rnams la chos kyang ston/ /mu stegs ldan pa tshogs 'dus
57a4(phal chen): pa'i| |rgol ba thams cad rab tu 'joms/ /sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du/ /rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston/ /phyogs na mi bzhugs bde gshegs rnams/ /sangs rgyas
57a5(phal chen): yul gyi rjes mi bzhud/ /tshad med pa dang tshad yod las/ /thub pa chen po 'das pa min/ /nyi ma mkha' las 'gro ba ni/ /nyin bar 'grangs pa smos pa byed/ /de bzhin mkhyen pas
57a6(phal chen): mkhas ston pa/ /dus gsum chags pa med pas brjod/ /zla ba nye ba'i mtshan mo la/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'phags par snang / /de bzhin chos dkar yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /mgon po
57a7(phal chen): rnams kyang mthong ba yin/ /bar snang nam mkha'i dbyings 'di las/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rgyu ba ni/ /gar yang thogs pa med par 'gro/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul de bzhin no/ /
57b1(phal chen): ji ltar nam mkha' phyogs rnams kyi/ /zhing rnams kun la mi gnas pa/ /de bzhin 'jig rten sgron ma yi/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul shes par bya/ /ji ltar sa ni 'jig rten na/ /lus can
57b2(phal chen): kun gyi gnas yin pas/ /'jig rten sgron ma'i 'jig rten na/ /chos kyi 'khor lo de ltar gnas/ /ji ltar rlung ni chags med par/ /mkha' la mgyogs par rab rgyu ba/ /de bzhin sangs
57b3(phal chen): rgyas chos nyid kyang / /'jig rten khams su rab tu rgyu/ /ji ltar chu yi phung po la/ /zhing rnams 'grangs pa kun gnas pa/ /de bzhin dus gsum sangs rgyas kyang / /ye shes tshogs la rab
57b4(phal chen): tu gnas/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po chags pa med pa'i rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa
57b5(phal chen): 'di dag smras so/ /ji ltar rdo rje ri rab brag /zang yag shin tu mtho yod pa/ /de ltar 'jig rten kun skyob pa'i/ /sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pas mtho/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu chen
57b6(phal chen): dag / tshad med rnyog pa med pa ltar/ /sangs rgyas mthong ba'ang de bzhin te/ /'jig rten kun gyi skom pa gcod/ /rgya mtsho'i chu las 'phags pa yi/ /ri bo ri rab ci 'dra bar/ /de bzhin
57b7(phal chen): 'jig rten sgron ma yang / /chos kyi mtsho las mngon par 'phags/ /rin chen kun gyi 'byung gnas kyis/ /rgya mtsho rgyas pa ji bzhin du/ /rang byung ye shes de bzhin te/ /mi zad skad cig
58a1(phal chen): rab tu mkhyen/ /mgon po'i ye shes shin tu zab/ /tshad med de bzhin bgrang du med/ /de bas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ba/ /bsam gyis mi khyab tshad med
58a2(phal chen): ston| |sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid ston pa yi/ /sgyu mkhan mkhas pa ci 'dra ba/ /de ltar sangs rgyas mkhyen dbang yang / /rnam par 'phrul ba rab tu ston/ /yid bzhin nor bu rnam dag
58a3(phal chen): pa| |bsam don rdzogs byed ji lta ba/ /de bzhin bsam pa dag pa la/ /rgyal ba smon lam rdzogs pa mdzad/ /'od snang gsal ba byed pa yi/ /rin chen rnam snang ji lta ba/ /de
58a4(phal chen): ltar thams cad mkhyen pa dag / 'gro ba'i bsam pa gsal bar mdzad/ /ji ltar phyogs la mngon lta ba'i/ /rin chen zur brgyad rab gnas pa/ /de bzhin chags med
58a5(phal chen): sgron ma yang / /chos dbyings rab tu snang ba mdzad/ /chu dwangs rin chen 'od gsal ba/ /ji ltar dri med chu dwangs byed/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas mthong bas kyang / /'gro ba'i dbang
58a6(phal chen): po dag par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su smon lam rab tu 'phrul ba'i zla ba'i rgyal pos/ /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par
58a7(phal chen): bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /phyogs 'di in+d+ra nI la yis/ /kha dog mdog gcig byas pa ltar/ /sangs rgyas mthong bas skye dgu rnams/ /de bzhin
58b1(phal chen): byang chub mdog tu 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rdul phran re re la/ /rnam par 'phrul ba sna tshogs rnams/ /tshad kyis gzhal du med pa ston/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam dag mdzad/ /de ni rmad
58b2(phal chen): byung shin tu zab/ /mtha' yas bsgrub pa dga' ba ste/ /blo ldan ye shes yul de la/ /'jig rten rnams ni 'bab mi nus/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsgrub don du/ /bkod pa phun sum
58b3(phal chen): tshogs pa dang / /sangs rgyas tshul gyis rnam sbyangs pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa ston/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsam yas pa/ /blo ldan bskor ba'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /kun nas
58b4(phal chen): gang bar gyur pa yang / /rgyal ba de la ston pa mdzad/ /chos kun mnga' sgyur ston pa ste/ /shAkya'i khyu mchog skyes par gyur/ /de yi cho 'phrul tshad med pa/ /'di dag rab tu byung ba
58b5(phal chen): yin| |brtan pa'i spyod pa sna tshogs rnams/ /tshad med rnam par gzigs gyur nas/ /rnam par 'phrul ba mtha' yas pa/ /tshad med gzi can ston pa mdzad/ /'jig rten mgon po
58b6(phal chen): rgyal sras rnams/ /chos kyi dbyings la slob pa mdzad/ /chos rnams thams cad yongs la yang / /chags med ye shes spyod yul 'gyur/ /skyes bu dbang po'i byin rlabs kyis/ /cho
58b7(phal chen): 'phrul brgya dang rab ldan zhing / /'jig rten thams cad rnam sbyong ba'i/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /sems can gtso bo'i yul la yang / /ye shes dkyil 'khor yongs
59a1(phal chen): sbyangs shing / /shes rab chen po'i klu chen rnams/ /'jig rten thams cad 'grel bar 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi don gyi blo gros
59a2(phal chen): gzi brjid rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /drang srong dam pa'i mchog
59a3(phal chen): rnams kyi/ /dus gsum nyan thos gang byung ba/ /de dag kun gyis bde gshegs kyi/ /gshegs thabs 'jog 'deg mi shes so/ /dus gsum ma lus thams cad kyi/ /ma
59a4(phal chen): nor rang rgyal gang byung ba/ /de dag gis kyang mgon po yi/ /gshegs thabs 'jog 'deg mi rig go /ma rig mun pas bsgribs pa rnams/ /khyi ltar ltong la brgyus pa yi/ /
59a5(phal chen): sems can de 'dra kun gyis ni/ /mgon po mi shes smos mi dgos/ /rgyal ba tshad mas gzhal ba min/ /de ni shes par mi nus te/ /sangs rgyas chags med ye shes can/ /tshig
59a6(phal chen): gi lam las shin tu 'das/ /zla ba nya rgyas 'od mnga' ba/ /brtan pa mtshan gyis rnam par bris/ /de ni bskal pa dpag yas par/ /rnam 'phrul thog med spyod pa mdzad/ /tshul
59a7(phal chen): sgo re res sangs rgyas la/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag bsams byas kyang / /bskal pa bye ba bsam yas pa/ /brjod du med pa zad 'gyur gyi/ /rang byung rnams kyi yon tan las/ /phyogs
59b1(phal chen): gcig cha yi mthar mi phyin/ /sangs rgyas de yi zhal bltas kyang / /sangs rgyas chos ni bsam mi khyab/ /gang zhig de la smon byed cing / /gang zhig yid kyis dga' mos pa/ /de dag kun kyang
59b2(phal chen): de 'dra ba'i/ /spyod yul blta dka' 'thob par 'gyur/ /bsod nams ye shes mtha' yas shing / /tshogs chen yangs pas rnam gnon la/ /dri med blo ldan sems gnas pa/ /de dag
59b3(phal chen): 'di yi tshul la 'jug / de dag smon lam rgya che bas/ /sems dang sdom pa rgya che ste/ /rgyal ba'i spyod yul thob gyur cing / /byang chub rgya chen gnon par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
59b4(phal chen): bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
59b5(phal chen): smras so| |chags med ye shes sku mnga' bas/ /rang byung rnams ni sku med de/ /bsam yas ye shes yul mnga' bas/ /de dag bsam par mi nus so/ /'phrin las dkar po bsam
59b6(phal chen): yas pas/ /sangs rgyas sku rab bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /de la 'jig rten gsum mi 'go /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos mdzes/ /chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam sbyangs pas/ /'jig rten kun
59b7(phal chen): tu snang ba mdzad/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sgo yin te/ /ye shes kun gyi gnas chen no/ /chags pa thams cad rnam spangs pas/ /rdul med spros pa mi mnga' 'o/ /ye shes 'od zer rab
60a1(phal chen): 'gyed pas/ /'jig rten kun tu nyi ma 'dra/ /khams gsum thams cad rnam sbyong bas/ /srid pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par gcod/ /byang chub sems dpa'
60a2(phal chen): sgrub pa mdzad/ /byang chub 'byung gnas de bzhin no/ /kha dog mtha' yas ston mdzad kyang / /kha dog kun la gnas pa med/ /sems can kun gyis bsam yas pa'i/ /kha dog
60a3(phal chen): tshad med yongs su ston/ /skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas kyis/ /byang chub bsam yas sbyangs pas na/ /de yi ye shes mthar phyin par/ /brtag par sus kyang mi nus so/ /ye
60a4(phal chen): shes brtan pa zad mi shes/ /rang bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba med/ /de la dus gsum rgyal ba kun/ /skad cig gcig gis rab tu brjod/ /rtag par las gzhan yongs btang
60a5(phal chen): ste| shes ldan byang chub don gnyer bas/ /sems la sems shes bya bar yang / /de la sems skye med par bsam/ /gang gis sangs rgyas bskyed pa yi/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams
60a6(phal chen): bsam mi khyab/ /de dag brjod pa'i yul ma yin/ /shin tu zab pas tshig lam spangs/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam dpal gyi rgyal mtshan
60a7(phal chen): gyis| sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /dran pa rmongs med dag pa rnams/ /chos 'dzin shin tu
60b1(phal chen): nges rtags shing / /blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab la/ /byang chub rgya mtsho mi zad pa/ /de dag yid ni 'di la nges/ /de dag spyod pa'i spyod yul yin/ /de dag shes pa 'dir mi g.yo/ /de dag
60b2(phal chen): 'di la the tshom 'chad/ /de dag skyo bar mi 'gyur te/ /de dag yid kyang zhum mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas chos la rab gzhol bar/ /de dag sems kyang rab tu 'byung / /de dag dad pa rting
60b3(phal chen): tshugs shing / /yang dag 'phags pa rab tu skye/ /dmigs med gnas pa med pa yi/ /ye shes 'di la de dag dga'/ /bskal pa bye bar bsags pa yi/ /yongs su rdzogs pa dge
60b4(phal chen): ba'i chos/ /ye shes 'di 'dod mtshungs med pa/ /de dag thams cad yongs su bsngo/ /'khor ba'i nang na rnam rgyu yang / /'khor ba dag la gnas pa min/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams
60b5(phal chen): rab rtogs pas/ /sangs rgyas yul la rab tu rtse/ /sems can khams na ji snyed du/ /'jig rten phun sum tshogs rgyu ba/ /de dag thams cad brtan pas spangs/ /sangs rgyas phun sum
60b6(phal chen): tshogs la gnas/ /sangs rgyas rtag tu 'byung gyur kyang / /'jig rten don med rab tu gnas/ /chags med spyod pa de dag ni/ /rtag tu sems can don la gnas/ /de dag spyod pa mtshungs
60b7(phal chen): med de| |lus can kun gyis bsam mi khyab/ /'jig rten bde ba kun sems pas/ /de dag sdug bsngal rnam par bzlog /'jig rten kun la snying brtse zhing / /byang chub ye shes rnam
61a1(phal chen): dag pas/ /de dag 'jig rten snang bar gyur/ /'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'grel/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i
61a2(phal chen): rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyar yang / /sangs rgyas sgra ni
61a3(phal chen): rab dkon na/ /the tshom thams cad gcod pa yi/ /dam pa mthong ba ci zhig smos/ /chos kun thugs su chud rtogs pa/ /'jig rten gsum po'i bsod nams stegs/ /sems can
61a4(phal chen): thams cad rnam sbyong ba'i/ /'jig rten sgron ma mthong gis dga'/ /sems can gtso bo ma smad pa'i/ /gzugs kyi sku ni mthong gyur na/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu/ /ngoms
61a5(phal chen): shing tshim pa skyer mi btub/ /mi yi dbang po'i sku gzugs la/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams blta blta zhing / /rang gi dge ba chags med pa/ /gzhan don brtson pa byang chub bsngo/ /thub
61a6(phal chen): pa chen po'i gzugs kyi sku/ /de las tha dad yang dag shes/ /chags med ye shes 'byung 'gyur bas/ /de ni sangs rgyas byang chub sgo/ /sems can bsam yas tshad med pa/ /snang
61a7(phal chen): bas mdzad de theg chen la/ /btsud nas thub pa chen po'i mchog /byang chub dam par lung yang ston/ /bsod nams chen po'i rang bzhin zhing / /ye shes dkyil 'khor shar cing
61b1(phal chen): 'byung / /'jig rten tshad med kun tu snang / /bsod nams phung po rnam 'phel mdzad/ /sdug bsngal dra ba rab tu gcod/ /ye shes phung po rnam par sbyong / /gang gis rgyal ba bsnyen bkur
61b2(phal chen): pa| |de dag ngan song 'jigs pa med/ /rkang gnyis dam pa mthong gyur na/ /shin tu yangs pa'i sems skye ste/ /'od snang gsal ba'i shes rab mthu/ /grangs med pa yang skye bar 'gyur/ /
61b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas skyes bu'i mchog mthong zhing / /byang chub dam par nges par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur bya zhes/ /de dag kun kyang nges par sems/ /de nas byang chub sems
61b4(phal chen): dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi smon lam gyi gzhi rab tu rtogs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /yon tan mtha' yas phun ldan pa/ /shAkya'i
61b5(phal chen): khyu mchog thub mthong nas/ /yongs su bsngo ba byed pa'i sems/ /theg pa che la rnam par 'dag /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /thugs rje mnga' ba brtan pa'i rnams/ /chos kyi 'khor
61b6(phal chen): lo bskor mdzad pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bskal pa khrag khrig phrag brgyar yang / /sems can don la brtson mdzad pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams la lus can rnams/ /
61b7(phal chen): kun gyis lan glan cis kyang nus/ /ngan song gsum po mi bzad par/ /bskal pa bye bar btsos bla yi/ /chags pa thams cad zlog mdzad pa'i/ /ston pa mi mthong ma yin no/ /sems can
62a1(phal chen): kun gyi rgyud rnams na/ /sdug bsngal phung po ci yod pa/ /ma lus nyams su bzod nus kyi/ /sangs rgyas mi mthong ma yin no/ /'jig rten 'di dag thams
62a2(phal chen): cad na/ /tha dad ngan song rgyud yod pa/ /de dag yun ring gnas bla yi/ /sangs rgyas mi thos ma yin no/ /sems can dmyal ba re rer yang / /bskal pa tshad med gnas bla yi/ /mtha'
