62a3(phal chen): yas rgyal bas brnyes pa yi/ /byang chub mchog las ring gnas min/ /ci zhig phyir ni ngan song du/ /yun ring gnas par 'dod ce na/ /rgyal ba'i dbang po mthong ba ni/ /ye shes
62a4(phal chen): 'phel ba'i rgyur 'gyur phyir/ /rgyal ba 'jig rten mchog mthong na/ /sdug bsngal thams cad 'chad par 'gyur/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyod yul gyi/ /ye shes khong du chud
62a5(phal chen): pa 'byung / /sangs rgyas mi yi mchog mthong zhing / /sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/ /byang chub gang gis 'thob pa yi/ /bsod nams tshad med 'phel bar 'gyur/ /sangs
62a6(phal chen): rgyas mthong bas sems can rnams/ /the tshom yid gnyis chad par 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten gyi/ /bsam pa'ang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub
62a7(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings
62b1(phal chen): pa 'di nyid de bas kyang rnam par dbye ba dang / rgya cher brjod pa dang / gsal bar bya ba dang / rab tu brjod pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa dang / shin tu snang bar bya ba dang / rab tu gsal
62b2(phal chen): bar bya ba dang / man ngag bstan pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pas dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can
62b3(phal chen): gyi khams mnyam pa nyid dang / 'jig rten thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang / las kyi rgyud thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi bsam pa mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi
62b4(phal chen): mos pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi snang ba mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus mnyam pa nyid dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po mnyam pa nyid kyis de
62b5(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bstan pa'i tshul bcus yang dag par rab tu ston te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di
62b6(phal chen): lta ste| chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ nam
62b7(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su brjod pa bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste
63a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su skye ba dang / mtha' dang dbus med pa'i mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgo rgya mtsho yongs
63a2(phal chen): su brjod cing bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa'i dge
63a3(phal chen): 'dun snying po byang chub la mngon du gyur pa'i gnas bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar sprul pa/ ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems skad cig
63a4(phal chen): la rab tu dgye zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par dgang ba bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho gzhi mnyam par byin gyis brlab cing / lus
63a5(phal chen): gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ dmigs pa'i gzhi thams cad la sangs rgyas kyis rnam par sprul pa dus gsum thams cad yang dag par gzhol bar
63a6(phal chen): 'gyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la/ dus gsum gyi zhing gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sangs rgyas
63a7(phal chen): kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / bskal pa rgya mtsho yongs su bshad cing bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas
63b1(phal chen): rab tu brjod pa phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlabs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'byung ba bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i seng ge'i khri dang /
63b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i snying po'i rgyan tha mi dad pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa tha dad pa rab tu bskor pa phyi ma'i mthar
63b3(phal chen): byin gyis brlab pa bstan pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ltar seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la bstan pa bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa shin tu bstan pa/ sangs rgyas
63b4(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
63b5(phal chen): bzang pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid kyi don gyi phyogs bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs
63b6(phal chen): pa'i zhal du blta zhing / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge
63b7(phal chen): 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dad dbus med pa la rnam par bltas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab par yang dag par gzhol pa la rnam par bltas nas/ ye shes
64a1(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgyu ma'i chos nyid la rnam par bltas te/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rnam par bltas
64a2(phal chen): nas mtha' dang dbus med pa'i ngag gi lam dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / chos kyi tshul thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /pa spu
64a3(phal chen): gcig la rgya mtsho rgyal ba'i zhing / /zhing kun shin tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam/ /de ni sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor/ /kun gyis yongs bskor sangs rgyas gdan la
64a4(phal chen): bzhugs/ /spu gcig rtse la zhing mang rgya mtsho'i rnams/ /snying po byang chub pad+mo'i gdan gnas pas/ /chos dbyings rgya chen yongs su rgyas bkang zhing / /shing drung dam pa kun na
64a5(phal chen): mgon po snang / /zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran rab mang snyed/ /rgyal ba spu rtse gcig la yongs bzhugs pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor/ /kun kyang
64a6(phal chen): bzang po'i spyod pa ston pa mdzad/ /zhing mchog gcig na rgyal ba bzhugs gyur kyang / /byang chub sems dpa'i sprin mang mi zad pa/ /de dag phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad nas/ /
64a7(phal chen): rab 'byams zhing kun bkang zhing kun kyang 'ong / /zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul phran mnyam pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho 'od/ /phyogs bcu'i chos dbyings rgyas
64b1(phal chen): par kun bkang zhing / /ston pa de la kun kyang 'khor nas ldang / /zhing rnams kun tu gzugs brnyan rab tu ston/ /chos kyi rgyal po rgyal ba'i ye shes mtsho/ /de dag kun kyang bzang po'i
64b2(phal chen): spyod la gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du nye bar 'dong / /rab 'byams zhing rnams kun na 'khod spyod cing / /byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba rab gnas te/ chos kyi sprin mnyan
64b3(phal chen): dpa' bo de dag ni/ /zhing gcig tu'ang bskal pa bye bar spyod/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa byed/ /chos kyi gangs chen mtsho spyod rnam par snang / /smon lam rgya mtsho kun la rab
64b4(phal chen): tu 'jug / de dag sangs rgyas sa yi spyod yul gnas/ /rgyal ba'i chos rnams gzhan dang gzhan byung ba'i/ /de dag kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes/ /sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa rgya
64b5(phal chen): mtsho dang / /rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen yangs la 'jug /bde gshegs chos dbyings kun tu rgyas bkang zhing / /zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran ji snyed pa'i/ /sku yi sprin rnams rtag tu 'gyed
64b6(phal chen): mdzad cing / /chos kyi char gyis byang chub rab la dgod// //bam po brgyad cu rtsa brgyad pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin seng
64b7(phal chen): ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid la/ de bas kyang brnan te dgod par mdzad pa'i don du/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i nang nas/ chos kyi dbyings sgo kun nas rnam par dmigs
65a1(phal chen): pas dus gsum snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer chen po/ 'od zer gyi 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan
65a2(phal chen): pa bkye ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad snang bar mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dze ta'i
65a3(phal chen): tshal du tshogs pa de dag gis/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
65a4(phal chen): cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba dag la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ming du bya ba kha dog sna tshogs dang / rnam pa sna tshogs
65a5(phal chen): su rnam pa dag pa dang / gzhi sna tshogs dang / dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying po byang chub tu phyin te seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa/
65a6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis shin tu mchod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang
65a7(phal chen): rgya bar mthong ste/ la la na ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa tsam du shin tu yangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na/ chos kyi dbyings rgyas par khyab pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor
65b1(phal chen): gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mthong ngo / /la la na ni lha'i gnas na 'dug /la la na ni klu'i gnas na 'dug /la la na ni gnod sbyin gyi gnas na 'dug /la la na ni lha ma yin gyi gnas
65b2(phal chen): na 'dug / la la na ni nam mkha' lding gi gnas na 'dug /la la na ni mi'am ci'i gnas na 'dug /la la na ni lto 'phye chen po'i gnas na 'dug /la la na ni mi'i dbang po'i gnas na 'dug/
65b3(phal chen): la la na ni mi'i 'jig rten gyi grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag na rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang / spyod lam sna tshogs
65b4(phal chen): dang | lus sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnam par dmigs pa sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi mngon par shes pa sna tshogs dang / rigs dang rgyud sna tshogs su byung ba dang / kha dog
65b5(phal chen): rnam par dmigs pa sna tshogs dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba dgye ba sna tshogs dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang / gtam gyi skyes bu'i
65b6(phal chen): gzhi sna tshogs dang / bstan pa'i gzhi sna tshogs dang / tshig dang / nges pa'i tshig sna tshogs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs na chos ston pa mthong bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems
65b7(phal chen): dpa' ji snyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa/ phyogs bcu na rnam par gnas pa/ phyogs kyi rgyud mtha' yas pas 'dus pa/
66a1(phal chen): phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du gtogs pa/ chos sna tshogs kyi sgo dang ldan pa/ phyogs kyi ming du bya ba sna tshogs su gtogs pa/ phyogs sna tshogs kun tu gzhol
66a2(phal chen): ba| phyogs cha rnam pa tha dad par gtogs pa/ phyogs sna tshogs kyi rjes su song ba/ phyogs rgya mtsho sna tshogs su gtogs pa/ 'di lta ste/ shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub
66a3(phal chen): phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub dang byang gi phyogs
66a4(phal chen): mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi zhing gi lhun gyi phyogs dang / sems can gyi lus kyi phyogs dang / sems can gyi ming du bya ba'i phyogs/ sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug
66a5(phal chen): pa'i phyogs dang / phyogs bcu da ltar byung ba'i phyogs dang / nam mkha'i khong thams cad du skra'i rtse mo shin tu phra ba dgod pas dmigs pa'i phyogs dang / zhing thams cad kyi
66a6(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyogs dang / las kyi 'du byed sna tshogs kyis yongs su grub pa'i phyogs dang / skra'i
66a7(phal chen): rtse mo gcig la mtha' dang dbus med pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings kyi ming du bya bar gtogs pa'i phyogs kyi khong du chud pa'i dus gsum gyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid du gzhol bas/ kun
66b1(phal chen): t u gtogs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad tha mi dad pas sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa la mnyam pa'i sgra dbyangs su gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems la gzugs brnyan rab tu
66b2(phal chen): snang bar gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus la mngon par blta pa dmigs par bya bas/ 'khor gyi dkyil
66b3(phal chen): 'khor thams cad du 'gro ba'i tshul dang ldan pa/ bskal pa thams cad la ye shes tha mi dad pa/ zhing thams cad la kun tu snyoms pas/ sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du
66b4(phal chen): gzugs mngon sum du bstan pa/ rnam par dmigs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bstan pas sems can thams
66b5(phal chen): cad 'dul ba rgyun mi 'chad pa mthong bar gyur pa/ de dag thams cad ni/ sngon bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis dge ba'i spyod pa bskal pa mnyam pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos
66b6(phal chen): po bzhis yongs su bsdus pa mthong ba dang / mnyam pa dang / rjes su dran pa dang / bsnyen bkur bas yongs su smin par byas pa dag go /sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
66b7(phal chen): chub tu sems bskyed du btsud pa dag go / de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi drung du gshegs pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bsdus pa dag ste/ de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskal ba mnyam
67a1(phal chen): pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis yongs su shin tu bzung ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
67a2(phal chen): kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs shing / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs par gyur pa dag kyang mthong zhing khong du chud par gyur pa yin te/
67a3(phal chen): la la ni chos kyi sku la 'jug go /la la ni gzugs kyi sku la 'jug go /la la ni sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su bsgrub pa la 'jug go /la la ni pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
67a4(phal chen): su rdzogs pa la 'jug go / la la ni spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i rgyan la 'jug go /la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go /la
67a5(phal chen): la ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go / la la ni sangs rgyas rnam par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin tha mi dad pa rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go /la la ni de
67a6(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi bsnyengs pa la 'jug go / la la ni sangs rgyas kyi tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa rgya mtsho la 'jug go /de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi
67a7(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la 'jug ste/ mos pa sna tshogs dang / lam sna tshogs dang / sgo sna tshogs dang /
67b1(phal chen): 'jug pa sna tshogs dang / 'bab pa sna tshogs dang / tshul sna tshogs dang / rjes su 'brang ba sna tshogs dang / phyogs sna tshogs dang / snod sna tshogs dang / yul sna tshogs dang / 'jig rten
67b2(phal chen): sna tshogs dang / khong du chud pa sna tshogs dang / tshogs sna tshogs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang / thabs sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par
67b3(phal chen): 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la 'jug go / ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyis 'jug pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kun nas brgyan pa dang / byang chub sems
67b4(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum thams cad la thogs pa med par yul snang bar byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha mi dad pa'i ye shes snang
67b5(phal chen): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin nam mkha'i dbyings su snang ba dang /
67b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'thob pas rnam par 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi bsnyengs pa mi mnga'
67b7(phal chen): ba'i rgyan gyis rnam par gnon cing rnam par bsgyings pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad kyi klong gi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
68a1(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du thogs pa med par sgra sgrogs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos
68a2(phal chen): kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis brgyan pa'i 'od kyis byang chub sems dpa'i de dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi rgyal po'i thabs chags pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
68a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad la sangs rgyas rgya
68a4(phal chen): mtsho rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad du tha mi dad pa'i lus snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
68a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tha dad pa'i yul la 'dug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyud kyis rjes su 'jug pa snying rje'i snying po can dang /
68a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi gnas la rten pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin shin tu zhi la rab tu zhi bas kun tu snang ba'i
68a7(phal chen): dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sprul pa bzang po dmigs su med pas kun tu 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhing
68b1(phal chen): thams cad yongs su 'du ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin zhing thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems
68b2(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du dbang po kha dog gis rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du khyad par du 'phags pa'i dkyil
68b3(phal chen): 'khor chags pa med pas rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed pa las byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems
68b4(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la nan tan gyis 'jug pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa ma lus pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa mngon
68b5(phal chen): par bsgrub pas phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho la 'jug pa dang / byang chub
68b6(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyi ma'i mthar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs bcu'i
68b7(phal chen): zhing rgya mtsho da ltar byung ba thams cad yongs su dag par mos pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas thams cad
69a1(phal chen): dang rnam par spyod cing 'grogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad la chags pa med pa'i mthar 'jug pa dang / byang chub
69a2(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skur
69a3(phal chen): 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dbang po rgya mtsho rdo rje'i dbang po lta bu thams cad khong du chud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
69a4(phal chen): 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku gcig pa'i snying bo'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig gi cha la chos kyi dbyings kyi
69a5(phal chen): tshul thams cad khong du chud pas khom par gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du zhing 'byams klas pa bsgrub pa yongs su ston
69a6(phal chen): pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin spyi'u tshugs gzhi la rnam par spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi
69a7(phal chen): zhing thams cad kyi sems can gyi lus tha mi dad par byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi klong thams cad la mngon sum du yang dag par
69b1(phal chen): gzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid yongs su shes pas rab tu 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
69b2(phal chen): dus gsum sems kyi skad cig la tha mi dad pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi rang bzhin
69b3(phal chen): dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par gnon pa'i seng ge dang / byang chub sems
69b4(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes pa'i mig gi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs bcu'i rtsal gyis rnam par gnon
69b5(phal chen): pas yang dag par rtsom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad kun nas mthong ba'i mig gi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
69b6(phal chen): kha dog thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'gro ba shin tu mdzes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin klong mi g.yo ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems
69b7(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos gcig la chos thams cad yongs su 'du bar ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos gcig gi tshig gi lam la nges pa'i ngag gi tshig
70a1(phal chen): tu 'byed pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho
70a2(phal chen): de dag la rab tu 'jug go / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
70a3(phal chen): 'dzin dus gsum gyi mu la mthar thug pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bskal pa thams cad khong du chud pas tha mi dad pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems
70a4(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshul shin tu phra bas stobs bcu khong du chud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mi 'phrogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bskal pa thams
70a5(phal chen): cad du mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs thams cad kun du shugs kyis mngon du 'char ba'i sprin dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting
70a6(phal chen): nge 'dzin mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshor ba thams cad kyis reg pa med pas bde ba'i rgyal mtshan
70a7(phal chen): dang | byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad du nam mkha'i rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skad cig skad cig la 'gro ba snyed
70b1(phal chen): kyi sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi sprin mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od nam mkha' ltar rdul dang bral ba dang / byang
70b2(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha' ltar byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad la dbang po'i rgyan
70b3(phal chen): rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi don rnam par 'byed pa'i sgron ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs bcu'i dkyil
70b4(phal chen): 'khor snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dpal gyi rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad gcig
70b5(phal chen): tu 'dres pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skad cig skad cig la brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyin par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
70b6(phal chen): bsod nams mi zad pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa mthong ba'i yul rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos
70b7(phal chen): thams cad la rdo rje'i seng ge ltar rab tu gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa yongs su bstan pas/ kun tu rnam par
71a1(phal chen): dmigs pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mnan pa'i nyi ma gnon pa dang /
71a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gcig tu spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rab tu zhi bar sgra dbyangs kun tu
71a3(phal chen): sgrog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba'i sa mtshams 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings ma
71a4(phal chen): lus pa thams cad kyi gnas kyi pad+mo'i tshal rab tu rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gnas med pa'i chos kyi nam mkha' la rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub
71a5(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs gcig tu phyogs bcu rgya mtsho yongs su sdud pa'i klong dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi thams cad kyi sgor
71a6(phal chen): 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos rgya mtsho thams cad dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad la 'od rab tu
71a7(phal chen): 'gyed pas rab tu zhi ba'i lus su 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig la mngon par shes pa dang / smon lam thams cad mngon
71b1(phal chen): par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag par thams cad du kun nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
71b2(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyan gcig tu khong du chud par 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad dran pa'i rang bzhin gyi rab tu snang ba dang /
71b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du khyad par chen po dang ldan pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig
71b4(phal chen): gcig gis chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul mtha' yas pa rang gi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings tshul gcig gis/ chos thams
71b5(phal chen): cad tshul gcig par rnam par dgod pa'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gzi brjid kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / byang
71b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can gyi khams mig 'phrul lta bu yongs su bsdu ba'i smon lam dang / spyod pa byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
71b7(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi thams cad tha mi dad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pad+mo'i byin rnam par 'phrul pas kun tu rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
72a1(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi rgyud khong du chud pas mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus sems can
72a2(phal chen): thams cad la mngon du byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtshor 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad yongs su
72a3(phal chen): 'byed pa'i tshul mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba'i gzhi tha dad pa thams cad khong du chud pas mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems
72a4(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin snying rje chen po'i mdzod tha mi dad pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin nyid du rtogs pa'i mtha' la 'jug pa
72a5(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i pho brang la rnam par lta bas seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pa dang / de dag la sogs pa
72a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lam la 'jug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa
72a7(phal chen): rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs par 'jug
72b1(phal chen): pa'i tshul gyis sngon skal pa mnyam par spyad pa yang rjes su dran no/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag dze ta'i tshal du phyin cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na 'khod pa/ seng ge'i khri
72b2(phal chen): rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad+mo'i snying po can/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang mnyam par yangs pa la 'khod pa/ ye shes dang mngon par shes pa
72b3(phal chen): chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba/ ye shes dang mngon par shes pa rno ba dang ldan pa'i sa rjes su thob pa/ ye shes kyi kun tu rnam par spyod pa/ shes rab kyi 'byung gnas kyi rigs su
72b4(phal chen): byung ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mngon du gyur pa/ ye shes kyi mig rab rib med pa dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi kha lo sgyur ba'i rang bzhin thob pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad
72b5(phal chen): dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba/ rtag tu rnam par rtog pa med par chos la spyod pa/ chos kyi dmigs pa thams cad rab tu rtogs pa/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis zhi bar dmigs
72b6(phal chen): pa| 'jig rten thams cad shin tu zhi bas gnas tha dad pa med pa la rab tu gzhol ba/ 'jig rten tha dad pa thams cad du rab tu zhugs pa/ gnas med par zhing thams cad du 'dong ba/
72b7(phal chen): chos kyi gnas thams cad la bstan pa med par chos thams cad bla gab med pa'i gzhal med khang du byin pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba la zhugs pa/ sems
73a1(phal chen): can thams cad la bde ba'i lam ston pa/ ye shes dang rnam par thar pa shin tu 'phags pa'i gnas kyi spyod yul can/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i
73a2(phal chen): mthar phyin pa'i ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par ston pa/ chos rgya mtsho'i
73a3(phal chen): shes rab snang ba'i dkyil 'khor can/ ting nge 'dzin gangs chen mtsho dang ldan pa'i dbyings la shin tu mnyam par bzhag cing snying rje chen po rab tu sems pa/ chos kyi tshul sgyu
73a4(phal chen): ma'i rnam pa lta bu rab tu rtogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rmi lam lta bur zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad mig yor lta bur khong du chud pa/
73a5(phal chen): sgra skad dang / dbyangs thams cad sgra brnyan lta bur rnam par rig pa/ chos thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes sprul pa lta bur rab tu rtogs pa/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i
73a6(phal chen): smon lam shin tu bsags pa/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas rnam par dag pa'i mkhas pa dang ldan pa/ sems shin tu zhi zhing rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa/ gzugs kyi rgyud
73a7(phal chen): thams cad kyi ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis dogs pa med pa kun nas rab tu gnon pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas kyi mthar phyin pa'i mig dang ldan
73b1(phal chen): pa| chos thams cad la dmigs pa med par rnam par spyod pa rab tu thob pa/ shes rab rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la rnam par spyod pa/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu son pa/
73b2(phal chen): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs dang shugs thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbang du gyur pa/
73b3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don mkhas pa la phyin ci log med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ chos kyi mdzod dbye ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa/ nges pa'i tshig shes pa la mngon par
73b4(phal chen): mkhas pa/ spobs pa'i stobs dang / chos kyi sprin zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa/ mi 'jigs pas khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ro 'byin pa/ gnas med pa'i chos kyi dga' ba la dga'
73b5(phal chen): bas mos pa/ chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i mig gis blta ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa'i zla bar gyur pa/ shes rab kyi dkyil 'khor gyis
73b6(phal chen): bden pa'i tshul thams cad la rnam par spyod pa'i 'od zer can/ ye shes kyi rdo rje bsod nams kyi khor yug tu gyur pa/ dper bya ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ chos thams cad
73b7(phal chen): la dbang po dang / ye shes kyi myu gu rab tu skyes pa/ dpa' bo'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa/ bdud thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu snyol ba la dpa' ba/ ye shes mtha' yas pa'i dkyil
74a1(phal chen): 'khor gyi gzi brjid can/ 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la shes rab sgrib pa med pa/ zad pa dang
74a2(phal chen): mi zad pa'i mtha'i ye shes kyis rnam par sangs rgyas pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' kun gyi mthar phyin pa la gnas pa/ mtshan ma med pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes kyi mig mngon sum
74a3(phal chen): can byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i rgyu la mkhas pa/ mi gnyis pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad la rnam
74a4(phal chen): par lta ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud gnas med pa thams cad du gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur pa/ chos thams cad la mun pa dang rnam par bral ba/ ye shes kyi dkyil
74a5(phal chen): 'khor mun pa med pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ phyogs kun tu chos kyi snang ba rab tu bkye ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing mchog tu gyur pa/ thos pa dang / mthong ba
74a6(phal chen): dang | smon lam don yod pa'i zla ba/ bsod nams kyi ri rab 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad tshar gcod pa la shin
74a7(phal chen): tu dpa' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sgra skad dang / dbyangs kyi nga ro 'byin pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mthong bas mi ngoms pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan
74b1(phal chen): gyi dbang bsgyur ba dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba 'dul ba dang mthun pa'i lus su byin gyis rlob pa/ zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad du lus gcig gis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ mngon par 'du bya ba med
74b2(phal chen): pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa thogs pa med par 'gro ba'i ye shes chen po'i theg pa'i gru dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad
74b3(phal chen): du lus rab tu snang ba/ ye shes kyi nyi ma 'gro ba thams cad du shar ba/ 'gro ba thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dga' ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam
74b4(phal chen): pa dang dbang po rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can/ chos thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i yul du khong du chud pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin skye ba med pa rnam par rig pa/ phra ba
74b5(phal chen): dang yangs pa phan tshun du yongs su bsdu ba la dbang bsgyur ba sangs rgyas kyi sa zab mo'i tshul nges par rtogs pa/ don zab mo'i tshig dang / yi ge'i tha snyad la mkhas pa/ tshig dang /
74b6(phal chen): yi ge dang / don mi zad pa rab tu brjod pa/ mdo sde rgya mtsho thams cad tshig gcig tu chud par rab tu ston pa/ gzungs dang ye shes kyi lus rgya chen po byin gyis rlob pa/ bskal pa
74b7(phal chen): mtha' yas par yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs dang ldan pa'i byin gyi rlabs can/ sems kyi skad cig gcig gis bskal pa brjod du med par gnas pa rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can/
75a1(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig gcig gis dus gsum shes pa/ 'jig rten thams cad mngon par shes pa/ chos kyi gzungs kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho mtha' yas
75a2(phal chen): pa dran zhing spobs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis shes par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir mi ldog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul la ye shes snang ba rab tu
75a3(phal chen): thob pa/ gya nom par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa/ chags pa med pa'i mtha'i chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la mngon par mkhas pa/ chos
75a4(phal chen): thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i yul la ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba/ dmigs pa thams cad la rgyan bzang por byin gyis rlob pa/ chos kyi
75a5(phal chen): dbyings phyogs med pa la phyogs kyi rjes su 'brang bas rab tu zhugs pa/ phyogs thams cad rnam par dbye bas chos kyi dbyings las yang dag par gzhol ba shin tu phra ba ste/
75a6(phal chen): yangs pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba la byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba rang bzhin kha dog thams cad yongs su ston pa/ phyogs gcig la yang dag par gzhol ba de lta bu'i yon
75a7(phal chen): tan dang ye shes mtha' yas pas yang dag par bskyed de/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi snying po dang ldan par gyur pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa/ bsngags pa/ bkur
75b1(phal chen): ba| tshig dang / yi ge mi zad pas yon tan dang legs pa brjod du yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dze ta'i tshal du 'dus te 'khod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la
75b2(phal chen): 'jug pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis rab tu snang bar gyur pa de dag gi lus thams cad dang / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod de
75b3(phal chen): dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stan de dag dang / dze ta'i tshal thams cad nas kyang / dga' ba chen po'i shugs rab tu thob pa'i chos nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos snang ba
75b4(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu thob pas/ dga' ba'i shugs las byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i rgyan mngon par 'thon nas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /
75b5(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ sems kyi skad cig re re la 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin shin tu yangs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa mngon par 'thon te/ phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par
75b6(phal chen): gyur to/ /rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i sprin mngon par 'thon te/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang / legs pa rab tu brjod pa'i sprin gyi nga ro rjes su
75b7(phal chen): bsgrags pas phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /dmigs pa thams cad las 'gro ba thams cad kyi rol mo'i sprin mngon par 'thon te/ sems can thams cad kyi las dang
76a1(phal chen): rnam par smin pa/ rol mo'i sgra snyan par blang bas rjes su sgrog cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon
76a2(phal chen): lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa'i tshul gyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sgra
76a3(phal chen): dbyangs rab tu sgrog pas phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de
76a4(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dbyangs rjes su brjod cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam
76a5(phal chen): par brgyan pa'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ zhing thams cad du byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba gcig nas skye ba gcig tu brgyud pa rab tu brjod cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab
76a6(phal chen): par gyur to/ /dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i snying po byang chub kyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par
76a7(phal chen): byang chub pa'i rgyan byung ba yongs su ston cing / phyogs bcu sangs rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /dmigs pa thams cad las klu'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon
76b1(phal chen): nas| spos sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bebs shing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po'i lus dang 'dra ba'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/
76b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su brjod pa byed cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /zhing yongs su dag pa rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin yongs
76b3(phal chen): kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mngon par ston cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur
76b4(phal chen): to| |de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byin gyi rlabs dang / chos kyi snang ba rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu thob pa'i chos nyid kyi rgyan chen po rnam par sprul pa'i
76b5(phal chen): sprin| sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis rnam par 'phrul
76b6(phal chen): pa de dag yongs su ston pa byed cing / phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /dze ta'i tshal du sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs/ /mtha' yas rgya chen yongs
76b7(phal chen): su byung la ltos/ /dmigs pa kun las lus kyi sprin chen rnams/ /mngon par 'thon cing phyogs rnams kun tu khyab/ /bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi sna tshogs rgyan/ /kha dog mtha'
77a1(phal chen): yas rgya chen rnam dag pa/ /stan dang dmigs pa yongs su bcas pa la/ /de dag thams cad gzugs brnyan byung ba snang / /rgyan rnams sna tshogs rin chen 'od
77a2(phal chen): 'phro'i sprin/ /bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi spu rtse las/ /sangs rgyas gsung rnams rab tu sgrog byed cing / /zhing rnams kun gyi dbyings su khyab par 'phro/ /tshangs pa'i dbang
77a3(phal chen): po'i gzugs 'dra lus rnams dang / /spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dag pa'i gzugs/ /zhing gi me tog kun las mngon 'thon te/ /bsam gtan yan lag brjod cing kun tu 'dong / /
77a4(phal chen): kun tu bzang po 'dra ba'i rgyal ba'i sras/ /mtshan rab dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i lus/ /grangs med bsam yas bde gshegs pa spu las/ /sprul pa de 'dra thogs pa med
77a5(phal chen): par 'byung / /bde gshegs sras po dus gsum byung ba rnams/ /yon tan rgya mtsho'i legs pa brjod pa dag /rgya mtsho che mnyam rgyan sprin de dag kun/ /dze ta'i tshal na gnas
77a6(phal chen): shing rab tu brjod/ /phyogs rnams kun gyi sems can yongs kyi las/ /rgya mtsho chen po sna tshogs ma lus par/ /dze ta'i tshal gyi shing gi gzugs rnams kyi/ /gseb nas byung
77a7(phal chen): bar gyur pa kun tu grags/ /dus gsum 'byung ba'i rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /zhing rnams kun gyi ma lus rnam 'phrul pa/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed de dag kyang / /so so
77b1(phal chen): dmigs kyi dmigs par gyur pa snang / /sangs rgyas phyogs kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i sprin/ /spu rtse re rer sna tshogs rnams phye ba'i/ /sangs rgyas gnas rnams skad cig re rer snang / /
77b2(phal chen): de dag la yang sangs rgyas sprin mang bzhugs/ /'gro dang mnyam par phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing / /sems can thabs kyis yongs su smin par byed/ /de dag 'od las spos kyi
77b3(phal chen): 'od 'phro dang / /me tog phal chen rgya mtsho sprin kyang 'byung / /mkha' ltar tshad med rin chen gzhal med khang / /ma lus rgyan rab kun gyis rnam mdzes pa/ /de dag thams cad phyogs
77b4(phal chen): rnams kun khyab byed/ /zhing dang snying po byang chub de bzhin no/ /dus gsum byung ba'i rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i rnam tshul du/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho
77b5(phal chen): rnam par dag byas pa'i/ /rgyan rab sna tshogs 'gro ltar tshad med pa/ /phyogs rnams dus gsum kun tu gang byung rnams/ /bskal pa rgya mtsho chen por rnam sbyangs pa/ /de dag kun
77b6(phal chen): kyang dze ta'i nags tshal gyi/ /bar snang mkha' la gzugs brnyan tshul du snang / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyud shin tu snang bar byas pa de dag
77b7(phal chen): las| |byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang / snying rje chen po'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du zhugs par gyur nas/ de dag de bas kyang 'gro ba thams
78a1(phal chen): cad la phan pa dang / yongs su bsdu ba'i don du zhugs par gyur te/ de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa de dag gi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi
78a2(phal chen): zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon par gyur te/ 'od zer de dag gi sgo re re nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'phrul pa'i sprin/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po
78a3(phal chen): thams cad dang 'dra ba'i lus dang / 'gro ba thams cad la mngon par blta ba'i lus dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'phrod pa'i las dang ldan pa
78a4(phal chen): mngon par 'thon te/ mngon par 'thon nas kyang / phyogs thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bkang nas/ sems can thams cad yang dag par bskul zhing yongs su
78a5(phal chen): smin par bya ba dang / gdul bar byed do/ /lha'i gnas nas shi 'phos pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang /
78a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / rmi lam yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
78a7(phal chen): kyis sems can yongs su bskul ba byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyis 'byung ba'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su bskyod pa'i sgo dang / sbyin
78b1(phal chen): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan la nan tan du bya ba dang rab tu bsgrub pa'i sgo dang / yan lag dang nying lag
78b2(phal chen): gcod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bstan pa'i
78b3(phal chen): sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi lam gyi dkyil
78b4(phal chen): 'khor snang ba rab tu brjod pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba'i phyir chos kyi tshig dang / yi ge re re'i phyir lus grangs med pa yongs su gtong ba yongs su
78b5(phal chen): bstan pa'i sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro zhing chos thams cad yongs su dri ba'i sgo dang / dus la ji ltar 'bab pa dang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro
78b6(phal chen): ba'i drung du 'gro zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par 'gyur ba thob par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho snang ba'i rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i sgo dang / byang chub sems
78b7(phal chen): dpa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad bdud dang phas kyi rgol bas mi tshugs pa'i stobs kyi rgyal mtshan yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / bzo thams cad shes shing
79a1(phal chen): mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags par shes shing / mkhas pa dang ldan
79a2(phal chen): pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i khyad par shes shing / mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo
79a3(phal chen): dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la 'jug pa'i thabs kyis nyon mongs pa dang bag chags sna tshogs yang dag par gzhom pa la shes shing / mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i
79a4(phal chen): ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / de dag la sogs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i thabs dang / bsdu ba'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du
79a5(phal chen): med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems can thams cad kyi gnas su phyin par snang ste/ la la ni lha'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la
79a6(phal chen): ni klu'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni gnod sbyin gyi gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni dri za'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni lha ma yin gyi gnas su phyin par
79a7(phal chen): snang ngo / /la la ni nam mkha' lding gi gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni mi'am ci'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni lto phye chen po'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /
79b1(phal chen): la la ni tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni mi'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni gshin rje'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni yi dwags kyi gnas thams
79b2(phal chen): cad du phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten thams cad du phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni yi dwags kyi skye gnas kyi rgyud thams cad du phyin par snang ste/ mthong
79b3(phal chen): bas 'dul ba'i sems can dang / thos pas 'dul ba dang / rjes su dran pas 'dul ba dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'dul ba dang / ming gi chu klung gi sgras 'dul ba dang / 'od
79b4(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu dgye bas 'dul ba dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul
79b5(phal chen): ba'i phyir snying rje chen po tha mi dad pa dang / smon lam tha mi dad pa dang / ye shes tha mi dad pa dang / sems can yongs su bsdu ba tha mi dad pa'i tshul du/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag
79b6(phal chen): dze ta'i tshal nas rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyan pa sna tshogs kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad rgyas par
79b7(phal chen): 'gengs pa byed par snang yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas mi g.yo ste/ la la ni rang gi gnas dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / stan dang / 'khor du bcas pas phyogs
80a1(phal chen): bcu rgyas par byed par snang yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas mi g.yo'o/ /la la ni sprul pa'i sprin rab tu 'gyed par snang / la la ni
80a2(phal chen): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du gcig pu gnyis su med par 'gro bar snang yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas mi g.yo'o/ /la la ni dge sbyong
80a3(phal chen): gi gzugs/ la la ni tshangs pa'i gzugs/ la la ni brtul zhugs can thams cad kyi cha byad dang / cho ga dang / chu zheng gi gzugs/ la la ni sman pa'i gzugs/ la la ni tshong
80a4(phal chen): pa'i gzugs/ la la ni snyan pas 'tsho ba'i gzugs/ la la ni gar mkhan gyi gzugs/ la la ni lha khyer ba'i gzugs/ la la ni bzo thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzugs su grong
80a5(phal chen): dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du phyin par snang ste/ dus kyi dbang gis dus kyi rjes su 'brang zhing / ming dang / gzugs
80a6(phal chen): dang / lus mngon par bsgrub pa tha dad pa dang / lus kyi kha dog dang / dbyibs tshul dang 'dra ba dang / dbyangs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / skad rnam pa tha dad pa dang / spyod lam rnam
80a7(phal chen): pa tha dad pa dang / gnas rnam pa tha dad pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad mig 'phrul lta bur shes pa dang / bzo'i 'khor thams cad rab tu brjod
80b1(phal chen): pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi shes pa brjod pas snang ba'i sgron ma dang / bde ba thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis brgyan pa dang / las thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od dang ldan
80b2(phal chen): pa dang / phyogs thams cad theg pa la gnas pas rab tu sbyong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba la spyod cing / sems can
80b3(phal chen): yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i don du grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i gnas dag tu phyin par snang ngo / /de nas 'jam dpal
80b4(phal chen): gzhon nur gyur pa gnas pa med pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa na 'dug 'dug pa las/ bskal pa mthun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lag na rdo rje dag dang /
80b5(phal chen): 'jig rten thams cad kyi nyams blta ba la brtson zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur bar smon pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i lus kyi rigs su gtogs pa'i lha dag dang / sngon gyi smon
80b6(phal chen): lam gyis rjes su 'brang ba'i rkang gis 'gro ba'i rigs su gtogs pa'i lha dag dang / chos mnyan pa la mngon par mos pa'i sa'i lha dag dang / snying rje chen po la brtson pa'i lu ma dang /
80b7(phal chen): mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing bu dang / khron pa dang / chu klung gi lha dag dang / shes rab kyi 'od snang bas rab tu gsal ba'i me'i lha dag dang / rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa'i rlung gi lha dag
81a1(phal chen): dang / chos kyi phyogs snang bar khong du chud pa'i phyogs kyi lha dag dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal ba la brtson pa'i mtshan mo'i lha dag dang / de bzhin
81a2(phal chen): gshegs pa'i nyi ma mngon par bsgrub pa la brtson pa'i nyi ma'i lha dag dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi nam mkha' brgyan pa la brtson pa'i nam mkha'i lha dag dang / 'gro ba
81a3(phal chen): thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar brtson pa'i gangs chen mtsho'i lha dag dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du tshogs yang dag par bsags pa la brtson zhing / dge ba'i
81a4(phal chen): rtsa ba'i sgo mngon par 'phags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i ri'i lha dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi lus brgyan par brtson zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kha dog dang / byin gyi
81a5(phal chen): rlabs la smon cing brtson pa'i chu klung gi lha dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi grong rdal yongs su bskyang bar brtson pa'i grong gi lha dag dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i
81a6(phal chen): chos kyi grong khyer du smon cing mos pa'i klu'i dbang po dag dang / sems can thams cad yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dag dang / sems can thams cad
81a7(phal chen): kyi dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba la brtson pa'i dri za'i dbang po dag dang / yi dwags kyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog pa la brtson pa'i grul bum gyi dbang po dag
81b1(phal chen): dang / sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho nas gdon pa'i smon lam gyis zhugs pa'i nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dag dang / 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa'i de bzhin
81b2(phal chen): gshegs pa'i sku dang / stobs yongs su bsgrub par smon lam yongs su bskyed pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas dga' bar gyur cing / lus rab
81b3(phal chen): tu 'dud pa'i lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang / 'khor ba las skyo ba'i yid dang ldan zhing ngor lta ba'i lha'i dbang po dag dang / rim gro chen po rab tu byed cing lus rab tu 'dud pa'i
81b4(phal chen): tshangs pa'i dbang po dag dang / lhan cig tu de dag gis rim gro chen pos mngon par bstod de mchod cing / de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa'i rgyan phun sum tshogs
81b5(phal chen): pa dang ldan par rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba lan brgya phrag du ma zhig tu byas nas/ mchod pa rnam pa du mas mchod de/ bcom
81b6(phal chen): ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung nas/ lho phyogs logs su yul rgyu zhing song ngo // //bam po brgyad cu rtsa dgu pa/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ tshe dang
81b7(phal chen): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra bas dze ta'i tshal nas byung ste/ lho phyogs logs
82a1(phal chen): su 'gro ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du gyur te/ bdag kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba dang lhan cig tu yul rgyu zhing 'gro'o snyam nas/ de dge slong drug
82a2(phal chen): cu tsam gyis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas
82a3(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung ste/ 'jam
82a4(phal chen): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der/ dge slong lhan cig tu spyod pa rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa gsar du zhugs pa sha stag ste/ 'di ltar dge slong rgya mtsho'i blo dang / legs
82a5(phal chen): par byin pa chen po dang / bsod nams kyi 'od dang / bu chen po dang / kun khyab sbyin pa dang / rnam dag spyod pa dang / lha'i dpal dang / dbang po'i blo gros dang / tshangs pa'i
82a6(phal chen): dam pa dang / dge slong zhi ba'i blo gros dang / de dag la sogs pa'i dge slong drug cu tsam kun kyang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa/ mos pa zab mor gyur
82a7(phal chen): pa| dad pa'i mig yongs su dag pa/ sems rgya chen pos yongs su spyod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par blta ba la mthu yod pa/ chos kyi ngo bo nyid dang rang bzhin nges par rtogs
82b1(phal chen): pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ gzhan la phan par gyur pa'i blo can de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la mngon par mos pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i chos bstan pas 'dul ba sha
82b2(phal chen): stag dang 'grogs shing mdun du byas te/ sngon du bdar nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ de ltar lam du zhugs te
82b3(phal chen): 'dong ba'i tshe/ dge slong de dag kun la bltas nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i blo la smras pa/ rgya mtsho'i blo/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam
82b4(phal chen): par brgyan cing yongs su dag pa/ lha dang mir bcas par bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag cing sems can tshad med pa'i dga' ba yongs su skyed pa
82b5(phal chen): dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba'i rgyan sems can dpag tu med pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bzung ba dang / lam
82b6(phal chen): gyi rgyan mgron lam mig mangs ris su gnas pa dang / lam rnam par gnon pa'i rgyan phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la mngon par lta bar gnas pa dang / bsod nams phun sum
82b7(phal chen): tshogs pa'i rgyan g.yas g.yon nas gter chen po mngon par 'thon pa dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas la rim gro byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang rgyu mthun pas shing gi gseb thams cad nas
83a1(phal chen): rgyan mang po 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad la mchod pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs shing btud de phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyogs
83a2(phal chen): bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mang po bkye ba sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu sgrog cing spyi bor 'char ba la ltos shig ces/ de dag la sogs pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lam du zhugs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan tshad med pa dag dge slong de dag la yongs su bstan to/
83a3(phal chen): /
83a4(phal chen): brjod do/ /bshad do/ /smos so/ /bkrol lo/ /rab tu brjod do/ /rnam par phye'o/ /gsal bar byas so/ /de ltar gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i
83a5(phal chen): yon tan ji tsam du brjod pa de tsam du dge slong de dag gi sems rnam par dag par gyur to/ /rab tu dang bar gyur to/ /dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar gyur to/ /mos pa skyes par
83a6(phal chen): gyur to/ /de dag gi sems kyi rgyud las su rung bar gyur to/ /dbang po rab tu dang bar gyur to/ /yid bde ba rnam par 'phel bar gyur to/ /yid mi bde ba rab tu byang bar gyur
83a7(phal chen): to| |sems kyi skyon dang bral bar gyur to/ /sgrib pa thams cad phyir ldog par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas blta ba la mngon par mos par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos la sems
83b1(phal chen): rab tu gzhol bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po yongs su dag par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i shugs skyes par gyur to/ /snying rje chen po 'byung bar gyur
83b2(phal chen): to| |pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor gnon par gyur to/ /snying rje chen po yongs su skyes par gyur to/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yongs su snang bar gyur to/ /de ltar de dag
83b3(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos pa'i shugs thob par gyur nas 'di skad 'dzer to/ /mkhan po/ bdag cag kyang skyes bu dam pa de'i drung du phyin par mdzad du gsol zhes nas/ de nas
83b4(phal chen): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dge slong de dag dang 'grogs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der song nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ dge slong 'di dag ni khyod la
83b5(phal chen): blta bar 'dod pa dag go / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i phyogs de tsam dang bcas pa glang po'i lta stangs kyi sa gzi
83b6(phal chen): dang ldan par khyab par bltas pa dang / de'i rjes la dge slong de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces
83b7(phal chen): smras so/ /skyes bu dam pa khyod mthong ba dang / khyod la phyag 'tshal ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dang / bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan khyod kyis mkhyen pa dang / mkhan pos thugs su chud pa
84a1(phal chen): dang / gang yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas mngon du gzigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des khyod ci 'dra bar de 'dra bar gyur te/ rnam pa
84a2(phal chen): 'di 'dra ba'i lus thob par shog cig / rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i dbyangs dang / rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i mtshan dang / 'di lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa dag kyang khyod ji lta ba bzhin thob par
84a3(phal chen): shog cig ces/ dge slong de dag gis de skad du smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /dge slong dag /yongs su mi skyo ba'i
84a4(phal chen): sems bskyed pa bcu dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la zhugs pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa lta smos kyang ci smos kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
84a5(phal chen): sa yang gnon par 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba la yongs su mi skyo
84a6(phal chen): ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags pa las phyir mi ldog cing / yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / chos thams cad btsal ba la yongs su mi skyo
84a7(phal chen): ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad sbyor ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad
84b1(phal chen): yongs su bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / dus gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du 'jug pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs
84b2(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho rgyas par dgang zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul
84b3(phal chen): ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / zhing dang bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /
84b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyar bas/ sems can gcig yongs su smin par bya ba'i tshul du sems can thams cad yongs su smin
84b5(phal chen): par bya bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gcig yongs su bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa'o/ /dge slong dag /yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu po 'di
84b6(phal chen): dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'khor ba'i rgyud thams cad las phyir ldog
84b7(phal chen): par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad las gyen du 'phags par 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad las yongs su 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin
85a1(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam la yang dag par 'grub par
85a2(phal chen): 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan gyi nan tan la rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /
85a3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs la yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad rab tu 'dul bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
85a4(phal chen): sa yongs su gnon par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang shin tu nye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dge slong de dag gis chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad
85a5(phal chen): rnam par mthong ba la chags pa med pa'i mig gi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ /de'i mthus phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na
85a6(phal chen): bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi 'gro ba'i rgyud du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma lus
85a7(phal chen): par mthong bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can rnams kyang ma lus par mthong bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang rnam par phye ba sna tshogs
85b1(phal chen): su mthong bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag na rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu shes par gyur to/ /sems can de dag gi rin po che'i gnas
85b2(phal chen): dang longs spyod de dag kyang mthong bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho yang thos par gyur to/ /chos bstan pa de dag kyang tshig dang / yi ge dang / nges
85b3(phal chen): pa'i tshig dang / skad dang / ming dang / brdas yongs su shes par gyur to/ /sems can de dag gi sems dang / dbang po dang / bsam pa la yang rnam par lta bar gyur to/ /sngon gyi mtha'
85b4(phal chen): dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i tshe rabs bcu yang rjes su dran par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi 'khor lo bcu'i nges pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa la yang rab tu zhugs
85b5(phal chen): par gyur to/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /bstan pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur
85b6(phal chen): to| |rjes su bstan pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa
85b7(phal chen): bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag stong phrag bcu yang yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu
86a1(phal chen): yang yongs su non par gyur to/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i yan lag stong phrag bcu yang rnam par dag par gyur te/ snang ba chen po rab tu thob cing shes rab chen
86a2(phal chen): po'i dkyil 'khor gyis snang bar gyur pa de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bcu rab tu thob par gyur to/ /de ltar mngon par shes pa'i myu gu gzhon zhing shin tu
86a3(phal chen): phra ba thob ste/ byang chub tu sems skyes pa brtan pa la gnas pa de dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul
86a4(phal chen): nas rab tu bkod do/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la rab tu gnas pa de dag smon lam chen po rgya mtsho la zhugs shing mngon par bsgrub par gyur to/ /
86a5(phal chen): de ltar smon lam chen po rgya mtshos mngon par bsgrubs pa'i sems rnam par dag pas lus yongs su dag pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /lus rnam par dag pas lus yang ba rab tu thob
86a6(phal chen): par gyur to/ /de ltar lus rnam par dag pa dang / lus yang bas mngon par shes pa'i sgo de dag shin tu yangs par byed pas mi nyams shing / rjes su 'brang ba'i mngon par
86a7(phal chen): shes pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /mngon par shes pa de dag thob pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa'i drung nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs
86b1(phal chen): su bsgrub pa'i phyir phyogs bcur yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i 'phrin las kyi sprin mngon par bsgrub par gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong
86b2(phal chen): de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod nas/ mthar gyis yul rgyu zhing lho phyogs logs skyid pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i grong rdal chen po gang na ba der
86b3(phal chen): logs su song ste phyin nas/ grong rdal chen po skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi shar phyogs logs na nags tshal chen po sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan ces bya ba sngon gyi sangs rgyas bzhugs bzhugs
86b4(phal chen): pa'i mchod rten/ sems can smin par mdzad pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ zhing mtha' yas par ming gi sgra rjes su grags pa/ sngon chad bcom ldan
86b5(phal chen): 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ yongs su btang bar dga' ba du ma yongs su btang ste/ sa'i phyogs de na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
86b6(phal chen): dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod pa la brtson pa'i gnas yod pa der/ 'khor dang
86b7(phal chen): bcas te phyin nas/ der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mdo sde chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu 'byung ba bstan to/ /
87a1(phal chen): de bstan pa'i tshe/ rgya mtsho chen po nas klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma nye bar lhags te/ de dag gis chos kyi tshul de thos nas/ klu'i rgyud la rnam par smod
87a2(phal chen): cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la mos par gyur nas klu'i rgyud rnam par bzlog ste/ lha dang mir skya ba yongs su 'dzin par gyur nas/ der klu stong phrag bcu bla na med par
87a3(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /chos de bstan pa'i tshe/ sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa theg pa gsum gyis dus gzhan dang gzhan du rnam
87a4(phal chen): par dul bar gyur to/ /de nas skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi mi rnams kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal du phyin te/ sA la sna tshogs kyi
87a5(phal chen): rgyan gyi gzhi 'di nyid na rnam par spyod do zhes thos nas/ dge bsnyen tshong dpon shes rab chen po la sogs pa dge bsnyen pha dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mang
87a6(phal chen): po dag so so nas 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya dang bcas te/ skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal nas byung nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba dar dong ngo / /de la dge bsnyen
87a7(phal chen): shes rab chen po ni/ dge bsnyen bzang pos byin dang / lhas byin dang / bsod nams 'od dang / grags pa'i lha dang / grags pas byin dang / zla ba'i dpal dang / zla ba dga'
87b1(phal chen): bo dang / blo gros bzang po dang / blo gros chen po dang / sgra gcan bzang po dang / dge bsnyen bzang po'i dpal dang / de dag la sogs pa dge bsnyen lnga brgyas ba skor cing mdun du byas
87b2(phal chen): te| 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan
87b3(phal chen): gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de la dge bsnyen ma shes rab chen mo ni/ dge bsnyen ma 'od bzang mo dang / lus bzang mo dang / dge ba yod pa dang / dge ba'i
87b4(phal chen): dpal dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / dpal gyi 'od dang / dpal bzang mo dang / dge bsnyen ma mig bzang mo dang / de dag la sogs pa dge bsnyen ma lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/
87b5(phal chen): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan
87b6(phal chen): gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de la tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang ni tshong dpon gyi bu brtul zhugs bzang po dang / tshul khrims bzang po dang / ngang tshul
87b7(phal chen): bzang po dang / rnam par gnon pa bzang po dang / bsam pa bzang po dang / blo gros bzang po dang / blo bzang po dang / mig bzang po dang / lag pa bzang po dang / tshong dpon gyi bu 'od
88a1(phal chen): bzang po dang / de dag la sogs pa tshong dpon gyi bu lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam
88a2(phal chen): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de la khyim
88a3(phal chen): bdag shes rab chen po'i bu mo dge ba bzang mo ni/ bu mo bzang mo dang / yid du 'ong ba'i bzhin dang / brtan pa'i blo gros dang / dpal bzang mo dang / tshangs pas byin pa dang / dpal
88a4(phal chen): gyi 'od dang / bu mo 'od bzang mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i
88a5(phal chen): rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
88a6(phal chen): pas skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal nas skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo de dag 'dus te 'khod par shes nas/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa'i byin gyis
88a7(phal chen): zil gyis gnan te/ byams pa chen po'i byin gyis sim par byas nas/ snying rje chen po'i byin gyis chos bstan pa mngon par bsgrubs te/ ye shes kyi byin gyis sems dang bsam pa
88b1(phal chen): rnam par phye nas tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa chen pos chos bstan par dga' ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la bltas so/ /tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang zhes bya ba/ ci'i phyir nor
88b2(phal chen): bzang zhes bya zhe na/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang zhes bya ba/ thog ma ma'i mngal du zhugs ma thag tu khyim de'i 'khor kun nas rnam par phye ba'i rin po che sna bdun gyi sdong po 'thon par
88b3(phal chen): gyur to/ /rin po che'i sdong po de dag gi 'og na rin po che'i gter bdun yod de/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang / asma gar b+ha dang / mu sa ra gal
88b4(phal chen): pa dang / rin po che de bdun gyi rin po che'i sdong po de dag kyang gter de dag nas skyes te/ sa'i gzhi brtol nas mngon par 'thon par gyur to/ /de yan lag dang nying lag thams cad
88b5(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs te/ zla ba bcu lon nas btsas pa dang / de'i tshe gter chen po bdun po de dag kyang chu zheng dang / rngams su khru bdun tsam du sa'i steng nas mngon par 'phags te snang bar
88b6(phal chen): byung nas rnam par snang zhing mdzes par gyur to/ /khyim der rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod lnga brgya yang byung bar gyur te/ 'di ltar mar gyi snod dang / til mar gyi snod dang / sbrang rtsi'i snod
88b7(phal chen): dang | mar gsar gyi snod dang / gzhan dag kyang so so nas yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba dag ste/ 'di ltar rdo rje'i snod spos sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang /
89a1(phal chen): spos kyi snod gos sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / man shel gyi snod kha zas dang spyan gzigs sna tshogs ro mchog tu zhim pas yongs su gang ba
89a2(phal chen): dang | nor bu'i snod rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / gser gyi snod dngul sil mas yongs su gang ba dang / dngul gyi snod gser phyes yongs su gang ba dang / phra men
89a3(phal chen): gyi snod nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Yas yongs su gang ba dang / shel gyi snod mu sa ra gal pas yongs su gang ba dang / mu sar gal pa'i snod rin po che shel gyis yongs su gang ba dang /
89a4(phal chen): asma gar b+ha'i snod mu tig dmar pos yongs su gang ba dang / mu tig dmar po'i snod asma gar b+has yongs su gang ba dang / nor bu rin po skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi snod nor bu rin po
89a5(phal chen): che chu 'dang gis yongs su gang ba dang / nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gi snod nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyis yongs su gang ba dang / de dag la sogs pa rin po che'i snod lnga
89a6(phal chen): brgya 'thon par gyur to/ /tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang de btsas ma thag tu khyim dang / bang ba dang / mdzod thams cad du nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / rin
89a7(phal chen): po che sna tshogs kyi char mngon par bab par gyur to/ /de la bram ze'i bltas pa dang / pha dang / ma dang / gnyen gyi tshogs kyis 'di btsas ma thag tu nor mang po phun sum tshogs
89b1(phal chen): pa byung bar gyur pas na/ nor bzang / nor bzang zhes de ltar ming du btags te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bu bzang de ni/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o/ /
89b2(phal chen): mos pa rgya chen po dang ldan pa'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i bsam pa can no/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
89b3(phal chen): lam yongs su sbyang ba la rab tu brtson pa'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa la mngon par mos pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod du gyur pa'o/ /bsam pa'i nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'o//
89b4(phal chen): byang chub kyi sems chags pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la bltas te/ dga' ba'i gtam byas nas/ de
89b5(phal chen): la 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsdu zhing thob par bya ba las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad
89b6(phal chen): gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad shes par bya ba las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil
89b7(phal chen): 'khor rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang sprul pa'i rgyan las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan
90a1(phal chen): dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku yongs su grub pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams
90a2(phal chen): cad kyi gsung rnam par phye ba las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa
90a3(phal chen): nyid las kyang brtsams te/ chos kyang bstan par gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag chos dang mthun
90a4(phal chen): ba'i gtam gyis bstan te/ yang dag par bskul nas spro ba bskyed de dga' bar byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du btsud de/ sngon gyi
90a5(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su dran par byas nas/ skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal de'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan pas byin gyis brlabs te/ bde bar
90a6(phal chen): byas nas de nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa las/ rnam pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / che ba nyid thos nas bla na med
90a7(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos shing brtson pas phyi bzhin du 'brang ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod do/ /blo gros chen po
90b1(phal chen): mtha' yas spyod yul can/ /khyod kyi mthus ni sems can sman slad du/ /bdag kyang byang chub mchog tu zhugs par gyur/ /de la nges pa gang mchis bdag la gson/ /dga' ba'i chus bkang
90b2(phal chen): 'obs kyis kun nas bskor/ /nga rgyal dregs pa'i ra ba mtho bar brtsegs/ /sems can lam rgyud sgo rnams btsud cing gdangs/ /de 'dra'i khyim ni srid gsum ming ldan che/ /de ni gti
90b3(phal chen): mug ma rig gzings pas khebs/ /'dod chags zhe sdang me lces rab tu gdungs/ /rtag par bdud kyi dbang po'i dbang du gyur/ /de la byis pa ma rig rten kyang 'cha'/ /sred pa'i sgrog
90b4(phal chen): dang zhags pas shin tu glags/ /g.yo dang sgyu yi skyon gyis mtho brtsams shing / /the tshom yid gnyis dag gis mig mdongs pa/ /log pa phyin phyogs lam la rab tu zhugs/ /phrag
90b5(phal chen): dog ser sna'i thag pas btags shing bcings/ /yi dwags byol song sems dmyal mi khom rgyu/ /rga shi na dang skye bas rab tu mnar/ /mgo rmongs lam rgyun 'bar lo kun tu 'khor/ /
90b6(phal chen): de la khyod ni thugs rje rnam dag pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor ye shes 'od zer snang ba mdzad/ /nyon mongs rgya mtsho skam par shar te 'phags/ /nyi ma 'dra bas bdag la snang ba mdzod/ /byams pa
90b7(phal chen): bsgoms pas dkyil 'khor rdzogs shing nya/ /bsod nams zla 'od bde ba'i zer 'gyed pa/ /sems can kun gyi gnas su shar gyur gyi/ /zla ba nya ba lta bus bdag snang mdzod/ /dkar
91a1(phal chen): mthus thams cad yongs bsags bskor mnga' zhing / /chos dbyings mkha' la chags pa mi mnga' ba/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen sngon 'dren pas/ /rgyal
91a2(phal chen): por gyur pas bdag la bstan du gsol/ /byang chub theg pa'i smon lam mthu mnga' ste/ /bsod nams ye shes shin tu yangs bsags shing / /sems can kun la phan pa'i don
91a3(phal chen): bzhugs pa'i/ /ded dpon chen pos bdag kyang bskyang du gsol/ /bzod pa brtan zhing sra ba'i go mnabs te/ /ye shes spyan mnga' thugs rje'i phyag ring bas/ /bdud kyi dmag
91a4(phal chen): dpung tshogs rnams mngon 'gyur bar/ /dpa' ba chen pos bdag gi sel yang mdzod/ /chos kyi ri rab spo la brtan bzhugs shing / /ting 'dzin mchog gi lha mos kun nas bskor//
91a5(phal chen): nyon mongs sgra gcan lha min 'dul mdzad pa/ /brgya byin gyur pas bdag kyang gzigs su gsol/ /byis pa'i gnas gyur khams gsum khang pa na/ /nyon mongs las rnams rnam
91a6(phal chen): par bsal ba mkhyen/ /rgyu yi sa dang lam rgyud 'khor rmongs par/ /me mar 'dra bas bdag kyang shul bstan gsol/ /ngan 'gro'i lam rnams rnam par zlog mdzad cing / /bde
91a7(phal chen): bar 'gro ba'i lam rnams rnam sbyong ba/ /'jig rten kun gyi lam gyi rgyud las 'das/ /bdag la'ang thar pa'i sgo ni bstan du gsol/ /rtag dang bdag dang bde bar 'du shes
91b1(phal chen): ldan| |log 'dzin sgo re'i skyabs kyis bcad gyur gyi/ /bden pa'i ye shes spyan rno mchog mnga' bas/ /thar sgo bdag la'ang myur du dbye bar gsol/ /yang dag log pa'i lam la
