91b2(phal chen): mkhas gyur cing / /lam gyi rgyus dang tshul la bsnyengs mi mnga'/ /lam rnams kun gyis 'dul ba thugs chud pa/ /bdag la byang chub shul ni bstan du gsol/ /yang dag lta ba'i
91b3(phal chen): sa yi thang la bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan chab kyis bskrun/ /sangs rgyas chos legs me tog char 'bebs pa/ /byang chub shul ni bdag la bstan du gsol/ /rgyal ba gang
91b4(phal chen): 'das ma byon gang rnams dang / /da ltar byung ba'i rgyal ba snang mdzad pa/ /sems can gtso bo legs par gshegs pa'i phyogs/ /de yang lam ston mdzad pas bdag bstan gsol
91b5(phal chen): las kyi 'khrul 'khor tshul la mi bsnyengs pa/ /chos theg shing rta'i 'khrul 'khor mkhyen gyur cing / /ye shes theg pa'i tshul la rnam nges pa/ /byang chub theg pa bdag la bshad
91b6(phal chen): du gsol/ /mos shing smon pa'i 'khor lo'i mu khyud can/ /bzod pa rdo rje snying rje srog shing brten/ /dad pa'i gnya' shing rin chen legs spras pa'i/ /byang chub theg la bdag kyang bskyon
91b7(phal chen): du gsol/ /gzungs rnams kun gyis rnam dag dkyil 'khor can/ /byams pa brtsegs pa'i dga' bas rab brgyan pa/ /tha dad yang dag shes pa'i dril phreng can/ /theg mchog
92a1(phal chen): bzang pos bdag la bstan du gsol/ /tshangs pa'i spyod pa'i lam gyis mngon par brgyan/ /ting 'dzin bud med khrag khrig kun nas rgyu/ /chos kyi
92a2(phal chen): rnga yi dbyangs chen rab bsgrags pa/ /theg pa'i dam pa bdag la bstab tu gsol/ /bsdu ba bzhi yi mi zad mdzod ldan pa/ /ye shes rin chen yon tan phreng gis brgyan/ /khrel
92a3(phal chen): yod dul ba'i 'phreng bas mchog bsdams pa'i/ /theg pa'i dam pa bdag la bstan du gsol/ /sbyin pa'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor bzang po can/ /tshul khrims tsan dan snying rje'i
92a4(phal chen): byug ldan zhing / /bzod pa'i gzer gyis mtshams rnams dam sbyar ba'i/ /theg pa'i mchog la myur du bdag gzhag gsol/ /sems can thams cad 'dul las mi ldog pa/ /
92a5(phal chen): bsam gtan ting 'dzin kha khyer mthor sgron cing / /shes rab thabs gnyis 'byor mthun 'gro rgyu ba'i/ /chos kyi theg pa mchog la bdag gzhag gsol/ /smon lam 'khor
92a6(phal chen): los lam gyi 'khor sbyong ba/ /chos kyi gzugs dam mthu brtan che ldan zhing / /ye shes 'khrul 'khor legs sbyangs legs byas pa'i/ /chos kyi theg pa de la bdag bskyon
92a7(phal chen): gsol/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas rab sbyangs shing / /sems can lta bas rgyu la thogs med pa/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas gnon gyur pa'i/ /ye shes theg pas bdag la
92b1(phal chen): bsdud du gsol/ /de ni brtan pas rdo rje bzhin gnas pa/ /ye shes sgyu mas legs sbyangs legs byas shing / /sgrib dang chags pa thams cad gcod pa yi/ /bzang po'i theg la bdag
92b2(phal chen): kyang bskyon par gsol/ /'gro mnyam dri med shin tu yangs gyur pa/ /sems can thams cad skyob pas bde sgrub cing / /chos dbyings shin tu rgya chen rnam snang ba'i/ /byang chub theg
92b3(phal chen): la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ /sdug bsngal phung po rab byung gcod byed pa/ /nyon mongs las kyi rdul mang sbyong sel cing / /bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba kun 'joms pa'i/ /chos kyi theg
92b4(phal chen): la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ /phyogs rnams kun tu ye shes rab snang ba/ /chos dbyings nam mkha' rnam par klubs byed cing / /sems can kun gyi bsam pa rdzogs byed pa'i/ /
92b5(phal chen): chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ /rnam dag mkha' ltar tshad med mi zad pa/ /sred dang ma rig lta ba'i skyon med cing / /sems can kun la phan par rab gnas pa'i/ /chos
92b6(phal chen): kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ /rlung chen langs pa'i shugs kyi shugs ldan pas/ /smon lam mthu yis 'jig rten kun 'dzin cing / /zhi ba'i gnas rab kun sar skyel byed
92b7(phal chen): pa'i| |chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ /sa chen bzhi yi stobs kyi stobs ldan pa/ /snying rje'i mthu dang shugs kyis khur khyer zhing / /ye shes lo tog 'gro ba nyer 'tsho
93a1(phal chen): ba'i| |theg pa'i mchog la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ /nyi ma lta bur 'gro ba nyer 'tsho zhing / /bsdu ba rab yangs 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor can/ /gzungs
93a2(phal chen): kyi stobs mchog dag pa'i 'od bzang ba'i/ /ye shes nyi ma bdag la bstan du gsol/ /bskal pa mang po du mar rab bslabs pa/ /rgyu yi tshul dang sa kun mkhas gyur pa/ /gang gis
93a3(phal chen): 'dus byas grong khyer gzhom 'gyur ba'i/ /shes brtan rdo rje 'phags pas bdag la stsal du gsol/ /sangs rgyas legs kun bslab pa phun sum gyis/ /ye shes rgya mtsho yangs pa
93a4(phal chen): gang zhig la/ /tshad med rgya mtsho'i blo mang bslab gyur pa/ /de legs ci 'dra 'phags pas bka' stsal gsol/ /gang na yang dag spyan mnga' khyod bzhugs shing / /ye shes rgyal
93a5(phal chen): po'i cod pan legs brgyan te/ /chos kyi dbu thod dam pas dbu bcings pa'i/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i pho brang bdag kyang ston/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ glang po'i lta
93a6(phal chen): stangs kyis bltas te/ /tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/
93a7(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod de/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dri bar bsam pa
93b1(phal chen): legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen cing bsten pa dang / rim gror bya ba 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su grub par
93b2(phal chen): 'gyur ba'i gzhi yin te/ 'di ni mthun pa'i rgyu yin gyi/ rigs kyi bu/ de bas na khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur bas yongs su ma skyo bar gyis shig /nor bzang gis
93b3(phal chen): smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i
93b4(phal chen): spyod pa brtsam par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su
93b5(phal chen): rdzogs par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyang bar bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug
93b6(phal chen): par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su
93b7(phal chen): 'brang bar bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la lhag par dmigs par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyas
94a1(phal chen): par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba rgya cher bstan du gsol/ de nas
94a2(phal chen): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ dge ba'i bsod nams gangs chen mtsho/ /de ltar khyod ni nga yi drung du nyer phyin
94a3(phal chen): te| |snying rje'i snying brtse rgya chen gyi/ /yid ldan byang chub dam pa tshol bar legs/ /'gro ba thams cad dgrol don du/ /spyod pa mtshungs med don du smon lam rab 'debs shing / /
94a4(phal chen): 'gro ba kun gyi skyabs 'gyur ba/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshul 'di yin/ /byang chub sems dpa'i brtan pa rnams/ /'khor ba'i nang na skyo med yid kyis spyod byed pa/ /
94a5(phal chen): de dag kun tu bzang po yi/ /spyod pa thub med chags med 'thob par 'gyur/ /bsod nams 'od can bsod nams dpal/ /de ltar khyod ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la/ /'gro
94a6(phal chen): la phan phyir smon byed pa/ /bsod nams rgya mtsho dge zhing dag pa'i mtshan/ /mtha' dang dbus med tshad med pa'i/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sangs rgyas kun kyang mthong bar
94a7(phal chen): 'gyur/ /dran pa'i mthu dang stobs kyis kyang / /de dag chos kyi sprin kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de ltar khyod kyis phyogs bcu yi/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun tu rgyal
94b1(phal chen): ba mthong nas kyang / /byang chub spyod pa'i don gyi phyir/ /de dag kun la smon lam rgya mtsho dag byed 'gyur/ /'jig rten gtso la slob byed cing / /gang rnams sangs rgyas sa la gnas ni
94b2(phal chen): bcas byas shing / /'di tshul rgya mtshor zhugs gyur pa/ /de dag kun kyang thams cad gzigs par 'gyur/ /khyod ni 'byams klas zhing kun du/ /bskal mang zhing rdul snyed du kun tu bzang
94b3(phal chen): po yi| |spyod pa'i dam pa spyod byas shing / /byang chub dam pa zhi ba 'thob par 'gyur/ /zhing rnams mtha' dang dbus med pa/ /ma lus kun tu bskal pa rgya mtshor spyad par gyis/ /kun
94b4(phal chen): tu bzang po'i spyod mchog phyir/ /smon lam rgya chen yongs su rdzogs par byos/ /khyod kyi smon lam thos gyur nas/ /sems can khrag khrig dga' ba yongs su skyes gyur cing / /kun tu bzang
94b5(phal chen): po'i ye shes kyis/ /byang chub mchog tu smon pa byed la ltos/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bu bzang po la 'di
94b6(phal chen): skad ces bsgo'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su btsal bar sems dpa'
94b7(phal chen): legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de lta bu'i sems can yang rab tu dkon te/ de bas kyang gang gis bla na
95a1(phal chen): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol ba de lta bu'i sems can ni ches dkon
95a2(phal chen): no| |rigs kyi bu/ de bas na byang chub sems dpas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen las gdon mi za bar rtogs
95a3(phal chen): pa thob par gyis shig / dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su btsal ba la yongs su skyo ba'i yid med par gyis shig /dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba la ngoms pa med par gyis
95a4(phal chen): shig |dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bstan pa la mthun par 'dzin par gyis shig / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa la khong khro ba med par gyis shig/
95a5(phal chen): rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul mi mo gya nom mchog ces bya ba yod de/ de na mgul legs pa zhes bya ba'i ri zhig yod pa de la/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal zhes bya
95a6(phal chen): ba 'dug gi / de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems
95a7(phal chen): dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsam par bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs
95b1(phal chen): par bya ba dang / ji ltar yongs su dag par bya ba dang / ji ltar 'jug par bya ba dang / ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bya ba dang / ji ltar rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / ji ltar lhag par dmigs
95b2(phal chen): par bya ba dang / ji ltar rgyas par bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dris shig dang / dge ba'i bshes
95b3(phal chen): gnyen de khyed la kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ston to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la/ tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/
95b4(phal chen): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ lan brgya
95b5(phal chen): brgya stong du mar phyir bltas te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid du 'ong ba'i sems dang ldan pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi mthong ba mi bzod de/ gdong mchi mas gang bar du
95b6(phal chen): zhing | 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang mthar gyis yul mi mo gya nom mchog ces bya ba der song ste/ phyin nas yul mi mo gya nom
95b7(phal chen): mchog nas rnam par rgyus te/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas byung zhing las rgya chen byin gyis brlabs pa'i longs spyod yid du 'ong ba la yongs su spyod cing / ri mgul legs pa gang na ba der phyin
96a1(phal chen): nas/ mgul legs pa'i ri la 'dzegs te/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal tshol tshol zhing shar phyogs logs su byung ngo / /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang
96a2(phal chen): dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su'ang byung ste/ bla 'og tu'ang lta zhing
96a3(phal chen): dge slong sprin gyi dpal tshol tshol ba las/ des zhag bdun lon pa dang / dge slong sprin gyi dpal ri rtse zhig gi sman ljongs na 'chag cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ dge slong sprin gyi
96a4(phal chen): dpal gang na ba der song ste/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ mdun du 'dug
96a5(phal chen): nas thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa thugs su chud par mdzad du gsol/ /bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji
96a6(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsam pa dang / ji ltar
96a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su spyod pa rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / ji
96b1(phal chen): ltar 'jug par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar rjes su 'brang bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar lhag par dmigs par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar rgyas par bgyi ba
96b2(phal chen): dang | ji ltar byang chub sems dpas kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa khyod ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams
96b3(phal chen): ngag dang / rjes su ston pa mdzad ces thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba bdag la bstan du
96b4(phal chen): gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang / dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
96b5(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dri ba legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su btsal
96b6(phal chen): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba rnam par dag pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam rnam par
96b7(phal chen): dag pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po rnam par dag pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa rnam par dag
97a1(phal chen): pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba'i snying rje'i rgyud yongs su bstan
97a2(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpas 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yongs su bstan pa dang /
97a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi skyon dang / 'jigs pas mi gos pa'i rgyud yongs su btsal ba 'di ni dka'o/ /shin tu dka'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho
97a4(phal chen): bo ni mos pa'i stobs kyi dbang gis/ mig gi blo gros dang / dad pa'i mig rnam par dag pas/ kun tu mngon par blta ba'i ye shes kyi 'od snang ba phyin phyogs med pa dang / yul kun
97a5(phal chen): la thogs pa med cing bsgribs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang / mig gi yul kun nas yongs su dag pa'i lus rnam par dag pa dang / phyogs kyi rgyud 'byams
97a6(phal chen): klas pa thams cad du mngon par 'dud pa'i lus kyis 'dud pa la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi stobs kyis/ phyogs kyi rgyud
97a7(phal chen): thams cad kun nas mngon du gzigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ste/ 'di ltar shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas gnyis dang /
97b1(phal chen): bcu dang / sangs rgyas brgya dang / sangs rgyas stong dang / sangs rgyas brgya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya dang / sangs rgyas bye ba stong dang / sangs rgyas
97b2(phal chen): bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs
97b3(phal chen): pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul
97b4(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong dang / stong gnyis pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
97b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo / /de bzhin
97b6(phal chen): gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba
97b7(phal chen): snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag stong gi rdul shin tu
98a1(phal chen): phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba
98a2(phal chen): snyed nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthong ste/ shar phyogs logs su ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang / nub
98a3(phal chen): phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og
98a4(phal chen): dang / bla'i phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang mthong ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba
98a5(phal chen): snyed dag kyang mthong ba'i bar du ste/ phyogs re rer rnam par bltas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / dbyibs sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / rnam
98a6(phal chen): par 'phrul pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / khyu mchog gi mthu dang / rnam par rol pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba
98a7(phal chen): dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba snang ba kha dog du ma can dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu 'gyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang / pho brang dang rgyan sna tshogs mnga' ba
98b1(phal chen): dang | sku tshe'i tshad rnam par dag pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'tshang rgya ba rnam par dag pa'i
98b2(phal chen): sgos rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ro rnam par sgrog pa mang po mthong ngo / /de ltar rigs kyi bu/ kho bos ni sgo kun
98b3(phal chen): nas dmigs pa thams cad rnam par rig pa la yang dag par gzhol ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'di thob par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam
98b4(phal chen): par dag pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / pho brang rnam par dag pa'i rgyan mngon par mthong bas/ sangs rgyas
98b5(phal chen): rjes su dran pa'i sgo nas kun nas snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu thob pa dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnam par dag
98b6(phal chen): pas| sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu tshad med pa'i rjes su 'brang bas/
98b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo stobs kyis sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis chos mnyan pa'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgo'i sprin la blta bas/ sangs
99a1(phal chen): rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo chos kyis sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sangs rgyas mtsho tha mi dad pa la 'jug
99a2(phal chen): pas| sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo phyogs rnam par snang ba'i snying po rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba
99a3(phal chen): la rab tu phra bar dmigs shing 'jug pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo phyogs thams cad du 'jug pa rab tu thob pa dang / bskal pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa
99a4(phal chen): mthong zhing rnam par dmigs pa dang mi 'bral bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo bskal par sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis dus thams cad du de bzhin
99a5(phal chen): gshegs pa mthong zhing 'grogs pa dang mi 'bral bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dus su sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas
99a6(phal chen): mngon par 'phags shing / zil gyis mi non pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su mthong zhing rnam par rig pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo zhing du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa
99a7(phal chen): dang / gang gis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor rang gi sems dang bsam par yang dag par gzhol bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dus gsum
99b1(phal chen): du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis dmigs pa thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang dag par tshogs pa mthong zhing dmigs pas/ sangs
99b2(phal chen): rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dmigs par sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yongs su mya ngan las
99b3(phal chen): 'da' ba rnam par dmigs pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo zhi bas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis nyin gcig tu gnas thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
99b4(phal chen): gshegs par rnam par dmigs pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo 'bral bas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa re re skyil mo krung du bzhugs
99b5(phal chen): pas kyang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par khyab ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par dmigs pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo shin tu yangs pas sgro btags pa rab tu thob
99b6(phal chen): pa dang / gang gis skra'i rtse mo gcig la sangs rgyas brjod du med pa byung ba mnyes par bya ba la 'jug pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo shin tu phra bas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa
99b7(phal chen): dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa rnam par dmigs pas/ gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo
100a1(phal chen): rgyan du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / ye shes snang ba rab
100a2(phal chen): tu thob pas/ gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo bgos par sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / rang gis sems dang bsam pa la bltas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
100a3(phal chen): thams cad rab tu snang ba thob pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo sems kyis sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi las rnam pa ji lta bur bsags pa'i
100a4(phal chen): gzugs brnyan yongs su ston pas gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo las kyis sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad pad+mo'i tshal gyis
100a5(phal chen): rgyas par sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen po ston pa/ phyogs kun tu mngon sum du dmigs pas gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo rnam par 'phrul pas sgro btags
100a6(phal chen): pa rab tu thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs brnyan gyi sprin dbyangs sgrog pas chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' kun nas snang ba/ gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su
100a7(phal chen): dran pa'i sgo nam mkha' sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid
100b1(phal chen): na| phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i sgo zhes bya ba yod pa de na/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin ces bya ba 'dug gi de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i
100b2(phal chen): spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig dang / rigs kyi bu/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen de khyod la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs dang / rgyu yongs su ston par 'gyur
100b3(phal chen): ro| |tshogs kyis rgya chen po yang khong du chud par byed do/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang / shugs rgya chen po yang yongs su skyed par byed do/ /byang chub kyi sems kyi tshogs dang / rgyu
100b4(phal chen): rgya chen po yang yongs su brjod par 'gyur ro/ /theg pa chen po rab tu 'thob pa dang / snang bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu rgya chen po yang skyed par byed do/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs kyi stobs
100b5(phal chen): rgya chen po yang rab tu ston par byed do/ /spyod pa rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i tshul rgya chen po yang rab tu brjod par 'gyur ro/ /smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po yang yongs su sbyong bar
100b6(phal chen): 'gyur ro/ /sgo kun nas 'byung ba'i rgyan rgya chen po yang rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po'i stobs rgya chen po yang yongs su 'phel bar byed do/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi
100b7(phal chen): bu nor bzang gis dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ lan
101a1(phal chen): brgya stong du mar phyir bltas nas/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyi drung nas song ngo // //bam po dgu bcu tham pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang
101a2(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag de rjes su bsam pa dang / ye shes snang ba de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de rnam par dpyad
101a3(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul de rjes su sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i tshul de blta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor de la mngon
101a4(phal chen): par mos par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi blta ba'i phyogs de la mngon par spro bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de la rjes su bsam pa dang / sangs rgyas gcig nas
101a5(phal chen): gcig tu brgyud pa de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rtogs par bya ba de khong du chud par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi nam mkha' de la rjes su blta bar
101a6(phal chen): bya ba byed cing mthar gyis phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i sgo gang na ba dang / dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi
101a7(phal chen): bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi mdun du 'dug ste/ tham mo sbyar
101b1(phal chen): nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par zhugs te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho la 'jug par
101b2(phal chen): 'tshal na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi rgyud las phyir ldog cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i rgya
101b3(phal chen): mtsho las brgal zhing / thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtshor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sa las gyen du 'phags par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin
101b4(phal chen): gshegs pa'i rigs su 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i rgyud las ldog par 'gyur zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyud du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /
101b5(phal chen): 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo las phyir ldog cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi 'khor lor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi dkyil
101b6(phal chen): 'khor thams cad rab tu 'joms shing / sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba thams cad rab tu ston pa dang / srid pa'i rgya mtsho yongs su skems shin snying rje chen po'i
101b7(phal chen): mtsho rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang / mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba thams cad kyi sgo gcod cing mtho ris dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i
102a1(phal chen): sgo 'byed pa dang / khams gsum gyi grong khyer gyi sgo rnam par gcod cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang gi sgo rnam par 'byed pa dang / yo byad
102a2(phal chen): thams cad kyi sred pa rnam par spong zhing 'gro ba thams cad bsdu ba'i smon lam yongs su bskyed par 'gyur ba ma 'tshal to/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin
102a3(phal chen): gyis| tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so/ /legs
102a4(phal chen): so| |rigs kyi bu/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams ni/ byang chub tu sems kyang mi skye'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba sgo kun tu snang ba rab tu thob dang / thabs kyi snying po dang
102a5(phal chen): ldan pa'i lam gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang bas rab tu snang bar 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams rgya mtsho'i tshogs rgya chen po bsags pa dang / dkar po'i tshogs thams
102a6(phal chen): cad kyi rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad bkur bas yongs su skyo ba med pa dang / lus dang srog la phangs par mi rtsi ba dang / dngos por 'dzin
102a7(phal chen): pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / mthon dman med pa'i sa ltar sems mnyam pa dang / rang bzhin gyis snying rje che zhing byams par sems pa dang ldan pa dang / srid pa'i
102b1(phal chen): lam gyi rgyud thams cad du gnas par 'dug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la mngon par mos pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu sems skye ste/ 'di ltar sems
102b2(phal chen): can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir snying rje chen po'i sems dang / 'gro ba thams cad la snyoms par nan tan du bya ba'i phyir byams pa chen po'i sems dang / 'gro ba
102b3(phal chen): thams cad kyi sdug bsngal kyi phung po zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bde ba'i sems dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad las rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir phan pa'i sems dang / 'jigs
102b4(phal chen): pa thams cad las yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir snying brtse ba'i sems dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i sems dang / chos kyi dbyings thams
102b5(phal chen): cad rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir rgya chen po'i sems dang / nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu gzhol zhing kun tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mtha' yas pa'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs
102b6(phal chen): pa thams cad mthong zhing rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir dri ma med pa'i sems dang / dus gsum gyi dmigs pa ma lus par ye shes kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir rnam par
102b7(phal chen): dag pa'i sems dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ye shes kyi sems kyang skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bos ni phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i
103a1(phal chen): sgo 'dir lo bcu gnyis su rgya mtsho chen po 'di la dmigs te/ mngon du byas nas 'di ltar rgya mtsho rgya che zhing tshad med pa rjes su bsam pa dang / dri ma med cing
103a2(phal chen): dang ba dang / zab cing gting dpag dka' ba dang / bags kyis gzhol zhing legs par gnas pa dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas du mas rnam par brgyan pa dang / chu'i phung po
103a3(phal chen): tshad med pa dang / kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa mang zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'byung po mtha' yas pa'i gnas su gyur pa dang / srog chags mang po sna tshogs kyi rten du gyur
103a4(phal chen): pa dang / sprin chen po'i char yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gang zhing 'bri bar 'gyur ba med pa la rjes su sems pa byed cing gnas gnas te/ rigs kyi bu/ de la kho bos 'di snyam du
103a5(phal chen): bsams so/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgya mtsho chen po 'di bas kyang 'phags par rgya che la 'di bas kyang yangs shing / 'di bas kyang tshad med la 'di bas kyang ngo mtshar
103a6(phal chen): dang ldan pa la la zhig yod dam snyam ste/ de de ltar kho bos tshul bzhin du bsam pa yid la byed pa la brtson par gnas pa'i tshe/ rgya mtsho chen po'i 'og gi gzhi las pad+ma chen
103a7(phal chen): po nor bu rin po che in+d+ra nI la thub pa med cing rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i chu ba can/ nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya dam pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser ltar dri ma med pa'i lo ma
103b1(phal chen): rgya chen po can/ dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi snying po'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che asma gar b+ha'i ze ba can/ rgya mtsho tsam du yangs shing rgya che ba/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po brgya stong
103b2(phal chen): phrag bcus sdong po'i lhun nas bzung ba/ rin po che sna tshogs brgya phrag stong gi dra bas kun nas yog pa/ klu'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus spos chu'i char mngon par phab pa/ nam
103b3(phal chen): mkha' lding gi dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus dar dang rin po che'i lda ldi dang / sen mo do mang po mchus gzung zhing rab tu dbyangs pa/ mi'am ci'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus phan pa'i
103b4(phal chen): sems kyis kun nas blta ba/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus 'khor nas mngon par 'dud pa/ srin po'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus lus btud cing mngon
103b5(phal chen): par mchod pa/ dri za'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus rol mo dang glu sna tshogs snyan pas bstod cing mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / spos dang /
103b6(phal chen): phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par phab pa/ tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya
103b7(phal chen): stong phrag bcus spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha brgya stong phrag bcus thal mo sbyar cing phyag bya ba/ mi'i dbang po 'khor los bsgyur ba brgya
104a1(phal chen): stong phrag bcus rin po che sna bdun gyis bsu zhing mngon par mchod pa/ rgya mtsho'i lha brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par 'thon cing phyag bya ba/ nor bu
104a2(phal chen): rin po che skar ma'i ngad brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'od zer gyi rgyan gyis rab tu snang bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che bsod nams kyis dag pa brgya stong phrag bcus mkhos su phebs par
104a3(phal chen): 'phel bas rab tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying po rab tu gsal bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po brgya stong phrag
104a4(phal chen): bcus dpal chen po shin tu 'bar bar gyur pa/ nor bu rin po che mdzod sna tshogs brgya stong phrag bcus mtha' yas par snang bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che 'dzam
104a5(phal chen): bu'i chu klung brgya stong phrag bcus yongs su ston par gnas pas rab tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i seng ge brgya stong phrag bcus thub pa med par brgyan pa/ nor
104a6(phal chen): bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po brgya stong phrag bcus rgya cher gsal ba bsgrubs pa/ nor bu rin po che 'bar ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog sna tshogs su brgyan pa/ nor bu rin
104a7(phal chen): po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po brgya stong phrag bcus mi zad pa'i rgyan dang / 'od 'bar bar byas pa byung ste/ pad+mo chen po de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das
104b1(phal chen): ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pas yongs su brtan pa'o/ /phyogs thams cad du mngon par dmigs su yod pa'o/ /sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i chos
104b2(phal chen): kyis byung ba'o/ /rjen pa'i dri ma med pa'i las kyis byung ba'o/ /nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyis brgyan pa'o/ /rmi lam lta bu'i chos nyid kyis yongs su byung ba'o/ /mngon
104b3(phal chen): par 'du bya ba med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyis rgyas btab pa'o/ /chags pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul dang ldan pa'o/ /phyogs kyi khams kun tu chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa'o/ /
104b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi yul brjod pa dang mthun pa ste/ de'i rnam pa dang / yon tan dang / dbyibs dang / kha dog dang / rgyan gyi mthar phyin par ni/ bskal pa brgya stong grangs med par
104b5(phal chen): yang khong du chud par mi nus te/ pad+mo chen po de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyil mo krung du bzhugs pas khyab cing / yongs su rgyas par mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa sku de
104b6(phal chen): yang 'di nas bzung ba nas/ srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi mthas klas par mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gdan gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang mthong ngo / /'khor gyi
104b7(phal chen): dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dpe byad bzang
105a1(phal chen): bzang po sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
105a2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / spyi gtsug ltar mi mthong ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / ljags yangs pa bsam gyis mi khyab
105a3(phal chen): pa yang mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang thos so/ /stobs tshad med pa bsam gyis mi
105a4(phal chen): khyab pa dang / mi bsnyems pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i stobs mngon par bsgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang rjes
105a5(phal chen): su shes so/ /sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang rjes su dran no/ /mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa
105a6(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang mthong ngo / /chos kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra mngon par bsgrags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / yongs su bstan pa rnam par dmigs pa'i gnas dang /
105a7(phal chen): rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang thos so/ /g.yas g.yon gyi sku'i rnam par tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sems can gyi don dang / dgos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa
105b1(phal chen): yongs su grub par gyur pa yang mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang phyag g.yas pa brkyang zhing / kho bo'i mgo la byugs nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas mig ces bya ba/ de bzhin
105b2(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab tu brjod pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi dang / rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad rab tu snang ba/ chos thams cad kyi dkyil
105b3(phal chen): 'khor la yang dag par gzhol zhing snang bar byed pa/ zhing gi dkyil 'khor dang / rnam pa thams cad rnam par dag pas yongs su snang ba/ phas kyi rgol ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad
105b4(phal chen): rnam par 'thor ba/ bdud kyi dkrugs ma'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'joms pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad shin tu tshim par byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi
105b5(phal chen): thibs po rab tu snang bar byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i 'khor lo'i rgyud dang mthu snang bar
105b6(phal chen): byed pa yang dag par bstan te/ kho bos kyang kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs de blangs so/ /bzung ngo / /spel to/ /bsams so/ /de ltar bzung ba de la yang bri na ni snag tsha rgya mtsho chen
105b7(phal chen): po'i chu'i phung po tsam dang / smyu gu'i phung po ri rab ri'i rgyal po tsam zad par gyur kyang chos kyi rnam grangs de las le'u re re dang / sgo re re dang / chos kyi tshul re re dang / chos kyi tshig
106a1(phal chen): rnam par phye ba re re las kyang zad pa'am/ 'grib pa'am/ 'byang ba'am/ mthar thug pa'am/ mtha' zad par 'gyur ba dmigs par mi rung ngo / /
106a2(phal chen): rigs kyi bu/ de ltar bdag gis lo bcu gnyis tshang bar chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas mig ces bya ba 'di la nyi ma gcig cing yang thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u
106a3(phal chen): grangs med pa zhig khong du chud do/ /zhi ba'i sgo'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig la zhugs so/ /glong mtha' yas pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa
106a4(phal chen): zhig la yang dag par 'jug go / sa la rnam par dpyod cing rjes su rtogs par byed pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig rnam par bsgom ste rnam par dbye ba byas
106a5(phal chen): so| |gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig yongs su blangs so/ /pad+mo'i rgyan gyi gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig mngon
106a6(phal chen): par bsgrubs so/ /dbyangs kyi tshul gyi gzungs kyi snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig yang dag par bshad do/ /nam mkha'i snying po'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u
106a7(phal chen): grangs med pa zhig rab tu phye'o/ /skar ma brtsegs pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig shin tu rgyas par byas so/ /rgya mtsho'i snying po'i gzungs kyi 'od
106b1(phal chen): snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig yongs su bkod do/ /kho bo'i drung du shar phyogs logs nas/ lha dang lha'i dbang po'am/ klu dang klu'i dbang po'am/ gnod sbyin dang gnod
106b2(phal chen): sbyin gyi dbang po'am/ dri za dang dri za'i dbang po'am/ lha ma yin dang lha ma yin gyi dbang po'am/ nam mkha' lding dang nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'am/ mi'am ci dang mi'am
106b3(phal chen): ci'i dbang po'am/ lto 'phye chen po dang lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'am/ mi dang mi'i dbang po'am/ tshangs pa'am tshangs pa'i dbang po'am/ sems can gang su 'ongs kyang rung ste/
106b4(phal chen): de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snang ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas mig ces bya ba 'di nyid la rab tu bkod cing btsud do/ /de dag
106b5(phal chen): kun kyang kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la mos par byas so/ /rtog tu btsud do/ /yongs su bstan to/ /yang dag par brjod do/ /yongs su gsal bar byas so/ /rnam par
106b6(phal chen): phye'o| |rgyas par byas so/ /mngon par bstan to/ /rnam par bkrol lo/ /rab tu phye'o/ /shin tu snang bar byas so/ /de ltar shar phyogs la ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs
106b7(phal chen): dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / bla'i
107a1(phal chen): phyogs nas sems can gang su 'ongs kyang rung ste/ kun la yang snga ma bzhin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar kho bos ni chos kyi rnam grangs gcig cig shes
107a2(phal chen): par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam yongs su dag pa dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / bskal pa thams cad du
107a3(phal chen): gnas pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir sems can rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs
107a4(phal chen): pa dang / stobs bcu'i ye shes chags pa med pa'i snang ba yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang / yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul
107a5(phal chen): ba'i dus las mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang / zhing thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs
107a6(phal chen): pas zhing rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gro byed pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / ye shes rnam
107a7(phal chen): par rig pas chos rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / nan tan dang ldan pas yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / brjod pa thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
107b1(phal chen): ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir 'gro ba'i skad rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ 'di nas dpag
107b2(phal chen): tshad drug cu 'das pa'i lho phyogs kyi gnas 'di nyid na/ lang+ka'i gnas rgya mtsho'i dogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge slong shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba 'dug gi /de'i gan du song la ji
107b3(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyang bar bya ba dris shig / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis
107b4(phal chen): la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi drung
107b5(phal chen): nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag de dang / kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs de yang rjes su dran par byed cing / de
107b6(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de yang rjes su bsam pa dang / chos kyi tshig dang yi ge'i sprin de dag kyang yongs su gzung ba dang / chos kyi sgo rgya mtsho'i tshul de dag
107b7(phal chen): la'ang 'jug par bya ba dang / chos kyi tshul de la'ang rjes su rnam par blta ba dang / chos kyi le'u dang / glong gi tshul de dag la 'jug par bya ba dang / chos kyi nam mkha' de la
108a1(phal chen): yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dkyil 'khor de yang rjes su sbyar bar bya ba dang / chos rin po che'i gling de yang rjes su sems shing
108a2(phal chen): mthar gyis lang+ka'i gnas rgya mtsho'i ngogs zhes bya ba gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa mthong bar dga' zhing shar phyogs su bltas so/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs
108a3(phal chen): dang | nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams
108a4(phal chen): dang | bla dang / 'og tu yang dge slong shin tu brtan pa mthong bar dga' ste kun tu bltas pa dang / des dge slong shin tu brtan pa nam mkha'i dbyings la lha brgya stong grangs med
108a5(phal chen): pas yongs su bskor cing phan tshun du 'chag pa mthong ngo / /nam mkha'i dbyings de yang lha'i dbang po rnams kyis/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa la mchod pa'i las su bya ba'i
108a6(phal chen): phyir lha rdzas kyi me tog sil ma'i sprin gyis yog pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sprin gyi sgra dang / dar gyi ba dan grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par mthong ngo / /klu'i dbang po
108a7(phal chen): rnams kyis nam mkha' de la/ a ka ru nag po'i spos mngon par 'thul ba'i sprin shin tu mtho ba las 'brug sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'byung bar byas pa mthong ngo / /mi'am
108b1(phal chen): ci'i dbang po rnams kyis nam mkha'i de la lha rdzas kyi ngag snyan pa'i rgyud kyis bstod pa'i rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba dang / glur blang ba'i dbyangs thams cad sbyar cing blangs ba
108b2(phal chen): thos par gyur to/ /lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rnams kyis nam mkha' de la gos shin tu phra zhing mdog bzang pa'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag yid dga' bas bkye ste/ dge
108b3(phal chen): slong shin tu brtan pa la dad cing mos pa'i gzugs su phyung ba mthong ngo / /lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams kyis kyang nam mkha' de la/ nor bu rin po che'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa
108b4(phal chen): byin gyis brlabs te/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan snang ba dang ldan par byas pa mthong ngo / /nam mkha' lding gi dbang po mang po yang mi'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang /
108b5(phal chen): dbyibs su 'khod cing / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i bu mos kun nas bskor te gsod pa med la dga' zhing thal mo sbyar te gnas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mthong ngo / /gnod
108b6(phal chen): sbyin gyi dbang po brgya stong 'khor dang bcas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang nam mkha' de la shin tu mi sdug pa'i gzugs su/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa la byams pa'i mthu dang ldan
108b7(phal chen): par 'khor ba mthong ngo / /srin po'i dbang po brgya stong 'khor dang bcas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang / nam mkha' de la dge slong shin tu brtan pa yongs su srung ba byed cing
109a1(phal chen): kun tu rgyu ba mthong ngo / /tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang nam mkha' de la thal mo sbyar cing dga' ba dang yid du 'ong
109a2(phal chen): ba'i tshig gi rgyud kyis bstod pa rab tu brjod pa mthong ngo / /gnas gtsang ma'i lha brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang nam mkha' de la dge slong shin tu brtan pa la mchod
109a3(phal chen): pa'i las su bya ba'i phyir/ thal mo sbyar cing gzhal med khang na gnas pa mthong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis dge slong shin tu brtan pa de ltar nam mkha'i dbyings
109a4(phal chen): la 'chag cing 'dug pa mthong nas dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa la thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di
109a5(phal chen): skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal
109a6(phal chen): bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsdu
109a7(phal chen): bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgom par bgyi ba dang /
109b1(phal chen): ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su brtul bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang
109b2(phal chen): chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgom par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par dag par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub
109b3(phal chen): sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su sbyang bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni/
109b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/ /zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos
109b5(phal chen): la nan tan du bgyi/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyis na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin dang / skol bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems
109b6(phal chen): dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang tshul gcig tu 'gyur ba'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / ye shes rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du sangs
109b7(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yongs su thob par bgyi ba'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam thams cad dang mi 'bral ba
110a1(phal chen): dang | bskal pa thams cad du gnas pas yongs su mi skyo bar bgyi ba'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / 'jig rten gyi
110a2(phal chen): khams thams cad yongs su dag par bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par
110a3(phal chen): 'phrul pa thams cad rnam par dmigs par bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sprul pa lta
110a4(phal chen): bus srid pa'i rgyud thams cad du skye zhing shi 'pho ba'i skye mched rang gi lus kyis nyams su myong bar bgyi ba'i slad du 'dus byas kyi gnas dang mi 'bral ba dang / de bzhin
110a5(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su gzung ba'i slad du chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dus gsum gyi ye shes khong du chud cing rjes su 'brang bar bgyi ba'i
110a6(phal chen): slad du ye shes snang ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba de bdag la bstan du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang / dge slong shin tu brtan pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang
110a7(phal chen): la 'di skad ces smras so/ /de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos
110b1(phal chen): dang | rang byung gi chos 'dri ba legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i sgo thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub
110b2(phal chen): sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i sgo de kho bos blangs te/ yongs su bzung nas rjes su 'brang zhing rnam par dbye ba dang / rnam par dpyad pa dang / rnam par brtag pa
110b3(phal chen): dang | snang bar bya ba dang / rab tu snang bar byas pas thogs pa med pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ye shes snang ba thob bo/ /de thob pas kho bos ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang /
110b4(phal chen): spyod pa khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sems can thams cad kyi skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho yongs su shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par bya
110b5(phal chen): pa'i sgor 'jug pa la thogs pa med do/ /phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par 'gro ba thams cad dang 'grogs par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /da ltar byung ba'i dus gyi 'gro ba thams cad
110b6(phal chen): rnam par rig par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad dang / kun rdzob yongs su shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sems can thams cad kyi the tshom
110b7(phal chen): gcad par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sems can thams cad kyi dbang po tha dad par khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
111a1(phal chen): gdul ba'i dus su 'gro bar bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /nyin mtshan dang / skad cig dang / yud tsam dang / thang cig dang / dus kyi ming du bya ba khong du chud par
111a2(phal chen): bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /dus gsum rgya mtsho'i rgyud du 'jug par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rang gi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs par bya ba la thogs
111a3(phal chen): pa med do/ /de ni de ltar dngos po med pa la gnas shing mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu/ dngos po med pa la gnas shing / mngon par 'du bya ba
111a4(phal chen): med pa'i rdzu 'phrul de'i byin gyis kho bo nam mkha'i dbyings 'di las phan tshun du 'gro zhing 'dug pa dang / bsnyes pa dang / spyod lam sna tshogs su spyod do/ /mi snang bar byed do/ /snang bar
111a5(phal chen): 'byung ngo / /du ba 'thul bar byed do/ /me lce 'bar bar byed do/ /gcig tu byas shing mang por bsgyur ro/ /mang por byas shing gcig tu bsgyur ro/ /snang ba dang mi snang ba'ang nyams su
111a6(phal chen): myong bar byed do/ /rtsig pa la'ang thag thogs med pa dang / ra ba la'ang thag thogs med par 'gro ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no/ /nam mkha' la'ang skyil mo krung gis
111a7(phal chen): 'gro ste/ dper na/ 'dab chags bya bzhin no/ /sa la yang byi'u zul dang steng du 'byung ba byed de/ dper na/ chu la bya ba bzhin no/ /chu la yang 'bying ba med par 'gro ste/ dper na sa la
111b1(phal chen): bya ba bzhin no/ /du ba 'thul ba dang / me lce 'bar bar byed de/ dper na/ me'i phung po chen po bzhin no/ /sa yang yongs su g.yos par byed do/ /nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis de ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing
111b2(phal chen): de ltar mthu che la/ de ltar gzi brjid che yang lag pas kun nas yongs su nyug go /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar dag tu'ang lus kyis dbang bsgyur ro/ /'jig rten spos kyi dud pa na bun du chags
111b3(phal chen): pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byas shing rab tu 'bar bar byed do/ /rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin gyi dra bas 'jig rten kun nas khebs par byas shing / 'gro ba thams
111b4(phal chen): cad dang 'dra ba'i sprul pa'i sprin rab tu 'gyed do/ /kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dra ba'i sprin rab tu bkye zhing / phyogs kun tu'ang 'gro ste/ 'di ltar shar phyogs su'ang 'gro'o/ /lho
111b5(phal chen): phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams
111b6(phal chen): dang | 'og dang / bla'i phyogs su'ang 'gro'o/ /sems kyi skad cig re re yang shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams gnyis dang / bcu yang
111b7(phal chen): 'da'o| / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya
112a1(phal chen): dang | 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med
112a2(phal chen): pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mtshungs pa med pa dang / 'jig
112a3(phal chen): rten gyi khams gzhal du med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu mtha' yas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams sa mtshams med pa dang / 'jig rten
112a4(phal chen): gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang 'da' bar byed de/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes la/
112a5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
112a6(phal chen): kyi rgyud de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'du ba de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su bya ba de dang de
112a7(phal chen): dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sgo de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal par bya ba de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su 'jug pa de dang de dag dang /
112b1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi snying po byang chub rnam par bkod pa de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig
112b2(phal chen): chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus sna tshogs dang / lus re re zhing
112b3(phal chen): yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi char 'bebs shing spyan sngar 'gro'o/ /de dag tu phyin nas kyang me tog thams cad dang / spos thams
112b4(phal chen): cad dang / phreng ba thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / na bza' thams cad dang / rgyal mtshan thams cad dang / lha'i ba dan thams cad dang / bla
112b5(phal chen): re thams cad dang / dra ba thams cad dang / gzugs thams cad kyi mchod pa rgyun ma chad par byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang ji snyed du gsungs pa dang / bstan
112b6(phal chen): pa dang / brjod pa dang / yang dag par bshad pa dang / yang dag par smos pa dang / yongs su brjod pa dang / man ngag tu gsungs pa dang / shin tu bstan pa dang / rab tu brjod pa de dag
112b7(phal chen): thams cad kyang shes shing 'dzin to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rjes su dran no/ /shar phyogs su ji lta
113a1(phal chen): ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams
113a2(phal chen): dang | nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs su yang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams gnyis dang / bcu yang 'da'o/ /'jig rten gyi
113a3(phal chen): khams brgya nas 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang 'da'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed
113a4(phal chen): cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong la/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtsho de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa de dang de dag nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor gyi
113a5(phal chen): dkyil 'khor de dang de dag na chos ston pa de dag kun kyang mthong ngo| |de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la'ang me tog thams cad nas/ gzugs thams cad kyi bar gyis mchod pa byed do/ /
113a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang ji snyed du gsungs pa nas/ rab tu brjod pa'i bar de dag thams cad kyang yongs su shes shing 'dzin to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs
113a7(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rjes su dran no/ /sems can gang gis kho bo mthong bar gyur pa dag/ gang dang 'grogs par gyur pa de dag kun kyang / bla na med pa
113b1(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro/ /sems can phra mo'am/ rags pa'am/ ngan pa'am/ bzang ba'am/ bde ba'am/ mi bde ba gang ji snyed cig kho bos mthong bar gyur pa de
113b2(phal chen): dag kun la yang yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba'i dus las mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/ khong ta de dag gi lus kyi tshad dang mnyam par lus byin gyis rlob bo/ /sems can ji snyed cig kho bo'i
113b3(phal chen): drung du 'ongs pa de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu 'gro ba 'di dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rnam par gnon pa don yod pa la rab tu gzhog go/
113b4(phal chen): rigs kyi bu/ kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i sgo kun tu 'gro ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa dang / rim gro rab tu sbyor ba/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin
113b5(phal chen): par bya ba dang mthun pa 'di shes par zad na kho bos byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po'i ngang tshul can/ theg pa chen po'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang mi 'bral
113b6(phal chen): ba'i ngang tshul can/ thogs pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'i snying po chud mi gson pa'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub kyi sems yongs su mi gtong ba'i ngang tshul
113b7(phal chen): can| sangs rgyas kyi chos la lhag par dmigs pa'i ngang tshul can/ thams cad mkhyen pa yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba'i ngang tshul can/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ngang tshul can/
114a1(phal chen): 'jig rten thams cad la mi gnas pa'i ngang tshul can/ chud mi gson pa'i ngang tshul can/ mnyam pa'i ngang tshul can/ ma god pa'i ngang
114a2(phal chen): tshul can/ glags med pa'i ngang tshul can/ ma 'dres pa'i ngang tshul can/ rnyog pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/ 'gyod pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/ rnam par dag pa'i ngang tshul
114a3(phal chen): can| byang chub sems dpa' rdul dang bral ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ dra byi
114a4(phal chen): la'i grong rdal rdo rje'i grong khyer ces bya ba yod de/ de na dra byi la sprin ces bya ba 'dug gi de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
114a5(phal chen): pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis dge slong shin tu brtan pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/
114a6(phal chen): lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang du bltas nas/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang
114a7(phal chen): chos kyi dad pa'i shugs dang byin gyis non pa sangs rgyas yid la bya ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcad pa la rab tu brtson pa/ dus
114b1(phal chen): gsum snang bas sems snang bar gyur pa smon lam chen po yid la byed pa dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i thabs la zhugs pa/ 'dus
114b2(phal chen): byas kyi dga' ba thams cad la mi gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs par bya ba la brtson pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs
114b3(phal chen): su sbyang ba'i smon lam las mi g.yo ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa med par gnas pa/ chos kyi snang ba rjes su dran par bya ba dang / dge ba'i
114b4(phal chen): gshegs gnyen rjes su dran par bya ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rigs yongs su rjod par byed cing / mthar gyis dra byi la'i grong rdal rdo rje'i grong khyer du phyin nas/ dra byi la sprin
114b5(phal chen): yongs su tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer gyi khams shig na chos bstan pa'i don du/ seng ge'i khri la 'dug cing / srog chags stong phrag bcu tsam zhig la/ chos kyi rnam grangs yi
114b6(phal chen): ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyan ces bya ba yongs su ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ dra byi la sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dra byi
114b7(phal chen): la sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag
115a1(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar
115a2(phal chen): nan tan bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems srid pa'i lam rgyud thams cad du chab mi 'tshal ba dang / ji ltar yongs su skyo ba ma mchis shing /
115a3(phal chen): bsam pa brtan par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar thub pa ma mchis shing / lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yongs su skyo ba ma mchis shing / snying
115a4(phal chen): rje chen po'i stobs yang dag par skye bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar sgo kun nas rnam par dag cing gzungs kyi stobs gnon par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar ma rig pa'i rab rib
115a5(phal chen): dang sgrib pa rnam par 'thor zhing / shes rab kyi 'od chos thams cad la rab rib ma mchis pa'i snang ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar don dang / chos dang / nges pa'i
115a6(phal chen): tshig dang / spobs pa la mkhas pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs shing / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i stobs gnon par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar sangs
115a7(phal chen): rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor lo tha mi dad pa yang dag par 'dzin cing dran pa'i stobs yongs su gnon par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar chos thams cad kyi phyogs rig pa'i
115b1(phal chen): snang ba rjes su rtogs shing rig pa'i stobs rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs chos thams cad kyi don rnam par
115b2(phal chen): gdon mi za bar rab tu dbye ba la brtson pas 'grub par 'gyur ba ma 'tshal to/ /de nas dra byi la sprin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la rim gror bya ba'i phyir seng ge'i khri de
115b3(phal chen): las langs te/ babs nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la lus thams cad kyis phyag byas nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la gser gyi me tog gi phung pos mngon par
115b4(phal chen): gtor to/ /nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa mang po dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dam pas kyang mngon par gtor to/ /gos tshon sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas kha dog bsgyur ba/ brgya stong
115b5(phal chen): phrag du mas kyang mngon par bkab bo/ spos kyi me tog kha dog rnam pa tha dad cing yid du 'ong la blta na sdug pa mang pos kyang mngon par gtor nas/ mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs
115b6(phal chen): gzhan dag gis kyang mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang cher byas te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar
115b7(phal chen): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
116a1(phal chen): bskyed pa de ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdung mi gcad pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rigs yang dag pa ji lta ba
116a2(phal chen): bzhin du rnam par rigs par bya ba la brtson pa yin/ zhing gi rgyud thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba la zhugs pa yin/ sems can gyi rigs thams cad yongs su smin
116a3(phal chen): par bya ba dang / gdul ba la sta gon du gnas pa yin/ chos kyi rigs thams cad yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa la brtson pa yin/ las kyi rigs thams cad
116a4(phal chen): dang mi 'gal bar gnas pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rigs thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la rab tu brtson pa yin/ smon lam gyi rigs thams cad
116a5(phal chen): rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin/ dus gsum gyi rgyud thams cad ye shes kyis khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa yin/ mos pa'i rigs shin
116a6(phal chen): tu brtan par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa yin/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mang po thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par
116a7(phal chen): dgongs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa yin /'phags pa thams cad kyis rjes su dgyes par bya ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang
116b1(phal chen): po thams cad kyis mngon par dga' bar byas pa yin/ lha'i dbang po thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod pa yin/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thams cad kyis yongs su
116b2(phal chen): bsrung ba yin/ srin po'i dbang po thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa yin/ klu'i dbang po thams cad kyis bsu ba yin/ mi'am ci'i dbang po thams cad kyis mngon par bstod
116b3(phal chen): pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa yin/ des ni sems can gyi khams thams cad kyang ngan song gi lam rgyud gsum po yongs su bcad
116b4(phal chen): pa dang / mi khom pa dang / ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad bzlog pa dang / dbul ba'i lam thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba dang / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya
116b5(phal chen): ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po mnyan pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag yongs
116b6(phal chen): su dag par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam snang ba thob par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes khong du
116b7(phal chen): chud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par bya bas dbugs phyin par bya ba yin/ rigs kyi bu de la bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
117a1(phal chen): ni dka' ba byed pa ste/ 'byung bar dka' zhing mthong bar dka' ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can rnams la bag dro bar byed pas
117a2(phal chen): pha dang ma lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan du gyur pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sdug bsngal gyis mnar ba rnams
117a3(phal chen): la skyabs su gyur pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gnas su gyur pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni 'jigs pa sna
117a4(phal chen): tshogs kyis gtses pa rnams la dpung gnyen du gyur pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad ngan song gsum du ltung ba las yongs su rton pa'i phyir
117a5(phal chen): rlung gi 'khor lo lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pas lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
117a6(phal chen): rnams ni bsod nams rin po che'i mdzod mi zad pa'i gtos dang ldan pas rgya mtsho lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ye shes kyi 'od kyis snang bar byed pa'i phyir
117a7(phal chen): nyi ma lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu mtho bas ri rab lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni snying po byang chub tu ye shes kyi zla ba 'char
117b1(phal chen): bar 'gyur ba'i phyir zla ba lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu 'joms pas dpa' bor gyur pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rang byung
117b2(phal chen): gi chos kyi grong khyer du phyin par byed pas rtul phod pa lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi bdag la bya mas ba'i rlan yongs su skem pas me lta
117b3(phal chen): bu'o| |byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos sprin rgya chen po'i char mngon par 'bebs pas sprin lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can gyi dbang po dad pa la sogs
117b4(phal chen): pa'i myu gu rnam par 'phel bar byed pas char pa lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos rgya mtsho'i 'gram yongs su ston pas mnyan pa lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
117b5(phal chen): rnams ni sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las yang dag par sgrol ba'i phyir zab pa lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyis mngon par bgrod
117b6(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir mu stegs lta bu'o/ /de ltar dra byi la sprin gyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gi mdun du 'dug ste/ tshig gi rgyud de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs
117b7(phal chen): su bsngags pa byas nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la legs so/ /zhes bsngags so/ /de ltar des byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i phyir tshig brjod pa'i
118a1(phal chen): tshe| kho'i sgo nas 'od 'phro ba'i phung po rnam pa 'di lta bu byung ste/ 'od 'phro ba'i phung po des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas
118a2(phal chen): par gang bar gyur nas/ lha dang / lha rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ klu dang / klu rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ dri za dang / dri za rdzu
118a3(phal chen): 'phrul chen po'am/ lha ma yin dang / lha ma yin rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ nam mkha' lding dang / nam mkha' lding rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ mi'am ci dang / mi 'am ci rdzu 'phrul
118a4(phal chen): chen po'am/ lto 'phye chen po dang / lto 'phye chen po rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ mi dang / mi rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ mi ma yin pa dang / mi ma yin pa rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ tshangs pa
118a5(phal chen): pa dang / tshangs pa rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ sems can gang sus mthong yang rung ste/ snang ba des yongs su snang bar byas pa de dag /dra byi la sprin gyi drung du 'ongs so/ /de nas de
118a6(phal chen): ltar dra byi la sprin gyis bsam pa byin gyis brlabs shing thal mo sbyar te gnas pa/ lus dang sems sim par gyur pa/ dga' ba rgya chen po skyes pa/ sri zhu chen po la gnas pa/ nga
118a7(phal chen): rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bcom pa/ g.yo sgyu dang bral ba/ dbang po rnam par dang bar gyur pa de dag la/ dra byi la sprin gyis chos kyi rnam grangs yi ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyan ces bya ba
118b1(phal chen): de nyid rgya cher yang dag par bstan te/ khong du chud pa dang / rtogs pa dang / shes pa dang / rig par byas so/ /de thos nas kyang de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
118b2(phal chen): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /de nas de'i phyir chos kyi stan la 'dug nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni dbyangs dang
118b3(phal chen): ldan pa'i gzungs thob pa ste/ de'i mthus kho bo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha rnams kyi lha'i skad kyang shes so/ /de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin
118b4(phal chen): dang | dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad kyang shes so/ /lha
118b5(phal chen): rnams kyi lha'i skad sna tshogs kyang shes so/ /de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang /
118b6(phal chen): mi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad sna tshogs kyang shes so/ /lha rnams kyi lha'i skad gcig pa yang shes so/ /de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
118b7(phal chen): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad gcig pa yang shes so/ /lha rnams
119a1(phal chen): kyi lha'i skad tha dad pa yang shes so/ /de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
119a2(phal chen): lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad tha dad pa yang shes so/ /byol song gi skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi brda
119a3(phal chen): dang | skad dang / ming tha dad pa yang shes so/ /sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi skad dang ming rnams kyang shes so/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems
119a4(phal chen): can rnams kyi skad dang ming rnams kyang shes so/ /'phags pa'i skad dang ming rnams kyang shes so/ /'phags pa ma yin pa'i skad dang ming rnams kyang shes so/ /byang
119a5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig dang / brda dang / nges pa'i ngag sems can gyi bsam pa bzhin du 'byung ba yang shes so/ /sems kyi skad cig re re la yang dus gsum
119a6(phal chen): du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / gsung rgya mtsho sems can thams cad kyi ming dang / gtam gyi sgra dang / tshig tu ldan pa yang rtogs
119a7(phal chen): shing khong du chud do/ /ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can rnams kyi brda dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / skad dang / ming rgya mtsho la
119b1(phal chen): 'jug cing shes pa de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha'
119b2(phal chen): yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar
119b3(phal chen): gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
119b4(phal chen): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa nas/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams kyi brda dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / skad dang / ming rgya mtsho thams
119b5(phal chen): cad la yang 'jug cing shes te/ 'di ltar lha rnams kyi lha'i skad kyang shes so/ /tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad kyi bar du'ang shes so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bos ni byang chub
119b6(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs snang ba dbyangs dang ldan pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi brda'i rnam pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de
119b7(phal chen): dag dang / 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi skad dang ming rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi ming shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / 'gro ba sna tshogs
120a1(phal chen): kyi brjod pa rab tu bkod pa dang / rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig thams cad kyi mtshams sbyar ba rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de
120a2(phal chen): dag dang / tshig lhur blangs te bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / dus gsum gyi dmigs pa thams cad dmigs pa gcig tu rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho gangs chen
120a3(phal chen): mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig gis brtsegs te bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig gnyis nas brtsegs te bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang /
120a4(phal chen): tshig rab tu phye ste bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / chos thams cad rab tu dbye bas 'dul ba'i tshul bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / 'gro ba thams
120a5(phal chen): cad kyi skad rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i rgyan thams cad la zhugs pa de dag dang / yi ge'i 'khor lo'i mthar phyin par
120a6(phal chen): bya bas rab tu dbye ba las byung ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul nags tshal na
120a7(phal chen): gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na tshong dpon btang brjod ces bya ba 'dug gi /de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la brtson
120b1(phal chen): par bya ba dang / ji ltar 'byung bar bya ba dang / ji ltar sems nges par gzhag par bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ dra byi la sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis
120b2(phal chen): la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos kyi rim gro byas nas/ dad pa'i mtshan nyid rtsa ba tshugs pa la rab tu brtag pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen las 'ongs pa'i thams cad
120b3(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par lta zhing gdong mchi mas gang bar ngus te/ dra byi la sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang du bltas
120b4(phal chen): te phyag 'tshal zhing dra byi la sprin gyi drung nas song ngo / / //bam po dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs
120b5(phal chen): snang ba dbyangs dang ldan pa'i rgyan de nyid la rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skad kyi tshul rgya mtsho de nyid la 'jug par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshul phra
120b6(phal chen): mo la 'jug pa de nyid rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems rnam par byang bas rnam par dag pa de nyid kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems
120b7(phal chen): dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bag chags bsdu zhing bsgrub pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgo de nyid rnam par sbyang ba dang /
121a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can bsdu ba'i ye shes de nyid shin tu byang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'i stobs rnam
