121a2(phal chen): par dag par bya ba de nyid brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs de nyid nye bar brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa'i rgyud
121a3(phal chen): de yang yongs su sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems de nyid gdon mi za bar dge bar bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yi dam chen po de nyid mthar phyin par
121a4(phal chen): byed cing / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang yi dam la brtan zhing smon lam gyi sems kyis yongs su skyo ba med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyan dang ldan pa phyir mi ldog pas rnam par gnon pa'i
121a5(phal chen): brtson 'grus can/ yid kyis brtul ba las mi zlog pa/ dad pa mi 'phrogs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa/ rdo rje'i mthu bo ches mi phyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes
121a6(phal chen): gnyen thams cad kyi gdams ngag mthun par len pa/ shes rab kha ma bab pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa la mngon du gyur pa/ ye shes rnam par dag pa'i spyod
121a7(phal chen): yul thogs pa med pa/ kun tu lta ba'i ye shes kyi tshul snang ba dang ldan pa/ sa'i gzungs kun nas snang ba rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi'i bye brag la mngon sum du
121b1(phal chen): gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ gzhi kun la rten pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin rnam par dmigs pa gnas pa med pa dang / bdag gi med pa dang / gnyis su med pa'i spyod
121b2(phal chen): yul la rab tu brtson pa/ 'du shes thams cad las 'da' bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi sgo rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi phyogs dang gzhi tha dad pa'i phyogs la so sor rtog pa med pa/
121b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi gzhi dang phyogs kyi bye brag las phyir mi ldog pa/ chos kyi gzhi dang phyogs kyi bye brag las phyir mi ldog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi phyogs dang gzhi tha dad pa mthong ba
121b4(phal chen): dang / rnam par rig par bya ba la gzhol ba/ dus kyi phyogs dang gzhi'i bye brag khong du chud pa'i ye shes can/ chos kyi 'khor lo yid du 'ong bas yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i
121b5(phal chen): blo dang ldan pa/ ye shes kun nas snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa snang bas sems gsal bar byas pa/ yid kyi lus yul kun dang ldan pa'i sa la zhugs pa/ de bzhin
121b6(phal chen): gshegs pa'i ye shes snang bas rgyud shin tu snang bar byas pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dad pa'i dba' rlabs kyi shugs kyis rab tu slob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la
121b7(phal chen): mos pa'i shugs dang 'bral ba med pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad rang gi sems kyi rgyud du khong du chud pa'i
122a1(phal chen): 'od kyis snang bar gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba thams cad rang gi lus kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i smon lam dang / chos kyi dbyings thams
122a2(phal chen): cad rang gi lus su yang dag par bsdu ba dang mngon par bsgrubs pa la brtson pa de/ mthar gyis song song ste/ lo bcu gnyis kyis yul nags tshal na gnas par phyin nas/
122a3(phal chen): des tshong dpon btang brjod de btsal btsal te mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang lus thams cad kyis phab ste/ phyag 'tshal nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces
122a4(phal chen): smras so/ /'phags pa/ bdag de ring dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mjal bar gyur pa ni/ bdag gis 'thob par bgyi ba legs par thob bo/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dge ba'i
122a5(phal chen): bshes gnyen rnams ni mthong bar dka' ba'o/ /'byung bar dka' ba'o/ /mjal bar dka' ba'o/ /bgrod par dka' ba'o/ /bsnyen bkur bgyi bar dka' ba'o/ /mnyes
122a6(phal chen): par bgyi ba dka' ba'o/ /'grogs par dka' ba'o/ /rim gror bgyi ba dka' ba'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni rjes su 'brang bar dka' ba lags na/ de lta bu'i dge
122a7(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa de ring bdag gis thob par gyur to/ /'phags pa/ bdag gis 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bkur ba dang / sangs rgyas
122b1(phal chen): thams cad la rim gror bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal blta ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par dmigs par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam
122b2(phal chen): pa nyid thob par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam khong du chud par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams
122b3(phal chen): cad kyis yang dag par bsgrub pa'i ye shes snang bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad rang gi lus su mngon par bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsgrubs
122b4(phal chen): pa rang gi spyod par mngon par bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba mngon sum du rtogs par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs dang mi
122b5(phal chen): bsnyengs pa yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa mnyan pas mi ngoms par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos brtan pa mnyan cing
122b6(phal chen): blang bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa yang dag par gzung bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa rnam par dbye bar bgyi ba dang / sangs
122b7(phal chen): rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa yongs su gzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang tshul gcig tu 'gyur bar bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang
123a1(phal chen): skal pa mnyam par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
123a2(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par dag par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems
123a3(phal chen): dpa' thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mdzod rab tu thob par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos kyi gter dang mdzod mi zad pa'i ye
123a4(phal chen): shes snang ba thob par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting 'dzin gyi gter dang mdzod khong du chud par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mdzod
123a5(phal chen): tshad med pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i gter dang mdzod sems can 'dul ba'i mthar phyin par bgyi ba dang / byang chub
123a6(phal chen): sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i gter dang mdzod rnam par dmigs par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang gi gter dang mdzod rang
123a7(phal chen): gi sems kyi dbang du bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i gter dang mdzod rnam pa thams cad du brgyan par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bla na med pa yang
123b1(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ 'phags pa/ de lta bu'i sems kyis bdag 'dir mchis so/ /bsam pa de lta bu dang / yid la smon pa de lta bu dang / mngon
123b2(phal chen): par dga' ba de lta bu dang / sems pa de lta bu dang / gdon mi 'tshal bar bsgrub par bsam pa de lta bu dang / spyod yul mngon du bgyi ba de lta bu dang / tshul khong du chud par bgyi
123b3(phal chen): ba la mos pa de lta bu dang / rnam par dag pa la gzhol ba de lta bu dang / rnam par dpyod pa'i bsam pa de lta bu dang / rab tu gzhol ba'i sems de lta bu dang / dge ba'i sbyor ba de
123b4(phal chen): lta bu dang / mngon du gyur pa'i dbang po de lta bus bdag 'dir mchis te/ 'phags pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su ston pa mdzad cing /
123b5(phal chen): tshul ni nye bar ston pa mdzad/ rtogs par bgyi ba ni snang bar mdzad/ lam ni bstan par mdzad/ mu stegs la ni 'jog par mdzad/ chos kyi sgo ni rnam par 'byed pa mdzad/
123b6(phal chen): the tshom ni yongs su gcod par mdzad/ nem nur ni sel bar mdzad/ yid gnyis kyi zug rngu ni 'byin par mdzad/ dogs pa'i dri ma ni sbyong bar mdzad/ sems kyi thibs po ni snang bar
123b7(phal chen): mdzad| sems kyi dri ma ni yongs su sel bar mdzad/ sems kyi rgyud ni rab tu dang bar mdzad/ sems kyi g.yo sgyu ni yongs su sel bar mdzad/ sems kyi gdung ba ni yongs su
124a1(phal chen): sim par mdzad/ 'khor ba las ni sems rnam par bzlog par mdzad/ mi dge ba'i las ni phyir bzlog par mdzad/ sems can dmyal
124a2(phal chen): ba las ni ldog par mdzad/ gnas dang ni dbral bar mdzad/ mngon par zhen pa las ni gyen du bskyod pa mdzad/ chags pa thams cad las ni yongs su 'grel ba mdzad/
124a3(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ni bsgrub pa mdzad/ chos kyi grong khyer du 'jug par bgyi ba'i slad du ni mngon du gyur par mdzad/ snying rje chen po la ni rab tu bsgrub pa mdzad/
124a4(phal chen): byams pa chen po la ni rab tu gzhog pa mdzad/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la ni rab tu sbyor ba mdzad/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bsgom pa la ni 'dzud pa mdzad/ rtogs par
124a5(phal chen): 'gyur ba'i sgo la ni gnas par mdzad/ rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa la ni gzhog par mdzad/ stobs dang ldan pas ni khyab par mdzad/ 'gro ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid
124a6(phal chen): du ni sems rnam par dbye ba mdzad do zhes thos na/ 'phags pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la brtson par bgyi/ ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi/ ji
124a7(phal chen): ltar brtson par bgyis na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par dag par 'gyur ba bdag la bstan du gsol/ de nas tshong dpon btang brjod kyis de'i tshe byang
124b1(phal chen): c hub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba gzungs kyi sgo klong mtha' yas pa sngon du 'gro ba la sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
124b2(phal chen): shugs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yang dag par bsams shing / ye shes snang ba nye bar bsgrubs pas snyoms par
124b3(phal chen): zhugs so/ /tshong dpon btang brjod de ltar snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu gzugs kyi lus yongs su dag pa rnam pa 'di lta bur gnas par gyur te/ lus yongs su dag pa de'i mthus
124b4(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang bcas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas/
124b5(phal chen): 'od rnam par dag pa dang bcas/ sngon spyod pa la zhugs pa dang bcas/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas/ smon lam gyi tshogs dang bcas/ spyod pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyan rnam
124b6(phal chen): par dag pa dang bcas/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yongs su ston pa dang bcas/ chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu ston pa dang bcas/ sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang bcas/
124b7(phal chen): chos kyi mu'i mthar thug pa dang bcas par kun kyang lus kyi khong du chud cing 'dus par snang ste/ de dag kyang phan tshun ma 'dres pa dang / phan tshun mchod pa dang / phan tshun shin tu rnam par
125a1(phal chen): phye ba dang / phan tshun shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang / tshul sna tshogs su bzhugs pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa dang /
125a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyan sna tshogs can mnga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa
125a3(phal chen): sna tshogs su yongs su ston par snang ngo / /theg pa sna tshogs rnam par dgod pa mdzad pa dang / smon lam gyi sgo sna tshogs yongs su brjod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams la la na
125a4(phal chen): ni dga' ldan gyi pho brang du skyes shing / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad par snang ngo / /la la na ni dga' ldan gyi pho brang nas 'pho ba dang / la la na ni yum gyi
125a5(phal chen): sku na bzhugs shing rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs yongs su ston pa dang / la la na ni skye ba dang / la la na ni byis pa'i rtsed mo ston pa mdzad pa dang / la la na ni btsun mo'i 'khor
125a6(phal chen): gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang / la la na ni mngon par 'byung ba dang / la la na ni snying po byang chub tu gshegs te rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyan chen pos bdud kyi sde pham par mdzad pa
125a7(phal chen): dang / la la na ni lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri zas yongs su bskor cing tshangs pa'i dbang pos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba gdab pa dang / la la na ni
125b1(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad pa dang / la la na ni sems can thams cad kyi gnas na bzhugs pa dang / la la na ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar snang ngo / /'jig
125b2(phal chen): rten gyi khams la la na ni de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi ring bsrel rnam par 'god par snang ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing la la na ni lha dang mi rnams de
125b3(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rgyan gyis klubs pa byed par snang ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sems can gyi ris rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi
125b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi lam rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi skye gnas rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
125b5(phal chen): sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems
125b6(phal chen): can gyi mos pa'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / dus kyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi las kyi bye brag rnam pa tha dad
125b7(phal chen): pa dang / sems can gyi las mi mthun pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi 'jig rten rnam par dbye ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi tshul lam dang / spyod pa rnam pa
126a1(phal chen): tha dad pa la rnam par spyod pa dang / sems can rgya mtsho bsam pa dang / sbyor ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa dang / dbang po mi mthun pa sna tshogs rnam par dag
126a2(phal chen): pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags sna tshogs bag la nyal bar gyur pa'i sems can 'byams klas pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs yongs
126a3(phal chen): su bstan pa dang / yul sna tshogs kyi nges pa'i tshig dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / gsung rnam pa sna tshogs su bsgrub pa dang / mdo sde sna tshogs kyi tshul rab tu brjod pa
126a4(phal chen): dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyud dang / tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i tshul gyi gzhung sna tshogs dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa'i ming rgya mtsho'i rgyud rnam pa sna
126a5(phal chen): tshogs dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ro rab tu bsgrags pa dang / sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yongs su bstan pa dang /
126a6(phal chen): dran pa'i sgo sna tshogs can shin tu bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa'i seng ge'i nga ro sna tshogs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
126a7(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo'i mthu phyung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' dang / dbus med pa mtha' yas par rnam pa tha dad pa phan tshun mchod pa dang / rnam par
126b1(phal chen): dag pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs yangs pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu phra bar 'dus pa dang / dpag tshad gcig gi tshad tsam dang / dpag tshad bcu'i tshad
126b2(phal chen): tsam dang / dpag tshad brgya'i tshad tsam nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
126b3(phal chen): tshad tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sgra skad thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro bas chos ji snyed du
126b4(phal chen): bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis thos so/ /blangs so/ /yang dag par bzung ngo / /bsams so/ /sangs rgyas kyi sa rnam par 'phrul pa de dag
126b5(phal chen): kyang mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de dag kyang mthong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon btang brjod dran zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin
126b6(phal chen): de las langs nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa/ thogs pa med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba
126b7(phal chen): yongs su blangs shing 'dzin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyan de la rtog cing dpyod pa'i tshe/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten
127a1(phal chen): gyi khams 'dzam bu chu klung gi mdog dang ldan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma'i dbang
127a2(phal chen): phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs
127a3(phal chen): pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo / /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stobs thams cad kyi shugs dang ldan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
127a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas spos kun tu rnam par yangs pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad
127a5(phal chen): dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo / /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
127a6(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab mar me'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i sems la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
127a7(phal chen): gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo / /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ngur smrig rgyal mtshan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
127b1(phal chen): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje rab tu 'dul ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i gom pas rnam par gnon pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i
127b2(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo / /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad rab tu
127b3(phal chen): 'bar ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi dmigs pa'i spyan rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa med
127b4(phal chen): par shin tu sprul pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo / /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams
127b5(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od zer rab tu snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi mar me zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems
127b6(phal chen): d pa' chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha dad pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam
127b7(phal chen): du snang ngo / /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma'i 'od zer ltar snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgo kun
128a1(phal chen): nas ye shes rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' me tog gi 'od kun nas 'phro bar gtsug phud rab tu 'phyang ba la
128a2(phal chen): sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo / /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi
128a3(phal chen): khams spos kyi rgyan yid du 'ong ba dge ba'i snying po na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'od ces bya ba/
128a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi 'od zer thogs pa med pa'i gzi brjid rgyal po blo gros la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig
128a5(phal chen): tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo / /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i seng ge snang zhing 'phar ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
128a6(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su snang ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings 'od 'phro zhing rnam par snang bar byung ba'i blo gros la sogs
128a7(phal chen): pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo / /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan gyi 'od
128b1(phal chen): rnam par snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan grags pa thogs pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/
128b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang brtson 'grus thogs pa med pa'i blo gros la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang
128b3(phal chen): mig lam du snang ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
128b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mthong yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang 'dir mi byon/ kho bo yang der 'gro ba med de/ nam 'dod pa de na/ bde ba yod pa'i
128b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang mtha' yas bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo / /tsan dan yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang rdo rje
128b6(phal chen): bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo / /spos dri yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang rin chen bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo / /pad+mo yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
128b7(phal chen): na| de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang rin chen pad+mo bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo / /gser yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang zhi ba bzhugs pa yang
129a1(phal chen): mthong ngo / /mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi sgul ba bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo / /shin tu brtan pa'i
129a2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo / /me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs
129a3(phal chen): pa blo gros zla ba bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo / /rin chen dpal gyi dad pas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs pa
129a4(phal chen): yang mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar kho bos ni phyogs gang dang gang na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang gi de bzhin gshegs pa gang dang gang mthong bar 'dod
129a5(phal chen): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag kyang mthong ngo / /dus gang dang gang du dmigs pa gang dang gang la sngon gyi spyod pa gang dang gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong
129a6(phal chen): bar 'dod pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa gang dang gang gi don dang / sems can 'dul ba gang dang gang gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa gang dang gang mthong bar 'dod pa'i de
129a7(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang 'dir gshegs pa ma yin/ bdag kyang der phyin pa ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar
129b1(phal chen): kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ga las kyang byon pa med par shes la/ rang gi lus kyang gar yang 'gro ba med par shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam
129b2(phal chen): par dmigs pa yang rmi lam lta bur shes la/ rang gi sems rnam par dmigs pa yang rmi lam dang 'dra bar rgyu bar shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par
129b3(phal chen): dmigs pa yang gzugs brnyan lta bur shes la/ rang gi sems rnam par dmigs pa yang chu'i snod gsal ba lta bur shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam
129b4(phal chen): par dmigs pa yang sgyu mas byas pa'i gzugs brnyan lta bur shes la/ rang gi sems rnam par dmigs pa yang sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
129b5(phal chen): yang sgra brnyan ri'i brag ca lta bur brjod par shes la/ rang gi sems rnam par dmigs pa yang sgra brnyan lta bur shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos
129b6(phal chen): thams cad ni/ rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs las 'byung ngo zhes bya bar rjes su rtogs shing khong du chud do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad kyang rang gi sems
129b7(phal chen): kyi byin gyi rlabs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so/ /sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba yang rang gi sems kyi
130a1(phal chen): byin gyi rlabs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
130a2(phal chen): kyi grong khyer du phyin par bya ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so/ /rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par rtse ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so/ /
130a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so/ /chos kyi dbyings kun nas 'dus par khyu mchog gi mthu 'byung zhing /
130a4(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so/ /bskal pa thams cad shin tu phra bar bsdu ba'i ye shes kyang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so/ /zhes bya bar
130a5(phal chen): khong du chud cing rjes su rtogs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis ni rang gi sems nyid nye bar brtan par bya'o//
130a6(phal chen): chos kyi sprin gyis ni rang gi sems nyid yongs su brlan par bya'o/ /sgrib pa'i chos rnams las ni rang gi sems nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /brtson 'grus kyis ni rang gi
130a7(phal chen): sems nyid brtan par bya'o/ /bzod pas ni rang gi sems nyid mnyam par bya'o/ /ye shes khong du chud par bya ba la ni rang gi sems nyid gzhol bar bya'o/ /shes rab kyis
130b1(phal chen): ni rang gi sems nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /dbang rnams la ni rang gi sems nyid mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa nyid la ni rang gi sems nyid rgyas
130b2(phal chen): par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus ni rang gi sems nyid snang bar bya'o snyam mo/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med
130b3(phal chen): pa'i rgyan 'di shes te/ blangs shing yongs su 'dzin par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i chags pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ chags pa med pa rnam par spyod pa'i
130b4(phal chen): spyod yul dang ldan pa/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ mya ngan las 'da' ba med pa'i mtha' la gnas pa'i rdzogs
130b5(phal chen): pa'i byang chub kyi sgo'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/ gzhi kun nas phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi tshul shes pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
130b6(phal chen): cad du lus rnam par bkram pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul tha mi dad pa la rnam par spyod pa/ phyogs thams cad du mngon par phyogs pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ phyin phyogs med pa'i ye shes
130b7(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par lta ba de dag gi lus la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jig cing 'du bar snang yang / de dag la bdag dang 'jig rten gyi khams su gnyis kyi 'du shes
131a1(phal chen): med pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi 'dzam bu'i gling
131a2(phal chen): gi mgo 'gebs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'dug gi /de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems
131a3(phal chen): dpas byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis tshong dpon btang brjod kyi rkang
131a4(phal chen): pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshong dpon btang brjod la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ tshong dpon
131a5(phal chen): btang brjod kyi yon tan grangs med pa la snyan par brjod de brtag pa dang / mos par bya ba dang / mi btang bar bya ba sems shing du ste/ smre sngags bton nas/ dge ba'i
131a6(phal chen): bshes gnyen sdug par sems shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur bar mos pa dang / dge ba'i bshes
131a7(phal chen): gnyen gyis bsgo ba dang mi 'gal bar byed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag lus par rjes su lta ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen
131b1(phal chen): la rjes su bsam pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la g.yo sgyu med par spyod pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar bya ba dang ldan pas dge ba'i bshes
131b2(phal chen): gnyen rnams gnod pa thams cad yongs su spong bar byed pas ma tsam du sems/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bskyed pas pha tsam du sems shing / tshong dpon btang brjod
131b3(phal chen): kyi drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang / tshong dpon btang brjod kyis bstan pa de la rjes su sems shing / tshong dpon btang brjod kyi gdams ngag la nan tan du
131b4(phal chen): bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rjes
131b5(phal chen): su dran par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug cing 'bab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su 'du bar bya ba'i
131b6(phal chen): tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rjes su blta bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
131b7(phal chen): bsdu ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyan rjes su sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa'i rnam par
132a1(phal chen): dgod pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yongs su brtag pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa la bsgribs pa med pa
132a2(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las la bsam pa shin tu brtan pa de la nan tan du bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las dang smon lam
132a3(phal chen): gyi rgyud bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i rjes su spyod cing / mthar gyis 'dzam bu gling gi mgo 'gebs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge slong rgya
132a4(phal chen): mtsho'i rgyal mtshan tshol tshol ba las/ 'chag pa'i gnas shig gi 'chag sa'i mthar 'dug ste/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhag nas/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba med
132a5(phal chen): cing mi g.yo la/ byed pa med cing lus drang por bsrang ste/ dran pa mngon du byas nas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul zhing /
132a6(phal chen): g.yas g.yon dang / steng logs su lus mtha' yas la/ tshad med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba/ kha dog du ma'i lus dang ldan pa sems kyi skad
132a7(phal chen): cig re re la kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa yongs su ston pa de/ de de ltar mnyam par bzhag cing zab la zhi ba ste/ g.yo ba med cing dmigs pa med la/ dga' bas lus
132b1(phal chen): mtho bar gyur pa de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu 'gyed par byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /
132b2(phal chen): rnam par thar pas rnam par 'phrul pa de'i mthus/ sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa sbyang
132b3(phal chen): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par bzlog pa dang / ngan song gi lam thams cad yongs su
132b4(phal chen): bcad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i lam gyi sgo dbye ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi
132b5(phal chen): shes pa'i sgrib pa rnam par gtor ba dang / sems can thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod pa'i phyir/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pas chos kyi dbyings
132b6(phal chen): thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing / de'i rkang pa'i mthil gnyis nas/ tshong dpon gyi tshogs bkur sti dang / rim gro sna tshogs byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs
132b7(phal chen): pa'i tshong dpon dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ lhag pa'i yul la spyod pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis lus shin tu klubs pa/ thor tshugs dang / gtsug gi rin po che dang / cod pan sna tshogs
133a1(phal chen): thogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/ byis pa bye ba 'phyes pa'i 'khor dang ldan par 'byung ba mthong ngo / /bram ze
133a2(phal chen): dang | khyim bdag mang po bza' btung rnam pa mang po dang / ro'i yan lag sna tshogs su sbyar ba thams cad dang / rgyan thams cad dang / gos thams cad dang / me tog thams
133a3(phal chen): cad dang / phreng ba thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yo byad thams cad dang / rin po che thams cad dang / gnas thams cad
133a4(phal chen): dang | snod rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad dang / yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyis sems can dbul po rnams yongs su sdud cing / 'gro ba sdug bsngal ba rnams
133a5(phal chen): dbugs dbyung ba dang / sems can gyi sems tshim par bya ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / sems can rnams byang chub tu yongs su smin
133a6(phal chen): par byed cing / phyogs bcu bkang ste 'dong ba mthong ngo / /pus mo'i lha nga gnyis nas rgyal rigs mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / bram ze mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig
133a7(phal chen): rten na mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / bzo sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / mi'i 'gro ba'i rgyud na mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten
133b1(phal chen): las 'das pa'i las kyi tshul dang / rgyus la gsal zhing mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten gyi slob dpon du bya bar mkhas pa'i gzugs cha byad rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa/
133b2(phal chen): dbyibs dang rgyan rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba'i tshig mang po brjod pas yi mi bde ba'i sems can rab tu dga' bar byed cing / chos kyi nor gyis dbul ba'i sems
133b3(phal chen): can rnams la phan gdags pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams bde bar bya ba dang / log par lhung ba'i sems can rnams mngon par gdon pa dang / theg pa'i gru
133b4(phal chen): la nyam nyes su gyur pa'i sems can rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang / 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgra kun tu grag par bya ba dang /
133b5(phal chen): sdig pa las bzlog pa'i sgra yongs su bsgrags pa dang / dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa la sems can gzud pa dang / don spyad pa la sems can dgod pa dang / dga'
133b6(phal chen): ba'i shugs yongs su bskyed pa dang / snyan par smra ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su brjod pa dang / 'jig rten la don mthun par bsgrub pa ston par byed cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par
133b7(phal chen): bkang ste 'dong ba mthong ngo / /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas drang srong mang po 'gro ba thams cad kyi lus dbyibs su 'khod pa/ pags pa dang / shun pa'i gos gyon pa/ ril ba thogs
134a1(phal chen): pa| gzugs dang / cha byad dang / dbyibs sna tshogs can/ spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dag byung nas/ steng gi bar snang las sangs rgyas kyi yon tan
134a2(phal chen): rjod par byed cing / chos kyi sgra yongs su bsgrag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yongs su bstan pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa yongs
134a3(phal chen): su brjod pa dang / dbang po dben pa la sems can dgod pa dang / rang bzhin med pa'i don rab tu brtag pa dang / ye shes kyi don la 'jig rten rab tu dgod pa dang / 'jig
134a4(phal chen): rten gyi gtsug lag gi rnam pa yongs su brjod pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba'i lam gyi tshul rab tu bstan pa dang / mthar gyis bya ba'i las la
134a5(phal chen): sems can rab tu dgod pa byed cing / phyogs bcu bkang ste 'dong ba mthong ngo / /rtsib logs gnyis nas klu'i bu mo 'jig rten rgyu ba thams cad kyi grangs dang mnyam pa/
134a6(phal chen): lus kyi dbyibs bsam gyi mi khyab pa du ma dang ldan pa byung ste/ klu'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bstan pa dang / spos kyi sprin gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi
134a7(phal chen): khyab pa nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis brlab pa dang / me tog gi sprin gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad brgyan pa dang / phreng ba'i sprin
134b1(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rnam par klubs pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad
134b2(phal chen): yongs su khebs par bya ba dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i lha'i ba dan gyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i
134b3(phal chen): phyang phrul sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / char bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che dam pa'i sprin gyi char 'bab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i se mo do sna tshogs
134b4(phal chen): dang / me tog gi sprin gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i khri la skyil mo krung du 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char bsam gyis
134b5(phal chen): mi khyab pa 'bebs pa'i rgyan dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha'i bu mo mang po chos kyi glu snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi
134b6(phal chen): khyab pa dang / rin po che'i pad+mo ze ba mtho ba/ mu tig gi dra bas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'bru'i sprin gyi char rnam par 'thor ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan
134b7(phal chen): dang / rin po che'i cod pan gyi sprin nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ 'od zer gyi sprin mtha' yas pa'i char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / lha'i
135a1(phal chen): lus kyi sprin gyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / lha'i bu mo mang po'i
135a2(phal chen): lus kyi sprin thal mo sbyar te/ gser gyi me tog snyim pas 'thor ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon tan dang legs pa thams cad du bstod pa'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra 'byin
135a3(phal chen): cing char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan/ nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis rlob cing / spos kyi phung po'i sprin rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa dang / bdug
135a4(phal chen): spos kyi na bun dang / sprin shin tu rgya che bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mngon par khebs par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas
135a5(phal chen): pa thams cad rab tu brgyan pa dang / sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pas skad cig skad cig tu chos kyi dbyings thams cad
135a6(phal chen): rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo / /mthongs ka'i dpal gyi be'u nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
135a7(phal chen): byung ste/ lha ma yin gyi sgyus rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu ston cing / chu 'dzin chen po yongs su bskyab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong rab tu bskyod
135b1(phal chen): pa dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po thams cad 'thab par bya ba dang / lha'i gnas thams cad yongs su bskyod pa dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad zil gyis mnan pa dang / bdud
135b2(phal chen): kyi sde thams cad rab tu gdul ba dang / nga rgyal dang / rlom pa dang / dregs pa thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / gnod par sems pa'i sems bzlog cing dga' bar bya ba
135b3(phal chen): dang / mtho 'tsham pa'i sems phyir bzlog par bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi mi dge ba'i chos rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i ri rnam par gtor bar bya ba dang /
135b4(phal chen): nyon mongs pa'i 'thab mo shin tu zhi bar bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi sgyus rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rnam par rtse ba sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams skyo bar bya ba dang / sdig pa
135b5(phal chen): las gyen du bskyod pa dang / 'khor pas 'jigs par bya ba dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad nas gyen du bskyod de/ gnas med pa la rab tu gnas par bya ba dang / byang
135b6(phal chen): chub kyi sems la sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / byang chub sems
135b7(phal chen): dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu dgod par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gzud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi
136a1(phal chen): tshul snang ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / chos kyi tshul rnam par dgod pa sna tshogs kyis sems kyi skad cig re re zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par
136a2(phal chen): 'gengs par byed pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo / /rgyab kyi gzhung nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra
136a3(phal chen): ba snyed byung nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can bdag tu mngon par zhen pa rnams la bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa yongs su rjod
136a4(phal chen): par byed cing / rtag par mngon par zhen pa rnams la 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par yongs su bstan pa dang / 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can rnams la mi sdug pa dang / zhe sdang
136a5(phal chen): gi spyod pa can rnams la byams pa dang / gti mug gi spyod pa can rnams la rkyen las 'byung ba'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba brjod pa dang / cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa can rnams la
136a6(phal chen): ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshul mngon par bstan pa dang / yul la mngon par dga' ba rnams la gnas med pa rab tu brjod pa dang / zhi ba la gnas su sems pa
136a7(phal chen): rnams la smon lam gyi khyad par gyis spro ba bskyed pa dang / phyogs kyi rgyud dang sgo thams cad du chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i rgyud dang sgo thams cad sems can thams cad kyi don du
136b1(phal chen): rjod par byed cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo / /phrag pa'i lhun gnyis las gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i dbang po'i dbyibs
136b2(phal chen): sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / lus mi sdug pa dang / kha dog dang chu zheng sna tshogs can/ spyod lam gyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ bzhon pa sna tshogs la zhon pa/ 'khor sna tshogs
136b3(phal chen): kyis yongs su bskor ba sems can gyi khams yongs su bskyang ba la brtson pa/ 'od sna tshogs kyis snang bar bya ba la brtson pa/ dbyangs sna tshogs rab tu sgrog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi
136b4(phal chen): zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas thabs mngon par bsgrub pa sna tshogs ma 'dres pas/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun gyi nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs shing /
136b5(phal chen): dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su gzung ba
136b6(phal chen): dang / lag na rdo rje'i las kyis yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba
136b7(phal chen): dang / sems can log par lhung ba rnams kyi ngan song gi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'jigs pa
137a1(phal chen): thams cad zhi bar bya ba'i don du brtson pa/ sems can gyi don bya bas 'jig rten yongs su bskyang ba la brtson pa rnams bsod nams dang ye shes
137a2(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i 'khor tshar gcod par byed cing / chos kyi dbyings thams
137a3(phal chen): cad rgyas par 'gengs par byed pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo / /mdun gyi lto nas mi'am ci'i dbang po/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu
137a4(phal chen): phra ba snyed/ mi'am ci'i dbang po'i bu mo'i 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa can dang / dri za'i dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dri za'i dbang
137a5(phal chen): po'i bu mo'i 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa can dag byung nas lha'i rol mo brgya stong grangs med pa'i sgra snyan pa dang / glu'i dbyangs kyis chos kyi rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sangs
137a6(phal chen): rgyas kyi bstod pa rjod pa byed cing / byang chub kyi sems yongs su bsngags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su brjod pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
137a7(phal chen): rgya ba'i sgo thams cad la mngon par bstod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgo thams cad du 'jug pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo thams cad la mngon par spro bar bya ba dang /
137b1(phal chen): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo thams cad yongs su brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i sgo thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / sems can gyi sgo thams cad rab tu
137b2(phal chen): dga' bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sgo thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / chos kyi sgo thams cad mngon par bstan par bya ba dang / sgrib pa'i sgo thams cad rnam par
137b3(phal chen): bzlog par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo thams cad yongs su skyed pa byed cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo / /kha'i sgo
137b4(phal chen): nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po/ rin po che bdun dang ldan zhing / stobs kyi yan lag bzhi'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang ldan pa byung nas/ sbyin pa chen po'i 'od zer gyi rgyan rab
137b5(phal chen): tu 'gyed cing rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang / nor bu rin po che'i tshogs thams cad spyin pa dang / dbul po rnams nor dang ldan par bya ba dang / srog
137b6(phal chen): gcod pa las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / byams pa'i sems la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang rab tu dbral ba dang / rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan
137b7(phal chen): pa'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su gtang ba dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa las rnam par bzlog pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa la rab tu dgod pa dang / brdzun du smra
138a1(phal chen): ba las rnam par bzlog pa dang / bslu ba med pa la gzhol bar rab tu dgod pa dang / phra ma'i tshig las rnam par bzlog pa dang / gzhan 'dum par
138a2(phal chen): brtson pa'i tshig rab tu brjod pa dang / zhe gcod pa'i tshig las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig rab tu brjod pa dang / gnod pa'i chos
138a3(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i byung rgyal du smra ba las sems can rnam par bzlog pa dang / don zab mo'i tshig rab tu dbye ba gdon mi za ba las yang dag par dgod pa dang / ngag gi nyes
138a4(phal chen): pa thams cad las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa'i tshig rab tu brjod par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi snying gi dri ma yongs su sel cing / 'dod pa chung
138a5(phal chen): ba dang / chog shes pa la brtson par sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / chags sems las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud dga' bar byed pa
138a6(phal chen): la rab tu dgod pa dang / lta ba'i dra ba thams cad las 'jig rten rab tu gdon pa dang / yid gnyis kyi ra ba thams cad rnam par gtor ba dang / the tshom gyi spo thams cad
138a7(phal chen): rab tu gzhom pa dang / nem nur dang som nyi'i rab rib yongs su bsal ba dang / chos rnam par dbye ba 'jig rten du rab tu dbye ba dang / rkyen las byung ba rab tu brjod pa dang /
138b1(phal chen): rang bzhin gyis bden pa'i tshul la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i tshul la gzud pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi don gyi
138b2(phal chen): tshul sna tshogs brjod pa byed cing / phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo / /mig gnyis nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor brgya stong /
138b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste sems can dmyal ba chen po thams cad yongs su snang bar byed cing / 'jig rten gyi mun pa chen po sel ba dang /
138b4(phal chen): sems can rnams kyi gti mug gi rab rib sel ba dang / grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyi grang ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / sa'i rang
138b5(phal chen): bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od kha dog dkar bo can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od bai DUR+Ya'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin gyi
138b6(phal chen): zhing rnams su 'od dngul gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / dngul gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od gser gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing
138b7(phal chen): rnams su 'od shel gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / asma gar b+ha'i rang bzhin gyi
139a1(phal chen): zhing rnams su 'od gser gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od asma gar b+ha'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed
139a2(phal chen): pa dang / in+d+ra nI la'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po'i rang bzhin gyi
139a3(phal chen): zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang /
139a4(phal chen): dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od mu
139a5(phal chen): tig dmar po kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che gcig gi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs
139a6(phal chen): kyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che gcig gi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can gyi
139a7(phal chen): don tshad med pa la brtson zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo / /smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas zla ba mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing
139b1(phal chen): grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ lha'i dbang po thams cad zil gyis gnon cing / 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba rnam par bzlog pa dang / sangs rgyas
139b2(phal chen): blta bar dga' ba la rjes su bsngags par byed cing / sems can tshad med pa gdul ba la brtson par phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo / /dpral ba nas
139b3(phal chen): tshangs pa chen po spyod lam rab tu zhi ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas tshangs pa'i dbyangs su brjod de sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa
139b4(phal chen): d ang | byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba byed cing sems can gyi don tshad med pa la brtson par phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon
139b5(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo / /mgo nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ kha dog dang dbyings sna tshogs kyis brgyan
139b6(phal chen): pa'i lus yongs su ston cing / dpe byad bzang pos rnam par bris pa'i lus rab tu bstan pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin mtha' dang dbus med pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i
139b7(phal chen): bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa nas bzung ste/ gtong ba dang / len pa dang / dngos po yongs su gtong ba'i rnam pa'i sprin
140a1(phal chen): mang po rab tu dgye ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi spyor ba rgya mtsho yongs su bstan pa dang / sbyin pa'i spyod pa 'jig rten
140a2(phal chen): du yongs su brjod pa dang / ser sna'i dri ma rnam par bzlog pa dang / chags pa thams cad spang ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / 'jig rten rin po che sna tshogs thams
140a3(phal chen): cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / mtshan thams cad kyi yon tan yang dag par brjod
140a4(phal chen): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan 'byung ba'i rgyu ston pa byed pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/
140a5(phal chen): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor
140a6(phal chen): ba rgya mtsho yongs su bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad lam gyi rgyud dang yul las phyir phyogs par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la mngon du phyogs par
140a7(phal chen): bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa la rnam par smad pa dang / 'jig rten gyi phyin ci log gi ling tog rnam par bsal ba dang / log pa'i rnam par rtog pa rab tu zhi bar
140b1(phal chen): byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims la yang dag par dgod pa dang / snying rje chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su brjod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims rab tu
140b2(phal chen): thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi lam nan tan du bya ba'i tshul khrims la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud rmi lam lta bur sems can rnams la rab tu brjod
140b3(phal chen): cing | rmi lam gyi tshul dang mnyam par yongs su gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir/ yul yongs su 'dzin pa dang / nyon mongs pa la dbang bsgyur ba sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa byed pa
140b4(phal chen): mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ 'jig rten rnams la mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bur mngon par ston
140b5(phal chen): cing | khro ba med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang / shar gnyer ba med pa dang / zhe sdang ba med pa dang / chud gson pa med pa dang / khong khro ba med pa'i sems la sems can rab
140b6(phal chen): tu dgod pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad yongs su gcad pa'i phyir/ ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin
140b7(phal chen): gshegs pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i srid rab tu 'gyed cing / bzod pa'i stobs la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / chos la dbang bsgyur ba la sems can rab tu snang bar byed
141a1(phal chen): pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus
141a2(phal chen): kyi stobs mtha' yas pa shin tu ston cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du brtsams pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i stobs kyis thos pa rgya mtsho yongs su btsal bas mi skyo bar bya
141a3(phal chen): bar yongs su brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing rim gro bya ba la sems can rab tu gzud pa/ sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad rnam par bzlog
141a4(phal chen): pa'i brtson 'grus chen po la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin lus thams cad las rab
141a5(phal chen): tu 'gyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa dang / sems can rnams kyi le lo'i ri rnam par gtor ba dang /
141a6(phal chen): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / las la dbang bsgyur ba la 'jig rten rab tu gzud pa dang / rgyun ma 'chad par brtson par byed
141a7(phal chen): pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjes su dran pa'i lam la
141b1(phal chen): sems can thams cad rab tu dgod cing / sgrib pa dang / bar du gcod pa dang / rab rib thams cad rnam par bsal ba dang / rlom pa dang bag med pa thams cad las sems can
141b2(phal chen): rnam par bzlog pa dang / bag yod pa'i chos la rab tu dgod pa dang / khengs pa 'gying ba dang / nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan rab tu snyol ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsam gtan gyi yan lag
141b3(phal chen): rgya mtsho brjod pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngags pa dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan
141b4(phal chen): pa'i sngon gyi tshul mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / sems can la dbang bsgyur ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa byed cing / skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs
141b5(phal chen): pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su tshol ba
141b6(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i skad thams cad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa dang /
141b7(phal chen): yang dag par lta ba'i glog rab tu 'gyed pa dang / chos kyi rang bzhin gyi sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bdag tu lta ba'i ri'i lhun rab tu gzhig pa dang / lta ba
142a1(phal chen): thams cad kyi zug rngu dbyung ba dang / the tshom dang yid gnyis dang nem nur gyi rab rib rnam par bsal ba dang / ye shes kyi dbang yang dag par
142a2(phal chen): bsngags pa byed cing sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu
142a3(phal chen): phra ba snyed byung nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thabs mkhas pa'i tshul gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu rjod par byed cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i
142a4(phal chen): sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / 'jig rten rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa rab tu brjod pa dang / theg pa chen po'i 'byung ba mngon par bstan pa dang /
142a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par bsngags pa dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa tha mi dad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan
142a6(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i dbang gi
142a7(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan pa byed cing / sems bskyed pa re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo / yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs
142b1(phal chen): med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgrog cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad
142b2(phal chen): nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu
142b3(phal chen): phyin pa yang dag par bsngags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i shing rta'i 'khor lo phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug
142b4(phal chen): par 'dril ba/ chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba/ nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa/ mi shes pa'i ri rnam par 'thor ba 'jig rten du rab tu rjod pa byed cing smon lam
142b5(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul bas/ sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i
142b6(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rab tu snang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stobs yongs su bsgrub pa'i sgra rab tu dbyung ba dang / ba spu bu ga thams
142b7(phal chen): cad nas stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub cing 'byin pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i stobs yongs stobs yongs su bstan
143a1(phal chen): pa dang / khor yug dang rdo rje'i ri thams cad lus kyi steng du rdib kyang mi nyams pa'i stobs rab tu brjod pa dang / bskal pas 'tshig pa thams
143a2(phal chen): cad kyi me rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas kyang lus la gnod pa med pa'i stobs yongs su bstan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad lag pa'i mthil gyis
143a3(phal chen): nam mkha'i dbyings su ston pa'i stobs yongs su ston pa byed cing / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings 'gengs pa rgyun mi gcod pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub
143a4(phal chen): sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas sems can rnams la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ston cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad
143a5(phal chen): nas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu 'gyed pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon
143a6(phal chen): tan dang ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa rab tu brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis
143a7(phal chen): mngon par bstan pa dang / smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su brjod pa dang / sems can
143b1(phal chen): thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis shin tu yangs par bya ba dang / sems can thams
143b2(phal chen): cad bdag med pa'i rang bzhin la gzud pa mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho rnam par blta ba
143b3(phal chen): mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rnam par dbye ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes
143b4(phal chen): kyi sa rab tu dbye ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / mos pa rnam par blta ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yang dag par brjod pa
143b5(phal chen): dang | sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa rnam par dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad
143b6(phal chen): k yi smon lam rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa yongs su ston pa byed cing sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas
143b7(phal chen): par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo / /spyi bo'i gtsug tor gyi gseb nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra
144a1(phal chen): ba snyed mtshan dam pa dang / dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pas brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi ri bo shin tu 'bar ba ltar snang ba/
144a2(phal chen): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur spa zhing tshad med par 'bar ba dang / chos kyi dbyings tshul gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dbyangs mnga' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par
144a3(phal chen): 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su ston pa 'gro ba thams cad la tha mi dad par chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs pa ste/ 'di ltar snying po byang chub mchog tu
144a4(phal chen): phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi'i bye brag mngon sum du shes pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems
144a5(phal chen): dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la gzhi kun tu rten pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos chen po'i rgyal tshab tu dbang
144a6(phal chen): bskur ba rnams la sgo kun nas 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nur gyur pa rnams la kun nas brgyan pa zhes
144a7(phal chen): bya ba'i chos kyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i tshogs shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char
144b1(phal chen): mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam bdag pa rnams la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi bye brag shes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char
144b2(phal chen): mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa rnams la 'gro ba yongs su sdud pas kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par
144b3(phal chen): dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' cher skyes pa rnams la dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum du dmigs pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi
144b4(phal chen): char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la spyod pa rnams la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / gzhi rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi
144b5(phal chen): char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i tshul dang / thabs kyi snying po'i sprin kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi
144b6(phal chen): char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams la dga' bar bya ba'i mdzod shin tu bsags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi
144b7(phal chen): char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yangs pa la mos pa rnams la rnam par thar pa la rnam par thar pa mi zad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam gyis
145a1(phal chen): dga' bar byed pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / gzugs la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la gzhi kun tu
145a2(phal chen): mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha rnams la tshul rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'brug sgra'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i
145a3(phal chen): chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / dbang sgyur gyi lha rnams la stobs 'byung ba'i chos kyi yo byad mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon
145a4(phal chen): par dbab pa dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs rgyal mtshan sna tshogs can yang dag par bsgrub pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi
145a5(phal chen): sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams la ye shes rin po che sna tshogs la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
145a6(phal chen): dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / mtshe ma'i lha
145a7(phal chen): rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dran pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gnas su de
145b1(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas dga' ba'i shugs 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i gnas su chos kyi dbyings kyi
145b2(phal chen): nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / dri za'i dbang po'i gnas
145b3(phal chen): su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos yang dag par bgro ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas su ye shes kyi tshul rdo rje'i
145b4(phal chen): dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i thabs kyi sprin
145b5(phal chen): ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / mi'am ci'i dbang po'i gnas su chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbyangs zhes bya ba'i chos
145b6(phal chen): kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / klu'i dbang po'i gnas su byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul ba sgrog cing srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud las skyo ba skyed pa zhes bya
145b7(phal chen): ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i gnas su dga' ba rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'i shugs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi
146a1(phal chen): sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / mi'i gnas su 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya
146a2(phal chen): ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i dbyangs dang / 'phags
146a3(phal chen): pa'i lam gyi tshig gi rgyud kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas su las kyi lam kha na ma tho ba med pa la
146a4(phal chen): nan tan du bya ba'i dbyangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran pa'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lhun ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
146a5(phal chen): gshin rje'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrags pas/ sems can thams cad kyi gtong ba'i sems 'byung ba zhes
146a6(phal chen): bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / sems can log par lhung ba rnams la sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba rab tu 'thob pas dbugs dbyung ba'i
146a7(phal chen): dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa mdzad cing / chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo / /ba spu'i bu
146b1(phal chen): ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi kha dog dang / gzugs kyi glong dang rgyan grangs med pa can/ dgos pa sna tshogs grangs med pa
146b2(phal chen): la sta gon du gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ste/ 'di ltar ba spu'i sgo'i 'od
146b3(phal chen): zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ sbyin pa'i spyod pa skyon med pas bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar rnam par 'phrul ba mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i dra ba dang / dkyil
146b4(phal chen): 'khor la la las ni/ dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / yid dam dang / tshul gyi dkyil 'khor du rnam par 'phrul pa mthong
146b5(phal chen): ngo| |ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bzod pa'i spyod pa'i rnam pa dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub sems
146b6(phal chen): dpa' rnams rkang lag dang / yan lag gi dam pa gcad kyang / nyams su bzod pa byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / khu tshur dang dbyig pas bsnun te/ mtshon gyis lus la btab
146b7(phal chen): kyang | nyams su bzod par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / lus thams cad gshegs sam snying dang mig phyung yang / nyams su bzod pa byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong
147a1(phal chen): ngo| |byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum du byung ba/ rnam par brtags pa'i lus dang ldan pa gzhan dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos
147a2(phal chen): nyid yongs su btsal ba'i ched du lus dang sems la gnod pa thams cad dang / yan lag dang / nying lag gcad pa thams cad kyang snying rje chen pos dbang du byas pa'i phyir
147a3(phal chen): nyams su bzod par byas pa dang / bag la zha bar byas pa dang / gtang snyoms su bzhag pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i spyod pa rnam par 'phrul ba'i gzugs
147a4(phal chen): brnyan gyi gzugs de lta bu dag kyang mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus
147a5(phal chen): kyi spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa rnam par phye ba'i gzugs dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam par 'phrul
147a6(phal chen): ba 'jig rten yongs su bskyod pa dang / rgya mtsho yongs su skem pa dang / sems can yongs su skyo bar bya ba dang / mu stegs can thams cad yongs su tshar gcad pa dang /
147a7(phal chen): bdud thams cad spa bkong ba dang / chos kyi phyogs snang bar bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po rnam par 'phrul ba mthong ngo / /pa spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang /
147b1(phal chen): dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa rnam par rgyu ba'i rnam grangs ji snyed pa dang / lus nye bar len pa ji snyed pa dang / rigs su skye ba yongs su gzung
147b2(phal chen): ba ji snyed pa dang / gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa ji snyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rjes su bstan pa yongs su gzung ba ji snyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen
147b3(phal chen): gyi man ngag la nan tan du bya ba'i gnas ji snyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi yan lag yongs su bsgrub pa dang mthun pa'i gtsug lag khang dang / gnas
147b4(phal chen): dang | gzhal med khang dang / yul dang / ri'i sul ji snyed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dag sus yongs su bsgrub pa'i drang srong gi lus ji snyed pa dang / rgyal po'i thabs
147b5(phal chen): ji snyed pa dang / 'byung ba la mngon par mos pa ji snyed pa dang / brtul zhugs dang / yi dam dang / tshul dang / spyod lam ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor
147b6(phal chen): bzang gis mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa la rnam par spyod cing / chos thams cad
147b7(phal chen): yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa'i lus yongs su bzung ba mthong ste/ lus gang gis chos kyi tshig gcig gi don du yang bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang ste/ sems can thams
148a1(phal chen): cad las yongs su btsal ba dang / rim gro dang / bkur sti thams cad kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad las yongs su btsal ba
148a2(phal chen): dang | dad pa dang / sri zhus lus rab tu btud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las yongs su btsal ba dang / chos kyi tshig gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol
148a3(phal chen): tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshig thams cad la'ang de bzhin te/ 'gro ba thams cad du gzugs brnyan byung ba'i lus thams cad kyis yongs su btsal ba de dag thams
148a4(phal chen): cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ ba spu'i sgo gcig gi 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor las mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil
148a5(phal chen): 'khor la la las ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i thabs 'gro ba'i rgyud rgya mtsho thams cad du 'byams klas pa sems
148a6(phal chen): can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i sbyor ba mthong ngo / /sems can re re la yang lus dang spyod pa'i tshul gyi sgo sngon gyi lus nye bar blangs pa/ thabs mkhas pa'i spyod
148a7(phal chen): pa la brtson pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang 'dra bas yongs su sdud pa yang ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig las mthong ngo / /ba
148b1(phal chen): spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ sngon gyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa thams cad du smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa dang / sems
148b2(phal chen): can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa dang / zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad
148b3(phal chen): pa ji snyed pa dang / smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dkyil 'khor ji snyed cig de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi zhabs kyi drung du 'khor ba'i skyon thams
148b4(phal chen): cad las 'khor ba'i skyon so so re re'i gnyen por mngon par bsgrubs pa mdzad pa de dag thams cad kyang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra
148b5(phal chen): ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig las mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i
148b6(phal chen): sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ ye shes kyi spyod pa rnam par rgyu ba thams cad dang ldan pa mi shes pa'i
148b7(phal chen): gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can sad par byed pa'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge slong rgya
149a1(phal chen): mtsho'i rgyal mtshan de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa la sems shing rtog pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de rjes su dran par
149a2(phal chen): bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de la rjes su rnam par bsam pa dang / sems can gyi don gyi tshul rgya mtsho de la 'jug par bya ba dang /
149a3(phal chen): mngon par 'du bya ba'i sgo rgyud kun la mngon du gnas pa'i rgyan de'i rjes su 'brang zhing khong du chud par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi sgo de
149a4(phal chen): la 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par mnod pa'i ye shes de la rab tu brtag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang gi stobs de yongs su bskyed
149a5(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi stobs de brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i stobs de shin tu rgyas par bya ba byed cing / dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal
149a6(phal chen): mtshan gyi mdun du nyin zhag gcig kyang lon no/ /nyin zhag gnyis dang / bdun yang lon no/ /zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig dang / zla ba gnyis dang / zla ba drug gi bar dang / nyin zhag
149a7(phal chen): kyang drug tu dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi mdun du lon te/ de ltar zla ba drug dang / nyin zhag drug 'das nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan ting nge 'dzin de las
149b1(phal chen): langs so/ /de nas nor bzang gis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ting nge 'dzin 'di de ltar zab la/ de ltar rgya che zhing / de ltar tshad ma mchis pa'i yul dang ldan pa dang / de ltar bsam
149b2(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang / de ltar snang ba mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang / de ltar grangs ma mchis pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang / de ltar mi 'phrog pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa
149b3(phal chen): dang | de ltar ma 'dres pa'i yul dang ldan pa dang / de ltar phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin 'di de ltar sems can gyi don tshad ma mchis pa rab tu sgrub par
149b4(phal chen): gyur pa ni ngo mtshar te/ de nas sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po tshad ma mchis pa rnam par zhi bar bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas pa ste/ 'di ltar dbul ba'i sdug
149b5(phal chen): bsngal zhi bar bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas so/ /sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud rgyun gcad pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud las yongs su bskyab pa dang / mi
149b6(phal chen): khom pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sgo thams cad gcad pa dang / mtho ris kyi lam gyi rgyud du phyin par bgyi ba dang / lha dang mi'i dga' ba dang bde ba 'byung bar bgyi ba dang / bsam gtan
149b7(phal chen): gyi yul gyi dga' ba nyams su myong bar bgyi ba dang / 'dus byas la spyod pa'i bde ba yongs su 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / khams gsum pa las 'byung ba'i sgo yongs su bstan
150a1(phal chen): pa la sta gon du gnas pa'o/ /byang chub kyi sems yang dag par skye ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa la sta gon du gnas pa'o/ /bsod nams dang ye
150a2(phal chen): shes kyi tshogs yang dag par skye ba'i rgyu rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / snying rje chen po'i shugs rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / smon lam chen po'i
150a3(phal chen): stobs yongs su bskyed par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam snang ba rab tu 'thob par bgyi ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'i theg pa rnam par dgod pa dang / theg
150a4(phal chen): pa chen po'i khyad par la 'jug pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes shing snang bar bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa shes shing snang ba thob
150a5(phal chen): par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang / spyod pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyan rnam par dag pa yongs su bsgrub pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i
150a6(phal chen): sa gnan pa la thogs pa ma mchis par bgyi ba sta gon du gnas pa'o/ /'phags pa/ ting 'dzin de'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol
150a7(phal chen): tu phyin pa kun nas lta ba'i btang snyoms yongs su thob pa zhes bya ba yod de/ ting 'dzin 'di ni de'i snang ba ste/ sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'o/ /rigs
150b1(phal chen): kyi bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas lta ba'i btang snyoms rab tu thob pa'i snang ba las skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shin tu
150b2(phal chen): bsgoms na/ sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu tshang ba yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ting nge
150b3(phal chen): 'dzin 'di'i yul der bas sam ma bas/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs pa la ni 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dmigs pa la thogs pa med do/ /
150b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams su 'jug par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /'jig rten gyi khams rnam par gnon pa la thogs pa med do/ /'jig rten gyi khams yongs su brgyan pa la
150b5(phal chen): thogs pa med do/ /'jig rten gyi khams yongs su sbyang ba la thogs pa med do/ /'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas blta zhing
150b6(phal chen): rnam par dmigs par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba brtag pa la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su shes par bya
150b7(phal chen): ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi stobs la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtshor 'jug pa la thogs pa med do/ /sangs
151a1(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yongs su gzung ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ma 'dres pa shes shing khong du
