151a2(phal chen): chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgya mtsho la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /phyogs bcur 'jug
151a3(phal chen): cing rjes su bgrang bar bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa rjes su brtag par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi phyogs rjes su brtag
151a4(phal chen): par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /snying rje chen po'i phyogs rnam par mi spang pa la thogs pa med do/ /byams pas phyogs rgyas par dgang ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs
151a5(phal chen): rgyas blta ba'i phyogs la 'jug pas mi ngoms par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sems can rgya mtsho thams cad du 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med
151a6(phal chen): do| |sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho thams cad shes shing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sems can gyi dbang po thams cad shes par bya ba la thogs
151a7(phal chen): pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu /kho bos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa 'di shes su zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
151b1(phal chen): rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi yul la blo gros rnam par dag pa/ chos thams cad la rig pa rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes can/ blo shin tu yangs
151b2(phal chen): pas tshad med pa'i yul rgyas par 'gengs pa/ gzungs chen po'i snang ba la dbang bsgyur ba/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba thams cad shin tu dag pa mngon par
151b3(phal chen): shes pas rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu 'byin pa la shin tu 'byung ba/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ ngag snyan pa sa'i
151b4(phal chen): snying po dang ldan pa brjod pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/ spyod yul bstan pa'am/ yul rab tu brjod
151b5(phal chen): pa'am/ smon lam chen po'i stobs yang dag par bsngags pa'am/ 'byung ba'i sgo yongs su snang bar bya ba'am/ yang dag par bsgrub pa mngon par brjod pa'am/ lam
151b6(phal chen): yongs su bstan pa'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyun gyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'am/ sems kyi yul shes par bya ba'am/ ye shes mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par bya bar nus re
151b7(phal chen): skan| song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ phyogs kyi gnas rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan
152a1(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba zhig / grong khyer 'od chen po zhes bya ba'i shar phyogs logs na yod de/ de na shes las skyes pa'i rgyal po 'od bzang gi
152a2(phal chen): chung ma/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin zhes bya ba yod kyi/ de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /
152a3(phal chen): ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la/ tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ dge slong rgya
152a4(phal chen): mtsho'i rgyal mtshan las snying po yongs su blangs te/ chos kyis nye bar 'tsho bar byas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la zhugs pa/ snang ba thob pa ye shes snang bar
152a5(phal chen): gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ mos pa rnam par dag pa khong du chud pa/ sems can chos kyi tshul gyi snang ba'i rjes su song ba/ rnam
152a6(phal chen): par dag pa'i sgos snang ba dang ldan par gyur pa/ phyogs su ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu 'dal ba des/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi
152a7(phal chen): bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan la btud de phyag 'tshal nas/ yang dang
152b1(phal chen): yang lta zhing / yang dang yang mngon par blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / rab tu gdud pa dang / gus bar bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / yid la bya ba dang / bsam
152b2(phal chen): pa dang / bsgom pa dang / yongs su bsgom pa dang / legs par brjod pa dang / ngo mtshar du bya ba dang / yon tan mngon du bya ba dang / rjes su bsngags pa dang / rjes su
152b3(phal chen): 'brang bar bya ba dang / rjes su dran par bya ba dang / brtan par bya ba dang / mi btang ba dang / yid la bsam pa dang / rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / smon lam gyi rjes su 'jug
152b4(phal chen): par bya ba dang / mthong bar dga' ba dang / dbyangs kyi mtshan ma gzung ba dang / gzungs kyi rjes su bsam pa dang / ming yongs su gzung ba'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang
152b5(phal chen): ldan par bya ba dang / kha dog dang dbyibs rjes su dran par bya ba dang / ye shes kyi yul rjes su bsam pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang / smon
152b6(phal chen): lam gyi yul la rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / spyod yul gyi yul rnam par dpyad par bya ba dang / ye shes kyi snang ba yongs su gzung ba byed cing dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi
152b7(phal chen): drung nas song ngo / / //bam po dgu bcu gnyis pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge ba'i ba shes gnyen gyi yon tan gyis ni mgu/ dge ba'i bshes
153a1(phal chen): gnyen gyis ni yang dag par bsngags te btang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba'i byin gyis ni byin du brlabs/ dge ba'i bshes
153a2(phal chen): gnyen gyi gdams ngag la ni nan tan du byed/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid du 'ong ba ni rjes su sems/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'byung
153a3(phal chen): gnas tsam du lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ston pa yin par yang dag par lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos
153a4(phal chen): rjes su lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sangs rgyas nam mkha' blta ba la mig tsam du lta zhing mthar gyis phyogs kyi gnas/ rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa'i bza'
153a5(phal chen): shing gi rab kun nas rnam par brgyan pa gang na ba der phyin nas/ des mthong mthong ba/ bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa rin po che thams cad kyi ra bas
153a6(phal chen): kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i shing gi phreng ba spel legs pas yongs su brgyan pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing gi phreng ba'i me tog srad bu yid du 'ong ba'i sprin
153a7(phal chen): rab tu 'phrul bas gzhi rgyas pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing gis yang dag par brgyan pa/ shing thams cad kyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su
153b1(phal chen): gang ba/ spos sna tshogs kyi shing gi phreng ba las phyogs kun tu spos kyi ngad zhim pa/ rin po che'i phreng ba'i shing sna tshogs kyi lhun las/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba 'phyang
153b2(phal chen): ba rab tu 'byung zhing char ltar mngon par 'bab pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi shing dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes shing spa la rgya cher brgyan pa'i
153b3(phal chen): gzhi can/ yid bzhin gyi gos kyi shing thams cad las kha dog sna tshogs kyi gos 'byung bas gam yo khebs shing mdzes par brgyan pa/ sil snyan gyi shing thams cad
153b4(phal chen): las| lha rdzas las kyang 'phags pa'i sil snyan rlung gis bskyod cing sgra 'byin pa'i dbyangs snyan pa 'byung ba/ sa'i gzhi mthon dman med par gnas pa/ rgyan gyi
153b5(phal chen): shing sna tshogs kyi gseb nas rgyan sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad par rgyun du 'byung zhing 'phyang bas rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa mthong ste/ bza' shing gi ra ba chen
153b6(phal chen): po kun nas rnam par brgyan pa de'i nang na khang pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun kyang / nor bu rin po che dam pa sna tshogs kyi ba gam gyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / khang pa
153b7(phal chen): brtsegs pa brgya stong phrag bcu 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las brtsegs pa'i bde dang ldan pa dang / gzhal med khang brgya stong phrag bcug gdung rin po che rnam par snang
154a1(phal chen): pa las bres pa dang / rdzing bu brgya stong phrag bcu rin po che thams cad las gzhi blangs te/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi pha gus mu khyud byas pa/ rin
154a2(phal chen): po che thams cad kyi them skas btags pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi stegs bus bskor ba/ lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi dri dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba/ gser gyi bye mas kun tu gram
154a3(phal chen): pa| gzhi nor bu rin po che chu 'dang kun tu bkram pa/ phyogs bzhi nas them skas rnam par bres pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba dang / ngang dur dang / rma bya dang /
154a4(phal chen): khu byug dang / khrung khrung dang / ka la ping+ka dang / ku na la'i sgra skad snyan pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i ta la'i phreng bas kun nas brgyan pa/ gser gyi dril bu'i dra bas
154a5(phal chen): kun nas yog pa/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba/ steng nas rin po che'i bla re chen po bres pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi ra bas yongs su bskor
154a6(phal chen): ba| rin po che'i dra bas brgyan pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan legs par bsgreng ba/ lu ma brgya stong phrag bcu dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi 'dam gyis mtha'
154a7(phal chen): 'khor ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa'i pad+mos yongs su khyab pa/ rin po che'i pad+mo'i 'od chen pos snang bar gyur pa'i chu dri ma med pa dang ldan pa yod pa
154b1(phal chen): ste| bza' shing gi ra ba de'i dbus na gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs zhes bya ba sa'i gzhi rin po che rgya mtsho'i snying po las blangs pa/ nor bu rin po che'i
154b2(phal chen): ka ba bkye ba/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi lhun mngon par 'phags pa nor bu rin po che 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i spang leb bkye bas brgyan pa/ gzhi nor bu rin po che 'bar
154b3(phal chen): ba grangs med pa'i ra bas bres pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po mi pham pa'i spos kyi dris gam yo kun nas bdugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po sgra snyan pa 'byin pa'i dri'i ngad kun tu ldang
154b4(phal chen): ba| rin po che'i rgyal po dri rnam par gsal bar byed pas/ dbang po rno ba'i bag chags rnam par bsgrubs pa dang ldan zhing gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs
154b5(phal chen): der stan grangs med cing tshad med pa bting bar gyur pa 'di lta ste/ pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che phyogs snang bar byed pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin
154b6(phal chen): po che rnam par snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che 'gro ba yid du 'ong ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che mdzod sna tshogs kyi pad+mo'i snying po can dang /
154b7(phal chen): nor bu rin po che seng ge'i shing thags pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po ches brgyan pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can
155a1(phal chen): dang | nor bu rin po che sgo kun nas brgyan pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che 'od kyi rgyan gyi pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin
155a2(phal chen): po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa'i rin po ches rnam par brgyan pa'i 'od zer kun tu 'byung ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i seng ges gnon
155a3(phal chen): pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag bshams shing bting ba ste/ gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs de'i ba gam mang po yang rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa
155a4(phal chen): las byas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab par mdzes shing gzugs yod du 'ong ba dag go /bza' shing gi ra ba kun
155a5(phal chen): nas brgyan pa de steng nas bla re chen po brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas khebs pa ste/ 'di ltar gos kyi bla re dang / 'khri shing gi bla re dang / me tog gi bla re dang / phreng
155a6(phal chen): ba'i bla re dang / spos kyi bla re dang / nor bu rin po che'i bla re dang / gser gyi bla re dang / rgyan gyi bla re dang / rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i bla re dang / glang po'i shugs dang ldan
155a7(phal chen): pas sprul pa'i lha mo'i bla re dang / nor bu rin po che brgya byin mngon par dga' ba'i bla re dang / de dag la sogs pa bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas khebs par byas pa'o//
155b1(phal chen): rin po che'i dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas yog pa ste/ 'di ltar rin po che dam pa'i dril bu'i dra ba dang / rin po che'i gdugs kyi dra ba dang / rin po che'i 'bru'i dra ba
155b2(phal chen): dang | mu tig rgya mtsho'i snying po'i dra ba dang / nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya sngon po'i dra ba dang / seng ge'i 'khri shing gi dra ba dang / nor bu rin po che chu shel gyi dra ba dang / spos kyi
155b3(phal chen): gzugs kyi dra ba dang / rin po che'i cod pan dang / rin po che'i phreng ba'i dra ba dang / de dag la sogs pa rin po che'i dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas yog pa/ snang ba
155b4(phal chen): chen po brgya stong phrag bcus kyang kun nas yog pa ste/ 'di ltar nor bu rin po che skar ma'i 'od zer gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po'i snang ba dang /
155b5(phal chen): nor bu rin po che zla ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che spos kyi dud pa 'od 'phro ba'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po'i snang ba dang / nor bu
155b6(phal chen): rin po che pad+mo'i snying po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che sgron ma chen po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che phyogs kun
155b7(phal chen): tu rnam par snang ba'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che spos kyi sprin chen po'i snang ba dang / glog gi phreng ba 'byung ba'i snang ba dang / de dag la sogs pa nor bu rin po che'i snang
156a1(phal chen): ba chen po brgya stong phrag bcus rtag tu snang bar byas pa'o/ /bza' shing gi ra ba de ni rgyan chen po'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i char 'bab
156a2(phal chen): pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa ste/ dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'brug sgra rab tu 'byung ba lha rdzas las 'das pa'i phreng ba dang lda ldi'i sprin chen po kun tu mched
156a3(phal chen): pas rab tu brgyan pa/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i gos tshon sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i sprin mngon par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyan gyi sprin
156a4(phal chen): brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par klubs pa/ lha'i bu brgya stong phrag bcu mthong bar dga' ste/ 'og tu lta zhing rab tu 'dud pa'i phyag char bzhin du 'bab pa/ lha mi'i
156a5(phal chen): sprin brgya stong phrag bcu sngon gyi spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam pos rang rang gi lus 'bul ba'i char mngon par 'bab pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcus chos
156a6(phal chen): mnyan pas sgom zhing 'ong ba'i char mngon par 'bab pa ste/ de na dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gser gyi snying po'i khri chen po la 'dug cing mu tig rgya mtsho'i snying po'i dra
156a7(phal chen): bas brgyan pa'i cod pan thogs pa/ lag pa la lha rdzas las 'das pa'i gser gyi dpung rgyan dang / gdu bu thogs pa/ lag pa nor bu rin po che dpal gyi rang bzhin
156b1(phal chen): gyi 'od zer gyis rnam par mdzes par gyur pa/ rna cha rin po che mthon thing dri ma med pa rab tu 'phyang ba/ mgo nor bu rin po che'i dra bas mdzes par brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che seng ge'i
156b2(phal chen): gdong gi rna ba'i gong rgyan thogs pa/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i mgul 'khor thogs pa/ lus rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas yog cing 'od rab tu 'bar
156b3(phal chen): ba| srog chags bye ba khrag khrig gis lus rab tu btud de/ phyag bya ba zhig 'dug ste/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin de'i drung du shar phyogs nas tshangs pa chen po'am/ tshangs
156b4(phal chen): lha nye phan nam/ tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'am/ dbang byed dam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi ris su gtogs pa'am/ rab 'phrul dga'am/ 'phrul dga'i ris
156b5(phal chen): su gtogs pa'am/ rab dga' ldan nam/ dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'am/ rab mtshe ma'am/ mtshe ma'i ris su gtogs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po'am/ sum
156b6(phal chen): cu rtsa gsum gyi ris su gtogs pa'am/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'i dbang po'am/ dri za'am/ grul bum gyi dbang po'am/ grul bum
156b7(phal chen): mam| klu'i dbang po'am/ klu'am/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'am/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi'am ci'i dbang po'am/
157a1(phal chen): mi'am ci'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'am/ lto 'phye chen po'am/ gshin rje'am/ gshin rje'i bu mo'am/ yi dwags rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/
157a2(phal chen): yi dwags sam/ mi'i dbang po'am/ mi yang rung ste/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag 'ong ba dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang /
157a3(phal chen): byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs
157a4(phal chen): nas kyang tshangs pa chen po'am/ tshangs lha nye phan nam/ tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'am/ dbang byed dam/ dbang byed kyi ris su gtogs pa nas/ mi'i dbang
157a5(phal chen): po'am/ mi'i bar gyi sems can mang po 'ong ba de dag nad sna tshogs shig gis btab pas/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis kun nas 'khor tam/ lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs
157a6(phal chen): la mngon par zhen tam/ las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa zhig yod na'ang / de dag gis dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin de mthong ma thag tu nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar
157a7(phal chen): gyur| sems kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang yang bral bar gyur/ lta ba'i gsal shing yang phyin par gyur/ sgrib pa'i ri thams cad kyang rnam par shigs par gyur/
157b1(phal chen): rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgribs pa med pa yang khong du chud par gyur te/ rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor de yod pas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rab tu byang bar 'gyur/
157b2(phal chen): dbang po'i myu gu thams cad kyang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtsho la'ang yang dag par gzhol bar gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho
157b3(phal chen): thams cad la'ang 'jug par gyur/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang tshul rgya mtsho thams cad kyang mngon sum du gyur/ smon lam gyi sgo thams cad kyang yang dag par skye bar gyur/ spyod
157b4(phal chen): pa'i sgo thams cad kyang rab tu 'byung bar gyur/ yon tan mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo thams cad kyang rnam par dag par gyur/ sems rgya chen po yang mngon par shes
157b5(phal chen): pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i tshul du 'byung bar gyur/ lus thogs pa med pas kyang thams cad du rjes su 'gro bar gyur to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang bza'
157b6(phal chen): shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i nang du phyin te bltas na/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin khri bzang po la 'dug pa mthong nas de dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gang na ba der
157b7(phal chen): stong ste phyin nas/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor
158a1(phal chen): ba byas nas/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar
158a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
158a3(phal chen): rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes thos na/ 'phags ma/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
158a4(phal chen): ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa mya ngan med pa/ bde ba'i rgyal
158a5(phal chen): mtshan thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni de'i mthus mthong na don yod pa'o/ /mnyan na don yod pa'o/ /rim gror byas pa don yod pa'o/ /gnas gcig na 'grogs
158a6(phal chen): pa don yod pa'o/ /rjes su dran par byas pa don yod pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su
158a7(phal chen): ma zin pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma dgongs pa rnams kyis mthong zhing rnam par dmigs par mig lam du 'ong bar mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ kho mo
158b1(phal chen): mthong btsam gyis ni/ sems can rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu/ kho mo'i drung
158b2(phal chen): du shar phyogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa dag byon cing / gdan rin po che'i khri la bzhugs nas chos ston to/ /shar phyogs nas ji lta ba bzhin du phyogs bcu nas kyang de
158b3(phal chen): bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de lta bas na kho mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba'o/ /chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs
158b4(phal chen): pa dang mi 'bral ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho mo dang spyod pa'i skal pa mnyam pa'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par
158b5(phal chen): brgyan pa 'di na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go /rigs kyi bu/ sems can gzhan gang
158b6(phal chen): 'di na gnas pa de dag kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las mi ldog pa phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun du gtogs pa sha stag ste/ kho mo dang spyod pa'i skal
158b7(phal chen): pa mnyam pa dag go / smras pa/ 'phags ma khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yun ji srid cig nas thugs bskyed/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ kho mos ni/ sngon
159a1(phal chen): gyi gnas rjes su dran te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ces bya ba byung ba de
159a2(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa de'i drung na/ kho mos tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de kho mos mchod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos bstan pa kho mos
159a3(phal chen): yongs su bzung ngo / /de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i bstan pa la'ang kho mo rab tu byung ngo / /chos kyi 'khor lo yang kho mos bzung
159a4(phal chen): ngo| |de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa dpal zhes bya ba byung ste/ de yang kho mos bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab dpal zhes bya ba
159a5(phal chen): byung ngo / /de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i snying po zhes bya ba byung ngo / /de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba byung ngo / /de'i
159a6(phal chen): snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba byung ngo / /de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa dag pa zhes bya ba byung ngo / /de'i snga rol du de bzhin
159a7(phal chen): gshegs pa rdo rje'i gtsug ces bya ba byung ngo / /de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa chu bo'i lha zhes bya ba byung ste/ rigs kyi bu/ gzhung de ltar tshe gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa
159b1(phal chen): d ang | bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshams 'dab chags su bsams te dran par byas
159b2(phal chen): na| gang kho mos rim gror byas te bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsti stang du byas pa dang / gang gi spyan sngar kho mos chos thos par gyur pa dang / gang gi bstan pa la kho
159b3(phal chen): mos tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gang+gA sum cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed rjes su dran te/ rigs kyi bu/ de phan chad du kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa ji
159b4(phal chen): snyed cig bsnyen bkur ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mkhyen to/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems dang po bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pas/ byang
159b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ snying rje chen po'i khongs su 'gro pa thams cad chud pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs
159b6(phal chen): kyi bu/ smon lam chen pos phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi zad zad du 'gro bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byams pa chen pos 'gro
159b7(phal chen): ba thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas zhing thams cad du bskal pa
160a1(phal chen): thams cad yongs su sdud pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i
160a2(phal chen): lam las phyir mi ldog pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzungs kyi stobs kyis 'gro ba thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi tshul khong
160a3(phal chen): du chud par byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ ye shes snang ba'i stobs kyis dus gsum gyi ye shes kyi tshul khong du chud par byed cing /
160a4(phal chen): yang dag par 'dzin pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis zhing thams cad du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa
160a5(phal chen): dang | mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'od kyi dra ba'i 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes
160a6(phal chen): pa'i stobs kyis tshig gcig brjod kyang / 'gro ba thams cad shin tu tshim par byed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ lus rnam par
160a7(phal chen): dag pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rang gi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /nor bzang gis smras pa/ 'phags ma khyod ji
160b1(phal chen): srid cig na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gcig la
160b2(phal chen): dmigs shing gdul bar bya ba dang / smin par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin te/ sems can brgya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can
160b3(phal chen): stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can brgya phrag stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba brgya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba stong gi phyir ma
160b4(phal chen): yin| sems can bye ba brgya phrag stong gi phyir ma yin te/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi don du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/
160b5(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can khrag khrig gi phyir ma yin/ sems can gang+gA'i phyir ma yin/ sems can ban bun gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can
160b6(phal chen): phyar phyur gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can byang bying gi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyer 'jal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyal phyol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can yal yol
160b7(phal chen): gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ljad ljod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyod zim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyad phyod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ldam ldem gyi phyir ma
161a1(phal chen): yin| sems can ya gangs kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can cho ma'i phyir ma yin/ sems can khram khrim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nab nub
161a2(phal chen): kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brgyud yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can btang yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bkra yar gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gsal yas kyi
161a3(phal chen): phyir ma yin/ sems can gzhal brtag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can mtshungs med kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lam lum gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rab rib kyi
161a4(phal chen): phyir ma yin/ sems can thab thib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'grigs yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can them 'phyo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bsam phyod
161a5(phal chen): kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'dra mnyam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brang breng gi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrod yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rgyas 'dal gyi
161a6(phal chen): phyir ma yin/ sems can bsngo yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can zang yag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'phro ba bkye'i phyir ma yin/ sems can rtse 'phyo'i phyir ma yin/
161a7(phal chen): sems can yong then gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brug g.yos kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can sang yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can thing yug gi phyir ma yin/ sems can
161b1(phal chen): snang yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nan pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yid 'phyo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can nab neb kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can khrig thams kyi phyir
161b2(phal chen): ma yin/ sems can yal yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can thug yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can yad yud kyi phyir ma yin/
161b3(phal chen): sems can phyo ldog gi phyir ma yin/ sems can brda yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lhub be'i phyir ma yin/ sems can thag thug gi phyir ma yin/ sems can
161b4(phal chen): khrig ga'i phyir ma yin/ sems can rig yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can snyad med kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mchog phreng gi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyag 'bru'i phyir
161b5(phal chen): ma yin| sems can spu 'phyes kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'bru 'brel gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod 'os kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lhod yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems
161b6(phal chen): can brjod phul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can zhi snyed kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ngag thim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'phyo 'gyur gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyar nyer
161b7(phal chen): gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyag phyig gi phyir ma yin/ sems can zal zul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can sal sul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can g.yo ldeg gi
162a1(phal chen): phyir ma yin/ sems can phan phun gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brnang ya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can rem 'drol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems
162a2(phal chen): can rdzi ngad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rdzi rdul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phun yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'ol 'ol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can

162a4(phal chen): can grangs mtha'i phyir ma yin/ sems can phyod yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'ol phyod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gdab yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems
162a5(phal chen): can gcal yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can byi ma 'phyo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yam me'i phyir ma yin/ sems
162a6(phal chen): can bsnyal yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ldab ldeb kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'ban chad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phan phung gi phyir ma yin/
162a7(phal chen): sems can mtha' rdul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rgyud lding gi phyir ma yin/ sems can yun 'gyangs kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mkha' yal gyi phyir ma yin/
162b1(phal chen): sems can bun lob kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lam lom gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsnyad yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lang ling gi phyir ma yin/
162b2(phal chen): sems can ljab ljib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mi brtsal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'byams yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nga 'grang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can
162b3(phal chen): smos yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bkra chal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lo rgyas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'bum rdib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can le lo'i phyir ma
162b4(phal chen): yin| sems can phyam phyam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang 'phyos kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang 'phyos la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag yas kyi phyir
162b5(phal chen): ma yin/ sems can dpag yas la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yal 'phyong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can yal 'phyong la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can mu yal
162b6(phal chen): gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mu yal la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yol la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can
162b7(phal chen): mi 'jal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mi 'jal la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bsam phyod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsam phyod la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/
163a1(phal chen): sems can mtha' 'byams kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mtha' 'byams la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag thag gi phyir
163a2(phal chen): ma yin/ sems can dpag thag la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems
163a3(phal chen): can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can 'jig
163a4(phal chen): rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin pa nas/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi
163a5(phal chen): phyir ma yin/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gi 'jig
163a6(phal chen): rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul
163a7(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
163b1(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin pa nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang
163b2(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du 'di lta ste/ yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul
163b3(phal chen): ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin gyi/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa lhag ma med pa mtha' dag thams cad
163b4(phal chen): du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o/ /'di lta ste/
163b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas gcig bsnyen bkur ba dang / mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin
163b6(phal chen): pa dang / sangs rgyas bcu bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa nas| brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig
163b7(phal chen): rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang
164a1(phal chen): chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing
164a2(phal chen): rim gror bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i de bzhin
164a3(phal chen): gshegs pa'i rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma
164a4(phal chen): yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ 'jig
164a5(phal chen): rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
164a6(phal chen): rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi bstan pa yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang
164a7(phal chen): chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs
164b1(phal chen): su gzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas gcig rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug
164b2(phal chen): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba
164b3(phal chen): snyed kyi sangs rgyas rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin no/ /de
164b4(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas /sangs
164b5(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang
164b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas gcig gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub
164b7(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/ 'khor gyi dkyil
165a1(phal chen): 'khor rnam par phye ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs
165a2(phal chen): pa gcig gi chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med
165a3(phal chen): pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems
165a4(phal chen): byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can gyi sems rgya mtsho gcig khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin
165a5(phal chen): pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi sems rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang
165a6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can gcig gi dbang po'i 'khor lo yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
165a7(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi dbang
165b1(phal chen): po'i 'khor lo yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can gcig gi dbang po rgya mtsho khong du chud
165b2(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba
165b3(phal chen): snyed kyi sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi
165b4(phal chen): bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du
165b5(phal chen): med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
165b6(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug
165b7(phal chen): bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu
166a1(phal chen): p hra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug par bya
166a2(phal chen): ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs
166a3(phal chen): pa rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i
166a4(phal chen): y ang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i
166a5(phal chen): phyir| byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho
166a6(phal chen): thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod
166a7(phal chen): du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub
166b1(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par
166b2(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
166b3(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub
166b4(phal chen): tu skye ba ma yin gyi/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa/ lhag ma med pa mtha' dag thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
166b5(phal chen): rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o/ /sangs rgyas ma lus pa thams cad bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams
166b6(phal chen): kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror
166b7(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam la mngon par mos pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
167a1(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa brtan par 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ma lus pa thams cad yongs su gzung ba'i phyir /byang chub
167a2(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba 'byung ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir/
167a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyi shugs drag po skye ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug
167a4(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yi dam brtan pa skye ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams
167a5(phal chen): cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par mos pa 'byung ba yin/ 'gro ba'i sems rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i
167a6(phal chen): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam yongs su skye ba yin/ sems can gyi dbang po'i 'khor lo ma lus pa thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/
167a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'dod pa skye ba yin/ sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
167b1(phal chen): rnams kyi spro ba skye ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
167b2(phal chen): rnams kyi mos pa skye ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yongs su gcad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
167b3(phal chen): rnams kyi brtson 'grus yongs su skye ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho bskam pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
167b4(phal chen): kyi ye shes chen po'i nyi ma 'char ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi
167b5(phal chen): snang ba 'byung ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi me'i phung po rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i sprin
167b6(phal chen): chen po kun nas 'du ba yin/ rigs kyi bu/ mdor na de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshul dang / sgo grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu dag /byang
167b7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su bsgrub par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni ye shes khong du chud par
168a1(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni yongs su dag par bya ba'i
168a2(phal chen): phyir| zhing thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de lta bas na kho mos ni bdag gi smon lam nam mkha'i dbyings rnam par dag pa'i mtha' gang
168a3(phal chen): du thug pa de'i mthas klas par shog cig / bdag gi smon lam 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa'i mtha' gang du thug pa de'i mthas klas par shog cig /bdag
168a4(phal chen): gi smon lam ma sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang / bdag la nyal ba'i mtha' gang du thug pa de'i mthas klas par shog
168a5(phal chen): cig ces de ltar smon lam btab bo/ smras pa/ 'phags ma/ rnam par thar pa 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ rnam par thar pa 'di
168a6(phal chen): ni nyon mongs pa med pa/ bde ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ kho mos kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de gcig pu shes par zad
168a7(phal chen): na| byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i phyir sems rgya mtsho dang ldan pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa'i phyir ri
168b1(phal chen): rab dang 'dra ba/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu sos par byed pa'i phyir sman gyi rgyal po mthong na legs pa lta bu/ sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i
168b2(phal chen): mun pa sel ba'i phyir nyi mar gyur pa / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i gnas su gyur pas ba lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don byed pa'i phyir
168b3(phal chen): rlung du gyur pa/ sems can thams cad la ye shes kyi snang ba 'byin pa'i phyir mar mer gyur pa/ zhi ba'i sgras sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi char yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'debs
168b4(phal chen): pa'i phyir sprin du gyur pa/ bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa'i phyir zla ba lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i phyir brgya phyin lta bu de
168b5(phal chen): dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa smos pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi rnam pa mtha'
168b6(phal chen): dang dbus med pa yongs su bstan par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu /lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa 'di na/ yul chu ba gtsang ma zhes bya ba yod de/
168b7(phal chen): de na drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs zhes bya ba 'dug gi /de'i gan du song la dris shig dang / des rigs kyi bu khyod la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshong dpon
169a1(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzang gis/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin la lan brgya stong du
169a2(phal chen): mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ phyag 'tshal nas ngo mchi mas gang bar ngus te/ byang chub mchog tu dkon pa rjes su sems shing / dge
169a3(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen rim gro bya ba dkon par rjes su bsdam pa dang / skyes bu dam pa dang 'phrad pa dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po thob par
169a4(phal chen): bya ba rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang / skal ba mnyam pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
169a5(phal chen): dang 'phrad pa dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub tu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par mos shing sems nges par gzhog pa dkon par rjes su
169a6(phal chen): bsdam pa dang / mi mnyam pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul rjes su bstan pa'i sbyor ba dkon par rjes su bsdam pa dang / sems dri ma med cing mi 'phrogs pa'i sbyor ba
169a7(phal chen): yang dag par bsgrub pa dka' bar rjes su bsam pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du shugs drag po rnam par skyed pa'i chos kyi snang ba dkon par rjes su bsam
169b1(phal chen): pa byed cing / dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang / byang chub sems dpa'i gdams ngag gi rjes su song ba'i sems dang
169b2(phal chen): ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi stobs rnam par 'phel bar bya
169b3(phal chen): ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas blta ba'i shugs drag po rab tu snang bar byas pa'i sems dang ldan pa| chos kyi gter 'thob par bya la shugs drag po skyes pa'i sems
169b4(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i shugs drag po rab tu 'phel ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi phyogs la mngon du lta ba'i sems dang ldan
169b5(phal chen): pa| chos kyi rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis snang bar byas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings la mun pa med par
169b6(phal chen): rnam par lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ rdo rje rin po che mthu bo ches mi choms pa ltar dri ma med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bdud thams cad kyi dpung gis brgal bar dka' zhing
169b7(phal chen): thub par dka' ba'i sems dang ldan pa de/ mthar gyis yul chu ba gtsang ma ga la ba der phyin nas/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs tshol tshol ba las/ de'i tshe drang
170a1(phal chen): song 'jigs mchog dbyangs/ dge ba sbyang ba'i gnas shing dang / shing phran sna tshogs grangs med pa'i nags tshal mdangs dga' ba/
170a2(phal chen): lo mas rgyas pa'i shing gis kun nas 'grigs pa/ rtag tu me tog rgyas pa dang ldan pa'i shing sna tshogs can/ rtag tu shing tog mang po dang ldan pa'i shing tog gi
170a3(phal chen): shing dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing drung / nor bu rin po che'i spang leb kyis rtag tu gshibs pa dang ldan pa/ tsan dan dam pa'i shing kun nas rnam
170a4(phal chen): par bres pa/ a ga ru yid du 'ong ba'i shing las spos kyi dri rtag tu 'byung bas rab tu brgyan pa/ phyogs bzhi nas shing pa ta la rnam par mdzes par skyes pas yongs su
170a5(phal chen): brgyan pa/ n+ya gro da'i shing dbyibs yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ 'dzam bu'i shing las rtag tu shing thog smin pa 'brul ba/ me tog gi tshal pad+mo dang / ut+pa la
170a6(phal chen): gsar du skyes pas rab tu brgyan pa zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs/ drang srong stong phrag bcus bskor
170a7(phal chen): cing | tsan dan gyi yal gshin tu 'brel ba'i bya skyibs shig na/ thor tshugs kyi cod pan can/ pags pa dang / rtswa'i gos gyon pa/ shing shun gyi smad g.yogs
170b1(phal chen): can| rtswa'i stan la 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs ga la ba der stong ste/ phyin nas yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang
170b2(phal chen): phrad pa'i bsam pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni yang dag pa'i lam ston pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'byung ba'i sgo yin par yang dag par lta/ thams cad
170b3(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i sa la gzhog pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la rag lus par yang dag par lta/ stobs bcu'i ye shes rin
170b4(phal chen): po che'i gling du skyel bas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi mnyan pa la rag lus par yang dag par lta/ stobs bcu'i ye shes snang ba yang
170b5(phal chen): dag par bskyed pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sgron mas snang bar bya ba yin par yang dag par lta/ nyam nyes med par thams
170b6(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong du phyin par byed pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
170b7(phal chen): yongs su ston pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mar me ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa thams cad med par byed
171a1(phal chen): pas| thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stegs ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ byams pa chen po'i stobs kyis sim
171a2(phal chen): pa yongs su skyed pa'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gdugs ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ snying rje chen po yongs su bskyed pas/ thams
171a3(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta zhing / chos kyi rang bzhin gyi tshul rab tu snang bar byed pas/ thams cad mkhyen
171a4(phal chen): pa nyid gsal bar mthong ba ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag las par mthong nas/ lus thams cad kyis phab ste/ phyag byas nas langs te/ drang srong 'jigs mchog
171a5(phal chen): dbyangs la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas/ yid du 'ong ba'i tshul gyis yid du 'ong ba'i tshig brjod de/ 'di skad ces smras
171a6(phal chen): so| |'phags pa/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab
171a7(phal chen): par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/ /
171b1(phal chen): zhes thos na/ 'phags pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol
171b2(phal chen): de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/ bram ze'i byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag la bltas te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /byis pa dag /rigs kyi bu 'dis bla na
171b3(phal chen): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sems can thams cad 'jigs pa med pa la mgron du gnyer to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni sems can thams
171b4(phal chen): cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du sta gon du gnas pa ste/ ye shes rgya mtsho mngon du gyur pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi sprin gyi char btung bar 'dod pa'o/ /
171b5(phal chen): chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par 'dod pa'o/ /ye shes kyi snang ba chen po la gnas par 'dod pa'o/ /snying rje chen po'i sprin bsdu bar 'dod pa'o/ /chos kyi char chen
171b6(phal chen): po mngon par dbab par 'dod pa'o/ /ye shes chen po'i zla ba 'jig rten du shar bar byas te/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad rab tu gzhil bar 'dod pa'o/ /sems
171b7(phal chen): can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel bar 'dod pa'o/ /de nas bram ze'i byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag gis/ me tog dri zhim la yid du 'ong zhing / kha dog sna tshogs
172a1(phal chen): dang ldan pa mang pos/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la gtor to/ /mngon par gtor to/ /rab tu gtor to/ /mngon par phyag 'tshal te/ rab tu
172a2(phal chen): btud de phyag 'tshal nas/ g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ tshig 'di skad du brjod do/ /'di ni sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal
172a3(phal chen): ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par gcod par 'gyur ro/ /gshin rje'i 'jig
172a4(phal chen): rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /mi khom pa'i sgo thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro/ /sred pa'i rgya mtsho yongs su skem par 'gyur ro/ /sred pa'i
172a5(phal chen): 'ching ba gcod par 'gyur ro/ /sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /ma rig pa'i mun pa sel bar 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams kyi khor yug gis 'jig
172a6(phal chen): rten yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /ye shes rin po che'i 'byung gnas yongs su ston par 'gyur ro/ /ye shes kyi nyi ma 'char bar bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi mig rnam par
172a7(phal chen): sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten rnams la mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/ byis pa de dag la 'di skad
172b1(phal chen): ces smras so/ /byis pa dag /gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni /byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams
172b2(phal chen): cad kyi bde ba rab tu bskyed de/ rim gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byis pa dag /rigs kyi bu 'dis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
172b3(phal chen): tu sems bskyed pa ste/ de bas na 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyis yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu
172b4(phal chen): nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan thob pa'o/ /nor bzang gis smras pa/ byang chub
172b5(phal chen): sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ tshong dpon
172b6(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzang gi mgo la byugs nas/ lag pa g.yas pas bzung ngo / /tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis lag pa g.yas pas bzung
172b7(phal chen): ma thag tu de'i mod la/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong bar gyur te/
173a1(phal chen): de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhabs kyi drung na/ bdag nyid 'dug pa shes par gyur
173a2(phal chen): to| |sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag kyang / rnam pa grangs med par rnam par dag pa'i rgyan dang ldan par mthong ngo / /de dag na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
173a3(phal chen): 'khor rgya mtsho kha dog sna tshogs can/ rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa dag 'khod par mthong ngo / /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de dag na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
173a4(phal chen): sku mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po 'bar bas brgyan pa dag bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /de dag las kyang tshig dang yi ge gcig las kyang / phyir phyogs pa med par chos bstan
173a5(phal chen): pa nyan to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo de dag kyang phan tshun ma 'dres par yang dag par 'dzin to/ /chos kyi sprin gyi char sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs la
173a6(phal chen): rab ba pa de dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam/ mos pa sna tshogs kyi stobs kyis rnam par sbyangs pa rgya mtsho la yang zhugs
173a7(phal chen): so| |sangs rgyas kyi yang dag par bsdu ba smon lam sna tshogs rgya mtshos rnam par dag pa rgya mtsho de dag la'ang zhugs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba
173b1(phal chen): bzhin du tshim par 'gyur bar rnam par dmigs pa de dag kyang mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba 'dod chags dang bral ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par dag pa'i rgyan gyi
173b2(phal chen): dkyil 'khor de dag kyang mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi stobs de dag la'ang ye shes snang ba bsgribs pa med pa dang ldan pas zhugs so/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
173b3(phal chen): thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ye shes kyi 'od kyis snang bar gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po snang ba rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin ye shes mi zad
173b4(phal chen): pa'i rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa/ gzungs kyi sgo snang ba/ phyogs kun gyi dra ba rab tu thob pa/ gzungs kyi sgo rdo rje'i snying pos sems rab tu gsal bar byas pa/ ting nge 'dzin
173b5(phal chen): gyi ye shes brtsegs pa rnam par phye ba'i yul la rnam par phye ba rab tu thob pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa/ gzhi kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i snying
173b6(phal chen): po yul du gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba sangs rgyas nam mkha'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu zhugs pa/ ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i
173b7(phal chen): mu khyud kyis sems rab tu snang bar byas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba dus gsum gyi ye shes rin po che mi zad pa'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu brtson pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
174a1(phal chen): la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni nyin zhag gcig lon par shes so/ /la lar ni nyin zhag bdun lon pa snyam/ la lar ni zla ba phyed lon pa snyam/
174a2(phal chen): la lar ni zla ba gcig lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo gcig lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo brgya lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo brgya phrag stong lon
174a3(phal chen): pa snyam/ la lar ni lo bye ba lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo bye ba brgya lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo byed ba stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo bye ba brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la
174a4(phal chen): lar ni lo bye ba khrag khrig lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa phyed lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa gcig lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa brgya lon pa
174a5(phal chen): snyam| la lar ni bskal pa stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa
174a6(phal chen): bye ba phrag brgya lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba phrag
174a7(phal chen): khrig brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam byed pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa snyed lon par gyur
174b1(phal chen): pa snyam byed pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni/ bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lon pa snyam byed pa nas/ bskal pa sangs rgyas
174b2(phal chen): kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lon pa snyam byed par gyur to/ /de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang
174b3(phal chen): btang ba dang / des yang bdag drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi mdun na 'dug par shes par gyur to/ /de la drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/
174b4(phal chen): dran mod/ smras pa/ 'phags pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis dran no/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bos ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i
174b5(phal chen): rgyal mtshan 'di shes par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ dus
174b6(phal chen): thams cad du 'khor lo bskor ba/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang ye shes mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba'i nyi ma la rnam par dmigs pa'i rgyan rab tu
174b7(phal chen): 'god pa/ dus gsum gyi yul skad cig gcig gis ye shes su yang dag par sdud pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus shin tu rnam par bkram pa/ chos kyi dbyings
175a1(phal chen): thams cad la/ ye shes snang ba'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon sum du mngon par
175a2(phal chen): langs pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du spyod pas rnam par dpyod pa dang mthun pa'i tshul dang ldan pa 'dod pa bzhin du kun tu snang zhing dri ma med la/ 'od dang
175a3(phal chen): ldan pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/ smon lam gyi khyad par smos pa'am/ zhing gi mngon par 'du bya
175a4(phal chen): ba shes pa'am/ ye shes kyi yul la 'jug par bya ba'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi rjes 'brang bar bya ba'am/ rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug par
175a5(phal chen): bya ba'am/ rnam par thar pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / rnam par rtse ba'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'am/ lus rnam par phye ba'i mtshan ma gzung bar bya ba'am/ dbyangs
175a6(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa brjod pa'am/ ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu bstan par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul yongs su
175a7(phal chen): tshol ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched ces bya ba 'dug gi /de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
175b1(phal chen): la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shing / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ drang
175b2(phal chen): srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs la/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/
175b3(phal chen): yang dang yang bltas te/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi drung nas song ngo // //bam po dgu bcu rtsa gsum pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang /
175b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ye shes kyis snang bar byas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab
175b5(phal chen): pa la mngon sum du rnam par spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mngon sum gyi ye shes kyis mngon par shes pa/ byang chub sems
175b6(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyis sems snang bar gyur pa/ dus thams cad du yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa/
175b7(phal chen): 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul gyis snang bar gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes
176a1(phal chen): snang ba thob pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i spyod yul la rnam par spyod pa mngon du gyur pa/ gnyis su rnam par rtog pa med pas mnyam pa nyid du
176a2(phal chen): bstan pa'i ye shes lhur len pa/ dmigs pa thams cad la rab tu 'dal ba'i ye shes snang ba dang ldan pa/ mnyam pa thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i bzod pa rnam par
176a3(phal chen): dag pa la mos pa'i mdzod la mkhas pa/ rang bzhin gyi chos la bzod pa khong du chud pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rang
176a4(phal chen): bzhin bsgom pa dang mi 'bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po las phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ stobs bcu'i ye shes snang ba'i
176a5(phal chen): 'od rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings brjod pa la mngon par mos pas ngoms pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam par spyod pa'i spyod yul la
176a6(phal chen): 'jug pa khong du chud pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan mtha' yas pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon
176a7(phal chen): lam gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa rnam par spyad pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba mi zad pa khong du chud pa'i ye shes mtha' dang dbus med pa mngon
176b1(phal chen): du gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul bar bya ba la zhum pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa des/ byang chub sems
176b2(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa'i yul mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
176b3(phal chen): rnam par phye ba sna tshogs mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dmigs pa phra ba dang / yangs pa'i khongs su chud par bya ba la yang
176b4(phal chen): dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzhi mtha' yas pa'i ming gi dra ba sna tshogs yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su rnam par spyad pa rnam par gdags
176b5(phal chen): pa mtha' yas pa'i kun rdzob rnam pa tha dad pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / sems can gyi mos pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / sems can rnam par
176b6(phal chen): phye ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba khong du chud par bya ba la yang dag par
176b7(phal chen): blta ba dang / sems can dang / phyogs dang / dus mtha' yas pa'i ming gi rnam pa sna tshogs la yang dag par blta ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mngon du bya ba byed cing / mthar
177a1(phal chen): gyis yul tshol ba dang ldan pa gang na ba dang / bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched ga la ba der phyin to/ /de'i tshe bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched thams
177a2(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgrub pa'i gzhir byas shing dka' thub drag po la spyod de/ de'i phyogs bzhi nas me'i phung po ri rab tsam du che ba bus pa dang / ri shin tu mtho ba'i g.yang sa'i
177a3(phal chen): lam gyi rgyud spu gri'i sos gshibs pas 'khod par snang ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal
177a4(phal chen): te| mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang
177a5(phal chen): chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad pa dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag
177a6(phal chen): dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar
177a7(phal chen): nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ song la spu gri'i so dang ra ba'i ri 'di la 'dzegs te/ me'i 'obs 'dir mchongs shig dang / des khyod
177b1(phal chen): kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ mi khom pa brgyad las rnam par ldog pa
177b2(phal chen): yang shin tu dkon/ mir 'gyur te/ khom pa phun sum tshogs shing rnam par dag pa yang shin tu dkon/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba yang shin tu dkon/ dbang po nyams su med pa yang
177b3(phal chen): shin tu dkon/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thos pa yang shin tu dkon/ skyes bu dam pa dang phrad pa yang shin tu dkon/ yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang shin tu dkon/ yang
177b4(phal chen): dag pa'i tshul rjes su bstan pas legs par sdud pa yang shin tu dkon/ yang dag par 'tsho bar bya ba yang shin tu dkon/ mi'i 'jig rten na chos dang gnyen ba'i chos la nan tan
177b5(phal chen): byed pa yang shin tu dkon na/ de skad zer zhing bdag gi dge ba'i bar chad la zhugs la/ de ltar bdag gi srog gcad par brtson pa 'di bdud dam zhig ma yin nam/ bdud
177b6(phal chen): kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'am/ bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'am/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ltar brdzus pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa' la mi gcags pa byed pa zhig ma
177b7(phal chen): yin grang / bdag gi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gegs byed par 'dod pa zhig ma yin grang / bdag lam gol ba ngan par gzhug par 'dod pa zhig ma yin grang / bdag
178a1(phal chen): gis sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par bya ba'i chos kyi sgo la gegs byed pa zhig ma yin grang snyam nas/ de de ltar sems shing yid la byed
178a2(phal chen): pa'i tshe/ tshangs pa stong phrag bcu steng gi bar snang la gnas te/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de lta bu'i sems mi brtan par ma byed cig /rigs kyi bu/ 'phags
178a3(phal chen): pa 'di ni/ ting nge 'dzin rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i snang ba rab tu thob pa ste/ brtson 'grus ldog pa med pa'o/ /brtsams pa chen po mthar dbyung ba la zhugs pa'o/ /'gro ba thams
178a4(phal chen): cad kyi sred pa'i rlan bskam pa la mngon par brtson pa'o/ /lta ba'i rnam pa dang / dra ba thams cad gtub pa la brtson pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i lcag lcig thams cad zad par
178a5(phal chen): bsreg pa la sta gon du gnas pa'o/ /mi khom mi shes pa'i bas mtha'i dgon pa thams cad snang bar bya ba la brtson pa'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi rga shi'i g.yang sa dang /
178a6(phal chen): 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa la yi dam brtan pa'o/ /dus gsum gyi mun pa bsal pa la mngon par brtson pa'o/ /chos thams cad kyi 'od zer dgye ba la zhugs pa'o/ /
178a7(phal chen): rigs kyi bu/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ tshangs pa ji snyed cig mkhan po dang / dbang sgyur ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad
178b1(phal chen): kyi gtso bor rang rang rlom zhing / sems pa blta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa de dag thams cad/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub dang / brtul zhugs kyi thugs
178b2(phal chen): dam gyi mthus/ rang rang gi gnas na bag dga' ba med cing / de dag bsam gtan gyi ro dga' ba myong ba med pas/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /de dag phyin pa dang /
178b3(phal chen): 'phags pa 'di'i rdzu 'phrul gyi byin dang / drag shul kyi dka' thub dang / brtul zhugs kyi sa zil gyis mnan te/ lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / nga rgyal
178b4(phal chen): dang | rlom sems thams cad rab tu spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /'gro ba thams cad la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos khyab par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi bsam pa
178b5(phal chen): brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa shin tu yangs par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par blta ba la mngon par brtson par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas
178b6(phal chen): kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor thob par bya ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / thams cad du grag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs la thogs pa med cing / bsgribs pa med par bya ba'i phyir
178b7(phal chen): chos ston to/ /bdud stong phrag bcu yang steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po ches mngon par gtor te/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'phags pa 'di
179a1(phal chen): dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ 'od 'phro ba'i phung po 'di las snang ba chen po byung zhing / kho bo cag gi khyim dang / lus dang /
179a2(phal chen): rgyan gyi longs spyod thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang so so'i gnas gnas na bag dga' ba med pas 'khor dang bcas te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du
179a3(phal chen): 'dong ngo / /kho bo cag 'di'i drung du phyin nas kyang / 'phags pa 'di ni kho bo cag la ci nas kyang / rang rang gi sems sor chud nas byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ bla na
179a4(phal chen): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba/ de lta de ltar chos ston to/ /dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcus kyang / lha rdzas kyi me
179a5(phal chen): tog gis mngon par gtor te/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba byed pa'i tshe/ kho bo cag kyang rang rang gi gnas
179a6(phal chen): na dga' ba med de/ de ltar bdag cag kyang rang rang gi skye bo'i 'khor dang bcas te/ 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /bdag cag drung du phyin pa dang / 'di ni bdag cag la rang rang gi
179a7(phal chen): sems la dbang bsgyur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /nyon mongs pa thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba thob par bya ba dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du skye ba la dbang
179b1(phal chen): bsgyur ba thob par bya ba dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i dbang rab tu thob par bya ba dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba thob par bya ba
179b2(phal chen): dang / yo byad la dbang ba'i rgyan yongs su dag par bya ba dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshe la dbang bsgyur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /rab 'phrul dga'i lha'i rgyal
179b3(phal chen): po stong phrag bcu yang / steng gi bar snang la 'khod de/ lha rdzas kyi glu yang dag par sbyar ba'i nga ro snyan pa'i dbyangs bsgrags te/ mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces 'dzer
179b4(phal chen): to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po 'di las de dang 'dra ba'i 'od byung zhing kho bo cag gi gzhal med khang 'di
179b5(phal chen): dag rnam par dag ste/ gsal ba dang / 'od shin tu dang bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyan 'di dag dang / lha'i bu mo 'di dag kyang / rnam par dag cing gsal la 'od shin tu dang bar
179b6(phal chen): 'gyur ro/ /de bas na bdag cag kyang lha'i bu dang / lha mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas par/ 'dod pa la dga' bar tshor ba med de/ 'dod pa'i bde ba la mngon par
179b7(phal chen): dga' ba med pas/ lus dang sems sim par gyur nas/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dod pa yin te/ 'phags pa 'di ni/ bdag cag de ltar phyin pa rnams la sems rnam par
180a1(phal chen): dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /sems kyi 'od dang bar bya ba dang / sems shin tu dag par bya ba dang / sems las su rung bar bya ba dang /
180a2(phal chen): sems kyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / stobs bcu'i ye shes 'thob pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / chos kyi shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / sangs
180a3(phal chen): rgyas kyi sku tshad med pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir lus rnam par dag par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thob par bya ba'i phyir ngag rnam par dag par bya ba dang /
180a4(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rab tu thob par bya bar sems rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu'i lha'i bu dang / lha'i
180a5(phal chen): bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag kyang / steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ spos sna tshogs kyi phye ma'i sprin gyi char mngon par phab pas mchod pa byas te/ phyag 'tshal
180a6(phal chen): nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang rang rang gi gnas na dga' ba med de/ de
180a7(phal chen): ltar dga' ba med pas 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag cag phyin pa rnams la/ 'phags pa 'di ni yul thams cad la ltos pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /chog shes
180b1(phal chen): pa'i sems su bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyod pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rab tu thob par bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs
180b2(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu lha'i bu dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag gis kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog man da ra
180b3(phal chen): ba'i char mngon par phab ste/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang lha rdzas kyi glu snyan
180b4(phal chen): pa la dga' ba med de/ de ltar dga' ba med pas 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag cag phyin nas kyang / 'phags pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad rnam par
180b5(phal chen): bzlog par bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin stong phrag bcu so so nas nye ba'i dbang po sum cu rtsa gnyis
180b6(phal chen): dang | lha'i bu dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pas/ lha rdzas kyi gos dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par phab ste/ 'di skad
180b7(phal chen): ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang brgya byin gyi khang pa dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / rtse ba'i
181a1(phal chen): nags tshal dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung zhing dkrol ba dang / gam yo na glu len pa'i longs spyod la dga' ba med/ de ltar bdag cag
181a2(phal chen): dga' ba med pas 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /bdag cag der phyin nas kyang / 'phags pa 'di ni kho bo cag la 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongs su spang pa'i phyir
181a3(phal chen): chos ston to/ /'di dag thams cad ni rtag pa ma yin te/ mi brtan zhing 'jig par 'gyur ba'i chos can no zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod do/ /dregs pa dang / bag med pa
181a4(phal chen): thams cad yongs su gcad pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub tu spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir chos ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang 'dis bltas pa tsam gyis ri rab kyi rtse mo
181a5(phal chen): thams cad kyang g.yo bar 'gyur te/ des bdag cag gshigs pas sems skyo bar gyur nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems brtan pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
181a6(phal chen): su smon lam mngon par sgrub bo/ /klu'i rgyal po shugs ldan dang / dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo la sogs pa klu brgya stong phrag bcu dag kyang steng gi bar snang la gnas
181a7(phal chen): shing | dus dang mthun pa'i lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi sprin dang / klu'i bu mos blangs pa'i nga ro snyan pa'i dbyangs dang / lha rdzas kyi spos chu'i rgyun rab tu 'bab pa'i char
181b1(phal chen): mngon par phab ste/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po chen po 'di las 'od chen po 'byung
181b2(phal chen): ste| des klu'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas/ bye ma'i char dang / nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa yongs su sel to/ /khro ba 'byung ba yang zhi bar byas te/ lus sim par byas
181b3(phal chen): nas yid shin tu mos par byed do/ /de ltar sems shin tu mos par gyur nas/ 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la chos ston te/ /'di ltar klu'i lam gyi rgyud ngan pa rnam par
181b4(phal chen): smad pa dang / sgrib pa'i las thams cad rab tu spang ba'i phyir nyes pa 'chags su btsud cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du btsud de/
181b5(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu 'god do/ /gnod sbyin gyi dbang po stong phrag bcu yang nam mkha'i dbyings la 'khod de/ mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bram ze rgyal ba'i
181b6(phal chen): drod kyi skye mched dang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la mchod pa byas nas/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ rigs kyi bu/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i
181b7(phal chen): pa'i tshe/ kho bo cag gi 'khor kun kyang mi rnams la byams pa'i sems skye bar gyur te/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang ldan
182a1(phal chen): par gyur to/ /de dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'tsho ba med pa la zhugs pa rnams kho bo cag gi drung du 'ong ngo / kho bo cag kyang de ltar
182a2(phal chen): byams pa'i dbang gis zil gyis non pas/ rang rang gi gnas de dang / de dag na dga' ba med de/ de ltar bdag cag kyang rang rang gi skye bo'i 'khor dang bcas te/ 'phags
