182a3(phal chen): pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /bdag cag de ltar 'ongs pa rnams la/ 'phags pa 'di'i sku las byung ba'i 'od kyis lus thams cad snang bar byas shing bde bas khyab par
182a4(phal chen): mdzad de/ de ltar bdag cag lus dang sems bde bar gyur nas/ 'phags pa 'di ni ci nas kyang bdag cag la gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / lus srul
182a5(phal chen): po mang po byang chub tu sems skye bar 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to/ /dri za'i dbang po stong phrag bcu dag kyang steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs
182a6(phal chen): kyi bu/ kho bo cag kyang rang rang gi gnas na 'khod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung bar mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po 'di las 'od byung ste/ bdag
182a7(phal chen): cag gi gnas snang bar gyur to/ /de ltar bdag cag 'od des phog ste/ bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur pas/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag
182b1(phal chen): cag drung du phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni/ bdag cag ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to/ /lha ma
182b2(phal chen): yin gyi dbang po stong phrag bcu dag kyang rgya mtsho'i nang nas mngon par 'thon te/ nam mkha' la pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad
182b3(phal chen): ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ kho bo cag gi lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten rgya mtsho dang rir bcas pa'i sa chen po'i
182b4(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rab tu g.yo bar gyur te/ bdag cag kun gyi nga rgyal dang / rlom sems dang / dregs pa thams cad brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyi zil gyis non te/ 'phags
182b5(phal chen): pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /der phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni/ bdag cag la g.yo sgyu thams cad rab tu spang ba dang / chos zab mo'i bzod pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i chos nyid
182b6(phal chen): la rab tu dgod pa dang / stobs bcu'i ye shes yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /nam mkha' lding gi dbang po shugs chen po 'dzin pa la sogs pa nam mkha' lding gi
182b7(phal chen): dbang po stong phrag bcus kyang / bram ze'i bu shin tu sdug gu'i gzugs su mngon par sprul te/ /'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs
183a1(phal chen): su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po 'di dag las 'od chen po byung ste/ bdag cag gis gnas snang bar byas nas yongs su g.yo bar byed do/ /
183a2(phal chen): des bdag cag kyang 'jigs shing skrag ste/ skyo ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur nas 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / 'phags pa 'di yang bdag cag la chos ston cing /
183a3(phal chen): byams pa chen po la yang dag par sbyor bar mdzad do/ /snying rje chen po la yang dag par dgod pa mdzad do/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'jug pa la yang yang dag par sbyor ba
183a4(phal chen): mdzad do/ /'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba'i sems can mngon par gdon par bya ba la yang yongs su sbyor ba mdzad do/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgo rnam par dag par bya ba la
183a5(phal chen): yang rab tu sbyor ba mdzad do/ /shes rab dang thabs shin tu gsal ba la yang yang dag par sbyor ba mdzad do/ /rnam pa ji lta bur yongs su smin par bya ba'i sems can rnams
183a6(phal chen): gdul bar bya ba la yang rab tu sbyor ba mdzad do/ /mi'am ci'i dbang po stong phrag bcu yang steng gi bar snang la 'khod do/ /'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'phags
183a7(phal chen): pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ kho bo cag gi gnas na 'khod pa'i shing ta la'i phreng ba las dril bu'i dra ba rin po che'i srad bus lda ldir brgyus
183b1(phal chen): pa'i sil snyan dang / rol mo'i yo byad dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / khyim gyi longs spyod thams cad las sangs rgyas kyi sgra 'byung ngo / /chos kyi sgra dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
183b2(phal chen): dpa'i dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa'i smon lam gyi sgra 'byung ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ming
183b3(phal chen): 'di zhes bya ba zhig byang chub tu smon lam 'debs so/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig dka' ba yongs
183b4(phal chen): su gtong ba byed do/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi dkyil
183b5(phal chen): 'khor yongs su sbyong ba byed do/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig snying po byang chub tu 'gro'o/ /
183b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa'i bdud rab tu pham par byas te/
183b7(phal chen): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes
184a1(phal chen): bya ba zhig chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad do/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ni che ge
184a2(phal chen): mo zhig sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las ma lus par mdzad nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mdzad do zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te/ rigs kyi
184a3(phal chen): bu| 'dzam bu'i gling gi rtswa dang / shing dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma thams cad rdul shin tu phra ba'i char blags pa'i mur thug par ni rung yang srid kyi/ de
184a4(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i khyad par gang kho bo cag gi gnas
184a5(phal chen): na yod pa'i shing ta la'i phreng ba las rol mo'i yo byad dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / khyim gyi longs spyod rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra 'byung zhing / nga ro 'byin pa dang / rna lam
184a6(phal chen): du grag pa'i mtha' ni thug par mi rung ngo / /de ltar bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'jug pa'i smon lam
184a7(phal chen): dang | spyod pa dang / mtshan gyi chu klung gi sgras dga' ba chen po'i shugs drag pos nyams bde ba skyes te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dod do/ /de ltar bdag cag phyin par
184b1(phal chen): gyur nas kyang / 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la ci nas kyang kho bo cag gi 'khor gyi sems can du ma zhig /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
184b2(phal chen): ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos ston pa mdzad do/ /'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag dpag tu med pa/ kha dog shin tu mdzes pa dag kyang nam mkha' la 'khod cing /
184b3(phal chen): yid kyis sprul pa'i mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po 'di dag las rnam pa 'di lta
184b4(phal chen): bu'i 'od 'byung ste/ 'od des mar na mnar med pa yan chad du sems can dmyal ba rnams snang bar byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug
184b5(phal chen): bsngal rtse zil bar byas te/ 'od de nyid kyis 'phags pa 'di bdag cag gi mig lam du snang bar bstan pas/ de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang 'phags pa 'di la sems mos par
184b6(phal chen): gyur nas 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i ris nyams su bde bar skyes so/ /de ltar bdag cag kyang 'phags pa 'di'i mdzad pa la drin du gzo zhing mthong bas mi ngoms pas/ 'dod
184b7(phal chen): pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongs su spangs te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /der bdag cag phyin nas kyang / 'phags pa 'di ni ci nas kyang sems can tshad med pa rnams
185a1(phal chen): byang chub tu smon lam 'debs par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis chos kyi tshul rnam pa 'di
185a2(phal chen): lta bu thos nas dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la/ tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes te/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched la yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes
185a3(phal chen): bskyed| bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ de ltar bdag gis dge ba'i bshes
185a4(phal chen): gnyen gyi bka' dang 'gal bar bgyis pa'i nongs pa la nongs par bshags so/ /de nas bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la tshigs
185a5(phal chen): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rjes su bstan dang mthun byed cing / /dran pa nye bar bzhag ste bla ma'i ngag gcog mi byed na/ /de'i phyir de yi
185a6(phal chen): don rnams thams cad mthun par 'grub par 'gyur/ /mthun pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes byang chub drung du 'tshang yang rgya/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ ri
185a7(phal chen): g.yang sa'i lam spu gri'i so gshibs pa la 'dzegs te/ me'i phung po chen po der mchongs so/ /de de ltar mchongs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin
185b1(phal chen): tu brtan pa zhes bya ba thob par gyur to/ /me des reg nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu zhi ba'i bde ba mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba thob par gyur nas/ des
185b2(phal chen): 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ me'i phung po la de ltar reg na bde ba dang / ri'i lam spu gris gtams pa 'di yang de ltar reg na bde ba de ni ngo mtshar che'o/ /des smras pa/
185b3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dkyil 'khor yongs su mi zad pa thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ kho bos ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar
185b4(phal chen): pa dkyil 'khor yongs su mi zad pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' me'i phung po lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams
185b5(phal chen): cad yongs su zad par bya ba'i smon lam can/ ru mtshon phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa/ sems la thub pa med cing / sems dma' ba med pa dang ldan pa/ yid zhum pa med pa
185b6(phal chen): can rdo rje'i snying po dang ldan pa'i mthu bo che lta bu/ brtsams pa chen po mthar phyin par bya ba la sgyid lug pa med pa/ sbyor ba lhod pa med pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bu/ 'gro ba
185b7(phal chen): thams cad kyi don du brtson pa/ brtson 'grus phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan
186a1(phal chen): song | rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na rgyal po seng ge'i dpal gyi
186a2(phal chen): bu mo byams ma zhes bya ba/ bu mo lnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas pa 'dug gi /de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab
186a3(phal chen): par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/
186a4(phal chen): bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi drung nas
186a5(phal chen): song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pa mos pa rgya chen pos rnam par dag pa/ theg pa chen
186a6(phal chen): po la mngon du phyogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par mos pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang dag par zhugs pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang bar spro ba/
186a7(phal chen): chos kyi rim gro la rnam par spyod pa/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes la mngon du gyur pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' shin tu rtogs pa/ ye shes kyi mtha' la mi gnas pa'i yul
186b1(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ dus gsum skad cig gi cha shas la khong du chud par byed pa/ nam mkha'i mtha' gnyis su med pa mngon du gyur pa/ mi gnyis pa'i mtha' rnam par gdon mi za ba thob
186b2(phal chen): pa| chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' la rnam par mi rtog par gnas pa/ bsgribs pa med pa'i mthas gdul ba khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa/ chos kyi mtha' dang mi 'gal bar bya ba la
186b3(phal chen): gzhol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha' la mtha' med par khong du chud pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtha' la rnam par mi rtog par gnas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi 'du
186b4(phal chen): shes kyi dra ba rnam par gtor ba'i ye shes la gzhol ba/ zhing la mngon par chags pa thams cad dang bral ba/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la chags pa
186b5(phal chen): med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba la gnas pa med par spyod pa/ sems can thams cad la bdag med pa dang / sems can
186b6(phal chen): med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ sgra thams cad tshig gi lam lta bur khong du chud pa/ gzugs thams cad gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan dang mnyam par rnam par rig par bya ba la
186b7(phal chen): gzhol ba de mthar gyis seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i grong khyer gang na ba der phyin te/ bu mo byams ma tshol zhing yongs su rmed rmed pa las/ rgyal po seng ge'i dpal gyi bu mo byams
187a1(phal chen): ma| 'khor bu mo lnga brgya dang ldan pa de khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i nang na/ khri tsan dan sprul gyi snying po'i rkang pa can/ gser gyi lcags
187a2(phal chen): bod kyi dra bas legs par blas pa/ lha rdzas kyi stan bting ba la 'dug cing chos ston to zhes thos nas/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i grong khyer du song ste/ rgyal po seng ge'i dpal
187a3(phal chen): gyi gnas gang na ba der phyin nas/ rgyal po'i phyi sgo'i sgo khang na/ bu mo byams ma mthong bar dga' ba'i phyir sdod cing 'dug 'dug pa dang / des der srog chags brgya phrag du ma dang /
187a4(phal chen): srog chags stong phrag du ma dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma 'dong ba mthong nas/ khyed gang nas 'ong / da gang du 'dong zhes dris pa dang / de dag na re/ ded ni bu mo byams
187a5(phal chen): ma'i drung du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dong ngo zhes nas/ des bsams pa/ 'dir ni su 'gro yang dag pa med pa lta zhig snyam ste/ de yang nang du phyin to/ /de ltar phyin te bltas
187a6(phal chen): na| khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po can de yang / gzhi shel du 'dug pa'i sa las blangs te/ bai DUR+Ya'i ka ba bkye ba/ rtsig pa rdo rje las byas pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi lhun
187a7(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i ba gam brgya phrag stong gis brgyan pa nor bu rin po che grangs med pas rnam par bris pa/ rin po che stong gi snying po'i me long gi dkyil 'khor gyis shin tu spa bar
187b1(phal chen): byas pa/ nor bu rin po che 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong bas rnam par brgyan pa/ rin po che'i shing rta grangs med pas yongs su bskor ba/ gser gyi dril bu brgya stong shin tu 'khrol ba'i sgra
187b2(phal chen): snyan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang ldan par 'dug par mthong ngo / /bu mo byams ma de yang mig dkar nag 'byes pa/ skra mthon mthing du 'dug pa/ mdog gser gyi kha dog
187b3(phal chen): ltar 'dug pa mthong nas/ des de'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te/ mdun du 'dug nas 'di
187b4(phal chen): skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la
187b5(phal chen): bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos
187b6(phal chen): pa| 'phags ma/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ smras pa/ rigs kyi
187b7(phal chen): bu| kho mo'i gnas kyi rgyan la ltos shig ces nas/ des kun tu yul te bltas pa dang / rtsig pa re re dang / ka ba re re dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor re re dang / rnam pa'i bye brag re
188a1(phal chen): re dang / dbyibs re re dang / nor bu rin po che re re dang / gser gyi dril bu re re dang / rin po che'i shing re re dang / ba sbu'i bu ga re re dang / rin po che'i sen mo do re re dag las
188a2(phal chen): kyang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa/ thog ma thugs bskyed pa dang bcas pa/ spyod pa dang smon lam gyi yul dang bcas pa/ 'byung ba'i
188a3(phal chen): rgyan dang bcas pa/ mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang bcas pa/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ston pa dang bcas par
188a4(phal chen): gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du mthong bar gyur to/ /dmigs pa de dag re re las/ ji lta ba de bzhin du dmigs pa thams cad las kyang mthong bar gyur to/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ chus
188a5(phal chen): yongs su gang ba'i mtsho dang zhing rnyog pa med pa la rnam par gsal ba la ni/ nam mkha' nyi zla dang / skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du yongs su snang
188a6(phal chen): ngo| |de bzhin du khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po 'di dmigs pa re re las kyang / chos kyi dbyings kun na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzugs brnyan
188a7(phal chen): gyi tshul du yongs su snang bar gyur te/ de ni bu mo byams ma'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu'i phyir te/ des de ltar rnam par bltas nas/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'i rgyan gyi mtshan ma
188b1(phal chen): de yongs su bzung ste thal mo sbyar nas/ bu mo byams ma'i gdong du bltas pa dang / des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par
188b2(phal chen): brgyan pa zhes bya ba thob pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud 'di ni/ kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gang+gA sum cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed las yongs su btsal ba
188b3(phal chen): ste| de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di/ sgo sna tshogs kyi khong du chud par bya bas rtogs par mdzad
188b4(phal chen): de| gcig gis gang du gsungs pa de yang gnyis kyis ma gsungs so/ /smras pa/ 'phags ma/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di'i yul
188b5(phal chen): ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di la/ kho mo mngon du byed cing / sems pa dang / rjes
188b6(phal chen): su 'brang bar bya ba dang / rnam par dpyod pa dang / rjes su sems pa dang / dran par bya ba dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / rnam par brtags pa dang / mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
188b7(phal chen): yang dag par brgyan par bya ba dang / rab tu rnam par dbye ba byed pa'i tshe/ gzungs kun nas sgo zhes bya ba yongs su skye ste/ gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor der ni chos kyi sgo brgya stong grangs
189a1(phal chen): med pa phrag bcu yongs su 'du'o/ /khong du chud do/ /mngon du 'gyur ro/ /mngon par 'du'o/ /khongs na 'khod do/ /'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas
189a2(phal chen): kyi zhing gi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgo dang / chos kyi sgo dang / sems can gyi sgo dang / 'das pa'i sgo dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sgo dang / da ltar byung ba'i sgo dang / gnas pa'i mtha' sgo
189a3(phal chen): dang | bsod nams kyi sgo dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi sgo dang / ye shes kyi sgo dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyi sgo dang / smon lam gyi sgo dang / smon lam gyi rnam pa'i sgo
189a4(phal chen): dang | spyod pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa yongs su 'byung ba'i sgo dang / spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i sgo dang / las kyi sgo dang / las dang mi
189a5(phal chen): 'gal pa'i sgo dang / las kyi rgyun gyi sgo dang / lam mngon par 'du bya ba'i sgo dang / mi mnyam pa'i las yongs su spang pa'i sgo dang / yang dag pa'i las la nan tan du bya ba'i sgo dang /
189a6(phal chen): las la dbang bsgyur ba'i sgo dang / legs par spyad pa'i sgo dang / legs par spyad pa yang dag par blang ba'i sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin khong du chud par bya
189a7(phal chen): ba'i sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin la rnam par spyad pa'i sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin spyod yul gyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa'i sgo dang / sems rgya
189b1(phal chen): mtsho'i sgo dang / sems kyi rnam grangs kyi sgo dang / sems kyi rgyud yongs su dag par bya ba'i sgo dang / sems kyi thibs po snang bar bya ba'i sgo dang / sems kyi mtsho dang bar bya ba'i sgo
189b2(phal chen): dang | sems 'byung ba'i sgo dang / sems rnam par rgyu ba'i sgo dang / sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyu ba'i sgo dang / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sgo dang / nyon mongs pa'i sbyor ba'i sgo
189b3(phal chen): dang | mos pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi spyod pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten 'byung ba'i sgo dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i sgo dang / sems
189b4(phal chen): can gyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / phyogs kyi sgo dang / chos kyi phyogs kyi sgo dang / snying rje chen po'i sgo dang / byams pa chen po'i sgo dang / zhi ba'i sgo dang / ngag gi lam gyi sgo dang /
189b5(phal chen): tshul gyi sgo dang / khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang / yang dag par 'du ba'i sgo dang / chags pa med pa'i mtha'i sgo dang / kun gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
189b6(phal chen): kyi sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sgo dang / nyan thos kyi chos kyi sgo dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten 'byung ba'i chos kyi sgo dang /
189b7(phal chen): 'jig rten 'jig pa'i chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten kun nas gnas pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa'i
190a1(phal chen): sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo
190a2(phal chen): dang | 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi mnyam pa nyid du khong du
190a3(phal chen): chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams snrel zhi'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams spyi'u tshugs su rgyu ba'i sgo dang / mig 'phrul du 'jug pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
190a4(phal chen): rgyud kyi sgo dang / gnas kyi 'du shes kyi rnam par gyur pa'i sgo dang / phra ba rgya chen por khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / rgya chen po phra bar khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / sangs
190a5(phal chen): rgyas mthong bar bya ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor
190a6(phal chen): rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i
190a7(phal chen): nges pa'i tshig gi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba kun tu 'khor ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
190b1(phal chen): gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi stobs snang ba'i sgo dang /
190b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi sgo dang /
190b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sems can pha rol gyi sems thugs su chud pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang / dga' ldan gyi pho
190b4(phal chen): brang na bzhugs pa'i sgo nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba bstan pa'i bar gyi sgo dang / sems can gyi don tshad med pa mdzad pa'i sgo dang / chos zab mo'i tshul gyi sgo dang / chos sna tshogs
190b5(phal chen): kyi tshul gyi sgo dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi chos kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rnam pa'i chos kyi sgo dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi tshogs kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / smon
190b6(phal chen): lam gyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / 'byung ba'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / gzungs rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / ye shes kyi dkyil
190b7(phal chen): 'khor rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / shes rab yongs su dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / byang chub tshad med pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / dran pa rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dag ste/ rigs
191a1(phal chen): kyi bu/ de ltar kho mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud dran pas kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems
191a2(phal chen): dpa' nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ blo gros chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs pa/ rgyud bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis brtan pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam du zhugs pa/
191a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi chos yongs su mi rgyu ba/ ye shes snang ba'i mig rab rib med pa rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad mun pa med par khong du chud pa/ blo nam mkha' ltar
191a4(phal chen): tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ dmigs pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i mig can/ chags pa med pa'i sa snang ba'i snying po dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi don rab tu dbye ba la
191a5(phal chen): mkhas pa zil gyis gnon la/ 'jig rten kun gyis zil gyis mi non pa/ 'jig rten gyi spyod pa'i tshul la rnam par spyod pa/ 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad na kha na ma tho
191a6(phal chen): med pa/ 'jig rten gyi don byed pa la brtson pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi ngag gi tshul dang rnam pa la mkhas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du gnas
191a7(phal chen): pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa ston pa/ dus kyi 'khor lo thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan
191b1(phal chen): brjod par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul mig gsum pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge slong blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song
191b2(phal chen): la| ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dri sa shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ bu mo byams
191b3(phal chen): ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bu mo byams ma la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ bu mo byams ma'i drung nas song ngo //
191b4(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rnam par spyod pa zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi zab mo khong du chud par bya ba rjes su
191b5(phal chen): bsam pa dang / sems can gyi ye shes shin tu phra zhing zab pa rjes su bsam pa dang / 'jig rten gyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i
191b6(phal chen): dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / sems kyi rgyud kyi dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / rang bzhin
191b7(phal chen): gyis bden pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi rnam par spyod pa bden pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings brgyan pa'i rgyan gyi
192a1(phal chen): dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / lus kyi 'khrul 'khor shugs kyis 'khor ba'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / las kyis sna tshogs su
192a2(phal chen): gyur pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa byed cing / mthar gyis yul mig gsum pa gang na ba der phyin te/ yul gyi 'khor dang / grong khyer gyi 'khor dang / tshong 'dus kyi
192a3(phal chen): 'khor dang / grong rdal gyi 'khor dang / yul gru'i 'khor dang / lhas kyi 'khor dang / drang srong dge ba spyod pa'i gnas kyi 'khor dang / yul dang / phyogs kyi 'khor dang / chu'i rgyud kyi
192a4(phal chen): 'khor dang / ri'i sal sul gyi 'khor dang / nags tshal chen po'i 'khor dag tu dge slong blta na sdug pa yongs su tshol tshol ba las/ des dge slong blta na sdug pa nags tshal stug
192a5(phal chen): po zhig na gzhon zhing dar la bab pa/ gzugs mdzes shing sdug la blta na yid du 'ong ba/ skra mthon mthing g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan pa/ mgo gdugs ltar 'dug
192a6(phal chen): pa| gtsug tor gyi spyi bo can dpral ba yangs pa/ mig dkar nag 'phyes shing ril la/ rdzi ma ba'i rdzi ma ltar 'dug pa/ sna'i dbyibs legs shing bzang la ran par mdzes pa
192a7(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ mchu mtshal ltar mdog bzang zhing shin tu legs pa dang ldan pa/ so mnyam zhing thags bzang la shin tu dkar ba bzhi bcu tshang ba dang ldan pa/ 'gram pa'i lha
192b1(phal chen): nga seng ge ltar 'dug pa/ mkhur ba shas gang zhing rgyas pa/ smin tshugs gzhu ltar 'dug cing ring la shin tu mdzes pa/ mdzod spu'i zla ba'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i thig le can/ rna shal
192b2(phal chen): ring zhing lhod par 'phyang ba/ zla ba nya ba ltar bzhin mdangs dang ldan zhing shin tu bzang ba/ mgul zlum zhing dung ltar mdzes pa/ snying ga dpal gyi be'us brgyan pa/ ro stod seng ge'i stod
192b3(phal chen): ltar 'dug pa/ thal gong shin tu rgyas pa/ dpung mgo'i lhun legs shing zlum pa/ lag pa ring ba dra bar 'brel ba'i sor mo can/ rkang lag 'khor los brgyan pa/ rkang lag 'jam
192b4(phal chen): zhing gzhon la shas rgyas pa/ bdun shin tu mtho ba/ rkang pa rdo rje ltar 'dug pa/ lus che zhing drang ba/ brla zlum pa/ pho mtshan gsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug pa/ byin pa ri dwags e
192b5(phal chen): na ya'i byin pa ltar 'dug pa/ sor mo ring ba/ rkang pa'i rting pa yangs pa/ 'od 'dom gang ba dang ldan pa/ mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa/ ba spu re re nas g.yas phyogs
192b6(phal chen): su gyen du 'khyil ba/ shing n+ya gro da'i rgyal po ltar chu zheng gab pa/ lus mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang pos shin tu brgyan pa/ mig mi 'gebs shing mi rgod pa/ dran pa nye bar gnas
192b7(phal chen): pa| ri'i rgyal po kha ba can ltar rtswa dang / nags tshal dang / sman dang / shing phran sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ blo shin tu yangs pa/ ye shes kyi spyod yul dang / yul la thub pa med
193a1(phal chen): pa| dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan sprin gyi sgra lta bu dang ldan pa/ g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / g.yeng ba dang / spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i
193a2(phal chen): sems dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi spyod yul ma 'dres pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po'i snang ba thob pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i bsam
193a3(phal chen): pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/ snying rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs pa skyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul yongs su gzung ba dang / sems can thams cad
193a4(phal chen): kyi ye shes snang ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul rjes su dran zhing / 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du 'chag pa la zhugs te/ drag dal med cing pad ral
193a5(phal chen): med la/ shin tu mdzes par 'chag pa/ gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i gos dang ldan pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am
193a6(phal chen): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pas bskor cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /dge slong blta na mdzes pa de
193a7(phal chen): 'chag pa'i tshe/ phyogs mngon du gyur pa'i phyogs kyi lha rnams phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su sgrub par byed do/ /rkang gis 'gro ba'i lha rnams rin po che'i pad mos gom pa
193b1(phal chen): 'dor ba'i tshe/ yongs su blang ba byed do/ /me'i lha snang ba'i dkyil 'khor zad mi shes pa rnams kyang mun pa dang / rab rib rnam par sel to/ /'dzam bu rgyal mtshan gyi nags tshal gyi
193b2(phal chen): lha rnams kyang me tog mang po char mngon par 'bebs so/ /sa'i lha mi g.yo ba'i snying po can rnams kyang rin po che'i 'byung gnas mang po ston to/ /nam mkha'i lha kun nas snang ba'i
193b3(phal chen): dpal dang ldan pa rnams kyang nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su brgyan pa byed do/ /rgya mtsho'i lha dpal kun nas 'byung ba rnams kyang rin po che dam pa mang pos mngon par 'thor to/ /ri
193b4(phal chen): rab gyi lha dri ma med pa'i snying po can rnams kyang thal mo sbyar cing phyag 'tshal lo/ /rlung gi lha thogs pa med pa'i stobs can rnams kyang spos dang / bdug spos dang / me tog 'thor ba'i rlung
193b5(phal chen): rab tu 'gyed do/ /mtshan mo'i lha gnas par byed pa lus shin tu brgyan pa rnams kyang lus shin tu btud cing phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyin mo'i lha rtag tu sad par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor can
193b6(phal chen): rnams kyang nor bu rin po che phyogs snang bar byed pa'i rgyal mtshan thogs shing / snang ba bskyed pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings la 'khod do/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang / dge slong
193b7(phal chen): blta na sdug pa gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge slong blta na sdug pa'i rkang pa'i bol gnyis la/ spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas/ dge slong blta na sdug pa'i rkang pa'i bol gnyis la
194a1(phal chen): bzhin sbyar te/ legs par phyis nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag
194a2(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol ba zhig lags te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams
194a3(phal chen): ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/ /zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar
194a4(phal chen): nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni tshes btab na dar la bab pa/ rab tu byung bas btab na gsar du zhugs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/
194a5(phal chen): kho bos ni tshe de 'dra ba gcig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gang+gA sum cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi drung du tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad de/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la
194a6(phal chen): la'i zham ring du nyin zhag gcig tu tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad do/ /la lar ni nyin zhag bdun du/ la lar ni zla ba phyed du/ la lar ni zla ba gcig tu/ la lar ni lo gcig tu/ la lar
194a7(phal chen): ni lo brgyar/ la lar ni lo stong du/ la lar ni lo brgya phrag stong du/ la lar ni lo bye bar/ la lar ni lo bye ba khrag khrig tu/ la lar ni lo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod
194b1(phal chen): du med par/ la lar ni bskal pa bar mar/ la lar ni bskal pa phyed du/ la lar ni bskal par bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zham ring du ni/ bskal pa brjod du
194b2(phal chen): med pa'i yang brjod du med par tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad de/ bskal pa bgrang ba'i tshul 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las chos bstan pa thos te/ gdams ngag dang /
194b3(phal chen): rjes su bstan pa yang dag par blangs so/ /smon lam gyi rgyan yongs su sbyangs so/ /yang dag par bsgrub pa'i yul la zhugs so/ /spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyangs so/ /pha rol
194b4(phal chen): tu phyin pa rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs par byas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su shes par byas so/ /de dag gis chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba phan tshun
194b5(phal chen): ma 'dres pa dag kyang yongs su gzung ngo / /de dag gi stobs mnyam pa nyid kyang khong du chud par byas so/ /de dag gi bstan pa yang dam pa'i chos zad pa'i mthar thug gi bar du yongs
194b6(phal chen): su bzung ngo / /kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rnams kyang / smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs kyis/ rang
194b7(phal chen): gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrubs so/ /kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams kyang /
195a1(phal chen): spyod pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i rang gi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrubs so/ /kho bos de bzhin gshegs
195a2(phal chen): pa de dag thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'ang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas 'byung ba'i stobs kyis mngon par bsgrubs so/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu/ kho bo
195a3(phal chen): 'chag sa 'di na 'chags pa'i tshe/ phyogs kyi rgyud kyi sgo thams cad kyang shin tu rnam par lta ba'i ye shes kyi sgos mngon du 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi sgo thams
195a4(phal chen): cad kyang / smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis sems bskyed pa gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa 'da' zhing / yongs
195a5(phal chen): su dag par bya ba'i phyir rnam par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sems kyi skad cig gcig la sems can gyi spyod pa'i tshul gyi sgo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang / byang
195a6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis stobs bcu'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mngon sum du 'gyur
195a7(phal chen): r o| |sems bskyed pa gcig la sangs rgyas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa mthong ba rnam par dag pa dag kyang snga phyi'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa'i smon
195b1(phal chen): lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba
195b2(phal chen): dang | rim gro bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro/ /sems bskyed pa gcig la de bzhin gshegs pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char rnams kyang / chos
195b3(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis chos kyi tshul grangs med pa rnam par 'tshang rgya zhing khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir
195b4(phal chen): bsam pa la mngon par 'bab bo/ /sems bskyed pa gcig la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i
195b5(phal chen): s pyod pa mig 'phrul lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur
195b6(phal chen): ro| |sems bskyed pa gcig la ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo gcig tu/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad yang dag par 'du
195b7(phal chen): bar bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro/ /sems bskyed pa gcig la
196a1(phal chen): dbang po rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang / dran pa'i mthar phyin pa'i dbang po thob par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs
196a2(phal chen): pa'i stobs kyi dbang po'i 'khor lo dang / dus kyi 'khor lo thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro/ /sems bskyed pa gcig la dus kyi 'khor lo brjod
196a3(phal chen): du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang / sems can zad mi shes pa zad par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis dus thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu
196a4(phal chen): bskor ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro/ /sems bskyed pa gcig la dus rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa thams cad kyang / dus gcig tu rnam par dgod pa'i tshul
196a5(phal chen): khong du chud pa'i ye shes snang ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dus gsum rnam par dgod pa'i phyir mngon sum du
196a6(phal chen): 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ kho bos ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa shin tu zhi bar mi 'gyur ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa'
196a7(phal chen): bsam pa rdo rje lta bu dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su rigs dang ldan par byung ba/ srog gi dbang po la rgyun chad pa med pa/ ye shes kyi sgron ma zhi
196b1(phal chen): bar 'gyur ba med pa/ mi shigs mi phyed pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bu'i gzugs shin tu grub pa rgyu'i chos mnyam pa'i yan lag dang nying lag tu ldan pa'i lus
196b2(phal chen): can| 'gro ba rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ rnam par dmigs par byed pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog dang
196b3(phal chen): dbyibs dang / chu zheng yongs su ston pa/ me mdag dang / me lce dang / dug dang / mtshon gyis mi tshugs pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ rdo rje ltar sra zhing khor yug ltar thub pa med pa'i lus
196b4(phal chen): can| bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi stobs kyi stobs med par byed pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi ri bo dang 'dra bar 'gro ba kun las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus
196b5(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du rnam par dmigs pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa/ sgo thams cad du rnam par dmigs shing thos par 'gyur ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis ngor blta ba/
196b6(phal chen): chos thams cad kyi sprin gyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ phyogs kun du rnam par snang ba/ sgrib pa'i ri thams cad rnam par gtor bas blta na mdzes pa/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
196b7(phal chen): shin tu 'joms pas shin tu dpa' bar snang ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po'i rgyu mthun pa las byung bas blta na dga' ba/ 'byung bar shin tu dka' zhing dkon pas me tog u dum
197a1(phal chen): wA ra lta bu de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul dge sbyong gi
197a2(phal chen): dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba na/ grong khyer sgo bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug ces bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas
197a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang /
197a4(phal chen): nan tan rnam par dag par bya ba la brtson pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs snang bas sems shin tu snang bar gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtan pa/ gzhan gyis mi
197a5(phal chen): thub cing / brgal thag chad pa'i snying dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi go cha bzang pos sems zhum pa med pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa brtan
197a6(phal chen): pas kun tu gnas shing / yongs su 'phel bar 'gyur ba la brtson pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sprin gyi char yongs su 'dzin pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems
197a7(phal chen): dpa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char yongs su mi ngoms pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan thams cad la 'jug pa'i smon lam mngon du gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams
197b1(phal chen): cad kyi kha lo sgyur bas yongs su sdud par bdag nyid yongs su gtong bar 'dod pa/ 'gro ba thams cad 'khor ba'i bas mtha'i dgon pa pa chen po las bzla bar 'dod pa/ dge ba'i
197b2(phal chen): gshes gnyen blta ba dang / mnyan pa dang / bsnyen bkur bas yongs su mi ngoms pa/ chos kyi rim gro tshad med pa bskyed pa dang ldan pa des/ dge slong blta na sdug pa'i rkang
197b3(phal chen): pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong blta na sdug pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ dge slong blta na sdug pa'i drung
197b4(phal chen): nas song ngo / / //bam po dgu bcu rtsa bzhi pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge slong blta na sdug pa de'i gdams ngag rjes su zlos shing / spel ba dang /
197b5(phal chen): bstud pa dang / rab tu dbye ba dang / bshad pa dang / so sor rnam par sgom pa dang / brjod pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa dang / rjes su bsam pa dang / mngon par 'jug pa bya ba
197b6(phal chen): dang | bkur ba dang / khong du chud par bya ba dang / yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang / yang dang yang bzlas pa dang / shin tu rtogs par bya ba dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / snang
197b7(phal chen): bar bya ba dang / rjes su rnam par lta bar byed cing / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za'i 'khor dang bcas pa de mthar gyis yul dge sbyong gi dkyil 'khor gyi grong
198a1(phal chen): khyer sgo bzang po gang na ba der phyin te/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug yongs su tshol tshol ba las/ de'i steng gi bar snang las/ lha dang / klu dang /
198a2(phal chen): gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams kyis bos pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khye'u'i dbang po'i dbang phyug ni chu klung gi chu 'dus dang nye ba zhig na/ byis pa stong phrag bcu tsam gyis bskor te/ bye ma la rtse
198a3(phal chen): bas rtse zhing 'dug go / zhes nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang grong khyer sgo bzang po dang nye ba'i chu klung gi chu 'dus gang na ba der song ste/ phyin pa dang / des khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug
198a4(phal chen): byis pa stong phrag bcu tsam gyis bskor cing / bye ma la rtse bas rtse ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug ga na ba der song ste/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi rkang
198a5(phal chen): pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi mdun du 'dug
198a6(phal chen): ste thal mo sbyar nas/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang
198a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan
198b1(phal chen): pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du
198b2(phal chen): gsol/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ yi ge dang / grangs dang / brda dang / rtsis kyi tshul bslabs te/ bzo thams cad mngon par shes pa dang ldan
198b3(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi sgor bcug go / de ltar rigs kyi bu/ kho bos ni 'jig rten na yi ge dang / ming gi rnam pa dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang / brda dang / shol thabs shes par bya ba dang /
198b4(phal chen): bzo sna tshogs shes par bya ba dang / khams kyi cho ga dang / dug gso ba'i thabs dang / skem pa dang / brjed byed dang / 'byung po'i gdon gyis btab pa gso ba dang / grong dang / grong
198b5(phal chen): khyer dang / tshong 'dus dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / gnas rnam par dgod pa shes par bya ba dang / ra ba dang / khang pa dang / skar khung dang /
198b6(phal chen): khang pa brtsegs pa'i tshad shes par bya ba dang / 'khrul 'khor dang / shing rta sbyar ba'i tshul sna tshogs shes par bya ba dang / dge mi dge dang / 'jigs mi 'jigs kyi
198b7(phal chen): ltas dang / mtshan ma shes par bya ba dang / rmos dang / tshong dang / rnam par spyad par sbyar ba'i cho ga shes par bya ba dang / sems can gyi yan lag dang / nying lag gi
199a1(phal chen): mtshan gyi rgyud dang / rgyus dang / rnam par spyad pa shes par bya ba dang / bde 'gro dang / ngan song gi las kyi lam rnam par dag par bya ba'i tshul shes par bya
199a2(phal chen): ba dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos dang / tshogs mchod pa shes par bya ba dang / bde 'gro dang / ngan song gi tshogs shes par bya ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
199a3(phal chen): kyi theg pa'i tshogs shes par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i tshogs shes par bya ba dang / rgyu dang / byed pa dang / sbyor ba'i rgyud shes par bya ba ji snyed pa de dag
199a4(phal chen): thams cad shes te/ de dag la sems can yongs su gzung bar byed do/ /rab tu dgod par byed do/ /yongs su gzhog par byed do/ /slob tu 'dzud do/ /sbyong du 'dzud do/ /brtan par
199a5(phal chen): byed do/ /lhur len par byed do/ /rdzogs par byed do/ /yongs su sgrub par byed do/ /yongs su spyod par byed do/ /gsal bar bstan par byed do/ /rnam par 'phel bar byed do/ /
199a6(phal chen): mtshan mar byed do/ /mthar phyin par byed do/ /rnam par sbyong bar byed do/ /dri ma med par byed do/ /shin tu dag par byed do/ /'od gsal zhing dang bar byed do/ /shin tu yangs
199a7(phal chen): par byed do/ /de ltar rigs kyi bu/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtsis kyi tshul shes pa de gang zhe na/ brgya stong phrag brgya na bye ba'o/ /bye ba bye ba na khod khod do/ /khod
199b1(phal chen): khod khod khod na tha da dgu'o/ /thad dgu thad dgu na khrig khrig go /khrig khrig khrig khrig na thams thams so/ /thams thams thams thams na myad myid do/ /myad myid myad myid na
199b2(phal chen): gang ya'o/ /gang ya gang ya na ban bun no/ /ban bun ban bun na phyar phyur ro/ /phyar phyur phyar phyur na lcag lcig go /lcag lcig lcag lcig na byang bying ngo / /byang bying byang bying na chem
199b3(phal chen): chem mo/ /chem chem chem chem na phyal phyol lo/ /phyal phyol phyal phyol na khyud khyud do/ /khyud khyud khyud khyud na zar zer ro/ /zar zer zar zer na khrib khrib bo/ /khrib khrib khrib khrib na
199b4(phal chen): ya gangs so/ /ya gangs ya gangs na cho ma'o/ /cho ma cho ma na khram khrim mo/ /khram khrim khram khrim na nab nub bo/ /nab nub nab nub na sang sang ngo / /sang sang sang sang na brgyud
199b5(phal chen): yas so/ /brgyud yas brgyud yas na btang yas so/ /btang yas btang yas na bkra yar ro/ /bkra yar bkra yar na gsa' yas so/ /gsa' yas gsa' yas na mtshungs med do/ /
199b6(phal chen): mtshungs med mtshungs med na lam lum mo/ /lam lum lam lum na yal yol lo/ /yal yol yal yol na khral khrul lo/ /khral khrul khral khrul na thud thud do/ /thud thud thud thud
199b7(phal chen): na bsam phyod do/ /bsam phyod bsam phyod na brang breng ngo / /brang breng brang breng na bgrod yas so/ /bgrod yas bgrod yas na bsngo yas so/ /bsngo yas bsngo yas na zang yag go/
200a1(phal chen): zang yag zang yag na 'phro bkye'o/ /'phro bkye 'phro bkye na rtse 'phyo'o/ /rtse 'phyo rtse 'phyo na yong tan no/ /yong tan yong tan na brug g.yos so/ /brug g.yos
200a2(phal chen): brug g.yos na sang yal lo/ /sang yal sang yal na 'thing yug go /'thing yug 'thing yug na yid 'phyo'o/ /yid 'phyo yid 'phyo na nab neb bo/ /nab neb nab neb na khrig thams
200a3(phal chen): so| |khrig thams khrig thams na yal yal lo/ /yal yal yal yal na bgrad yas so/ /bgrang yas bgrang yas na thug yal lo/ /thug yal thug yal na shang shang ngo / /shang
200a4(phal chen): shang shang shang na yag yag go / yag yag yag yag na tham thim mo/ /tham thim tham thim na rlom bsnyal lo/ /rlom bsnyal rlom bsnyal na gzhal 'phyos so/ /gzhal 'phyos
200a5(phal chen): gzhal 'phyos na gzhal yal lo/ /gzhal yal gzhal yal na gzhal med do/ /gzhal med gzhal med na gzhal 'khor to/ /gzhal 'khor gzhal 'khor na gzhal thim mo//
200a6(phal chen): gzhal thim gzhal thim na gar gzhal lo/ /gar gzhal gar gzhal na gzhal sangs so/ /gzhal sangs gzhal sangs na gzhal thag go /gzhal thag gzhal thag na gzhal
200a7(phal chen): phul lo/ /gzhal phul gzhal phul na gzhal zhi'o/ /gzhal zhi gzhal zhi na 'phyo 'gyur ro/ /'phyo 'gyur 'phyo 'gyur na nyar nyer ro/ /nyar nyer nyar nyer na phyag phyig go /phyag
200b1(phal chen): phyig phyag phyig na zal zul lo/ /zal zul zal zul na sal sal lo/ /sal sal sal sal na g.yo ldeg go /g.yo ldeg g.yo ldeg na phan phun no/ /phan phun phan phun na brnang ya'o/ /
200b2(phal chen): brnang ya brnang ya na rem 'drol lo/ /rem 'drol rem 'drol na rdzi ngad do/ /rdzi ngad rdzi ngad na rdzi rdul lo/ /rdzi rdul rdzi rdul na phun yol lo/ /phun yol phun yol na ngad ngad do/ /ngad
200b3(phal chen): ngad ngad ngad na bgrang brtsi'o/ /bgrang brtsi bgrang brtsi na zab bgrang ngo / /zab bgrang zab bgrang na dga' rkyang ngo / /dga' rkyang dga' rkyang na gzhung 'dal lo/ /gzhung 'dal gzhung
200b4(phal chen): 'dal na khrug phyad do/ /khrug phyad khrug phyad na 'ol phyod do/ /'ol phyod 'ol phyod na gdab yas so/ /gdab yas gdab yas na gcal yas so/ /gcal yas gcal yas na bgrang yas
200b5(phal chen): so| |bgrang yas bgrang yas na byim 'phyo'o/ /byim 'phyo byim 'phyon ya me'o/ /ya me ya me na bsnyal yas so/ /bsnyal yas bsnyal yas na ldab ldeb bo/ /ldab ldeb ldab ldeb na
200b6(phal chen): 'ban chad do/ /'ban chad 'ban chad na phang phung ngo / /phang phung phang phung na khye'u tsang ngo / /khye'u tsang khye'u tsang na zhung zung ngo / /zhung zung zhung zung na mchog yal lo/ /mchog yal
200b7(phal chen): mchog yal na mtha' rdul lo/ /mtha' rdul mtha' rdul na yun 'gyangs so/ /yun 'gyangs yun 'gyangs na bun lob bo/ /bun lob bun lob na lam lom mo/ /lam lom lam lom
201a1(phal chen): na bsnyad yas so/ /bsnyad yas bsnyad yas na lang ling ngo / /lang ling lang ling na ljab ljib bo/ /ljab ljib ljab ljib na mi brtsal to/ /mi brtsal mi
201a2(phal chen): brtsal na 'byams yas so/ /'byams yas 'byams yas na nga 'grang ngo / /nga 'grang nga 'grang na smos yal lo/ /smos yal smos yal na bkra chal lo/ /bkra chal bkra chal na
201a3(phal chen): lo rgyas so/ /lo rgyas lo rgyas na 'bum rdib bo/ /'bum rdib 'bum rdib na gam gum mo/ /gam gum gam gum na la lo'o/ /la lo la lo na bgrang 'phyos so/ /bgrang 'phyos bgrang
201a4(phal chen): 'phyos na bgrang 'phyos la bsgres pa'o/ /'grang 'phyos la bsgres pa bgrang 'phyos la bsgres pa na/ dpag yas so/ /dpag yas dpag yas na dpag yas la bsgres pa'o/ /
201a5(phal chen): dpag yas la bsgres pa dpag yas la bsgres pa na/ yal phyod do/ /yal phyod yal phyod na yal phyod la bsgres pa'o/ /yal phyod la bsgres pa yal phyod la bsgres pa na/ mu yal
201a6(phal chen): lo| |mu yal mu yal na/ mu yal la bsgres pa'o/ /mu yal la bsgres pa mu yal la bsgres pa na/ bgrang yol lo/ /bgrang yol bgrang yol na/ bgrang yol la bsgres pa'o/ /bgrang
201a7(phal chen): yol la 'gres pa bgrang yol la bsgres na/ mi 'jal to/ /mi 'jal mi 'jal na/ mi 'jal la bsgres pa'o/ /mi 'jal la bsgres pa mi 'jal la bsgres na/ bsam phyod do/ /
201b1(phal chen): bsam phyod bsam phyod na/ bsam phyod la bsgres pa'o/ /bsam phyod la bsgres pa bsam phyod la bsgres na/ mtha' 'byams so/ /mtha' 'byams mtha' 'byams na/ dpag thag
201b2(phal chen): go| dpag thag dpag thag na/ dpag thag la bsgres pa'o/ /dpag thag la bsgres pa dpag thag la bsgres na/ brjod du med pa'o/ /brjod du med pa brjod du med pa na/ brjod du med
201b3(phal chen): pa la bsgres pa'o/ /brjod du med pa la bsgres pa brjod du med pa la bsgres na/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la bsgres pa shin tu bstan pa'o/ /de'i mdun na bye ma'i phung
201b4(phal chen): po chen po dpag tshad du ma'i tshad dang ldan pa zhig 'dug 'dug pa las 'di la bye ma'i 'bru 'di snyed cig yod do/ /zhes bya ba nas/ bye ma'i 'bru brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa
201b5(phal chen): la bsgres pa 'di snyed cig yod do/ /zhes rab tu phye nas bgrang brtsis te grangs su bcad do/ /des bye ma'i phung po de rtsis kyi brdar bstan pas shin tu bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so//
201b6(phal chen): rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa kun na'ang yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni
201b7(phal chen): bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa dag kyang bgrang zhing brtsi'o/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang
202a1(phal chen): shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng
202a2(phal chen): gi phyogs su'ang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa dag kyang bgrang zhing brtsi'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems
202a3(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ming du bya ba/ gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa thams cad na'ang yod do/ /byang chub
202a4(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bgrang zhing brtsi'o/ /ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ming
202a5(phal chen): gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i bskal pa'i ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig nas
202a6(phal chen): gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa dang / chos kyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa dang / sems can gyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa
202a7(phal chen): dang | las kyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa kun la'ang 'jug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di nyid ni/ phyogs bcu na ming
202b1(phal chen): du bya ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du rung ba ji snyed pa thams cad la'ang 'jug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis/ phyogs bcu na ming gcig
202b2(phal chen): nas gcig tu brgyud pa ji snyed yod pa thams cad kyang bgrang zhing brtsi'o/ /de ltar rigs kyi bu/ kho bo pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba chos thams cad shes
202b3(phal chen): par bya ba'i bzo mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ chos kyi tshul thams cad kyi grangs
202b4(phal chen): la zhugs pa/ dus gsum gyi grangs la zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ chos kyi phung po thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
202b5(phal chen): sems dpa' thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ chos thams cad kyi ming gi 'khor lo dbang bsgyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/ spyod yul smos pa'am/
202b6(phal chen): yul brjod pa'am/ stobs bsngags pa'am/ bsam pa bstan pa'am/ tshogs yongs su brjod pa'am/ smon lam bshad par bya ba'am/ spyod pa yongs su bstan pa'am/ pha
202b7(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa mngon par brjod pa'am/ yang dag par bsgrub pa yongs su dag pa'am/ yang dag par bstan pa'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par smos pa'am/ ye
203a1(phal chen): shes snang ba khod du chud par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer rgya mtsho brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na
203a2(phal chen): dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya
203a3(phal chen): ba dris shig / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig thos nas spu g.yos te/ dga' ba chen po'i shugs skyes nas/ rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan
203a4(phal chen): par gyur pa/ ngo mtshar gyi bsam pa rin po che rab tu dkon pa thob pa/ 'gro ba mang po la phan pa'i sems dang / bsam pas byung ba/ sangs rgyas skyes pa gcig nas gcig
203a5(phal chen): tu brgyud par 'gro ba la dbang bsgyur ba/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i blo gros la rten pa/ thams cad du rjes su song ba'i rigs rnam par phye bas 'byung ba bstan
203a6(phal chen): pa la brtson pa/ dus gsum gyi dbyings su ma 'dres pa'i sangs rgyas gyi yul dang ldan pa/ bsod nams mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho las byung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi
203a7(phal chen): snang ba chen po la dbang bsgyur ba khams gsum gyi khyim du sdud pa'i sgo shin tu gcod pa des/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ khye'u
203b1(phal chen): dbang po'i dbang phyug la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu
203b2(phal chen): nor bzang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi sprin gyi char yongs su 'dzin pa byed cing / gangs chen mtsho ltar sprin chen po'i char gyis ngoms mi shes pa/ dge ba'i bshes
203b3(phal chen): gnyen gyi nyi ma'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis/ dge ba yongs su smin par byas pa'i sa gzhi las dbang po'i myu gu 'thon cing skyes pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa'i
203b4(phal chen): gdams ngag gi 'od zer kyi dra bas/ lus dang sems shin tu tshim par byas pa/ dpyid kyi nyi ma'i 'od kyis gdungs pa'i ri dwags kyi tshogs gsal zhing bsil ba'i gangs chu la
203b5(phal chen): 'thung bar 'dod pa ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi chu la 'thung bar 'dod pa/ bung ba mang po 'khor zhing lding bas rgyas par gyur pa'i pad mo dang ldan pa'i pad mo'i
203b6(phal chen): mtsho ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gis/ sems kyi me tog puN+Da ri ka kha bye ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su rgyas pa'i rin po che'i gling ltar dge ba'i
203b7(phal chen): bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag rin po che 'phel ba'i snang bas sems shin tu snang bar byas pa/ 'dzam bu'i shing chen po me tog dang 'bras bu'i tshogs chen po dang ldan pa ltar
204a1(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs su gyur pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ klu'i dbang po chen
204a2(phal chen): po rtsed mo dam pas rtse ba las byung ba'i nam mkha'i sprin chen po ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag thos pa'i tshogs su gyur pa'i rnang shin tu che ba/ sum cu rtsa gsum
204a3(phal chen): pa'i 'jig rten gyis brgyan pa'i sna tshogs kyi spo ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag las byung ba'i chos dri ma med pa sna tshogs brtsegs pa'i spor gyur pa / sum
204a4(phal chen): cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i brgya byin/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i tshogs rab tu 'joms pa ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag las byung
204a5(phal chen): ba'i yon tan dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing zil gyis mi non la/ gzhan la zil gyis gnon pa de/ mthar gyis grong khyer rgya mtsho brtan pa gang na ba
204a6(phal chen): der phyin te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba yongs su tshol tshol ba las/ de la skye bo mang pos bstan te/ rigs kyi bu/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba de/ grong khyer gyi dbus
204a7(phal chen): kyi rang gi khyim na 'dug go zhes nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i gnas gang ba der song ste/ thal mo sbyar nas sgo khang na sdod sdod pa dang /
204b1(phal chen): des dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i khyim de shin tu rgya che la yangs shing rin po che'i ra bas yongs su bskor ba/ phyogs bzhi nas sgo shin tu mdzes pa rnam par phye ba/ rin po che tshad
204b2(phal chen): med grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa mthong nas/ de khyim der song ste kun tu bltas na/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba/
204b3(phal chen): na chung shin tu gzhon la/ thog ma dar la bab pa/ gzugs mngon zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa/ kha dog dam pa pri ya pa shin tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa/ skra phye mar bzhag pa/ lus
204b4(phal chen): la rgyan med pa/ gos dang / smad g.yogs dkar po bgos pa/ rin po che'i khri la 'dug pa mthong ste/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par de'i lus sam/
204b5(phal chen): sems kyi dbang ngam/ gzi brjid dam/ kha dog gis zil gyis mngon pa'i sems can ni khyim de na gang yang med de/ lha'am mi'ang rung ste/ sems can gang gis dge bsnyen ma
204b6(phal chen): phul du byung ba mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang / dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la ston pa'i 'du shes su bsam pa zhig /rin po che'i khri la 'dug pa mthong ngo / /gzhan
204b7(phal chen): yang khyim de na/ stan lha rdzas dang / mi'i rdzas las shin tu 'phags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su grub pa bye ba stong phrag bcu bting ba dang /
205a1(phal chen): mdun du phru ba gcig cig bzhag pa las kha zas dang / skom gyi bag gam/ gos dang / rgyan gyi longs spyod kyi bag gzhan ci'ang mi snang ngo / /
205a2(phal chen): bud med stong phrag bcu tsam zhig mdun na 'dug par mthong na'ang / de dag thams cad kyang lha'i bu mo'i kha dog dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i tshul
205a3(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i spyod pa dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i longs spyod dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i tshul du shis pa dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi gos yid bzhin du gyon pa/ lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub kyis
205a4(phal chen): shin tu klubs pa/ lha'i bu mo'i skad lta bu'i dbyangs snyan pa dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i chu zheng mdzes pa dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de'i 'khor gyi bud med kyang / nges ci
205a5(phal chen): bsgo ba bzhin du byed cing mdun na 'khod do/ /rim gro byed do/ /bkur sti byed do/ /gdong du lta'o/ /ci bsgo ba nyan cing gnas so/ /rje sar 'khod do/ /yongs su lta'o/ /rnam par
205a6(phal chen): lta'o| |'dud do/ /rab tu 'dud do/ /phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gi lus las spos kyi ngad ldang pas ni/ grong khyer de'i 'khor thams cad du dri zhim pos khyab par 'dug ste/ sems
205a7(phal chen): can gang gis dri de tshor bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang gnod sems med pa'i sems dang / shar gnyer med pa'i sems dang / 'tshe ba med pa'i sems dang / phrag dog
205b1(phal chen): dang | 'jungs pa dang bral ba'i sems dang / sgyu dang g.yo med pa'i sems dang / chags pa dang / khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang / zhum ba dang / gzengs mtho ba med pa'i sems
205b2(phal chen): dang | byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / sdom pa la gnas pa'i sems dang / gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba la re ba med pa'i sems su gyur te/ gang gis de dag
205b3(phal chen): gi skad thos pa de dag thams cad kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / dul ba'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gang gis de dag mthong bar gyur pa de dag kyang 'dod chags dang
205b4(phal chen): bral ba tsam du rang rang gis shes par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar mthong nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal
205b5(phal chen): te| dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma/ bdag
205b6(phal chen): gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan
205b7(phal chen): tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/ /zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags ma/ ji ltar
206a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ smras pa/
206a2(phal chen): rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba thob ste/ rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni phru ba gcig po 'di las mos
206a3(phal chen): pa sna tshogs can rnams/ kha zas ci la dga' ba bzhin du tshod ma sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs kyis tshim par byed de/ rigs kyi
206a4(phal chen): bu| de ltar kho mo ni phru ba gcig po 'di las ci la dga' ba'i kha zas kyis sems can brgya'ang yongs su tshim par byed do/ /sems can stong dang / sems can brgya phrag
206a5(phal chen): stong dang / sems can bye ba dang / sems can bye ba phrag brgya dang / sems can bye ba phrag stong dang / sems can bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag
206a6(phal chen): stong nas/ sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa/ mos pa sna tshogs can rnams kyang / ci la dga' ba'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/ /yongs su
206a7(phal chen): stob par byed do/ /yongs su dga' bar byed do/ /yongs su mgu bar byed do/ /yongs su spro bar byed do/ /shin tu tshim par byed do/ /yid bde bar byed do/ /'on kyang phru ba
206b1(phal chen): 'di las 'god par 'gyur ba med de/ 'grib pa med do/ /dma' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /'bri bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sa mtshams yod par mi 'gyur ro/ /mthar
206b2(phal chen): thug par mi 'gyur ro/ /mur thug par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhung de dang 'dra bar sems can 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / de bzhin du gling bzhi pa'i 'jig
206b3(phal chen): rten gyi khams gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong
206b4(phal chen): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ sems can mos pa sna tshogs can/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul
206b5(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed cig 'ongs kyang ci la dga' ba'i kha zas tshod ma sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/ /yongs
206b6(phal chen): su dga' bar byed do/ /nyams bde bar byed do/ /shin tu tshim par byed do/ /yid shin tu bde bar byed do/ /'on kyang phru ba 'di las 'god par 'gyur ba med de/ 'grib pa med
206b7(phal chen): do| |dma' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /sa mtshams yod par mi 'gyur ro/ /mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro/ /mur thug par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ gal te phyogs
207a1(phal chen): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can mos pa sna tshogs can dang / bsam pa sna tshogs can thams cad 'ong bar gyur
207a2(phal chen): na yang / de dag thams cad ci la dga' ba'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed pa nas yid bde bar bya ba'i bar du byed do/ /kha zas sna tshogs kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du btung
207a3(phal chen): pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ro rnam pa sna tshogs dang / stan sna tshogs dang / mal cha sna tshogs dang / bzhon pa sna tshogs dang / gos sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang /
207a4(phal chen): phreng ba sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dang / bdug spos sna tshogs dang / byug pa sna tshogs dang / phye ma sna tshogs dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang /
207a5(phal chen): rin po che'i shing rta sna tshogs dang / gdugs sna tshogs dang / rgyal mtshan sna tshogs dang / lha'i ba dan sna tshogs dang / yo byad kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su
207a6(phal chen): tshim par byed pa nas/ yid dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na nyan thos dang / rang sangs
207a7(phal chen): rgyas sku'i tha ma 'dzin pa gang ji snyed gcig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi 'bras bu
207b1(phal chen): brnyes par mdzad do/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
207b2(phal chen): brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag
207b3(phal chen): stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
207b4(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong
207b5(phal chen): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
207b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas sku'i tha ma 'dzin pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing / nyan thos
207b7(phal chen): dang | rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu brnyes par mdzad do/ /shar phyogs na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs
208a1(phal chen): mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs na ji snyed
208a2(phal chen): cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig
208a3(phal chen): bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing / snying po byang chub tu bzhugs nas/ bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
208a4(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
208a5(phal chen): stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong dang / 'jig rten gyi
208a6(phal chen): khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / gling bzhi pa'i
208a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra pa snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba
208b1(phal chen): snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin
208b2(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing snying po
208b3(phal chen): byang chub la bzhugs nas/ bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shar phyogs na bzhugs pa ji
208b4(phal chen): lta ba de bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /
208b5(phal chen): nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs
208b6(phal chen): pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing snying po byang chub tu bzhugs te/ bdud sde dang bcas pa rab tu pham par mdzad nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
208b7(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong
209a1(phal chen): dang | 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong
209a2(phal chen): dang | 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / gling
209a3(phal chen): bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra
209a4(phal chen): ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ rigs kyi bu/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du
209a5(phal chen): med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas
209a6(phal chen): las gsol cing snying po byang chub tu bzhugs nas/ bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /
209a7(phal chen): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kho mo'i 'khor bud med stong phrag bcu po 'di dag mthong ngam/ smras pa/ 'phags ma/ bdag gis mthong ngo / /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ bud med 'di
209b1(phal chen): dag la sogs pa brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu kho mo dang skal pa mnyam par spyod pa/ smon lam gcig pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig pa/ 'byung ba'i rgyan gcig pa/ mos pa'i lam rnam par
209b2(phal chen): dag pa gcig pa/ kho mo dang skal pa mnyam par dran pa rnam par dag pa/ skal pa mnyam par blo rnam par dag pa/ skal pa mnyam par blo tshad med par gyur pa/ skal pa mnyam par
209b3(phal chen): dbang po rab tu thob pa/ skal pa mnyam par sems kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ skal pa mnyam par spyod yul gyi yul dang ldan pa/ skal pa mnyam par chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa/
209b4(phal chen): skal pa mnyam par don nges par rtogs pa/ skal pa mnyam par chos kyi don ston pa/ skal pa mnyam par gzugs rnam par dag pa/ skal pa mnyam par stobs tshad med pa/ skal
209b5(phal chen): pa mnyam par brtan pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ skal pa mnyam par chos kyi sgra sgrogs pa/ skal pa mnyam par dbyangs rnam par dag pa/ tshad med pa'i yon tan brjod du yod pas
209b6(phal chen): rnam par spyod pa thams cad la skal pa mnyam par yon tan rnam par dag pa/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la kha na ma tho ba med cing / rnam par dag pas bskal pa mnyam par las
209b7(phal chen): kyi rnam par smin pa rnam par dag pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa/ skal pa mnyam par byams pa chen pos rgyas par 'gengs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par byed
210a1(phal chen): pas mi skyo ba'i phyir/ skal pa mnyam par snying rje chen pos rgyas par 'gengs pa/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad tshim par byed
210a2(phal chen): pa'i lus yongs su ston pas skal pa mnyam par lus kyi las rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi nges pa'i tshig tha snyad la skal pa mnyam par ngag gi las rnam par dag pa/
210a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du skal pa mnyam par 'dod pa/ sangs rgyas la mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skal pa mnyam
210a4(phal chen): par rgyu ba/ chos thams cad kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba la skal pa mnyam par mngon sum du gyur pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad thob par bya ba
210a5(phal chen): la skal pa mnyam par spyod pa rnam par dag pa sha stag cig kyang yod de/ rigs kyi bu/ bud med stong phrag bcu po 'di dag kyang skad cig gcig tu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
210a6(phal chen): dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa rnams la zhal zas yongs su dbul ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu rgyas par 'dong ngo / /phru ba 'di nyid nas kha zas blangs shing srid pa tha ma pa
210a7(phal chen): dang | nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams la bsod snyoms dbul ba'i phyir phyogs bcur rgyas par 'dong ngo / /phru ba 'di nyid nas kha zas blangs shing phyogs
210b1(phal chen): bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ yi dwags kyi tshogs thams cad kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar kho mo ni phru ba 'di nyid nas lha rnams ni lha'i kha zas kyis yongs
210b2(phal chen): su tshim par byed do/ /klu rnams ni klu'i kha zas kyis/ gnod sbyin rnams ni gnod sbyin gyi kha zas kyis/ dri za rnams ni dri za'i kha zas kyis/ lha ma yin rnams ni lha ma yin gyi kha zas
210b3(phal chen): kyis| nam mkha' lding rnams ni nam mkha' lding gi kha zas kyis/ mi'am ci rnams ni mi'am ci'i kha zas kyis/ lto 'phye chen po rnams ni lto 'phye chen po'i kha zas kyis/ mi
210b4(phal chen): rnams ni mi'i kha zas kyis/ mi ma yin pa rnams ni mi ma yin pa'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ yud tsam zhig sdod dang / de'u re mngon du 'gyur ro/ /
210b5(phal chen): dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba des tshig de brjod ma thag tu de'i mod la 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung bas sngon gyi smon lam gyis pos pas/ sems can grangs med pa zhig shar
210b6(phal chen): phyogs kyi sgo nas nang du 'ongs par gyur to/ /de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas/ sems can grangs med pa zhig lho phyogs dang / nub
210b7(phal chen): phyogs dang / byang phyogs kyi sgo nas nang du 'ongs par gyur te/ de ltar 'ongs pa de dag dge bsnyen ma phul du byung bas/ stan de dag la bkod de/ so so nas ci dga' ba'i kha
211a1(phal chen): zas tshod ma sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang ldan pas yongs su tshim par byas so/ /yongs su bstabs par byas so//
211a2(phal chen): yongs su dga' bar byas so/ /yongs su mgu bar byas so/ /yongs su spro bar byas so/ /shin tu tshim par byas so/ /yid bde bar byas so/ /kha zas sna tshogs kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du
211a3(phal chen): btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ro rnam pa sna tshogs dang / stan sna tshogs dang / mal cha sna tshogs dang / bzhon pa sna tshogs dang / gos sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / phreng
211a4(phal chen): ba sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dang / bdug spos sna tshogs dang / byug pa sna tshogs dang / phye ma sna tshogs dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i shing
211a5(phal chen): rta sna tshogs dang / gdugs sna tshogs dang / rgyal mtshan sna tshogs dang / lha'i ba dan sna tshogs dang / yo byad kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byas pa nas/ yid
211a6(phal chen): dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byas so/ /lha rnams ni lha'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byas so/ /klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
211a7(phal chen): mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyang / mi ma yin pa'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byas pa nas/ yid bde bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byas so/ /'on
211b1(phal chen): kyang phru ba de las god par gyur pa med/ 'grib pa med/ dmas pa med/ zad par gyur pa med/ sa mtshams su gyur pa med/ mthar thug pa med/ mur thug pa med do/ /de nas dge bsnyen
