211b2(phal chen): ma phul du byung ba des/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho mos ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyan
211b3(phal chen): ces bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams chen po'i rgya mtsho mi zad pas/ mi zad pa'i bsod nams dang ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po shin tu
211b4(phal chen): bsags pas nam mkha' lta bur gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge
211b5(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsrung bas/ bsod nams chen po'i khor yug dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du rin po che snyim pa nas char ltar 'thor bas/ bsod nams chen po'i sprin du gyur pa
211b6(phal chen): chos kyi grong khyer gyi sgo 'byed pas/ bsod nams chen po'i mdzod la mngon sum du lta ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi phongs pa'i mun pa sel bas/ bsod nams chen po'i sgron mar gyur pa de
211b7(phal chen): dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer 'byung ba chen po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na khyim bdag mkhas
212a1(phal chen): ba zhes bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan
212a2(phal chen): du bya ba dris shig / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la lan brgya stong du mar
212a3(phal chen): g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i drung nas blta bas mi ngoms bzhin du song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang /
212a4(phal chen): bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa de/ bsod nams rgya mtsho de la ni rjes su sems/ bsod nams kyi nam mkha'
212a5(phal chen): de la ni kun tu lta/ bsod nams kyi phung po de ni yongs su 'dzin/ bsod nams kyi ri bo de la ni mngon par 'dzeg /bsod nams kyi tshogs de ni yang dag par sdud/ bsod
212a6(phal chen): nams kyi chu bo de la ni yongs su 'bog / bsod nams kyi mu stegs de la ni rab tu 'bab/ bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor de ni yongs su sbyong / bsod nams kyi gter de la ni
212a7(phal chen): yang dag pa blta/ bsod nams kyi tshul de la ni rjes su dran par byed/ bsod nams kyi chos de ni yongs su 'dzin/ bsod nams kyi rgyud de ni yongs su sbyong ba byed cing / mthar
212b1(phal chen): gyis grong khyer 'byung ba chen po gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'dod cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta bas bsgos pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen
212b2(phal chen): gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i bsam pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la thogs pa med pa'i sbyor ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bya bas skyo ba med pa'i brtson 'grus dang /
212b3(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag lus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nges par gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang / dge ba'i bshes
212b4(phal chen): gnyen gyis rnam par spel ba'i thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa dang / rnam par 'phel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
212b5(phal chen): cad dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / yang dag par 'phel ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po dang / yongs su smin par
212b6(phal chen): 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / yang dag par 'phel ba'i smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang / shin tu yangs par 'gyur ba'i snying rje chen pos bdag nyid thams
212b7(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur par yang dag par mthong nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad las byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas/ chos kyi snang ba yang dag pa
213a1(phal chen): blang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu snang ba rnam par 'phel bar byed cing / khyim bdag mkhas pa yongs su tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer
213a2(phal chen): gyi dbus lam gyi bzhi mdo zhig na/ rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu zhig la/ rin po che grangs med pa las byas pa'i khri/ nor bu rin po che'i rkang pa rdo rje dang / in+d+ra nI la sna tshogs
213a3(phal chen): kyis spras pa bkye ba/ gser gyi lcag pod kyi dra bas legs par blas pa/ nor bu rin po che dri ma me pa'i snying po can rin po che lnga brgya tsam gyis gzugs legs par brgyan pa/
213a4(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi stan sna tshogs bting ba/ gam yo na sa lha rdzas kyi gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang po bsgreng ba/ rin po che du ma'i dra bas kun nas yog pa/ rin po che'i bla re
213a5(phal chen): chen po bres pa/ bla nas gser dang / rin po che'i me tog gi lda ldi mang po bkye ba zhig la 'dug cing / 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi gdugs yu ba dri ma med pa bai DU R+Ya las byas
213a6(phal chen): ba ni drung na bsgreng zhing bzung / rin po che'i g.yag rnga dri ma med pa'i rdul yab ngang pa'i rgyal po lta bus ni legs par g.yab/ spos kyi rim gro yo byad sna tshogs kyis ni bdugs
213a7(phal chen): shing bsangs/ rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba lha rdzas kyi dbyangs las 'das par sgra 'byin pa lnga brgya tsam ni g.yas g.yon nas brdungs shing dkrol/ grong khyer 'byung ba
213b1(phal chen): chen po na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams shin tu dga' bar bya ba'i don du/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char ni kun nas 'bab par gyur/ g.yog srog chags stong phrag bcu tsam
213b2(phal chen): sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba skal pa mnyam par spyod spyod pa/ ngag nyan cing ci dga' bar byed pa/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs
213b3(phal chen): su grub pa/ lha dang mi'i gzugs las shin tu 'das pa sha stag gis kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang / khyim bdag mkhas pa gang na ba der song
213b4(phal chen): ste phyin nas/ khyim bdag mkhas pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ khyim bdag mkhas pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug
213b5(phal chen): ste| thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ bdag ni 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad shin tu bde ba
213b6(phal chen): la dgod pa dang / sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho nas mngon par gdon pa dang / sems can thams cad chos rin po che'i gling du yang dag par bskyal ba dang / sems
213b7(phal chen): can thams cad kyi sred pa'i rlan shin tu bskam pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi snying rje'i rlan yang dag par bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang /
214a1(phal chen): sred pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos shing bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad 'khor
214a2(phal chen): ba'i dgon pa las yang dag par bzla ba dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / chos la dga' zhing mos pa yang dag par bskyed pa dang / sems can thams
214a3(phal chen): cad khams gsum gyi grong brdal nas gdon pa dang / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du gzung par sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang
214a4(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs kyis kyang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma
214a5(phal chen): 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems
214a6(phal chen): dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar bslabs na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba bdag la bshad du
214a7(phal chen): gsol/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / khyim bdag mkhas pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bu bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par
214b1(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing byang chub sems
214b2(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta bas mi ngoms pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro bas mi skyo ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro
214b3(phal chen): bya bas sgyid lug pa med pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bas yid mi bde ba mi skyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal ba las phyir mi ldog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes
214b4(phal chen): gnyen la mos shing dad pa'i yid las rnam par mi ldog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi ngor blta ba las phyir mi zlog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi tshul la
214b5(phal chen): zhum pa med pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur bya bas mi skyo ba de lta bu ni shin tu dkon no/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis kho bo'i 'khor 'di dag mthong ngam/
214b6(phal chen): smras pa/ 'phags pa/ mthong ngo / /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di dag kun kyang kho bos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed bdag ste/ 'di dag ni kho bos
214b7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bskyed pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos pha rol tu phyin pas bstud de/ gsos pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos chos dkar po thams cad kyis bskyed pa'o/ /'di dag
215a1(phal chen): ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rnam par bskyed pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos 'jig rten gyi rigs las gyen du bskyod pa'o/ /'di dag ni
215a2(phal chen): kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la bkod pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos 'jig rten gyi lam gyi 'khor lo las bzlog pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
215a3(phal chen): ba la btsud pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos ngan song gsum gyi rgyud du ltung ba las yongs su bzung ba'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos chos nyid khong du chud par bya ba la bkod pa ste/ rigs
215a4(phal chen): kyi bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni yid kyi mdzod nas byung ba'i bsod nams mang po thob
215a5(phal chen): pa ste/ de'i mthus kho bo ni zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /btung ba 'dod pa rnams la btung ba dang / ro dam pa 'dod pa rnams la ro'i dam pa dang / bza' ba
215a6(phal chen): 'dod pa rnams la bza' ba dang / bca' ba 'dod pa rnams la bca' ba dang / bldag pa 'dod pa rnams la bldag pa dang / mur pa 'dod pa rnams la mur ba dang / gos 'dod
215a7(phal chen): pa rnams la gos dang / me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog dang / phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba dang / spos 'dod pa rnams la spos dang / bdug pa 'dod pa rnams la
215b1(phal chen): bdug pa dang / byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa dang / phye ma 'dod pa rnams la phye ma dang / rgyan dang lhab lhub 'dod pa rnams la rgyan dang lhab lhub dang / rin po che 'dod pa rnams
215b2(phal chen): la rin po che dang / gser 'dod pa rnams la gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams la dngul dang / mu tig 'dod pa rnams la mu tig dang / rten 'dod pa rnams la rten dang /
215b3(phal chen): stan 'dod pa rnams la stan dang / mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad 'dod pa rnams la na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad dang / bzhon pa 'dod
215b4(phal chen): pa rnams la bzhon pa dang / dga' ba 'dod pa rnams la dga' ba dang / glang po dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / ma he dang / ra lug 'dod pa rnams la
215b5(phal chen): glang po dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / ma he dang / ra lug dang / rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang / ba dan 'dod pa rnams la/ rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang /
215b6(phal chen): ba dan dang / bran pho dang / bran mo 'dod pa rnams la bran pho dang / bran mo dang / 'khor gyi byis pa 'dod pa rnams la 'khor gyi byis pa dang / bud med 'dod pa rnams la bud med
215b7(phal chen): dang | bu mo gzhon nu 'dod pa rnams la bu mo gzhon nu dang / cod pan dang / gtsug gi rin po che 'dod pa rnams la cod pan dang / gtsug gi rin po che dang / thor pag dang bcas
216a1(phal chen): pa'i gtsug gi rin po che 'dod pa rnams la thor pag dang bcas pa'i gtsug gi rin po che dang / skra mthon mthing dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa
216a2(phal chen): rnams la/ skra mthon mthing dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin pa byed pa nas/ yo byad sna tshogs thams cad 'dod pa rnams la yang yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyi sbyin pa
216a3(phal chen): byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ yud tsam zhig sdod dang / de'u re mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de skad du khyim bdag mkhas pas tshig de brjod ma thag tu de'i mod la/ sems
216a4(phal chen): can grangs med pa zhig khyim bdag mkhas pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas/ phyogs tha dad pa dang / yul tha dad pa dang / gnas tha dad pa dang / grong khyer tha dad pa dang /
216a5(phal chen): grong rdal tha dad pa dang / tshong 'dus tha dad pa dang / ljongs tha dad pa dang / 'khor gyi grong tha dad pa dang / khyim tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang / sems can
216a6(phal chen): gyi rigs tha dad pa dang / sems can rnam pa mi mthun pa tha dad pa dang / lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang / gnas kyi rnam pa dang / ming du bya ba tha dad pa dang / sems can skye mched
216a7(phal chen): rnam par dag pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa kha zas sna tshogs don du gnyer ba/ kha zas sna tshogs 'dod pa/ bsam pa tha dad pa bza' ba dang btung ba gtsang ba 'dod pa dang /
216b1(phal chen): sha 'dod pa dang / kha zas rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs don du gnyer ba/ lam gyi rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par du skyes pa'i skye mched la gnas pa 'di lta ste/ mi'i nang nas 'bras
216b2(phal chen): chan dang / sran chan dang / 'khur ba dang / skyo ma dang / nya dang / sha la sogs pa/ kham gyis bza' ba'i kha zas sna tshogs don du gnyer ba dang / mi'i nang nas ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro
216b3(phal chen): ba'i rgyud thams cad rnam par spyod pa dag las kyang / kha zas dang btung ba sna tshogs don du gnyer ba dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa
216b4(phal chen): thogs pa med par gtong ba'i rnga'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas kun kyang 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang khyim bdag mkhas pa la slong
216b5(phal chen): mo 'debs so/ /gdong du lta'o/ /sdod do/ /gsol ba 'debs so/ /de nas khyim bdag mkhas pas/ slong ba de dag kun nas 'dus par shes nas yud tsam du bsams te/ nam
216b6(phal chen): mkha' la bltas pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nas kha zas dang / btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs/ ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ dri sna tshogs dang ldan
216b7(phal chen): pa mang po 'thon te/ lag mthil du 'ongs par gyur to/ /des de dag yongs su blangs shing de ltar kun nas 'dus pa'i slong mo pa mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa de dag ci 'dod
217a1(phal chen): pa'i zas dang / btung ba'i rnam pa dang / yo byad kyi khyad par thams cad kyis yongs su tshim par byas so/ /ci 'dod pa yongs su byin no/ /rab tu dga' bar
217a2(phal chen): byas so/ /shin tu tshim par byas so/ /dga' ba shin tu skye bar byas so/ /nyams shin tu bde bar byas so/ /yid rab tu dga' bar byas so/ /de ltar de dag shin tu tshim par
217a3(phal chen): byas nas/ des kyang mchog ste/ de'i 'og tu chos bstan pa 'di lta ste/ ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po bsags pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod de/ chos bstan to/ /phongs pa thams
217a4(phal chen): cad 'byung mi srid pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / skyid pa chen po yongs su 'grub pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / chos kyi ye shes kyi tshul 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod
217a5(phal chen): pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po bsags pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / dga' ba bza' ba'i zas rab tu 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / mtshan
217a6(phal chen): dang / dpe byad bzang pos shin tu brgyan pa'i lus 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / thub pa med pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su
217a7(phal chen): brjod pa dang / bla na med pa'i kha zas yongs su shis pa 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs
217b1(phal chen): mi zad pa rab tu 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu'ang yongs su brjod pa byas te chos ston to/ /de kha zas don du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la nam mkha'i dbyings nas kha zas rnam pa sna
217b2(phal chen): tshogs blangs shing tshim par byas te/ de dag la tshe dang / mdog dang / stobs dang / bde ba dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /des btung ba
217b3(phal chen): don du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la/ btung ba mang po zhim pa kha na ma tho ba med pa/ yid shin tu dga' ba byed pa de dag gis tshim par byas nas/ de dag la 'khor bas skom zhing 'khor
217b4(phal chen): ba la dga' ba las rnam par bzlog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la dga' zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir chos bstan to/ /des ro'i mchog don du gnyer
217b5(phal chen): zhing 'ongs pa rnams la ro'i mchog sna tshogs mngar ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tsha dang / tsha ba dang / kha ba dang / bska ba rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su tshim par byas te/ de'i 'og tu
217b6(phal chen): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /des bzhon pa don du gnyer zhing / phyogs kyi rgyud sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa rnams la bzhon pa sna
217b7(phal chen): tshogs kyi sbyin pas yongs su bstud de/ de dag theg pa chen po la gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /des gos don du gnyer cing phyogs sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa kun nas
218a1(phal chen): 'dus par shes nas yud tsam du bsams te/ nam mkha'i dbyings la bltas pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings las gos sna tshogs dang / sngon po
218a2(phal chen): dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa/ kha dog sna tshogs can/ kha dog du mar rnam par dag pa dag 'thon cing /
218a3(phal chen): lag pa'i mthil du 'ongs pas/ des de dag gi slong mo pa de dag la yongs su bstud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa bla na med pa dang / mdog
218a4(phal chen): gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob par 'gyur ba rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /de bzhin du yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyis/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i slong mo pa rnams la
218a5(phal chen): bstud byas nas/ ci rigs su chos bstan to/ /de ltar khyim bdag mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul bstan pa byas nas/
218a6(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bos ni yid kyi mdzod nas byung ba'i bsod nams kyi rnam par thar pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos
218a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' yo byad la dbang thob pa/ rin po che'i lag pa thob par gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad lag pas yongs su khebs par byas
218b1(phal chen): shing | sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rin po che'i kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu
218b2(phal chen): 'bebs pa/ de bzhin du rgyan kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / cod pan kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / khang pa brtsegs pa kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / na bza' kha dog sna
218b3(phal chen): tshogs kyi sprin dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba dang / glu yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs snyan pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / ma tog kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / spos
218b4(phal chen): kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang / rnam
218b5(phal chen): pa thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa'i sprin gyi char dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi gnas
218b6(phal chen): su sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bar bya ba'i phyir yo byad thams cad kyi sprin gyi char
218b7(phal chen): 'bebs pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/ rnam par 'phrul pa bstan par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/
219a1(phal chen): grong khyer seng ge'i gzugs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud ces bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar
219a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shing / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dga' rangs te/
219a3(phal chen): mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ khyim bdag mkhas pa la chos kyi rim gros slob ma'i tshul bstan te/ de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sangs rgyas
219a4(phal chen): kyi chos thams cad thob par 'gyur bar yongs su blta zhing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de la rag lus par blta ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dben par sems
219a5(phal chen): rgyun mi 'chad par bstan pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bka' shin tu nyan pa'i sems dang ldan par bstan pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang du
219a6(phal chen): 'gyur ba'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag dang tshig mnyan par bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba'i dang pa'i dbang
219a7(phal chen): po la bsam pa byed cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis btams te btang bas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten cing bkur ba dang / rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i sems
219b1(phal chen): kyis khyim bdag mkhas pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ khyim bdag mkhas pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang
219b2(phal chen): bltas te/ khyim bdag mkhas pa'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang / bsod nams kyi chu bo de la ni yid ches par sems/ bsod nams kyi zhing de la ni yang
219b3(phal chen): dag par blta/ bsod nams kyi ri bo de ni yongs su sbyong / bsod nams kyi mu stegs de la ni yang dag par 'dzeg /bsod nams kyi mdzod de ni rnam par 'byed/ bsod nams kyi
219b4(phal chen): gter de la ni shin tu blta/ bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor de ni yongs su spyod/ bsod nams kyi phung po de ni yang dag par len/ bsod nams kyi stobs de ni yongs su bskyed/ bsod
219b5(phal chen): nams kyi shugs de ni rnam par 'phel bar byed cing / mthar gyis grong khyer seng ge'i gzugs gang na ba der phyin te/ chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud yongs su tshol tshol ba
219b6(phal chen): las| tshong 'dus kyi srang zhing na 'dug pa mthong nas/ des de'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas
219b7(phal chen): 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
220a1(phal chen): pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal na/ 'phags pa/ lam gang gis bdag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
220a2(phal chen): 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi man ngag legs par mi stsal tam/ de nas chos kyi tshong don rin chen gtsug phud kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu
220a3(phal chen): nor bzang gi lag nas bzung ste/ rang gi khyim gang na ba der khrid de/ khyim de bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bo'i khyim la ltos shig ces nas/ des
220a4(phal chen): bltas na khyim de dag cing 'od gsal la/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las byas pa ste/ yangs shing mtho la dngul gyis ra bas bskor ba/ shel gyi rtsig pas shin tu legs
220a5(phal chen): par brtsigs te mdzes par byas pa/ bai DUR+Ya'i phung po brgya phrag stong gis rab tu brgyan pa/ mu sa ra gal pa'i ka ba bkye ba/ mu tig dmar po las byas pa'i seng ge'i khri
220a6(phal chen): shin tu bshams pa/ nor bu rin po che rang bzhin snang ba'i seng ge'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/ nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i bla re bres pa/ gser gyi dra ba yid bzhin gyi
220a7(phal chen): nor bus brgyan pas kun nas yog pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa/ asma gar b+ha las brtsigs pa'i rdzing bu chu bsil pas gang ba dang
220b1(phal chen): ldan pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing gis bskor ba/ rgya che zhing yangs pa/ rim pa bcur brtsegs pa/ shin tu mtho ba/ sgo brgyad dang ldan par 'dug pa mthong nas/
220b2(phal chen): des khyim de'i nang du phyin te/ kun tu bltas na/ rim khang tha ma'i nang na/ bza' ba dang / btung ba'i rnam pa yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo / /rim khang gnyis pa'i nang na/ gos kyi
220b3(phal chen): rnam pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo / /rim khang gsum pa'i nang na/ rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan dang lhab lhub yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo / /rim khang bzhi pa'i
220b4(phal chen): nang na/ btsun mo'i 'khor dga' ba'i yo byad du bya ba/ bud med rin po che sa chen po'i steng na bzang du bya ba yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo / /rim khang lnga pa'i nang na/ sa lnga pa la
220b5(phal chen): gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos yang dag par 'gro ba'i dga' ba la mos pa/ 'jig rten la phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa/ gtsug lag thams
220b6(phal chen): cad mngon par sgrub pa/ gzungs kyi tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang / ting nge 'dzin las rnam par ldang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin la rnam par spyad pa dang / ye shes kyi
220b7(phal chen): snang ba mngon par sgrub pa 'dus shing 'khod par mthong ngo / /rim khang drug pa'i nang na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa rab tu
221a1(phal chen): thob pa/ shes rab shin tu zab pa/ rab tu zhi ba'i chos thams cad mngon par shes pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / snying po mang
221a2(phal chen): pos sgo kun nas 'byung ba/ bsgribs pa med pa'i spyod yul can mi gnyis pa la yang dag par spyod pa/ chos yang dag par 'gro ba la rnam par 'phrul ba/ shes rab kyi pha
221a3(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang zhing rnam par dbye ba dang / rab tu gsal bar byed pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mang po yang dag par 'gro ba byed pa rnams kun
221a4(phal chen): nas 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo zhi ba'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad du ye
221a5(phal chen): shes rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mi g.yo ba'i gling zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rdul dang bral ba'i 'od ces bya ba
221a6(phal chen): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad mos par byed cing / rjes su 'brang ba'i
221a7(phal chen): dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i tshul gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rgya mtsho'i
221b1(phal chen): snying po zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo kun tu lta ba'i btang snyoms thob pa zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mi zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan
221b2(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i rjes su song ba zhes
221b3(phal chen): bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo chos kyi sprin la dmigs pas rim pas mi dmigs
221b4(phal chen): pa'i gnas zhes bya ba dang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo de dag la sogs pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang bar yang dag par
221b5(phal chen): bgro ba byed cing / rgyan brjod du med pa shin tu rnam par phye ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa mthong bar gyur te/ /rim khang bdun pa'i nang na/ byang chub sems dpa'
221b6(phal chen): sgra brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa rab tu thob pa/ thabs dang ye shes rnam par gdon mi za ba la shin tu byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'dzin
221b7(phal chen): pa sha stag 'dus shing 'khod par mthong ngo / /rim khang brgyad pa'i nang na/ byang chub sems dpa' ma nyams par 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi
222a1(phal chen): khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu ba/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du
222a2(phal chen): lus shin tu rnam par phye ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas gud du mi 'phags pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku la yang dag
222a3(phal chen): par gzhol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du sngon du brjod pa'i gtam gyi skyes bur gyur pa sha stag kun nas 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong
222a4(phal chen): ngo / /rim khang dgu pa'i nang na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ngo / /rim khang bcu pa'i nang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
222a5(phal chen): thams cad thog ma byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa dang / spyod pa dang / 'byung ba dang / smon lam rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i yul dang / sangs rgyas kyi
222a6(phal chen): zhing dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog pa dang bcas pa dang / sems can 'dul ba mdzad pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang
222a7(phal chen): bcas par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ khyod la 'di lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa mnga' na/
222b1(phal chen): phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam pa de/ ji lta bu zhig tu sbyang ba mdzad mdzad/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ni su zhig la yongs su bskrun bskrun/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ kho bos dran te/ 'das
222b2(phal chen): pa'i dus kyi bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i yang pha rol gcig na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'khor lo sna tshogs zhes bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa
222b3(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings 'od zer mtha' yas pas yongs su brgyan pa'i chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla
222b4(phal chen): na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ye shes rnam par snang ba la
222b5(phal chen): sogs pa/ nyan thos bye ba phrag brgya dang / ye shes nyi ma'i gzi brjid la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag stong dang thabs gcig tu rgyal po chos kyi dbang phyug
222b6(phal chen): rgyal pos spyan drangs nas/ bza' shing gi ra ba chen po rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis mdzes pa zhes bya bar gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de grong khyer du gshegs nas/
222b7(phal chen): tshong 'dus kyi srang nas bzhud pa'i tshe/ kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir sil
223a1(phal chen): snyan dang / rol mo'i sgra zhig kyang phyung / spos kyi ri lu gcig gcig kyang bsregs te/ bdug spos kyis bsangs so/ /spos kyi ri lu gcig po
223a2(phal chen): de de ltar bsregs pas/ zhag bdun du 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyang spos kyi na bun gyi sprin kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang 'dra bas
223a3(phal chen): yongs su khebs par gyur to/ /spos kyi na bun gyi sprin de dag las kyang sgra 'di skad du brjod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ dus gsum du dri ma med
223a4(phal chen): pa'i ye shes kyi phung po dang ldan pa'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ sgrib pa thams cad mi mnga' ba'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad yongs su byang ba ste/ de bzhin
223a5(phal chen): gshegs pa la yon phul ba thams cad kyang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i don chen po tshad med pa bsgrub par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur
223a6(phal chen): ro zhes de skad du kho bo'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba la shugs yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir/ spos kyi na bun gyi sprin de
223a7(phal chen): las| sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sgra'i rnam pa de lta bu byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
223b1(phal chen): de yang / kho bos gnas gsum du yongs su bsngos te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di ltar phongs pa thams cad shin tu rgyun gcad pa dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /
223b2(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngos so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bos
223b3(phal chen): ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor thogs pa med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rin po che
223b4(phal chen): tshad med pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku rgya mtsho dang tha mi dad pa la zhugs pa/ tha mi dad pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char yang dag par 'dzin pa/ tha mi dad pa'i yon tan
223b5(phal chen): rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dra ba rnam par rgyas par gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin tha mi dad pa'i yul la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad tha mi
223b6(phal chen): dad pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyun gcig tu gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang tha mi dad cing rnam par mi rtog par spyod pa/ dus gsum tha mi dad pas mnyam pa nyid la
223b7(phal chen): zhugs pa/ bskal pa thams cad tha mi dad par yongs su gnas pas mi skyo ba/ kun tu lta ba tha mi dad pa'i yul gyi sa la gnas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod
224a1(phal chen): par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul sba'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i grong khyer kun nas sgo zhes
224a2(phal chen): bya ba na/ tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba
224a3(phal chen): dang | ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos kyi
224a4(phal chen): tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud kyi drung nas
224a5(phal chen): song ngo / / //bam po dgu bcu lnga pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa mthong ba la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
224a6(phal chen): mtha' yas pa dang 'grogs pa rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam mtha' yas pa'i tshul gyis snang bar gyur pa/ chos kyi tshul mtha' yas pas mngon par
224a7(phal chen): brlan pas shin tu rtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa mtha' yas pa'i lam gyi rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po
224b1(phal chen): mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa mtha' yas pa'i stobs la gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i rjes su song ba'i
224b2(phal chen): sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mtha' yas pa'i stobs yongs su skyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis thub pa med pa mtha' yas pa'i rgyal
224b3(phal chen): mtshan can/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa de/ mthar gyis
224b4(phal chen): yul sba'i rtsa ba gang na ba der phyin nas/ grong khyer kun nas sgo yongs su tshol zhing phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang / yul phyogs nyen kor kun dang / sgang dang / gshong
224b5(phal chen): dang | mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa thams cad du yongs su skyo ba med pa'i bsam pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i sems dang / ldog pa med pa'i brtson 'grus dang / thub pa
224b6(phal chen): med pa'i sems kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag ma brjed pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi spyod pa ma nor bas sems rab tu bsgos pa dang / sgo
224b7(phal chen): kun nas rnam par dmigs pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa dang / bag med pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / mig dang rna ba g.yeng ba med par kun tu tshol tshol nas/ yul sba'i rtsa
225a1(phal chen): pa'i dbus shig na/ grong khyer kun nas sgo tshong 'dus kyi rdul stong phrag bcu'i gnas su gyur pa de/ shin tu bzang po grub pa/ ra ba brtan
225a2(phal chen): pas bskor ba/ shin tu mtho ba/ bzhi mdo brgyad kyis brgyan pa 'dug par mthong ste/ de'i nang na spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba yang / spos 'tshong gi khyams shig na
225a3(phal chen): 'dug pa mthong nas/ spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba gang na ba der phyin te/ spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas mdun du 'dug ste/
225a4(phal chen): thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas
225a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal to/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag
225a6(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bos ni sems can thams cad kyi nad shes te/ rlung las gyur pa dang /
225a7(phal chen): mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / cha mnyam par 'khrugs pa dang / gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa dang / mi ma yin pa las gyur pa dang /
225b1(phal chen): dug 'thungs pa dang / sngags dang / mtshon dang / ro langs pa'i sbyor ba sna tshogs dang / me las gyur pa dang / chus bskyod pa las gyur pa dang / dngangs pa dang / 'jigs pa
225b2(phal chen): sna tshogs las gyur pa thams cad kyang shes so/ /nad de dag thams cad zhi bar bya ba'ang shes te/ 'di ltar snum par bya ba'ang rab tu shes so/ /skyug par bya ba dang / bkru
225b3(phal chen): ba dang / brta ba dang / gtar ba dang / sna'i cho ga dang / nyar dang / dugs dang / lums dang / byug pa dang / dug gso ba dang / 'byung po'i gdon med par bya ba dang /
225b4(phal chen): bcud dang / khrus dang / bzhag pa dang / bskyed pa dang / kha dog sbyang ba dang / nyam bstod pa'ang rab tu shes te/ rigs kyi bu/ phyogs bcu nas sems can gang ji
225b5(phal chen): snyed cig kho bo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyi nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar byed de/ nad sos nas kyang legs par bkru ba dang / lus la byug pas byugs pa byas nas
225b6(phal chen): ci tshul gyi rgyan gyis yan lag shin tu brgyan te/ ci rigs pa'i gos lus la bskon nas/ kha zas bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byas
225b7(phal chen): te| nor dpag tu med pas kyang phun sum tshogs par byed do/ /de'i 'og tu yang de dag la mi gtsang ba bstan cing 'dod chags spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /byams pa
226a1(phal chen): chen po yongs su bsngags shing zhe sdang spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /chos rnam par dbye ba'i bye brag bstan cing gti mug spang ba'i phyir
226a2(phal chen): chos ston to/ /khyad par khong du chud pa'i tshul gyi sgo yang dag par bstan cing cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa dang / nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi
226a3(phal chen): yon tan gyi chos dang ldan pa'i gtam thams cad yongs su brjod cing / byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal tshad gzung du med
226a4(phal chen): pa yongs su bstan cing / snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po bsags pa yang dag par bsngags shing /
226a5(phal chen): yon tan tshad med pa 'thob pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bar bya ba yongs su bstan cing / theg
226a6(phal chen): pa chen po'i smon lam 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / bskal pa thams cad du gnas par bya ba'i spyod pa'i dra ba shin tu rgyas
226a7(phal chen): par bshad cing / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa 'thob pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngags
226b1(phal chen): shing mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'thob pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
226b2(phal chen): brjod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su dag pa thams cad du 'gro ba thob pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod
226b3(phal chen): cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dang / sku mdog rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
226b4(phal chen): su brjod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thub par dka' ba yongs su ston to/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
226b5(phal chen): zil gyis ma non pa rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / chos kyi sku yongs su ston to/ /thabs mkhas pa'i pha
226b6(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i sku gtsang zhing rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
226b7(phal chen): su brjod cing / bskal pa thams cad kyi dus su 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang 'grogs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
227a1(phal chen): yongs su brjod cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mngon par 'byung ba'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /ye shes kyi pha rol
227a2(phal chen): tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par mdzad pa'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /mi dge ba'i chos thams
227a3(phal chen): cad las rnam par ldog pa yongs su brjod cing / blta na phul du bzang ba'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /de ltar de dag chos kyi sbyin pas yongs su bsdus te/ nor
227a4(phal chen): dang rin po che mtha' yas pa'i tshogs kyis nye bar brtan pa byas shing so sor 'gyed do/ /yang rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni spos dang / bdug spos dang / bsgo ba dang / bsku ba
227a5(phal chen): sbyor shes te/ 'di ltar spos kyi rgyal po gzhal du med pa la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po sin+d+hu wa ra la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po mi pham pa la sogs pa dang /
227a6(phal chen): spos kyi rgyal po rnam par gsal byed la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po nyi ma yod pa la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po dus dang mthun pa la sogs pa dang / spos kyi
227a7(phal chen): rgyal po sprul gyi snying po'i tsan dan la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po sprin gyi a ga ru la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po dbang po mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa spos
227b1(phal chen): sbyar ba thams cad kyang rab tu shes so/ /yang rigs kyi bu/ kho bos ni sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod
227b2(phal chen): pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs shes te/ rigs kyi bu/ sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod
227b3(phal chen): pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs 'dis kho bo'i bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ de'i mthus kho bo sems can thams cad yongs su skyob
227b4(phal chen): pa'i rgyan gyi sprin byin gyis rlob pa byed do/ 'di ltar spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi rgyan nas/ rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gror bya
227b5(phal chen): ba'i rgyan gyi sprin gyi bar du byin gyis rlob pa byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni nam de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya bar 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe/ kho bos sems
227b6(phal chen): can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs 'di las spos kyi mdzod kyi khang pa
227b7(phal chen): brtsegs pa'i sprin tshad gzung du med pa bton cing / phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi dbyings
228a1(phal chen): thams cad du spos thams cad kyi mdzod kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi rgyan byin gyis rlob pa byed do/ /chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sangs
228a2(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi khang pa'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi ra ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi ba gam gyi sprin gyi rgyan
228a3(phal chen): dang | spos kyi rta babs kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi skar khung gi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi pu shu'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi zla gam gyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi gdugs
228a4(phal chen): kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi lha'i ba dan gyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi bla re'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi gzugs kyi dra
228a5(phal chen): ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi 'od kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi snang ba dri ma med pa'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan byin gyis rlob
228a6(phal chen): ste| rigs kyi bu/ kho bos ni sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i spos
228a7(phal chen): kyi gzugs kyi chos kyi sgo 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po lta bur gyur pa blta na don yod pa/ 'grogs na don yod pa/ rjes su dran na
228b1(phal chen): don yod pa/ brtul zhugs rjes su byas na don yod pa/ ming thos na don yod pa/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam
228b2(phal chen): gyis sems can rnams ngan song gi rgyud las ldog par 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos la skabs bye ba thob par 'gyur ba/ mthong ba
228b3(phal chen): tsam gyis sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams 'jigs pa dang / 'khor ba'i lam gyi rgyud thams
228b4(phal chen): cad kyi 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyogs la rten par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba
228b5(phal chen): mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams rga shi'i grog po dang / g.yang sar mi ltung ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas mya
228b6(phal chen): ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba 'thob par 'gyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am yon tan brjod pa nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer
228b7(phal chen): ta la'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na rgyal po me zhes bya ba 'dug gi /de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab
229a1(phal chen): par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang / tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba'i rkang pa gnyis la
229a2(phal chen): spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun
229a3(phal chen): tu lta ba'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de dag rjes su dran par byed cing / dge ba'i bshes
229a4(phal chen): gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi sgo de dag rjes su dran par bya ba dang / bdag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ngo zhes rang gi sems yongs su tshim par bya ba dang /
229a5(phal chen): bdag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bsrungs pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro snyam du rnam par sems shing sems
229a6(phal chen): dga' ba ni rab tu thob/ sems dang ba dang / sems rab tu dga' ba dang / sems rangs pa dang / sems mgu ba dang / sems mos pa dang / sems kyi shugs dang / sems
229a7(phal chen): rnam par zhi ba dang / sems rgya chen po dang / sems rgyan dang / sems la thogs pa med pa dang / sems la sgrib pa med pa dang / sems rnam par phye ba dang / sems yang dag par
229b1(phal chen): gzhol ba dang / sems kyi dbang dang / sems dbang bsgyur ba dang / sems kyi chos khong du chud pa dang / sems kyis zhing rgyas par dgang ba dang / sems sangs rgyas mthong bas brgyan
229b2(phal chen): pa dang / sems stobs bcu'i yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba'ang thob nas/ de mthar gyis ljongs nas ljongs dang / grong nas grong dang / yul nas yul du tshol zhing / grong khyer
229b3(phal chen): ta la'i rgyal mtshan gang na ba der phyin te/ rgyal po me gang na bzhugs zhes dris na/ de la 'gro ba gzhan dag gis 'di skad du bstan te/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di re/ rgyal po me ni/ rgyal po'i
229b4(phal chen): don bsgrub pa'i phyir seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs shing rgyal po'i 'phrin las mdzad do/ /khams rab tu skyong ngo / /chad pas gcad par 'os pa ni chad pas gcod do/ /bya dgas bsdu
229b5(phal chen): bar 'os pa ni/ bya dgas sdud do/ /g.yon yod pa rnams la ni gyod rmod do/ /rtsod pa rnams kyi zhal che ni yongs su gcod do/ /dma' ba rnams ni dbugs 'byin to/ /dregs pa rnams ni/
229b6(phal chen): 'dul ba mdzad do/ /srog gcod pa las ni rnam par zlog go /ma byin par len pa dang ni rnam par 'byed pa mdzad do/ /gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba la mngon par zhen pa ni rnam par
229b7(phal chen): zhi bar mdzad do/ /brdzun du smra ba las ni phyir zlog pa mdzad de/ /phra ma'i tshig dang ni rnam par dbral bar mdzad do/ /zhe gcod pa'i ngag ni rgyun gcod pa mdzad do/ /tshig kyal ba las ni yongs
230a1(phal chen): su glon no/ /chags sems dang ni mi 'dre bar mdzad do/ /gnod sems dang ni rgyang sring ngo / /log par lta ba ni 'dre ba med par mdzad do/ /de nas tshong dpon
230a2(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzang rgyal po me gang na ba der phyin na/ des mthong ba/ rgyal po me de ni rin po che'i seng ge'i khri chen po rdo rje mthu bo che'i nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ rin po che 'od gsal
230a3(phal chen): ba rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa las byas pa'i rkang pa bkye ba/ rin po che gcig ma yin pas legs par spras shing brgyan pas yid du 'ong ba'i lhun dang ldan pa/ gser gyi lcag/
230a4(phal chen): bod kyi dra bas legs par blas shing chub par btags pa/ nor bu rin po che du ma'i sgron mas shin tu snang bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po las byas pa'i pad+mo'i snying
230a5(phal chen): po can lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan rim pa du mar bting ba/ gam yo nas lha rdzas kyi spos sna tshogs kyi bdug spos kyis shin tu bdug pa/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba brgya stong gis
230a6(phal chen): mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i ba dan brgya phrag rnam par bres pas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i me tog gi chun po sna tshogs kyi lda ldi rab tu bkye bas shin tu mdzes par byas pa/
230a7(phal chen): steng nas lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i bla re sna tshogs bres pa zhig la 'dug cing / de ni gzhon zhing dar la bab pa gzugs mdzes shing blta na yid du 'ong ba/ skra mthon mthing g.yas
230b1(phal chen): phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan pa/ mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ gtsug tor gyi spyi bo can/ dpral ba yangs pa/ mig dkar nag 'byes shing ring la/ rdzi ma ba'i rdzi ma ltar 'dug pa/
230b2(phal chen): sna'i dbyibs legs shing bzang la/ ran par mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ mchu mtshal ltar mdog bzang zhing shin tu legs pa dang ldan pa/ so mnyam zhing thags bzang la shin tu dkar
230b3(phal chen): ba bzhi bcu tshang ba dang ldan pa/ 'gram pa'i lha nga seng ge'i 'gram pa ltar 'dug pa/ mkhur ba shas rgyas pa/ smin tshugs gzhu ltar 'dug cing ring la shin tu mdzes pa/ mdzod
230b4(phal chen): spu zla ba'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i thig le can/ rna shal ring zhing lhod par 'phyang ba/ zla ba nya ba ltar bzhin mdangs dang ldan zhing bzang pa/ mgul zlum zhing dung ltar mdzes
230b5(phal chen): pa| snying ga dpal gyi be'us brgyan pa/ ro stod seng ge'i stod ltar 'dug pa/ thal gong shin tu rgyas pa/ dpung mgo'i lhun legs shing zlum pa/ lag pa ring ba/ dra bar 'brel ba'i sor
230b6(phal chen): mo can/ rkang lag 'khor los brgyan pa/ rkang lag 'jam zhing gzhon la shas rgyas pa/ bdun shin tu mtho ba/ rked pa rdo rje ltar 'dug pa/ lus che zhing drang ba/ bral zlum pa/ pho mtshan
230b7(phal chen): gsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug pa/ byin pa ri dwags e na ya'i byin pa ltar 'dug pa/ sor mo ring ba/ rkang pa'i rting pa yangs pa/ 'od 'dom gang ba dang ldan pa/ mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa/
231a1(phal chen): ba spu re re nas g.yas phyogs gyen du 'khyil ba/ shing n+ya gro ha'i rgyal po ltar chu zheng gab pa/ lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos shin tu brgyan pa/
231a2(phal chen): mgo la nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi cod pan thogs pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las byas pa'i dpral ba'i rgyan zla gam gyis mdzes par brgyan pa/ rna ba las rin po che in+d+ra nI
231a3(phal chen): la'i rna cha dri ma med pa 'phyang ba/ nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa'i se mo do'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pas/ dri ma med pa'i ro stod rgyas pa dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu dam pa'i
231a4(phal chen): dpung rgyan dang / gdu bus lag pa mdzes par brgyan pa zhig ste/ rin po che'i gdugs chen po rin po che'i bai DUR+ya dri ma med pa'i yu ba can/ rin po che shar bu brgya phrag bcus rnam
231a5(phal chen): par phye ba/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi bla gab can/ nor bu rin po che sgra snang ba rnam par dag pa'i snying po can/ rin po che'i dril bu'i phreng ba las sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba/
231a6(phal chen): nor bu rin po che'i 'od phyogs kun tu 'phro ba can drung nas bzung zhing bsgreng ba/ rgyal po'i gzi brjid dang dbang chen po la gnas pa/ srid la gzhan gyi 'khor gyis gco ba med
231a7(phal chen): pa| dgra'i 'jigs pa dang bral pa'i dbang phyug dang ldan par 'dug pa mthong ngo / /de'i 'khor kun nas kyang blon po stong phrag bcu tshogs shing rgyal po'i dgos pa sgrub pa la brtson/
231b1(phal chen): pa mthong ngo / /de'i mdun na chad pas gcod pa'i mi sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma lta bu/ gshin rje'i g.yog 'khor lta bu/ 'jigs 'jigs lta'i gos gyon pa/ gtum zhing
231b2(phal chen): mi bzad la 'jigs pa chen po bskyed pa/ mig dmar ba/ so gtsigs pa/ gdong gi gnyer ma gsum khro gnyer du bsdus pa/ ral gri dang / sta re dang / lcags kyi changs mdung dang /
231b3(phal chen): mda' dang / ber ga dang / mdung la sogs pa'i mtshon cha dang / lag cha thogs pa/ lus dang bzhin gyi dbyibs mi sdug cing 'jigs su rung ba/ sprin nag po ltar 'dug pa/ mi snyan
231b4(phal chen): cing brlang la sdang ba'i sgra drag po 'byin pa/ gzi blta bar dka' ba 'jigs pa chen po bskyed pa/ srog chags brgya phrag stong gi snying 'gems par byed pa de lta bu dag chad pas gcad
231b5(phal chen): par 'os pa'i sems can chad pas gcod pa la brtson pa mthong ngo / /de na srog chags rku ba/ gzhan gyi nor la 'phrog pa/ sems can gyi longs spyod chud gson pa/ lam
231b6(phal chen): sgugs shing 'phrog pa/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / lhas la mes gtong ba/ grong du chom po byed pa/ khyim phugs 'debs pa/ sdig sdig ltar byed pa/ dug
231b7(phal chen): ldud pa/ bkrugs ma byed pa/ thong mi byed pa/ byi bo byed pa/ log par zhugs pa/ gnod par sems pa/ 'dod chen che ba/ sdig pa sna tshogs kyi las mi bzad pa byed pa
232a1(phal chen): brgya stong mang po bcing ba dam po lngas bcings shing / rgyal po me'i drung du khrid pa dag kyang mthong ngo / /de dag la'ang rgyal po mes ci rigs par chad
232a2(phal chen): pas gcad par gyur pa mthong ngo / /des de na rgyal po mes bsgo zhing / la la ni rkang lag bcad/ la la ni rna ba dang sna bcad/ la ni mig phyung / la la ni yan lag dang
232a3(phal chen): nying lag dang mgo bcad/ la la ni lus thams cad mes btang / la la ni ba tsha'i chu khol mas lus la gtor cing / pags pa brnyil ba la sogs pa de lta bu'i chad pa sna
232a4(phal chen): tshogs du ma mi bzad pa/ drag pa/ brlang ba/ yid du mi 'ong ba/ srog 'phrog pa dag kyang byed par mthong ngo / /gsad pa'i sa de na yang / gsang ba'i rkang lag dang / rna ba
232a5(phal chen): dang | mig dang / sna dang / mgo dang / yan lag dang / nying lag gi phung po ri tsam du spungs pa mthong ngo / /khrag gi mtsho dpag tshad gsum tsam du zabs su zab la chu zheng
232a6(phal chen): du dpag tshad du ma yod pa yang mthong ngo / /de na shi ba'i keng rus yan lag dang / nying lag dang / mgo dang bral ba brgya stong du ma la/ spyang ki dang / wa dang / khyi dang / bya rog dang / bya
232a7(phal chen): rgod dang / khra dang / bya ku ra ra mang pos gang ste/ 'drad cing 'thog pa mthong ngo / /de la'ang la la ni kha dog gyur te/ sngon por gyur pa tsam/ la la ni rangs pa tsam/ la
232b1(phal chen): la ni bam pa tsam/ la la ni 'bu zhugs pa tsam du gyur to/ shin tu skyi g.ya' zhing 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo / /gsad pa de dag gsod pa'i tshe/ mi sdug pa cho dgur
232b2(phal chen): byas pas na/ 'jigs 'jigs skad dang / snying rje rje skad du sgra 'byin cing / cho nges 'debs pa'i sgra chen po thos nas kyi g.ya' zhing mi dga' ba chen po bskyed pa/ sems can dmyal
232b3(phal chen): ba chen po ris gzhom pa'i sgra lta bu yang thos so/ /des de ltar kha btags te brdungs pa dang / shin tu 'jigs pa'i drag shul mthong nas 'di snyam du gyur to/ /bdag ni sems can thams
232b4(phal chen): cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol zhing 'bad de/ dge ba'i bshes
232b5(phal chen): gnyen rnams la dge ba ni ci zhig bgyi/ mi dge ba ni gang zhig spang zhes 'dri 'dri na/ rgyal po me 'di la ni dge ba'i chos kyang med de/ kha na ma tho ba chen po'i las la spyod pa/
232b6(phal chen): yid kyi yongs su rtog pa shin tu gtum pa dang ldan pa/ sems can pha rol gyi srog gcad pa la zhugs pa/ sems can pha rol shin tu mnar ba la brtson pa/ tshe phyi ma la lta ba med
232b7(phal chen): pa| ngan song gi g.yang sa'i gad kha na 'dug pa zhig na/ 'di las ci byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang thob par 'gyur ram snyam ste/ de de ltar sems shing yid la byed de/ sems
233a1(phal chen): can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la mngon par brtson pa/ snying rje rgya chen po skyes pa'i sems dang ldan pa de la/ steng gi nam mkha'i dbyings las lha
233a2(phal chen): mang pos bos pa/ rigs kyi bu/ drang srong rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag tu bya ba mi dran nam/ des gyen du nam mkha'i dbyings la
233a3(phal chen): bltas nas dran no zhes brjod do/ /lha rnams kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la de ltar the tshom ma skyed cig /rigs kyi bu/ dge
233a4(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni yang dag pa ma nor bar ston gyi/ log pa ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pas spyod pa'i ye shes ni
233a5(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sems can yongs su sdud pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sems can
233a6(phal chen): tshar gcod pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sems can gzengs bstod pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sems can yongs su spyod pa'i ye shes bsam
233a7(phal chen): gyis mi khyab bo/ /sems can yongs su skyong ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sems can 'dzud pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sems can yongs su smin
233b1(phal chen): par byed pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sems can 'dul ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /song / rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dris shig
233b2(phal chen): ces nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis lha'i ngag mnyan te/ rgyal po me gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po me'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ rgyal po me
233b3(phal chen): la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag
233b4(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/
233b5(phal chen): 'phags pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang
233b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ /de nas rgyal po mes rgyal po'i bya ba byas te/ seng ge'i khri las
233b7(phal chen): langs nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gi lag pa g.yas pa nas bzung ste/ rgyal po'i pho brang ta la'i rgyal mtshan du khrid do/ /de mthar gyis rang gi gnas su phyin nas/ tshong
234a1(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzang btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du khrid de/ khri la bzhag nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ nga'i khyim dang longs
234a2(phal chen): spyod la ltos zhes nas/ des bltas na/ khyim de rgya che zhing yangs la/ rin po che bdun gyi ra bas yongs su bskor ba/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pas shin tu
234a3(phal chen): mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa brgya stong du mas rab tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od shin tu 'bar bas gzi brjid rab tu 'bar
234a4(phal chen): byas pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam pa tha dad par rnam par phye zhing bris pas rnam par mdzes par byas pa/ mu tig dmar po'i ka ba bkye ba/ nang du seng ge'i khri mu sa ra
234a5(phal chen): ga ba las byas pa/ rin po che brgya stong du mas rnam pa sna tshogs su brgyan pa shin tu bshams pa/ nor bu rin po che sgra snang ba'i seng ge'i rgyal mtshan shin tu bsgreng ba/ steng nas
234a6(phal chen): nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i bla re bres pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs grangs med pas rab tu
234a7(phal chen): brgyan pa'i ba gam gyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ asma gar+b+ha las byas pa'i rdzing chu bsil bas gang ba dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gis 'khor bar 'dug par mthong ngo / /
234b1(phal chen): de'i 'khor bud med bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa/ kha dog rgyas pa bzang ba'i phul du bya ba dang ldan pa/ sgyu rtsal thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas pa/ sngon du ldang ba/
234b2(phal chen): phyi nas nyal ba/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ ci bsgo ba bzhin du byed cing ngag nyan pa bye ba phrag bcu yang 'khod par mthong ngo / /de nas rgyal po mes/ tshong dpon gyi bu
234b3(phal chen): nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji snyam du sems/ cig sdig pa byed pa rnams la las kyi rnam par smin pa mngon par grub pa 'di lta bu yod dam/
234b4(phal chen): lus phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dam/ 'khor phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dam/ skyid pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dam/ dbang phyug dang dbang
234b5(phal chen): chen po thob pa phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dam/ smras pa/ 'phags pa/ de lta bu ni ma mchis so/ /des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
234b6(phal chen): thar pa sgyu ma'i rnam pa thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ nga'i yul na gnas pa'i sems can 'di dag kyang / phal cher srog gcod pa byed pa/ ma byin par len pa/ 'dod pas log
234b7(phal chen): par g.yem pa/ brdzun du smra ba/ phra ma can/ tshig brlang por smra ba/ byung rgyal du brjod pa/ chags sems dang ldan pa/ gnod sems can/ log par lta ba/ sdig pa'i las
235a1(phal chen): byed pa/ khro zhing gtum pa/ bab rgyal can mi dge ba'i las kyi bya ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa dag ste/ de dag ni rnam pa gzhan gyis sdig pa'i spyod
235a2(phal chen): pa las bzlog pa dang / dgag pa dang bstan par mi nus te/ de ltar/ rigs kyi bu/ nga ni sems can 'di dag gdul ba dang / yongs su smin par bya ba dang / shin tu dul
235a3(phal chen): bar bya ba dang / phan pa la dgod par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po mdun du byas te/ gsod pa'i gshed ma sprul pa rnams bsad pa'i mir sprul pa rnams la gsod du gzud
235a4(phal chen): pa dang / chad pas gcod pa'i mi sprul pa rnams/ mi dge ba'i las kyi lam la spyod par sprul pa'i mi rnams la chad pa sna tshogs kyis gcod du gzud pa dang / rkang lag dang /
235a5(phal chen): sna dang / rna ba dang / yan lag dang / nying lag dang / mgo bcad pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyams su tshor bar gyur pa lta bu dag kyang yongs su ston pa
235a6(phal chen): byed de/ de mthong nas nga'i khams na gnas pa'i sems can de dag nyes pa gtong zhing skyo ba'i shugs thob par 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa skye zhing bag tsha ba skye bar 'gyur
235a7(phal chen): ro| |de dag sdig pa'i las byed pa rnams gtong zhing bag byed par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar nga ni sems can 'di dag thabs des/ nyes pa gtong zhing / 'jigs
235b1(phal chen): pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / skyo ba'i yid dang ldan par shes nas/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam las bzlog ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par byas nas/ dga' zhing
235b2(phal chen): bde ba'i mthar phyin pa sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bde ba la dgod pa byed kyi/ rigs kyi bu/ nga ni lus dang ngag gam/ yid kyis kyang
235b3(phal chen): sems can su la'ang co mi 'dri/ mtho mi 'tsham mo/ /rigs kyi bu/ nga ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal gyis bgrings shes pa ste/ byol song gi skye gnas glen
235b4(phal chen): pa'i khams su gtogs pa las kyang / chung ngu na rtswa'i rtse mos blta ba'i srog chags phra'u 'ga' la yang sems bskyed pa gcig tsam du yang sdug bsngal bar bya bar mi
235b5(phal chen): dga' na/ zhing du gyur cing dge ba'i las kyi lam bskyed par nus pa'i mi lta zhig la ci smos/ rigs kyi bu/ nga ni rmi lam na yang mi dge ba'i chos yongs su rgyu ba mi skyed na/
235b6(phal chen): ched du bsams te lta smos re skan/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar ngas ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgyu ma'i rnam pa 'di shes par zad na/ ngas byang chub sems dpa'i mi skye ba'i
235b7(phal chen): chos kyi bzod pa thob pa/ srid pa dang lam gyi rgyud thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam par khong du chud pa/ sprul pa lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas byung ba gzugs brnyan lta bu'i
236a1(phal chen): 'jig rten thams cad rnam par rig pa/ rmi lam lta bu'i chos nyid khong du chud pa/ thogs pa med pa'i sgo'i chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la rjes
236a2(phal chen): su zhugs pa/ mig 'phrul lta bu'i spyod pa'i dra ba rtogs par gyur pa/ ye shes bsgribs pa med pa'i spyod yul gyi yul dang ldan pa/ kun tu yang dag par gzhol ba'i
236a3(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin gyi lam gyis byung ba/ glong kun tu 'khyil pa'i rgyud kyi gzugs la dbang bsgyur ba/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gyi yul khong du chud pa rnams kyi spyod yul shes
236a4(phal chen): pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na rgyal po 'od chen po zhes
236a5(phal chen): bya ba 'dug gi / de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas
236a6(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ rgyal po me'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ rgyal po me la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ yang
236a7(phal chen): dang yang bltas nas/ rgyal po me'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang ye shes sgyu ma de rjes su dran par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
236b1(phal chen): thar pa sgyu ma'i rnam pa de la bsam pa dang / chos nyid sgyu ma'i rnam pa de la rab tu brtag pa dang / las kyi sgyu ma mnyam pa de khong du chud par bya ba dang / chos kyi sgyu ma mnyam pa de
236b2(phal chen): la rjes su bsam pa dang / chos kyis yongs su smin par bya ba'i sprul pa mnyam pa de khong du chud par bya ba dang / ye shes las byung ba'i snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i rjes
236b3(phal chen): su 'brang bar bya ba dang / smon lam gyi sgyu ma'i rnam pa mtha' yas pa mngon par bsgrub pa de mngon par bsgrub par bya ba dang / spyod pa sprul pa'i chos nyid chags pa med pa de
236b4(phal chen): rnam par sbyang bar bya ba dang / dus gsum sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i mtshan nyid de yang rnam par dbye bar byed cing / mthar gyis yul nas yul du dri ba dang / kun du btsal ba dang / rjes
236b5(phal chen): su rnam par blta ba byed cing / phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang / lam dang / sman ljongs dang / thang dang / thag thug dang / khal kol dang / ri dang / ri sul dang / grong
236b6(phal chen): dang | grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i gnas thams cad du yongs su skyo ba med pa'i sems dang / lus la dub pa med par tshol tshol
236b7(phal chen): te| grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po'i nyen kor zhig tu phyin nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po gang na bzhugs zhes dris na/ de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'de re/ 'di
237a1(phal chen): ni grong khyer 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yin te/ 'di na rgyal po 'od chen po bzhugs so zhes nas/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang / grong khyer chen po
237a2(phal chen): 'od bzang po gang na ba der phyin nas/ grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/
237a3(phal chen): 'di snyam du bsams so/ /'di na bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen bzhugs pa blta ste/ de ring ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen de yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de las byang chub sems
237a4(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon
237a5(phal chen): tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
237a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la rnam par spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par rol pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang
237a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i brtsams pa chen po mthar dbyung ba rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di thos par 'gyur ro zhes de ltar bsam pa yid la byed cing / grong khyer chen po
237b1(phal chen): 'od bzang po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po de la bstas na/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang /
237b2(phal chen): asma gar b+ha dang / mus ra gal pa dang / rin po che 'di bdun gyis shin tu bzang zhing blta na mdzes pa/ rin po che'i 'obs zabs su zab pa/ chus gang ba/ gzhi gser gyi gram
237b3(phal chen): pas gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / pun da ri kas kun nas yog pa/ dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi 'dam dang / lu mas 'khor ba bdun
237b4(phal chen): gyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyi ta la'i phreng ba'i rim pa bdun gyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba/ rdo rje rin po che'i ra ba bdun gyis kun nas yongs su
237b5(phal chen): bskor ba 'di lta ste/ seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje gzhan gyis thub pa med pa'i ra ba dang / 'bug pa'i ngang tshul gyi rdo rje'i ra ba dang / thub par dka' ba'i ngang
237b6(phal chen): tshul gyi rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje brtan pa chags pa med pa'i ra ba dang / rdo rje'i 'od zer dra ba'i snying po'i ra ba dang / rdul dang bral ba'i kha dog gi rgyan gyi rdo rje'i ra bas yongs su
237b7(phal chen): bskor ba ste/ rdo rje rin po che'i ra ba de dag thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che grangs med pas yongs su spras pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi lan kan dang / ba so mdzes par
238a1(phal chen): bkye ba/ dngul rin po che'i ba so'i phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa/ rin po che bai DUR+ya'i ba so'i phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa/ rin po che shel gyi
238a2(phal chen): ba so'i phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i byi ru'i ba so'i phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa/ mu tig dmar po'i ba so'i phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa/ mu tig rin po che'i rgya
238a3(phal chen): mtsho'i snying po'i ba so'i phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa ste/ grong khyer chen po de'i sgo chen po brgyad kyi bar bar na'ang dpag tshad bcu bcu yod do/ /sgo de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun
238a4(phal chen): las sna tshogs mdzes par byas pa ste/ blta na yid du 'ong ba'o/ /grong khyer chen po de ni de ltar rgya che zhing yangs la/ yan lag rnam pa brgyad du rnam par phye ba/ bai DUR+ya
238a5(phal chen): sngon po'i sa la gnas pa ste/ grong khyer chen po de'i nang na yang srang chen po bye ba phrag bcu yod de/ srang re re'i glo gnyis nas kyang khyim chen po brgya phrag stong stong mkhos
238a6(phal chen): legs par 'grigs pa ste/ kun kyang rin po che sna tshogs las byas pa dag go /rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa dag go /rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal
238a7(phal chen): mtshan bsgreng ba dang / ba dan che phra dang ldan pa dag go /yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dag go /sems can khrag khrig du ma gnas pa dag go /grong khyer chen po de
238b1(phal chen): yang nor bu rin po che kha dog grangs med pa'i khang pas mdzes par byas pa ste/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che bai DUR+ya'i dra bas kun nas khebs pa/
238b2(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/ /dngul gyi khang pa brtsegs pa la mu tig dmar po'i dra bas kun nas khebs pa/ bsam gyis
238b3(phal chen): mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/ /bai DUR+ya'i khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che mdzod sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas khebs pa/ bsam gyis mi
238b4(phal chen): khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/ /shel gyi khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che'i rgyal po snying po yangs pa'i dra bas kun nas khebs pa/ bsam
238b5(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/ /nor bu rin po che 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che'i nyi ma'i snying po'i dra bas
238b6(phal chen): kun nas khebs pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/ /rin po che in+d+ra nI la'i khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che dpal
238b7(phal chen): gyi 'od zer gyi dra bas kun nas khebs pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/ /rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i khang pa
239a1(phal chen): brtsegs pa la rin po che'i rgyal po skar ma'i 'od zer gyi dra bas kun nas khebs pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa
239a2(phal chen): grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/ /rin po che rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che'i rgyal po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i dra bas kun nas khebs pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
239a3(phal chen): rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/ /dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi khang pa brtsegs pa la lha rdzas kyi me tog mnad ra ba'i dra bas kun nas
239a4(phal chen): khebs pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/ /spos kyi rgyal po mtshungs pa med pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa la lha rdzas kyi
239a5(phal chen): me tog sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas khebs pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/ /rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs
239a6(phal chen): pa de dag re re zhing yang / rin po che'i lan kan du mas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i stegs bu rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba/ rin po che ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis
239a7(phal chen): bskor bar dkrigs pa'o/ /rin po che'i lan kan de dag dang / rin po che'i ta la de dag thams cad du'ang / phan tshun rin po che'i srad bus sbrel ba'o/ /rin po
239b1(phal chen): che'i srad bu de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi dril gyi phreng bas brgyan pa'o/ /gser gyi dril gyi phreng ba de dag thams cad kyang rin po che'i chun po'i lda ldi sna tshogs kyi rnam par bres
239b2(phal chen): shing sbrel ba'o/ /rin po che'i chun po'i lda ldi de dag thams cad las kyang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba mngon par dpyangs pa de dag ste/ de ltar grong khyer chen po de thams
239b3(phal chen): cad ni/ nor bu rin po che'i dra ba grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/ /rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/ /lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dra ba grangs
239b4(phal chen): med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/ /lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs kyi dra ba grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/ /rin po che'i 'bru'i dra ba grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/ /rdo rje'i
239b5(phal chen): bla re grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/ /rin po che'i bla re grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/ /rin po che'i gdugs kyi bla re grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/ /rin
239b6(phal chen): po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i bla re grangs med pa'i kun nas khebs pa'o/ /gos rin po che'i bla re grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/ /me tog gi phreng ba'i bla re grangs med pas
239b7(phal chen): kun nas khebs pa'o/ /rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan sna tshogs btsugs shing bsgreng ba ste/ grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po de'i dbus su/ rgyal po 'od chen po bzhugs
240a1(phal chen): pa'i pho brang brtsegs pa 'khor kun tu dpag tshad bzhi yod pa ste/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'o/ /rin po che sna tshogs kyi stegs bu rim pa bdun
240a2(phal chen): gyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /rin po che'i dril bu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan par 'khrol ba'i dra ba rim pa bdun gyi sgra kun nas 'byung ba'o/ /rin po che sna bdun gyi ta la'i phreng ba rim pa
240a3(phal chen): bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba'o/ /rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i rgyan brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o/ /rdzing rin po che sna tshogs du ma las byas pa
240a4(phal chen): gser gyi gram pa kun du bkram pa yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / me tog pun da ri kas chu'i steng kun
240a5(phal chen): du yog pa/ rin po che'i me tog dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ phyogs bzhi nas rin po che'i pha gus brtsigs pa'i them skas rnam par bkye ba can gyis
240a6(phal chen): shin tu mdzes par byas pa dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byin pa'i bya bran sna tshogs kyi sgra shin tu 'byung ba yod pa/ lha'i dbang po'i pho brang dang 'gran pa
240a7(phal chen): ste| de'i dbus na rin po che 'gro ba la snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa shin tu bzang la mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba/ rin po che grangs med pa'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas gya nom par
240b1(phal chen): brgyan pa yod de/ de'i nang na rgyal po 'od chen po'i dam pa'i chos gces pa'i dbyig tu bya ba bzhugs so/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang rin po che'i 'obs de dag la ni/ chags
240b2(phal chen): pa'i sems med/ rin po che'i ra ba de dag la ni/ ngo mtshar du 'dzin pa'i yid med/ rin po che ta la phreng ba de dag la ni 'dod cing chags pa med/ rin po che'i dril gyi dra ba'i sgra la ni ro
240b3(phal chen): myong bar byed pa med/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra dang / glu bro snyan pa'i dbyangs la ni chags pa'i sems med/ rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa
240b4(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi longs spyod ni yid la bya ba med par shin tu dga' bar gyur pa'i skyes pa dang / bud med kyi tshogs kyi chos kyi dga' ba'i mos pas shin tu dga' zhing / gzugs dang /
240b5(phal chen): sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg la dga' bas dben pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos nges par brtag pa la shin tu mos pa/ sems can gang dang phrad kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen
240b6(phal chen): rtag tu 'dri zhing mthar gyis grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i drung zhig tu phyin nas kun du bltas na/ grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i dbus kyi mchod rten gyi khang pa nas ha cang yang
240b7(phal chen): mi ring ba zhig na/ rgya chen po dang ldan pa khri rin po che bai DUR+ya sngon po'i rkang pa bkye ba bai DUR+ya dkar po'i seng ges blangs pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi lcag pod kyis dra ba legs par
241a1(phal chen): btags pa/ lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i rin po che'i stan sna tshogs bting ba/ rin po che'i 'bru grangs med pas rnam par brgyan pa/ nor bu
241a2(phal chen): rin po che'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dra ba kun nas khebs pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi snam bu la lha rdzas rin po che sna tshogs kyi gur shin tu spa bar dgye ba'i
241a3(phal chen): gnam yol bres pa/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i pad+mo'i snying po dang ldan pa/ de lta bu'i chos kyi khri chen po la rgyal po 'od chen po mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
241a4(phal chen): gnyis kyis lus shin tu brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs brgyad cu tham pas lus shin tu mdzes pa/ gser gyi ri bo ltar rin po che sna tshogs rnam par bkod pas rnam
241a5(phal chen): par mdzes pa/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar gzi brjid rab tu 'bar ba/ zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor ltar blta na bzang ba/ tshangs pa ltar tshangs pa'i 'khor gyi nang na
241a6(phal chen): rnam par mdzes pa/ rgya mtsho ltar zab pa'i chos dang yon tan mtha' yas pa'i rin po che'i tshogs dang ldan pa/ sprin chen po ltar chos kyi rang bzhin gyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa/ nam
241a7(phal chen): mkha' ltar chos kyi tshul gyi skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ ri rab ltar kha dog bzhi po'i sems can rgya mtsho'i sems la gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba/ rin po che'i gling
