241b1(phal chen): ltar gzhi ye shes sna tshogs rin po ches yongs su gang ba de skyil mo krung du 'dug pa mthong ngo / /de'i mdun na yang gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+ya dang /
241b2(phal chen): dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul rin po che'i phung po dang / lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog sna tshogs kyi phung po dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs
241b3(phal chen): kyi phung po dang / kha zas dang / spyan gzigs sna tshogs kyi phung po dang / zhim po'i mchog khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phung po dgod pa dang / dngar ba'i thabs sna
241b4(phal chen): tshogs kyi yul du bkod pa mthong ngo / /lha rdzas kyi shing rta rin po che bye ba brgya stong du ma dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan bye ba brgya stong du ma dang / lha rdzas kyi spos kyi rnam pa bye ba brgya stong
241b5(phal chen): du ma dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad kyi phung po du ma dang / yo byad kyi khyad par thams cad kyi phung po spyad du rung zhing kha na ma tho ba med pa mang po sems can rnams ci dga' bar
241b6(phal chen): spyod du gzud pa'i phyir bshams te bkod pa dang / ba bzhon gser gyi ru mig can stong phrag du ma 'o ma bres 'jal ba mang po yang sems can phongs pa rnams yongs su bsdu ba'i
241b7(phal chen): phyir bkod pa mthong ngo / /bu mo rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bzhin bzang ba shin tu mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par klubs pa/ lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che
242a1(phal chen): gyon pa/ lha rdzas kyi tsan dan sprul gyi snying pos lus byug pa/ sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi'i tshul shes pa/ 'dod pa'i spyod pa dang / cho ga thams cad
242a2(phal chen): la mkhas pa dag kyang bsags shing bkod par mthong ngo / /de'i mdun na ji lta ba de bzhin du/ sems can rnams yongs su bsdu ba dang / sems can rnams yongs su gzung
242a3(phal chen): ba dang / sems can rnams dga' ba bskyed pa dang / sems can rnams spro ba bskyed pa dang / sems can rnams kyi yid dang bar bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi sems
242a4(phal chen): shin tu bde bar bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rnam par zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can rnams chos kyi rang bzhin gyi don la yongs su dgod pa dang / sems
242a5(phal chen): can rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du don mnyam par bya ba dang / sems can rnams gzhan la 'khu ba rnam par bzlog par bya ba dang / lus dang ngag gis ngan du spyod pa
242a6(phal chen): thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can rnams kyi lta ba'i zug rngu yang dag par dbyung ba dang / sems can rnams kyi lam yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir/ srang dang / lam
242a7(phal chen): gyi bzhi mdo dang / lam gyi sum mdo dang / sgo dang / khyams dag na'ang de bzhin te/ srang re re'i ngos g.yas g.yon nas kyang / stegs bu bye ba nyi shu tsam la yo byad
242b1(phal chen): thams cad yongs su spungs te bkod pa mthong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ rgyal po 'od chen po la lus thams cad kyis phab nas phyag byas te/ rgyal po 'od chen
242b2(phal chen): po la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par
242b3(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/
242b4(phal chen): 'phags pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang
242b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
242b6(phal chen): pa byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byams pa chen po'i rgyal
242b7(phal chen): mtshan 'di yang sangs rgyas brgya phrag du ma dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag du ma dang / sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag du ma dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma nas/
243a1(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yongs su dris so/ /yongs su zhus so/ /rnam par sbyangs
243a2(phal chen): so| |yongs su sbyangs so/ /rnam par bkod do/ /rnam par bltas so/ /rnam par spyod do/ /rjes su btsal to/ /yongs su brtags so/ /rnam par bris so/ /rgya cher byas
243a3(phal chen): so| |rigs kyi bu/ de ltar nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan 'di la gnas shing / chos dang mthun par khams skyong zhing ston to/ /chos
243a4(phal chen): dang mthun par 'jig rten la phan par byed do/ /chos dang mthun par 'jig rten na rjes su spyod do/ /chos dang mthun par sems can bcos par byed do/ /chos dang mthun
243a5(phal chen): par sems can rnams la nan tan byed do/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor la sems can rnams yongs su 'dzud do/ /chos kyi tshul sems can rnams la nye bar bsgrub bo/ /chos
243a6(phal chen): dang mthun par sems can rnams la yongs su bsgo ba byed do/ /chos kyi nan tan la sems can rnams yongs su sbyor ro/ /chos kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa la sems
243a7(phal chen): can rnams rab tu 'god do/ /byams pa'i sems dang / byams pa chen po'i dbang dang / byams pa'i stobs dang / phan pa'i sems dang / bde ba'i sems dang / snying
243b1(phal chen): rje'i sems dang / phan 'dogs pa'i sems dang / yongs su bsrung ba'i sems dang / sems can yongs su 'dzin pa mi gtong ba'i sems dang / sdug bsngal thams
243b2(phal chen): cad rnam par bzlog pa'i smon lam rgyun mi gcod pa'i sems dang / bde ba'i mthar phyin pa la rab tu 'god par yang dag par spyod pa rgyun mi gcod pa la sems can
243b3(phal chen): rnams rab tu 'god do/ /bag yangs kyi bde ba yang dag par bskyed nas/ sems can de dag gi lus kyang shin tu bde bar byed do/ /de dag gi 'khor ba'i bde ba la zhen
243b4(phal chen): pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyang rnam par bzlog pa byed do/ /de dag gi sems kyi rgyun kyang chos kyi dga' ba dang / mos pa la yongs su gzhol bar byed do/ /nyon mongs pa'i dri ma
243b5(phal chen): thams cad las rnam par sbyong bar byed do/ /mi dge ba'i chos thams cad las yongs su sbyang bar byed do/ /'khor ba'i rgyun las rnam par bzlog pa byed do/ /chos kyi dbyings
243b6(phal chen): kyi tshul rgya mtsho la yongs su gzud pa byed do/ /de dag gi srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud du skye ba thams cad rgyun gcad pa'i phyir sems kyi ma rig pa yongs su bsreg pa byed do/ /thams
243b7(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir de dag gi sems kyi myu gu yongs su bskyed do/ /mi 'phrogs pa'i dad pa'i stobs yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir de dag gi sems
244a1(phal chen): kyi rgya mtsho yang rab tu dang bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan la gnas
244a2(phal chen): te| chos dang mthun par 'jig rten skyong zhing ston te/ rigs kyi bu/ nga'i khams na gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni ngas 'jigs shing dngang ba'am/ bag tsha zhing skyi
244a3(phal chen): g.ya' ba med de/ rigs kyi bu/ sems can gang phongs shing yo byad sna tshogs kyis brel ba/ bza' ba 'dod pa'am/ btung ba 'dod pa'am/ gos 'dod pa nas/
244a4(phal chen): yo byad sna tshogs thams cad gang 'dod kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad nga'i drung du 'ong ngo / /de dag la'ang ngas snga nas bsham bsham pa'i mdzod sgo phye zhing ci 'dod pa
244a5(phal chen): khyer cig ces bstabs te/ gang gi don du khyed sdig pa'i las la spyod par gyur cing / srog gcod pa'am/ ma byin par len pa'am/ 'dod pas log par g.yem
244a6(phal chen): pa'am/ brdzun du smra ba'am/ phra ma'am/ ngag rtsub po'am/ tshig kyal ba'am/ chags sems sam/ gnod sems sam/ log par lta ba'am/ de ma yin pa'i
244a7(phal chen): lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen par gyur pa de thams cad kyang grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po 'di'i sgo dang / srang dang / khyams dang / lam gyi sum mdo dang /
244b1(phal chen): bzhi mdo kun du spungs te/ snga nas byin pa yin gyi/ su ci 'dod pa kun kyang khyer cig ces bstabs shing byin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ grong khyer 'od bzang po 'di na sems can ji
244b2(phal chen): snyed gcig gnas pa de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' ste/ theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'o/ /de bas na grong khyer chen po 'od bzang ngo / /'di yang de dag la bsam
244b3(phal chen): pa rnam pa ji lta bur dag pa'i tshul bzhin du snang ste/ la la la ni dog par snang ngo / /la la la ni yangs par snang ngo / /la la la ni gzhi sa la gnas par snang ngo / /la la la ni
244b4(phal chen): gzhi rin po che bai DUR+ya las blangs par snang ngo / /la la la ni sa'i ra bas bskor bar snang ngo / /la la la ni rin po che rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ra bas bskor bar
244b5(phal chen): snang ngo / /la la la ni gseg ma dang / gyo mos gang zhing thag thug dang / grog po dang / g.yang sa mang po can du snang ngo / /la la la ni nor bu rin po che dam pa grangs med pas
244b6(phal chen): gzhi brgyan cing yongs su bkram pa dang / lag mthil bzhin du gzhi mnyam par snang ngo / /la la la ni sa las byas par snang ngo / /la la la ni rin po che grangs med pa'i khang pa
244b7(phal chen): dang | gzhal med khang dang / khang bzhag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang steng dang / ba gam dang / skar khung gi shar bu dang / zla gam rin po che seng ge'i dra bas brgyan
245a1(phal chen): par snang ngo / /grong khyer gyi phyi rol na gnas pa'i sems can sngon ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ bsdu ba'i dngos po
245a2(phal chen): bzhis yongs su bsdus pa/ bsam pa dag pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par mos pa/
245a3(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rab tu gzhol ba de dag la yang rin po che las byas par snang ngo / /de ma yin pa gzhan dag la ni sa las byas par snang ste/ rigs kyi bu/
245a4(phal chen): nga'i khams na gnas pa'i sems can yul dang / phyogs dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dag na/ rnyog pa lnga
245a5(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi dus kyi rang bzhin gyis dkrugs te/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam zhig byed par 'dod par gyur na yang / de'i tshe nga de dag la phan par bya
245a6(phal chen): ba'i sems kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i glong zhes bya ba/ byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba la snyoms par 'jug ste/ rigs kyi
245a7(phal chen): bu| de ltar nga ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / de nyid kyi mod la sems can de dag gi 'jigs pa de dag dang / mi bde ba de dag dang / shar gnyer ba de
245b1(phal chen): dag dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa de dag dang / sems kyi 'khrug pa de dag dang / 'tshe ba'i sems de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i
245b2(phal chen): glong byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba de'i chos nyid thob pas rab tu zhi bar gyur to/ /nye bar zhi bar gyur to/ /rnam par ldog par gyur to/ /'gag par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/
245b3(phal chen): yud tsam zhig sdod dang / de'u re mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po 'od chen pos de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba 'jig rten
245b4(phal chen): gyi dbang po'i glong la mnyam par bzhag go / de ltar rgyal po 'od chen pos/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i glong la
245b5(phal chen): mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ de'i mod la grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po'i yul dang phyogs su bcas pa/ grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i
245b6(phal chen): pho brang gi 'khor dang bcas par rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /de g.yos pa'i tshe rin po che'i ra ba de dag dang / rin po che'i khang pa dang / rin po che'i snying po dang / rin po che'i khyim
245b7(phal chen): dang | rin po che'i gnas dang / rin po che'i gzhal med khang dang / rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / rin po che'i ba gam dang / rin po che'i pu shu dang / rin po che'i skar khung dang /
246a1(phal chen): rin po che'i stegs bu dang / rin po che'i rta babs dang / rin po che'i zla gam dang / rin po che'i seng ge'i dra ba dang / rin po che'i lan kan dang /
246a2(phal chen): rin po che'i 'bru dang / rin po che'i bla re dang / rin po che'i srad bus brgyus pa'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang / rin po che'i dril bu dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin
246a3(phal chen): po che'i ba dan dang / rin po che'i ta la de dag kyang rab tu g.yos te sgra 'byin to/ /rab tu 'khrol lo/ /de dag de ltar sgra 'byin cing / yid du 'ong la snyan pa dang / mnyan na dga'
246a4(phal chen): ba'i dbyangs brjod cing / rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba der 'dud de phyag 'tshal lo/ /grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po'i nang na/ sems can ji snyed cig gnas pa de dag thams
246a5(phal chen): cad kyang dga' ba dang / rangs pa'i sems kyis yongs su rgyas nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba de logs su mngon du bltas te/ lus thams cad kyis phab cing phyag
246a6(phal chen): 'tshal lo/ /de'i khams kyi grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang lus dang sems
246a7(phal chen): bde bar gyur te/ dga' zhing rangs pa skyes nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba de logs su phyag 'tshal lo/ /byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de
246b1(phal chen): dag thams cad kyang / gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems su ldan par gyur nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba de logs su blta zhing mngon par
246b2(phal chen): 'dud do/ /ri dang sgang mthon po'i sa'i phyogs thams cad kyang / rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba der mngon par 'dud do/ /me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / lo ma'i
246b3(phal chen): shing dang / sa bon gyi tshogs dang / 'byung po'i tshogs dang / lo tog dang / ldum bu dang / rtswa dang / gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal thams cad kyang / rgyal po 'od
246b4(phal chen): chen po gang na ba de logs su lta zhing mngon par 'dud par gyur to/ /de'i khams na mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / lu ma dang / lteng ka dang / 'bab chu dang / chu klung dang / rdzing dang / khron
246b5(phal chen): pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang / rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba de logs su mngon par gzhol zhing rlabs kyi sgra 'byin par gyur to/ /klu'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu yang a ga
246b6(phal chen): ru nag po'i bdug spos kyi dud pa na bun du 'grigs pa'i spos kyi sprin las glog sna tshogs 'gyu ba'i 'od kyis snang bar byed cing / 'brug sgra sgrog pa dang / spos chu'i char gyi rgyun
246b7(phal chen): shin tu phra ba mngon par 'bebs par gyur to/ /brgya byin dang / rab mtshe ma dang / rab dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po la sogs pa/
247a1(phal chen): lha'i bu stong phrag bcus kyang steng gi bar snang la 'khod do/ /nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sil snyan gyi sprin bye ba khrag
247a2(phal chen): khrig brgya stong gi sgra phyung bas/ dbyangs snyan pa rgya cher bsgrags pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha'i bu mo grangs med pa/ lha'i glu snyan pa len pa'i sprin gyi sgra bsgrags
247a3(phal chen): pa'i dbyangs snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan
247a4(phal chen): pa dang / lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i phreng ba sna tshogs kyi sprin
247a5(phal chen): grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa
247a6(phal chen): dang | lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i lhab lhub sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi gos sna tshogs dri ma med cing 'jam pa/
247a7(phal chen): kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa'i sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i gdugs rnam par phye ba sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs
247b1(phal chen): med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa
247b2(phal chen): d ang | lha rdzas kyi rin po che 'bab ba'i lce shin tu 'phro ba'i rin po che'i ba dan gyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par rgyal po 'od chen po la mchod pa bya
247b3(phal chen): ba'i phyir byin gyis brlabs so/ /glang po'i rgyal po chen po shugs 'dzin gyis kyang / glang po'i dbang po'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul ba'i mthus nam mkha'i
247b4(phal chen): dbyings thams cad lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad+mo'i sprin grangs med pas kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs so/ /lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i se mo do grangs med pa rab tu
247b5(phal chen): 'phyang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i snam bu'i lda ldi dang / chun po grangs med pa rab tu 'phyang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i rgyud grangs med pa mngon par 'phyang
247b6(phal chen): ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi lhab lhub dang / phreng ba grangs med pa mngon par 'phyang ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi me
247b7(phal chen): tog gi lda ldi grangs med pa mngon par bres pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi spos kyi rgyal po kha dog sna tshogs phyogs thams cad du dri zhim pos rgyas par 'gengs pa'i sprin
248a1(phal chen): grangs med pas kun nas khengs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i gos kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab
248a2(phal chen): tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos kyi dud pa na bun du 'khrigs pa'i sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye
248a3(phal chen): ma kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char phra mo rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed pa dang / glu snyan pa'i dbyangs yid
248a4(phal chen): du 'ong bar len cing / bstod pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa'i char mngon par 'bebs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par nam mkha'i dbyings byin gyis brlabs so/ /srin po'i dbang
248a5(phal chen): po brgya stong grangs med pa rgya mtsho la gnas pa dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rten gyi sa'i gzhi la gnas pa/ kha zas su sha dang khrag 'thung zhing za la/ chu la spyod
248a6(phal chen): pa dang / ri dwags dang / phyugs dang / bya dang / ba lang dang / rta dang / glang po dang / bong bu dang / skyes pa dang / bud med kyi tshogs kyi mdangs 'phrog pa/ zhe sdang ba'i
248a7(phal chen): yid kyi rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa/ rtag tu 'gro ba la 'tshe zhing / mtho 'tsham pa la zhugs pa rnams kyang / byams pa dang phan pa'i sems dam pa dang ldan zhing / bzhin
248b1(phal chen): gyi mdog shin tu dang ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad la mi 'tshe zhing / mtho 'tsham pa med pa la zhugs te/ 'jig rten pha rol la blta bar gyur nas/ thal mo sbyar cing shin tu dga'
248b2(phal chen): ba'i sems kyis rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba de logs su btud nas phyag 'tshal bar gyur te/ lus dang sems kyi bde ba rgya chen po mtshungs pa med pa yang myong bar gyur to/ /
248b3(phal chen): gnod sbyin dang / grul bum dang / sha za dang / 'byung po'i dbang po brgya stong du ma yang byams pa dang / phan pa'i sems dam pa dang ldan zhing / bzhin gyi mdog shin tu dang ba
248b4(phal chen): dang | 'gro ba thams cad la mi 'tshe zhing / mtho 'tsham pa med pa la zhugs te/ 'jig rten pha rol la blta bar gyur nas/ thal mo sbyar cing shin tu dga' ba'i sems kyis/ rgyal
248b5(phal chen): po 'od chen po gang na ba der 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar gyur te/ lus dang sems kyi bde ba rgya chen po mtshungs pa med pa yang myong bar gyur to/ /de ltar gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten
248b6(phal chen): gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can kun gyi 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / mi bde ba dang / shar gnyer ba dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / sems kyi 'khrug pa dang / 'tshe
248b7(phal chen): ba'i sems thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur to/ /rnam par zhi bar gyur to/ /rnam par log par gyur to/ /'gag par gyur to/ /phyir log par gyur to/ /gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten
249a1(phal chen): gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas/ phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams
249a2(phal chen): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i bar gyi sems can kun gyi 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / mi bde ba dang / shar gnyer ba dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / sems
249a3(phal chen): kyi 'khrug pa dang / 'tshe ba'i sems thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i glong gi chos nyid thob pa'i
249a4(phal chen): phyir rab tu zhi bar gyur to/ /rnam par zhi bar gyur to/ /rnam par log par gyur to/ /'gag par gyur to/ /phyir log par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po 'od chen po ting nge 'dzin
249a5(phal chen): de las langs te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i ye shes snang ba'i sgo byams pa chen po'i rgyal
249a6(phal chen): mtshan 'di shes par zad na/ ngas byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bde ba'i bsam pas rgyas par 'gengs pa/ byams pa chen po'i gdugs tshad med
249a7(phal chen): pa dang ldan pa/ 'khor mi phyed pa dang ldan pas/ 'gro ba thams cad 'khor du gyur pa/ dbang po rab dang 'bring dang tha ma'i sbyor bas 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la
249b1(phal chen): zhugs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su gzung ba la zhugs pas/ byams pa'i sems lta bu dang ldan pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi 'od zer 'gro ba thams cad du 'byung bas
249b2(phal chen): zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa lta bur gyur pa/ shes bya thams cad ye shes kyi 'od kyis snang bar byed pa'i phyir nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gyur pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi mun
249b3(phal chen): pa thibs po rab tu sel bas sgron ma chen po lta bur gyur pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgya mtsho'i g.yo sgyu'i rnyog pa dang bar byed pas nor bu rin po che chu 'dang dang 'dra
249b4(phal chen): ba| 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po dang 'dra ba/ 'gro ba thams cad ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms
249b5(phal chen): par 'jug pa'i khang pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang chen por gzhog pas/ rlung dmar chen po dang 'dra ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/
249b6(phal chen): bsod nams kyi ri bo gzhal ba'am/ yon tan gyi skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i nam mkha' la blta ba'am/ smon lam chen po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor las mtshams gcad
249b7(phal chen): pa'am/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyi stobs la tshad gzung ba'am/ theg pa chen po'i rgyan gyis bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa'am/ kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i tshul gyi khyad par brjod
250a1(phal chen): pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po bsgom pa'i sgo dbye ba'am/ snying rje chen po'i sprin yongs su smos par nus re skan/ song /
250a2(phal chen): rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na rgyal po'i gnas brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang
250a3(phal chen): chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ rgyal po 'od
250a4(phal chen): chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang bltas nas/ rgyal po
250a5(phal chen): 'od chen po'i drung nas song ngo / / //bam po dgu bcu drug pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang / grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po nas byung ste/ yud tsam
250a6(phal chen): du lam gyi mgo btsal nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po'i gdams ngag de la rjes su bsam pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshul byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan de
250a7(phal chen): rjes su dran par bya ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i glong gi snang ba chen po de yongs su bsgom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus rnam par dag pa
250b1(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri'i rgyan rnam par phye ba rnam pa sna tshogs de dag mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / bsod nams
250b2(phal chen): kyi dbang dang / stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag rjes su spel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ye shes kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de
250b3(phal chen): shin tu bstan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod kyi bdag nyid che ba thun mong du gyur pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de la rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
250b4(phal chen): gnas rnam pa tha dad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag kyang mtshan mar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rnam par dag pa bsam
250b5(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs shing yongs su dag pa de la brtag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi
250b6(phal chen): don bsam pa snang ba'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de la yid ches par byed byed pas/ sems dga' zhing mos pa'i shugs dang / sems kyi nyams bde ba dang / sems
250b7(phal chen): shin tu tshim pa dang / sems khong nas dga' ba dang / sems rnyog pa med pa dang / sems 'od dad pa dang / sems brtan pa dang / sems rgya che ba dang / sems mi
251a1(phal chen): zad pa thob ste/ de de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen rjes su dran zhing yid la byed pa la brtson pas gdong mchi mas gang nas rjes su sems pa/ kyi
251a2(phal chen): hud| dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba 'di ni/ yon tan rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su dag
251a3(phal chen): pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i rgyur gyur pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi
251a4(phal chen): dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi snang ba thams cad yongs su bskyed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar
251a5(phal chen): 'gyur ba yongs su bsgrub pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi tshul thams cad brjod pa'o/ /
251a6(phal chen): shes rab dang / ye shes kyi snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang dag par bskyed pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po brtan pa'i myu gu skyed par byed pa'o/ /dge ba'i
251a7(phal chen): bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag ngan song gi g.yang sa thams cad nas skyob pa'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag chos mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba
251b1(phal chen): la gzhog pa'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la lam bde ba dang / mi bde ba ston pa'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la theg pa chen po yongs su ston pa'o//
251b2(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i gdams ngag gis 'doms pa'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la
251b3(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer gyi lam ston pa'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyi bdag thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas su phyin par skyel ba'o/ /dge ba'i bshes
251b4(phal chen): gnyen rnams ni bdag chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug par byed pa'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la dus gsum gyi shes bya rgya mtsho'i tshul rab tu ston
251b5(phal chen): pa'o| |dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu ston pa'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag gi dkar
251b6(phal chen): po'i chos thams cad rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'o/ /zhes de de ltar ngu zhing smre sngags 'don pa'i tshe/ nam mkha'i dbyings la 'khod pa'i lha'i tshogs dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin
251b7(phal chen): 'brang zhing yang dag par bskul ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ltar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'di skad 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams
252a1(phal chen): ngag la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang thugs shin tu dgyes par 'gyur ba yin/ dge ba'i bshes
252a2(phal chen): gnyen gyi tshig dang mi 'gal bar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du'ang shin tu bsnyen pa yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig la the tshom
252a3(phal chen): mi za ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyang nye bar bsnyen pa yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba'i byang chub sems
252a4(phal chen): dpa' la ni don thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ba yin gyi/ rigs kyi bu/ rgyal po'i pho brang brtan par dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba gang na ba der song zhig dang / de las byang chub
252a5(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa thos par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba las langs nas/ mthar gyis rgyal po'i pho brang brtan par dge bsnyen
252a6(phal chen): ma mi g.yo ba gang na ba der song nas/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba yongs su tshol zhing rmed rmed pa las/ de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pa/ rigs kyi bu/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de
252a7(phal chen): ni| rang gi khyim na pha ma dang 'phrogs shing gzhon nur gyur pa ste/ rang gi gnyen bshes kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / skye bo'i tshogs chen po la chos ston to/ /de nas
252b1(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dga' ba chen po dang mos shing spro bas yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pa de dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ dge
252b2(phal chen): bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i khyim gyi sgo na sdod pa'i tshe/ des khyim de thams cad 'od lus dang sems shin tu bde bar byed pa/ gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa zhig gis khyab cing gsal bar
252b3(phal chen): gyur nas/ 'od des tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la phog par gyur ma thag tu tshor ba thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / zhi ba'i gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi
252b4(phal chen): sgo mang po dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / kun du lta ba'i btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / de bzhin gshegs
252b5(phal chen): pa'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgya tsam la zhugs par gyur te yongs su skyes so/ /de dag kyang shin tu phra zhing gzhon pa ste/ 'di ltar
252b6(phal chen): dper na/ thog ma mngal du zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa lta bu ste/ ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang shin tu phra zhing gzhon par skyes par gyur to/ /des dri zhim po zhig tshor na yang /
252b7(phal chen): de ni lha la yang med/ lha'i bu mo la yang med/ klu la yang med/ klu'i bu mo la yang med/ gnod sbyin la yang med/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo la yang med/ dri za la yang med/ dri za'i
253a1(phal chen): bu mo la yang med/ lha ma yin la yang med/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo la yang med/ nam mkha' lding la yang med/ nam mkha' lding gi bu mo la yang
253a2(phal chen): med| mi 'am ci la yang med/ mi 'am ci'i bu mo la yang med/ lto 'phye chen po la yang med/ lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo la yang med/ mi la yang med/ mi'i bu mo la yang
253a3(phal chen): med cing mi srid pa de lta bu'i dri zhim po tshor bar gyur to/ /bud med de'i gzugs dang mnyam pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong / kha dog dang
253a4(phal chen): mdog de lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog dang / kha dog dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i kha dog dang / mdog ma gtogs par de'i kha dog
253a5(phal chen): dang | mdog tu mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong / lus kyi chu zheng dang / dbyibs de lta bu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khrun chu
253a6(phal chen): zheng dang / dbyibs dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa'i lus kyi chu zheng dang / dbyibs ma gtogs par de'i lus kyi chu zheng dang / dbyibs su mnyam
253a7(phal chen): pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong / 'od kyi rgyan de lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba
253b1(phal chen): thob pa'i 'od kyi rgyan ma gtogs par de'i 'od kyi rgyan dang mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong / de'i kha'i drod kyi dri zhim po dang mnyam pa'i dri de lta bu yang
253b2(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi lha'i gnas sam/ klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang /
253b3(phal chen): mi ma yin pa'i gnas na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong / khyim gyi rgyan dang longs spyod de lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i longs spyod dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang
253b4(phal chen): bskur ba thob pa'i longs spyod ma gtogs par/ de'i khyim gyi rgyan dang longs spyod dang mnyam pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong / g.yog 'khor
253b5(phal chen): phun sum tshogs pa de lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ma gtogs par de'i g.yog
253b6(phal chen): 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang mnyam pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong ste/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems
253b7(phal chen): kyis blta bar nus pa'i sems can de lta bu yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gyi ris na med do/ /dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de mthong ma thag tu nyon mongs pa zhi
254a1(phal chen): bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gyi ris na med de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshangs pa chen po stong
254a2(phal chen): phrag bcu la dbang bsgyur ba la ni/ 'dod pa la spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams mi rgyu'o/ /de bzhin du dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba yang mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams kyi nyon
254a3(phal chen): mongs pa mi rgyu'o/ /dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de la blta bas ngoms par 'gyur ba'i sems can de lta bu yang / shes rab kyis ngoms pa ma gtogs par phyogs bcu'i 'jig
254a4(phal chen): rten gyi khams kyi sems can gyi ris na med do/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i lus kyi byin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzugs
254a5(phal chen): dang | kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sa'i gzhi dang / grong khyer dang / rin po che thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer gyi dra
254a6(phal chen): ba'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sems can gyi don bsam gyis mi khyab pa sgrub pa mthong ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas byung ba'i dri zhim po tshor nas/ 'khor rgya
254a7(phal chen): mtsho phun sum tshogs pa mtha' yas pa mthong ste/ khyim dang / gzhal med khang gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa mi 'phrogs pa mthong nas/ yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa
254b1(phal chen): khong du chud de/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bstod do/ /khyod kyis rtag tu tshul khrims dri med yongs bsrungs te/ /bzod pa shin tu yangs pa'ang yongs su
254b2(phal chen): bsgoms mdzad cing / /brtson 'grus brtan pa rdo rje lta bu bsgrubs pas na/ /ri bo'i rgyal po lta bur 'gro bar 'phags shing 'bar/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ dge
254b3(phal chen): bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba la tshigs su gcad pa des mngon par bstod de/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
254b4(phal chen): bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni/ byang chub sems
254b5(phal chen): dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos nas/ 'phags ma/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la
254b6(phal chen): bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i ngag 'jam zhing yid du 'ong la nyams
254b7(phal chen): su bde bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshig tu brjod nas/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par
255a1(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thub par dka'
255a2(phal chen): ba'i ye shes kyi snying po thob pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo yi dam brtan pa la slob pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs kyi sgo thob pa'o/ /kho
255a3(phal chen): mo ni spobs pa'i ye shes snang ba chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa thob pa'o/ /kho mo ni chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting 'dzin gyi
255a4(phal chen): sgo thob pa'o/ /smras pa/ 'phags ma/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po de'i yul ni ji lta bu zhig mchis/ yi dam la
255a5(phal chen): brtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs kyi sgo dang / chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa'i spobs pa snang
255a6(phal chen): ba'i sgo dang / chos yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'i yul ni ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gnas 'di ni yid ches par dka'o/
255a7(phal chen): smras pa/ 'phags ma/ bstan du gsol/ sangs rgyas kyi byin dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung na yid ches par mchi grang / rtogs pa dang / 'tshal
255b1(phal chen): pa dang / rnam par rtogs pa dang / rjes su rtogs pa dang / rig pa dang / dmigs su phebs pa dang / goms pa dang / mi 'gal ba dang / rnam par mi rtog pa dang / sgro
255b2(phal chen): 'dogs pa ma mchis pa dang / mnyam par bgyid par yang mchi grang / de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs
255b3(phal chen): kyi bu/ sngon 'das pa'i dus shig na dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi bskal pa la de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ kho mo yang de'i tshe rgyal po
255b4(phal chen): glog gis byin pa'i bu gcig ma zhig tu gyur nas/ de'i tshe nub mo mi nyal tsam zhig na rgyal po'i sgo yang bcad/ pha dang ma yang nyal/ skyes pa dang bud med dag kyang gnyid
255b5(phal chen): kyis log / rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba'i sgra yang zhi/ lhan cig spyod pa'i bud med lnga brgya tsam dag kyang nyal bar gyur pa zhig na/ kho mo mal gyi steng na 'dug cing / nam
255b6(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings la rgyu ba'i skar ma'i tshogs kyi phreng ba rnam par 'khod pa la lta lta ba las/ steng gi bar snang la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
255b7(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyag rab tu brkyang pa ri'i rgyal po ri rab ltar lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
256a1(phal chen): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor mang pos bskor ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pas yongs su bskor ba/ phyogs thams
256a2(phal chen): cad du 'od zer gyi dra ba thogs pa med pas rgyas par khyab pa'i sku bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas kyang dri zhim po rnam pa 'di lta
256a3(phal chen): bu byung ste/ des kho mo'i lus dang sems shin tu bde bar gyur/ yid shin tu dga' bar gyur te/ mal gyi steng nas langs nas/ sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te sa la babs
256a4(phal chen): nas| bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang pa de la phyag 'tshal te/ de'i spyi gtsug la bltas na yang mtha' thug par ma rung / g.yas g.yon gyi tshad
256a5(phal chen): kyang zin par ma rung / mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs pa la bsams na yang ngoms par ma rung ste/ de'i tshe kho mo 'di snyam du bsams so/ /las ji lta bu zhig byas
256a6(phal chen): na| lus phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu ni 'thob par 'gyur/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs pa ni skye bar 'gyur/ 'od kyi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa ni 'byung bar
256a7(phal chen): 'gyur/ 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ni 'grub par 'gyur/ yid kyi rang bzhin gyi gnas dang longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ bsod nams phun sum
256b1(phal chen): tshogs pa ni skye bar 'gyur/ ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa phun sum tshogs pa ni yang dag
256b2(phal chen): par 'grub par 'gyur/ gzungs phun sum tshogs pa ni yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa ni dbang du 'gyur snyam pa dang / rigs kyi bu/ de nas bcom
256b3(phal chen): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang pa des/ kho mo'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bu mo khyod kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad gzhom
256b4(phal chen): pa'i phyir thub pa med pa'i sems skyed cig / mngon par zhen pa thams cad bsal ba'i phyir pham pa med pa'i sems skyed cig /chos zab mo'i tshul khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir
256b5(phal chen): zhum pa med pa'i sems skyed cig / sems can bsam pa mi bzad pa dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho'i klong du ltung bas mi sgul ba'i sems skyed cig /srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams
256b6(phal chen): cad du skye ba'i skye mched du mgo rmongs pa med pa'i sems skyed cig / sangs rgyas thams cad blta bar mos pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir ngoms mi shes pa'i sems skyed cig/
256b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chog mi shes pa'i sems skyed cig /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul snang ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir
257a1(phal chen): nges par rtogs pa'i sems skyed cig / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo gzung ba'i phyir yang dag par gzung ba'i sems
257a2(phal chen): skyed cig / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas byung ba shes par bya ba lta la ci smos kyi chung ngu na brdar byas pa tsam la yang 'khrul pa med pa'i sems skyed cig /bu mo khyod
257a3(phal chen): kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos rin po che rnam par dbye ba'i phyir rnam par dbye ba'i sems skyed cig ces byung ste/ de ltar rigs kyi bu/ kho mos
257a4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyag rab tu brkyang pa las/ chos kyi tshul gyi gdams ngag gi sgo rnam pa de lta bu
257a5(phal chen): dag thos nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la ni mngon par mos par gyur/ stobs bcu'i rang bzhin la ni mngon par smon par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung la ni mngon par
257a6(phal chen): dad par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi rgyan ni yongs su sbyang bar dga'/ sangs rgyas kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa ni yongs su bsgrub par dga'/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang dpe
257a7(phal chen): byad bzang po rnam par dag pa la ni mngon par mos par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par smon par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam
257b1(phal chen): par dag pa la ni mngon par dad par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par mos par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi sku tshe'i tshad phun sum tshogs pa la ni
257b2(phal chen): mngon par dga' nas/ rdo rje ltar ri dang mtshon cha thams cad kyi mthus thub par dka' ba'i sems nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad
257b3(phal chen): kyis mi phyed mi tshugs pa bskyed de/ rigs kyi bu/ de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sems bskyed pa de'i mthus/ bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu
257b4(phal chen): yid kyi dgu las kyang 'dod pa la spyad par mi dran na/ gnyis kyis gnyis 'du ba lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu/ de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du rang gi gnyen bshes la'ang khong
257b5(phal chen): khro bo'i sems gcig ma bskyed na/ de ma yin pa'i sems can ma nyes pa gzhan lta la ci smos/ de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du bdag tu lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa
257b6(phal chen): gcig tsam yang bskyed par mi dran na/ de ma yin pa'i yo byad gzhan la bdag gir byas te mngon par chags pa lta ci smos/ shi 'pho dang / mngal na gnas pa'i tshe 'ang sems
257b7(phal chen): rmongs pa'am/ 'du shes sna tshogs sam/ lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyang byung du mi dran na/ legs par bsam shing gnas pa lta ci smos/ bskal pa de snyed cig tu
258a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas gcig kyang chung ngu na rmi lam du mthong ba'i rnam par dmigs par yang rjes su mi dran na/ byang chub sems dpa'i mig bcus mthong
258a2(phal chen): bar gyur pa lta ci smos/ de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'dzin kyang chung ngu na ming du bya ba'i rnam pa tsam gyi
258a3(phal chen): chos kyi tshig dang / yi ge gcig kyang brjod par mi dran na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi mdzod nas byung ba lta ci smos/ de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du chos kyi rgya mtsho
258a4(phal chen): de snyed cig 'thung 'thung yang chung ngu na 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la tshig 'ga' yang ma bsam ma brtags par mi dran no/ /de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du de snyed cig
258a5(phal chen): gis chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho las kyang chung ngu na 'jig rten pa'i bzo'i rgyus dang tshul yang rung ste/ chos kyi tshul gyi sgo gang la yang kho mos ting nge 'dzin mngon par ma bsgrubs pa
258a6(phal chen): de lta bu med do/ /de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du de bzhin gshegs pa de snyed kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bzung yang / ji ltar yongs su bzung ba las/ sems can 'dul ba'i
258a7(phal chen): dbang du bya ba ma gtogs par chung ngu na rjes su brgyud pa'i rgyus tsam gyi tshig dang / yi ge 'ga' yang por bar mi dran no/ /de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sangs rgyas rgya mtsho
258b1(phal chen): de snyed cig mthong yang / chung ngu na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kyi smon lam gyi rgyud kyang rung ste/ smon lam 'ga' yang kho mos sems can rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir
258b2(phal chen): mngon par ma bsgrubs pa med do/ /de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de snyed cig gi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
258b3(phal chen): pa 'ga' tsam yang / kho mos bdag gi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par ma bsgrubs pa de lta bu mi dran no/ /de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du/ sems can gang kho mos
258b4(phal chen): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma bskul pa de lta bu gcig kyang mig lam du 'ongs par mi dran no/ /de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs
258b5(phal chen): rgyas yid la bya ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mngon par bsgrubs su mi dran no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du/ bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul
258b6(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed cig lon yang / tshig dang yi ge 'ga' la yang the tshom bskyed pa'am/ gnyis kyi 'du shes sam/ rnam par rtog pa'i 'du shes sam/ sna tshogs kyi 'du shes
258b7(phal chen): sam| rab kyi 'du shes sam/ bzang ngan gyi 'du shes sam/ sdug mi sdug gi 'du shes bskyed du mi dran no/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni de phyin chad du sangs rgyas byung ba dang ma bral
259a1(phal chen): lo| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang ma bral lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ma bral lo/ /yang dag pa'i dge ba'i
259a2(phal chen): bshes gnyen rnams dang ma bral lo/ /sangs rgyas kyi smon lam thos pa dang ma bral lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos pa dang ma bral lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
259a3(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i ye shes snang ba'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs dang / ting
259a4(phal chen): nge 'dzin mi bzad pa'i mdzod dang gter thos pa thob pa dang ma bral lo/ /mtha' dang dbus med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba la 'jug cing / khong du chud par bya ba'i tshul thos
259a5(phal chen): pa dang ma bral lo/ /mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sems can gyi khams 'byung ba'i rgyu thos pa thob pa dang ma bral lo/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dra ba'i dkyil
259a6(phal chen): 'khor yongs su zad par bya ba'i ye shes snang ba dang ma bral lo/ /sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'byung ba'i rgyu'i ye shes thob pa dang ma bral lo/ /sems can
259a7(phal chen): thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus yongs su ston pa dang ma bral lo/ /sems can thams cad shes par byed pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa
259b1(phal chen): dang ma bral lo/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po 'di dang / chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan
259b2(phal chen): gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo yi dam la brtan pa 'di rnam par phye ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis
259b3(phal chen): 'di dang / slobs pa'i ye shes snang ba'i sgo chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa 'di rnam par phye ba dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa yod na/ rigs kyi bu khyod mngon
259b4(phal chen): sum du blta bar 'dod dam/ smras pa/ 'phags ma/ 'tshal lo/ /de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de na de ltar 'dug bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo
259b5(phal chen): thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo don yod pa'i
259b6(phal chen): dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyur ba la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi
259b7(phal chen): zad pa'i mdzod la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong phrag bcu la rnam par blta ba dang / rnam par spyad pa dang / rjes su 'jug pa dang / nges par rtogs par byas so/ /de ltar dge
260a1(phal chen): bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod
260a2(phal chen): du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa dang / bai DUR+ya yongs su dag pa'i rgyu las gyur par gnas par mthong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams re re'i
260a3(phal chen): gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya brgya na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya brgya bzhugs par mthong ste/ la la ni dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa nas/ la la ni yongs su
260a4(phal chen): mya ngan las 'da' ba mdzad pa'i bar du'ang mthong ngo / /de'ang 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUR+ya'i rang bzhin de dag yongs su dag cing sgrib pa med pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
260a5(phal chen): de dag so so nas 'od zer dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par khyab par mda' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
260a6(phal chen): shin tu rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho yang mthong bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag re re'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad brjod pa/ sems can thams
260a7(phal chen): cad kyi rna lam du rnam par grag pa'ang thos par gyur to/ /de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
260b1(phal chen): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mthong ngam/ thos sam/ shes sam/ smras pa/ 'phags ma/ mthong ngo / /thos so/ /rig go /rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yi
260b2(phal chen): dam brtan pa la slob cing / chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka'
260b3(phal chen): ba'i ye shes kyi snying po la gnas nas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs khong du chud pa dang / spobs pa'i ye shes snang ba chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa la
260b4(phal chen): mkhas pa'i legs par bshad pas/ sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' yon tan tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang
260b5(phal chen): ldan pa nam mkha'i dbyings la 'dab chags khyu mchog 'khod pa ltar gnas med par spyod pa/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po chen po ltar yongs su smin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
260b6(phal chen): gdon pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa/ tshong pa ltar stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che mngon par 'dod cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che'i
260b7(phal chen): gling du rgyu ba/ mthu dang ldan pa'i nya pa ltar yid du 'ong ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgya dang ldan pa'i lag pas sred pa'i chu las byung ba'i sems can yongs su smin par mngon par gdon
261a1(phal chen): pa'i phyir chos kyi rgya mtsho la rnam par rgyu ba/ lha'i dbang po ltar nyon mongs pa'i lha ma yin gyi g.yul chen po gdul ba bzlog pa'i phyir khams gsum
261a2(phal chen): gyi gnas yongs su bkang zhing rnam par rgyu ba/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar sems can gyi sred pa'i chu dang nyon mongs pa'i 'dam shin tu bskam pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi nam
261a3(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings la yang dag par 'phags pa/ zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa ltar 'dul ba'i yid kyi me tog ku mu da rnam par kha dbye ba'i phyir ye shes kyi nam mkha' la mngon par shar
261a4(phal chen): ba| sa'i gzhi ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i dbang po'i myu gu bskyed cing rnam par spel ba'i phyir/ byams mi byams dang / mthon dman med par 'jig rten na mnyam
261a5(phal chen): par gnas pa/ rlung dmar ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / lta ba'i shing dang / shing phran gyi nags tshal dang / kun dga' rtsa ba nas gdon pa'i phyir chags
261a6(phal chen): pa med par phyogs thams cad du rnam par rgyu ba/ 'khor los bsgyur ba ltar bsdu ba'i dngos po'i yo byad dang rkyen gyis 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir/ 'jig rten
261a7(phal chen): na rnam par spyod pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul dga' 'dzin tshad med pa na/ grong
261b1(phal chen): khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na kun du rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'dug gi /de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
261b2(phal chen): pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/
261b3(phal chen): dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon
261b4(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzang / dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba mngon du byas te/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i gdams ngag rjes su dran par byed cing / dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo bas bstan pa dang /
261b5(phal chen): yang dag par bstan pa dang / bsgrags pa dang / bshad pa dang / brjod pa dang / yang dag par brjod pa dang / bzhag pa dang / rnam par phye ba dang / smos pa dang / rgya cher
261b6(phal chen): bstan pa de dag thams cad la gdon mi za bar yid ches shing / rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / rjes su bsam pa dang / khong du chud par bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / yongs
261b7(phal chen): su bsgom pa dang / gzhan du mi 'gyur ba dang / rtogs par bya ba dang / snang bar bya ba dang / mnyam par bya ba byed cing mthar gyis gnas nas gnas dang / yul nas yul
262a1(phal chen): du brgyu ste/ rgyu zhing song song nas yul dga' 'dzin tshad med pa gang na ba der phyin nas/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa rmed cing tshol tshol te/ nyi ma nub
262a2(phal chen): tu cha ba zhig na/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin par phyin nas/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa'i nang du song ste/ grong khyer gyi lam gyi bzhi mdo'i dbus shig tu phyin nas/ srang gi sgo
262a3(phal chen): nas srang gi sgo dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo nas/ lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / grong phrag nas/ grong phrag tu kun du rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba tshol zhing rmed rmed pa dang / mtshan mo mi nyal
262a4(phal chen): tsam zhig na/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa'i byang phyogs logs na ri shin tu mod pa zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de'i rtse mo rtswa dang / gel ba dang / sman sna tshogs dga' dga' ltar
262a5(phal chen): skyes pas brgyan pa/ 'od chen po dang ldan pa nyi ma shar ba lta bur gnas pa mthong ngo / /des snang ba de mthong nas/ dga' ba'i shugs chen po skyes te/ 'di snyam du bsams so//
262a6(phal chen): bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen ri'i rtse mo 'di la gdon mi za bar mthong bar 'gyur ba lta zhig snyam nas/ grong khyer de nas byung ste/ ri shin tu mod pa gang na ba der phyin pa
262a7(phal chen): dang / ri shin tu mod pa de la 'dzegs nas/ ri'i rtse mo snang ba chen po can gang na ba der phyin pa dang / rgyang yang ring po zhig nas/ kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba tshangs pa chen
262b1(phal chen): po las kyang lhag pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa dpal gyis shin tu 'bar ba zhig / tshangs pa stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor te/ 'chags na 'chag cing 'dug pa mthong nas de'i
262b2(phal chen): dung du phyin te/ rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ de la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad
262b3(phal chen): ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
262b4(phal chen): pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/ /
262b5(phal chen): zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad
262b6(phal chen): du gsol/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni thams cad du
262b7(phal chen): 'gro ba ste/ thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa'o/ /sgo thams cad du rnam par spyod pas snang ba'i ting 'dzin gyi sgo dang / dngos po med pa
263a1(phal chen): la gnas pas/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / chos kyi dbyings kun gyi gzhir thug par thal ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes snang
263a2(phal chen): ba'i sgo dang ldan pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar kho bo ni sems can gyi snod kyi 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad dang / sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad dang / sems can gyi shi 'pho'i
263a3(phal chen): sgo thams cad dang / sems can gyi skye ba'i sgo thams cad dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa thams cad dang / skye ba'i skye mched sna tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi gnas rnam pa tha dad pa dag
263a4(phal chen): gi sems can kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ skye ba kun du 'brel pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ sbyor ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ mos pa sna tshogs/
263a5(phal chen): can 'di lta ste/ lha'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / klu'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / dri za'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / lha
263a6(phal chen): ma yin gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / mi'am ci'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs
263a7(phal chen): pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /
263b1(phal chen): mi'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / mi ma yin pa'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la gnas pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la mos pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
263b2(phal chen): theg pa la mos pa dang / theg pa chen po la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi don thabs sna tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshul dang / sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis byed de/ 'di ltar sems can la la la ni bzo'i
263b3(phal chen): rgyud tha dad pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzugs snang bas 'jig rten gyi bzo sna tshogs bslabs shing don byed do/ /sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
263b4(phal chen): bstabs pa'i phyir/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdu ba'i thabs kyi don byed do/ /sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i ye shes kyi sgo snang
263b5(phal chen): ba yongs su bskyed pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par brjod cing don byed do/ /sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sa bon chud mi za bar brtan zhing yongs su bskyed pas
263b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sems yongs su brjod cing don byed do/ /sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sems can thams
263b7(phal chen): cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par brjod pas don byed do/ /sems can la la la
264a1(phal chen): ni 'di lta ste/ ngan du spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa dang mthun pa'i rgyus sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba yongs su
264a2(phal chen): bstan pas/ skyo ba yongs su bskyed cing don byed do/ /sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bskyed pa'i yon tan thams cad ni gdon mi za bar thams cad
264a3(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'bras bu'i mthar thug par 'gyur bar brjod pas dga' ba chen po bskyed cing don byed do/ /sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / sku la
264a4(phal chen): mngon par mos pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam 'debs par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang bsngags pa yang dag par brjod pas
264a5(phal chen): don byed do/ /sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ mi zlog cing lhun gyis grub pa dang / rgyun chad pa med par sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las nan tan du mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan
264a6(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'thob par mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba brjod pas don byed do/ /sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ tshur zil gyis gnon la/
264a7(phal chen): phar zil gyis mi non pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po yongs su brjod cing don byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/
264b1(phal chen): gzhan yang kho mo ni grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa 'di yi bzhi mdo'i phongs thams cad dang / srang thams cad dang / lam gyi sum mdo thams cad dang / grong mtshams thams cad dang
264b2(phal chen): khyim thams cad dang / mthun par 'dus pa'i rdal thams cad dang / grong thams cad dang / grong gi rgyud thams cad du rnam pa ji ltar tshogs shing 'dus pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang /
264b3(phal chen): khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang / sbyor ba ji lta ba dang / mthu ji lta ba dang / rnam par spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du de dag dang mthun pa'i lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyibs mngon
264b4(phal chen): par bsgrubs shing chos ston kyang / sems can de dag gis de sum bstan pa dang / de ga las 'ongs pa mi shes te/ gzhan du na thos nas ma nor bar nan tan du byed pa ni med
264b5(phal chen): pa'ang ma yin no/ /gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na zhags pa 'thub pa lta ba rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa dgu bcu rtsa drug 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyi nang
264b6(phal chen): du yang / sems can lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la chags pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thams cad dang mthun par gnas te/ rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar kho bo grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin
264b7(phal chen): pa 'di na/ sems can gyi don byed cing 'dug pa de bzhin du/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / khams dang / rgyal ba'i pho brang 'khor thams cad
265a1(phal chen): na yang sems can gyi don byed do/ /'dzam bu'i gling na ji lta ba de bzhin du gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / de bzhin du stong dang /
265a2(phal chen): stong gnyis pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sems can gyi rten du bya ba thams cad dang / sems
265a3(phal chen): can gyi gnas su bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi gzhir bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi khams su bya ba'i ming du gtogs pa thams cad dang / sems can yongs
265a4(phal chen): su rgyu ba thams cad dang / sems can yongs su 'du ba thams cad dang / sems can rgya mtsho na gnas pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi rgyud gnas pa thams cad dang /
265a5(phal chen): sems can gyi phyogs su bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi phyogs mtshams su bya ba thams cad dang / sems can spyod pa'i gnas thams cad du'ang thabs sna tshogs
265a6(phal chen): dang / tshul sna tshogs dang / sgo sna tshogs dang / rigs pa sna tshogs dang / phrad pa sna tshogs dang / thabs kyi tshul sna tshogs dang / bya ba sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams kyi
265a7(phal chen): don byed do/ /gzugs dang kha dog sna tshogs yongs su bstan cing mos par bya ba dang / tshig gi lam sna tshogs brjod pas kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do/ /rigs kyi bu
265b1(phal chen): kho bos ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad du 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su song ba 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i lus
265b2(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ bdag dang sems can gyi lus su tha mi dad pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ 'phrul pa'i 'khor lo rgya chen pos srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du khyab pa/ 'jig rten gyi skye ba
265b3(phal chen): thams cad rang gi lus la rjes su spyod la/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sprul pa'i 'khor lo la brtson pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi rigs dang / rgyud dang /
265b4(phal chen): cher skye ba rab tu ston pa/ bskal pa thams cad du gnas pa la thogs pa med pa'i smon lam gyi 'khor lo dang ldan pa/ mig 'phrul lta bu'i spyod pa rnam par phye ba'i snang ba rab tu thob
265b5(phal chen): pa| 'gro ba thams cad kyi don byed kyang gos pa med par gnas pa la brtson pa/ dus gsum gyi 'gro ba'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa/ ye shes kyi dbyings bdag med
265b6(phal chen): pa dang ldan pas snang bar byas pa'i snying rje chen po mtha' yas pa'i snying po dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskyed pa la mngon par brtson pa de dag gi spyod
265b7(phal chen): pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul khams chen po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon
266a1(phal chen): longs spyod ut+pa la zhes bya ba 'dug gi/ /de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /
266a2(phal chen): ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro
266a3(phal chen): ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang
266a4(phal chen): lus dang srog la mi lta/ srid pa'i longs spyod dang / yongs su zin pa dang / nye bar blangs pa mngon par chags pa'i gnas thams cad la ni mi sems/ sems can gyi yul
266a5(phal chen): gyi dga' ba thams cad la ni mi lta/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya thams cad la ni mi lta/ g.yog 'khor dang / longs spyod dang / nye bar spyad pa thams
266a6(phal chen): cad la ni mi lta ste/ rgyal srid dang / dbang phyug gi dbang gi bde ba thams cad la ni mi lta la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bla na med par yongs su dag pa mngon par bsgrubs pas/
266a7(phal chen): sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba dang / yongs su dag par bya ba la blta ba/ mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / rim gror bya bas mi ngoms
266b1(phal chen): pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la blta ba dang / rang bzhin med pa yongs su shes pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir chos thams cad la blta ba/ yon tan rgya
266b2(phal chen): mtsho thams cad kyi don du nan tan bya ba las nyams pa med par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad la blta ba dang / bskal ba thams cad du byang chub
266b3(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam chen po la lta ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
266b4(phal chen): 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad du 'jug par bya ba la lta ba/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo re rer/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa thams cad gzud pa la rnam par 'phrul par
266b5(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la lta ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par bzung bas/ mi ngoms par bya
266b6(phal chen): pa'i phyir chos kyi ye shes snang ba'i 'khor lo thams cad la lta ba de/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'di dag dang / gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen
266b7(phal chen): las byung ba ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ de dag thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin par yang dag par lta zhing / mthar gyis yul khams chen po gang na ba der phyin
267a1(phal chen): nas| spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ut+pa la yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol ba las mthong nas/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ut+pa
267a2(phal chen): la gang na bder phyin te/ drung du song nas spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon spyod ut+pa la'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ut+pa la
267a3(phal chen): la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ut+pa la'i mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /
267a4(phal chen): 'phags pa/ bdag sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i ye shes 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar yang
267a5(phal chen): dga'| sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku yongs su grub par bgyi bar yang dga'/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi bar yang dga'/
267a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bgyi bar yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad snang
267a7(phal chen): bar bgyi bar yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su brten par yang dga'/ sgrib pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par
267b1(phal chen): gtor bar yang dga'/ zhing gi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rnam par rgyu bar yang 'tshal nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs na/ ji ltar
267b2(phal chen): byang chub sems pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' thams
267b3(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma 'tshal to/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed pa legs so/ /
267b4(phal chen): legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni spos thams cad shes te/ spos sbyar ba thams cad dang / bdug spos thams cad dang / bdug spos sbyar ba thams cad dang / byug pa
267b5(phal chen): thams cad dang / byug pa sbyar ba thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad dang / phye ma sbyar ba thams cad dang / spos dang byug pa dang / phye ma'i rnam pa thams cad kyang shes te/ lha'i
267b6(phal chen): spos kyang shes so/ /klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i spos kyang
267b7(phal chen): shes so/ /nad gso ba'i spos dang / yid mi bde ba bsal ba'i spos dang / 'jig rten gyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang / nyon mongs pa 'bar bar bya ba'i spos dang /
268a1(phal chen): nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba'i spos dang / 'dus byas kyi dga' ba dang bde ba sna tshogs yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang / 'dus byas thams
268a2(phal chen): cad las skyo ba yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang / bag bya ba'i gnas thams cad yongs su sel ba'i spos dang / sangs rgyas yid la bya ba'i rgyud yang dag par 'byung ba'i
268a3(phal chen): spos dang / chos kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba'i spos dang / 'phags pas spyad pa'i spos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spos rnam pa tha dad pa dang / byang chub sems
268a4(phal chen): dpa'i sa thams cad rnam par dgod pa'i spos kyang shes te/ kho bos spos de dag thams cad rnam pa ji lta bu'ang rab tu shes so/ /'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / 'grub pa dang / yongs
268a5(phal chen): su rdzogs pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su spangs pa dang / rab tu sbyar ba dang / yongs su spyad pa dang / yul dang / mthu dang / las dang / rgyu yang rab tu shes so/ /rigs kyi bu/ mi'i
268a6(phal chen): 'jig rten na spos glang po'i snying po zhes bya ba/ klu yongs su 'khrug par byed pa yod de/ de'i ri lu til gyi 'bru tsam gyis kyang / yul khams chen po thams cad spos kyi sprin gyi dra
268a7(phal chen): ba shin tu stug pas kun nas khebs par gyur te/ zhag bdun du spos chu'i rgyun shin tu phra ba'i char mngon par 'bab bo/ /de'i tshe sems can su'i lus sam/ gos la spos chu'i
268b1(phal chen): rgyun de dag gis bab par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / me tog gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pas rnam par brgyan pa'i gos dang / lus su 'gyur ro/ /khang pa dang / gzhal
268b2(phal chen): med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa gang du bab par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / me tog gser gyi kha dog lta bus rnam par brgyan par gnas so/ /sems can khyim gyi
268b3(phal chen): nang na gnas par gang gis/ spos kyi sprin gyi dra ba de la rlung gis mngad pa'i dri tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / zhag bdun du dga' ba dang / mos pa chen pos yongs su
268b4(phal chen): rgyas par 'gyur te/ lus dang sems la bde ba dang / dga' ba sna tshogs kyang rab tu myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag gi lus la yang khams 'khrugs pa las gyur pa'am/ gzhan
268b5(phal chen): gyis gnod par byas pa las gyur pa'i nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ba med do/ /sems kyi sdug bsngal dang / mi bde ba yang mi 'byung ngo / /'jigs pa'am/ dngang ba'am/ bag
268b6(phal chen): tsha ba'am/ yid 'khrugs pa'am/ gnod sems kyang mi rgyu ste/ de dag thams cad zhag bdun du dga' ba dang bde ba skyes te/ gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems su 'gyur
268b7(phal chen): ro| |rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni de dag de ltar dga' ba dang / nyams bde ba skyes pa rnams la bsam pa dag par bya ba'i phyir/ ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
269a1(phal chen): byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu/ rim la ya las 'byung ba'i tsan dan sa steng dam pa zhes bya ba yod
269a2(phal chen): de| de lus la bskus na me'i 'obs su mchongs kyang tshig pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ rgya mtsho'i mtha' nas 'byung ba'i spos gzhan gyis thub pa med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ des rnga'am/
269a3(phal chen): dung la bskus na/ de'i sgras gzhan gyi 'khor thams cad pham par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ mtsho ma dros pa'i ngogs nas 'byung ba'i a ga ru nag po pad+mo'i snying po zhes bya ba
269a4(phal chen): yod de/ de'i ri lu til gyi 'bru tsam gcig gi dris kyang / 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad rgyas par gang bar 'gyur te/ sems can gang gis spos kyi dri de tshor ba de dag thams
269a5(phal chen): cad kyang sdig pa la smod cing / sdom pa'i sems rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ ri'i rgyal po kha ba can las 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa 'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba
269a6(phal chen): yod de/ de'i dri tshor na sems can de dag 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su 'gyur te/ kho bo ni de dag la ci nas kyang rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge
269a7(phal chen): 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/ srin po'i 'jig rten nas 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni 'khor los bsgyur
269b1(phal chen): ba'i longs spyod kyi don du 'byung ste/ des bdugs ma thag tu 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa yang nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas so/ /rigs
269b2(phal chen): kyi bu| lha'i 'khor chos bzang po nas 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ des bdugs ma thag tu lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi dri zhim po dran par 'gyur
269b3(phal chen): ro| |rigs kyi bu/ lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i gnas na spos kyi rnam pa dag pa'i mdzod ces bya ba yod de/ des bdugs ma thag tu mtshe ma'i lha'i bu thams cad lha'i rgyal po
269b4(phal chen): rab mtshe ma'i drung du 'dong ngo / /de dag der phyin nas kyang lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe mas chos kyi gtam bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ dga' ldan gyi gnas na spos kyi rnam pa sin du ba ra
269b5(phal chen): zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i spos kyi dud pa byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gis thogs pa chos kyi stan la 'dug pa'i mdun du phyung na/ spos kyi sprin chen pos chos kyi dbyings thams
269b6(phal chen): cad rgyas par gang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i chos kyi sprin chen po'i char rab tu bab bo/ /rigs
269b7(phal chen): kyi bu| lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i gnas na/ spos kyi rnam pa yid 'phrog pa zhes bya ba yod de/ des lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i gnas su bdugs na/ zhag bdun
270a1(phal chen): du chos kyi sprin gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bos ni spos sbyar ba de shes su zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems
270a2(phal chen): dpa' skyon gyi dri ma med pa 'dod pa'i 'jig rten thams cad nas gyen du 'phags pa/ nyon mongs pa'i bdud kyi zhags pa dang bral ba/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad las
270a3(phal chen): shin tu 'das pa/ ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam pa dang / gzugs kyis rnam par spyod pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis gos pa med pa/ chags pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/ sgrib
270a4(phal chen): pa med pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang / yul du ldan pa/ kun gyi gzhi'i gnas thams cad la mi gnas par srid
270a5(phal chen): pa'i kun gzhi dang / gnas thams cad du rgyu ba rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/ tshul khrims kyi spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo yongs su smos pa'am
270a6(phal chen): kha na ma tho ba med pa'i spyod pa'am/ gnod par spyod pa med pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi rgyud bstan par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid
270a7(phal chen): na| grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na mnyan pa dpa' bo zhes bya ba 'dug gi /de'i drung du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems
270b1(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ut+pa la'i rkang pa gnyis la
270b2(phal chen): spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ut+pa la la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ spos 'tshong gi
270b3(phal chen): tshong dpon longs spyod ut+pa la'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang grong khyer khang pa brtsegs par 'gro ba'i lam du 'jug pa'i tshe/ lam gyi gyen thur dang / lam
270b4(phal chen): mnyam pa dang / lam gyi thag thug dang / lam rdul yod pa dang / lam rdul med pa dang / lam bde ba dang / lam mi bde ba dang / lam dog pa dang / lam gegs med pa
270b5(phal chen): dang | lam 'khyug pa dang / lam 'khyug pa med pa la rnam par spyod de/ bltas nas 'dri snyam du bsams so/ /'di ltar bdag dge ba'i bshes gnyen de'i drung du 'gro ba
270b6(phal chen): 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /sems can la phan gdags pa'i lam gyi nan tan
270b7(phal chen): gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad byams sdang dang / mthon dman du gyur pa'i g.yang sa las rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad mi mnyam pa'i nan
271a1(phal chen): tan las bsgyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rdul rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i lta ba sna tshogs
271a2(phal chen): kyi sdong dum dang / tsher ma dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma bsal ba dang / chos kyi dbyings bsgribs pa med pa la gzhol bar bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du thogs
271a3(phal chen): pa med par bskyal ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni/ thams
271a4(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rag lus so zhes/ de de ltar sems shing yid la byed pas spyod pa thub par dka' ba de mthar gyis grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa der phyin nas/ mnyan pa
271a5(phal chen): dpa' bo yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer chen po zhig gi sgo rgya mtsho chen po'i ngogs na mnyan pa dpa' bo de tshong pa brgya phrag stong tsam dang / srog chags brgya
271a6(phal chen): stong du ma gtam sna tshogs nyan par 'dong pa sha stag gis kun nas bskor cing / rgya mtsho'i gtam yongs su brjod pas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho sems can
