300a3(phal chen): gzung ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang / nan tan thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag lus pa'i 'du shes can/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa shin
300a4(phal chen): tu dga' bar sems pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen las stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che 'byung zhing 'thob par 'gyur pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen
300a5(phal chen): las ye shes snang ba mi zad pa 'byung ba'i 'du shes can/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rten gyis bsod nams kyi rgyud rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang
300a6(phal chen): ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo yang dag par ston pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni ye shes kyi rgya mtsho
300a7(phal chen): chen po la 'jug pa yongs su ston par 'du shes pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par 'dus pa yongs su bskyed pa'i 'du
300b1(phal chen): shes dang ldan pa de/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po gang na ba der phyin te/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos/ tshong dpon gyi bu
300b2(phal chen): nor bzang ring zhig nas tshur 'ong ba mthong nas smras pa/ tshur shog/ dpe med pa'i theg pa chen po yangs shing / bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pa/ skye ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal
300b3(phal chen): sna tshogs kyis gtses shing skyabs med par gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyabs pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa/ 'jig
300b4(phal chen): rten thams cad las 'das te/ dpe med tshad med pa la mngon par mos pa/ snying rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs pas 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyabs pa'i blo gros can/ blta
300b5(phal chen): na kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la mngon du bltas pa/ smon lam chen po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyangs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su
300b6(phal chen): gzung bar mos pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pas ngoms mi shes pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jam dpal
300b7(phal chen): gyi ye shes rgya mtsho las byung ba'i yon tan gyi 'byung gnas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs thob par bya ba la mngon du bltas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba dang shugs rab tu thob
301a1(phal chen): pa| sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yang dag par gzung ba la mngon par mos pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas mthong bas dga' ba dang /
301a2(phal chen): mos pa'i shugs kyis yid rab tu bde bar gyur pa/ legs par spyod pa tshad med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i shugs kyis mngon par brlan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ yon tan
301a3(phal chen): la nan tan du bya ba'i shugs kyis rnam par dag pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi mdzod bdag la mngon du gyur pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i lam gyi shugs
301a4(phal chen): gzhan la yongs su bstan pa'i bsam pa can/ snying rje chen po'i shugs ma nyams pa'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang ba'i shugs yang dag par
301a5(phal chen): gzung ba'i blo gros can khyod 'ongs pa legs so/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po gang na ba der song nas/ byang chub
301a6(phal chen): sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs
301a7(phal chen): su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
301b1(phal chen): na| ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
301b2(phal chen): gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan
301b3(phal chen): du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos/ mdog 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa/
301b4(phal chen): 'od kyi dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs tshad med pa 'phro ba'i rgyan gyi sprin rab tu 'gyed pa'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po las byung ba'i 'od zer sna tshogs dri ma
301b5(phal chen): med pa/ lus dang sems kyi bde ba tshad med pa rab tu skyed pa'i tshogs kyis shin tu rgyas pa'i lag pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gi spyi bo la bzhag ste 'di skad ces smras so//
301b6(phal chen): rigs kyi bu/ de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i
301b7(phal chen): sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba shes te/ rigs kyi bu/ nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa de ni/ 'gro ba thams cad
302a1(phal chen): la dbye ba med par sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba la zhugs pa/ sgo kun nas thos shing rnam par rig par 'gyur bas/ sems can yongs
302a2(phal chen): su bsdu ba dang gdul ba la nye bar gnas pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa la gnas pas/ de bzhin gshegs
302a3(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sems can thams cad kyi dgos pa la'ang sta gon du gnas te/ sbyin pas kyang sems can yongs su sdud do/ /ngag snyan
302a4(phal chen): pa dang / don bya ba dang / don mthun pas kyang sems can yongs su sdud do/ /gzugs kyi lus rnam par bstan pas kyang sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /kha dog
302a5(phal chen): dang / dbyibs dang / gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan te/ rnam par dmigs par bya ba dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba dgye bas kyang / sems can rab tu sim par byed
302a6(phal chen): cing yongs su smin par byed do/ /bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dbyangs brjod pa dang / ci la dga' ba'i spyod lam yongs su bstan pa dang / mos pa sna tshogs dang tshul mthun
302a7(phal chen): par chos bstan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam 'phrul ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dge ba'i chos bsags par bag mi byed pa'i sems can gyi sems yongs su bskul
302b1(phal chen): ba dang / bsam pa dang mthun par sprul pa sna tshogs tshad med pa yongs su bstan pa dang / rigs sna tshogs su skyes pa'i sems can rnam dang skal pa mthun pa'i gzugs yongs su
302b2(phal chen): bstan pa dang / gnas gcig tu 'grogs pas kyang / sems can yongs su bsdus shing yongs su smin par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo
302b3(phal chen): snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa 'di yongs su sbyangs pas/ 'gro ba thams cad rab tu rten pa'i smon lam bskyed de/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa
302b4(phal chen): dang / sems can thams cad kyi rgyud kyi 'jigs pa zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mgo rmongs pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad
302b5(phal chen): kyis bcings pa'i 'jigs pa yongs su gcad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi srog la bab par mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi
302b6(phal chen): yo byad kyis phongs pa'i 'jigs pa bsal ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi grags pa med pa'i 'jigs
302b7(phal chen): pa las yongs su bzla ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khor du bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa med pa
303a1(phal chen): bya ba dang / /sems can thams cad 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las rnam par bzla ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi ngan song gi 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog
303a2(phal chen): pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lam mun pas nyam nga ba phyir mi ldog pa'i snang bas gsal bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi skal ba mi mnyam pa dang 'grogs
303a3(phal chen): pa'i 'jigs pa shin tu bsal ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug pa dang bral ba'i 'jigs pa dgag par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi sdug pa dang 'grogs
303a4(phal chen): pa'i 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad lus la mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad sems la mi bde ba'i 'jigs
303a5(phal chen): pa las dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su bzla ba'i phyir/ 'gro ba thams cad rab tu rten pa'i smon
303a6(phal chen): lam mngon par bsgrub pa 'di byas so/ /sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa rnam par zhi bar bya ba'i phyir yang 'jig rten du rjes su dran pa'i sgo byin gyis brlabs so/ /
303a7(phal chen): sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi ming gi 'khor lo'ang 'jig rten du rnam par dmigs par byas so/ /dus ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro
303b1(phal chen): bas rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir/ 'gro ba thams cad rnam pa'i bye brag mtha' yas pa dang mnyam par nga'i lus kyang byin gyis brlabs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar nga ni thabs 'dis
303b2(phal chen): sems can thams cad 'jigs pa las yongs su bkrol zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
303b3(phal chen): cing phyir mi ldog par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa 'di thob par zad na/ ngas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
303b4(phal chen): bzang po rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa khong du chud par rtogs pa/ dge ba'i
303b5(phal chen): chos mngon par 'du bya ba rgyun mi gcod pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyud la rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa/ bskal pa thams cad du
303b6(phal chen): gnas shing spyod pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ dus gsum thams cad kyi tshul rjes su rtogs pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi klong
303b7(phal chen): yongs su 'khyil ba'i rgyud la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i sems rnam par zhi bar byed pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i sems
304a1(phal chen): yongs su 'phel ba'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgyun las phyir ldog par byed pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/
304a2(phal chen): yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /g.yas phyogs bskor ba byas te gus par bkur bstod nas/ /nor bzang shin tu dul ba lho phyogs rgyud du song / /spyan
304a3(phal chen): ras gzigs dbang drang srong snying rje rnam spyod pa/ /rin chen ri yi sul na gnas par des kyang mthong / /rin chen sna tshogs rdo rje'i ri yi sman ljongs na/ /pad+mo'i snying po'i seng ge'i
304a4(phal chen): khri la brtan pa 'dug/ lha dang lha min klu dang srin po mi'am ci/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis bskor cing de la chos kyang ston/ /mthong nas nor bzang dga' ba tshad med skyes par gyur/ /bsnyen
304a5(phal chen): te yon tan rgya mtsho'i rkang la phyag 'tshal nas/ /ci nas bzang po'i spyod pa bdag gis thob 'gyur bar/ /'phags pas thugs rje bskyed de gdams shing bslab par gsol/ /
304a6(phal chen): bsod nams brgya bas brgyan pa'i dri med lag brkyang ste/ /'od sprin dra ba rgya chen bzang po rab bton nas/ /nor bzang spyi bor bzhag ste sems can rnam dag pa/ /spyan ras
304a7(phal chen): gzigs kyi dbang po mkhas pas tshig 'di smras/ /sangs rgyas sras po da ni rnam thar gcig sgo shes/ /ye shes snying po rgyal ba kun gyi thugs rjes sdug /'gro ba thams cad
304b1(phal chen): bskyab cing yongs su bsdu phyir byung / /kun tu bdag nyid rang la byams pa bzhin du rgyu/ /'gro ba mang po thams cad sdug bsngal kun las skyob/ /gang rnams dam du bcings shing dgra lag
304b2(phal chen): phyin pa dang / /lus la gzer cing de bzhin btson rar btsud pa yang / /nga yi ming thos bcings shing bzung ba thar bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po dag la nyes pa'i g.yon byas gsad spangs pa/ /
304b3(phal chen): de tshe de dag nga yi ming yang dran 'gyur na/ /mda' 'phangs de yi lus la phog par mi 'gyur te/ /mtshon rnon btab kyang de dag mi 'dzug rgal bar 'gyur/ /dbang po'i 'khor du phyin
304b4(phal chen): dang gang rnams rtsod gyur pa/ /dgra rnams kun las rgyal 'gyur grags pa thob par 'gyur/ /grags dang grogs dang rigs dang nor rnams 'phel bar 'gyur/ /nga yi ming dran de dag thub
304b5(phal chen): pa med par 'gyur/ /gang gis nga yi ming ni rjes su dran byas pa/ /de dag rkun pos 'jigs dogs dgras 'jigs nags phyin te/ /seng ge dom gzig gcan zan g.yag rgod
304b6(phal chen): sbrul gang yang / /dgra rnams kun las rgyal zhing 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ /gang rnams la las nga yi ming zhig dran byas na/ /sdang ba'i sems kyis rin chen ltongs su bor
304b7(phal chen): gyur tam/ /sol ma dag lce med rab tu 'bar bar bor gyur kyang / /me rnams pad+mos gang ba'i chu yi gter du 'gyur/ /nga yi ming ni skad 'ga' yud tsam rjes dran na/ /rgya mtsho'i
305a1(phal chen): chur bor de yi nang du 'chir mi 'gyur/ /chu bos mi khyer me yi dbus su 'tshig mi 'gyur/ /don med kun tu mi 'gyur don rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /shing
305a2(phal chen): sgrog dbyig chings lcags sgrog de bzhin ltung rnams dang / /brnyas shing khyad bsad de bzhin bring cing bslus pa dang / /spyos shing bsdigs te gshe dang sma phab rnam pa las/ /
305a3(phal chen): nga yi ming tsam dran par byas na thar pa thob/ /gang rnams shar gnyer sna tshogs glags lta ji snyed dang / /gang rnams rtag tu zhe sdang mi snyan brjod pa'i rnams/ /nga yi ming thos
305a4(phal chen): dran byas snyan par brjod par 'gyur/ /mthong ba tsam gyis mod la byams pa'i sems kyang skye/ /nga yi ming tsam la la gang gis dran byas na/ /gnod pa'i don du ro langs sngags
305a5(phal chen): dang byad byed pa'i/ /dgra rnams rtag tu de yi zil gyis non par 'gyur/ /ma lus dug gis de yi lus la mi tshugs so/ /la la gang gis nga yi ming tsam dran byas na/ /klu dbang
305a6(phal chen): srin tshogs mkha' lding sha za thams cad dang / /grul bum srul po 'tshe byed gtum pa'i sems ldan dang / /mdangs 'phrog 'jigs byed rmi lam 'ong ba'ang zhi bar 'gyur/ /
305a7(phal chen): nga yi ming ni skad cig yud tsam dran byas kyang / /pha dang ma dang gnyen gshes mdza' ba kun dang yang / /'bral bar mi 'gyur sdang dang 'grogs par de bzhin min/ /nor
305b1(phal chen): zad mi 'gyur phongs pa'i dngos su mi 'gyur ro/ /nga yi ming gi rjes su la la dran byed na/ /'di nas shi 'phos mnar med sems dmyal mi 'gro ste/ /byol song skye gnas yi dwags mi
305b2(phal chen): khom gnas su min/ /sems can dag pa lha dang mi yi gnas su skye/ /nga yi ming ni la la gang gis dran byas na/ /dmus long zhar ba 'on pa zha bor mi 'gyur te/ /theng po long bar mi
305b3(phal chen): 'gyur gsal smra blta sdug 'gyur/ /bskal ba bye ba mang por dbang po kun ldan 'gyur/ /la la gang gis nga yi ming ni rjes dran na/ /sems can dag pa 'di nas shi 'phos phyogs
305b4(phal chen): bcu yi/ /'jig rten khams su sangs rgyas mngon sum skye bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mthong 'gyur de dag chos kyang thos par 'gyur/ /'di dang de bzhin gzhan dag thabs mang ji snyed
305b5(phal chen): kyis/ /'gro ba sems can nga 'dul gzhal dang zad mi nus/ /sangs rgyas sras po ngas ni rnam thar gcig bsgom ste/ /yon tan can gyi yon tan thams cad ngas mi shes/ /de'i tshe
305b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba zhes bya ba/ shar phyogs nas nam mkha'i dbyings las 'ongs te mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khor yug gi rtse mor 'dug go/
305b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro bas/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams khor yug gi rtse mo la rkang pa gnyis por ma thag tu/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam
306a1(phal chen): ba drug tu g.yos te/ rin po che du ma'i rang bzhin du kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba des/ nyi ma dang / zla ba'i 'od thams
306a2(phal chen): cad zil gyis non pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa
306a3(phal chen): dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po dang / me dang / rin po che dang / glog dang / skar ma'i 'od kyang zil gyis non pa de lta bu'i 'od lus bkye ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag kyang
306a4(phal chen): snang bar byas/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thibs po thams cad kyang snang bar byas te/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyang de ma thag
306a5(phal chen): tu zhi'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'ang nyams su mi gnod par gyur to/ /mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang / sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyang rtse zil bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas
306a6(phal chen): kyi zhing sa thams cad du'ang rin po che'i sprin gyi char phab ste/ me tog dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang /
306a7(phal chen): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char yang mngon par phab ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo / /de'i lus
306b1(phal chen): de'i gzugs brnyan ni/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas su snang ba ste/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sim par byed pa la mngon par gzhol bas/ ri gru 'dzin de la byang chub sems dpa'
306b2(phal chen): spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i drung du'ang phyin par snang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs
306b3(phal chen): kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir phyin pa mthong ngam/ smras pa/ 'phags pa/ mthong ngo / /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub
306b4(phal chen): sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas
306b5(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang
306b6(phal chen): po la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang / byang
306b7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i ye shes kyi gting ma rnyed pa'i sems kyis/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po bltas pas kyang ma ngoms bzhin du bsgo ba dang mi
307a1(phal chen): 'gal bar byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba gang na ba der song ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos
307a2(phal chen): phyag 'tshal nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
307a3(phal chen): na| ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
307a4(phal chen): rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
307a5(phal chen): ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun tu 'gro ba thob pa'o/ /
307a6(phal chen): smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi zhabs kyi drung nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba 'di brnyes/ /
307a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams de ni 'di nas ji srid cig na mchis/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas bzhud nas ni ji srid cig lags/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gnas 'di ni/ lha
307b1(phal chen): dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus kyang shes par dka' ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang / byang chub sems
307b2(phal chen): dpa'i brtson 'grus mi ldog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mi 'phrog pa'i yul te/ de ni rigs kyi bu/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa/ sangs rgyas
307b3(phal chen): kyis ma dgongs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags pa/ bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po ma thob pa/ shes rab kyi mig dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis thos
307b4(phal chen): pa'am/ yongs su gzung ba'am/ yid ches pa'am/ khong du chud par bya bar mi nus so/ /smras pa/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gzungs kyis dad pa dang
307b5(phal chen): mos par bgyi na 'phags pas bdag la bka' mi stsal tam/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ nga ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi snying po dang ldan pa/ de bzhin
307b6(phal chen): gshegs pa dpal kun nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'ongs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i zhabs kyi drung
307b7(phal chen): nas/ ngas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar bsgo kun tu 'gro ba 'di thob bo/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi snying po dang ldan pa de nas nga song nas ni/
308a1(phal chen): bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig 'das te/ sems bskyed pa re re zhing yang gom pa sangs
308a2(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig por ro/ /gom pa re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das te/
308a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan par shes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod
308a4(phal chen): pa bla na med pa/ yid kyi rang bzhin chos nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rgyas btab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba yongs su
308a5(phal chen): bskyed pas mthong ba byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ste/ de dag thams cad kyi sems rgya
308a6(phal chen): mtsho'ang khong du chud do/ /de dag thams cad kyi dbang po'i 'khor lo yang yongs su shes shing bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta bzhin du gzugs kyi lus yongs su bstan to/ /chos kyi
308a7(phal chen): dbyings rab tu bsgrags so/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su bkye'o/ /yo byad sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pas kyang nye bar sdud do/ /rang gi lus kyang de dag la byin gyis brlabs
308b1(phal chen): te| de ni yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i sbyor ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro/ /shar phyogs nas ji ltar 'ongs pa de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang /
308b2(phal chen): byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs nas kyang de
308b3(phal chen): bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu/ ngas ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ ngas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs kun tu mngon par
308b4(phal chen): gzhol ba tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus rnam par bkod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du
308b5(phal chen): mthun par spyod pa/ zhing thams cad lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ chos thams cad kyi rgyud kyi rjes su song ba/ dus gsum gyi rgyud mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/ chos kyi phyogs kyi
308b6(phal chen): rgyud dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad du rnam par snang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pa/ chags
308b7(phal chen): pa med pa'i rgyud thams cad khong du chud pa/ gnas med pa'i rgyud la rab tu gnas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par yang nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/
309a1(phal chen): lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer sgo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na lha lha chen po zhes bya ba 'dug gi /de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas
309a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i rkang
309a3(phal chen): pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ byang chub sems
309a4(phal chen): dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems
309a5(phal chen): dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi spyod yul 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can/ mngon par shes pa chen po/ mngon par bsgrubs pa'i yul la yon tan gyi khyad par du lta ba/
309a6(phal chen): brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha rab tu dga' ba'i khyad par thob pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba'i rjes su song ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa de/
309a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi sa la ni nan tan du byed/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sa la ni rnam par dpyod/ gzungs kyi sa la ni rab tu gnas par byed/ smon lam gyi sa la ni
309b1(phal chen): 'jug par byed/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i sa la rjes su slob/ stobs kyis ni yongs su sgrub cing mthar gyis grong khyer sgo dang ldan pa gang na ba der song ste/ lha lha chen po kun tu dris
309b2(phal chen): pa dang / de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'de re/ lha lha chen po grong khyer gyi lam gyi bzhi mdo na/ bdag nyid shin tu che bas sems can rnams la chos ston cing 'dug
309b3(phal chen): go| de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang lha lha chen po gang na ba der song ste/ lha lha chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces
309b4(phal chen): smras so/ /'phags pa/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par
309b5(phal chen): bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji
309b6(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ de nas lha lha chen
309b7(phal chen): pos lag pa bzhi phyogs bzhir brkyang ste/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las shin tu myur ba'i shugs kyis chu blangs te/ bdag gi gdong bkrus nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la gser
310a1(phal chen): gyi me tog gis gtor te 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mthong bar shin tu dka' ste/ thos par yang rab tu dka'o/ /
310a2(phal chen): skyes bu mchog gi me tog pun da ri ka ni 'jig rten gyi phul du bya ba yin par ngos tshar rmad du byung ba yin te/ 'jig rten gyi gnas su gyur pa'o/ /'gro ba'i rten du gyur pa'o/ /sems
310a3(phal chen): can rnams la snang ba chen po 'byin pa'o/ /lam rmongs pa rnams la lam bde ba ston pa'o/ /chos kyi tshul du gzud pa la mgon du gyur pa'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer
310a4(phal chen): du phyin par bya ba la ded dpon chen po gyur pa ste/ de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ming ni sems dri ma med pa rnams la
310a5(phal chen): rang gi lus kyi gzugs brnyan ston cing / lus rnam par dag pa rnams la mngon par snang ba dang / ngag gi nyes pa spangs pa rnams dbyangs kyi snang ba yongs su gdon par byed pa
310a6(phal chen): dang / bsam pa dag pa rnams la dus thams cad du mngon sum du gyur par gnas pas lta ba ngan pa 'joms pa yin par bsams so/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni byang chub sems
310a7(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par thar pa sprin gyi dra ba thob pa'o/ /smras pa/ 'phags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sprin gyi dra ba de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ de nas lha lha chen
310b1(phal chen): pos tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gi mdun du ri chen po tsam gyi gser gyi phung po dang / dngul gyi phung po dang / baiDUR+ya'i phung po dang / shel gyi phung po dang / mus ra gal pa'i phung po dang / asmra
310b2(phal chen): gar b+ha'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che ngang gis snang ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa snying po'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po
310b3(phal chen): che phyogs kun tu mngon pa'i phung po dang / gtsug gi nor bu rin po che dang / cod pan gyi phung po dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi se mo do'i phung po dang / dpung rgyan gyi phung po dang / rna cha'i rgyan
310b4(phal chen): gyi phung po dang / gdu bu'i phung po dang / ska rags kyi phung po dang / rkang gdub kyi phung po dang / mu tig dmar po'i dra ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi phung po dang / yan lag dang nying
310b5(phal chen): lag thams cad kyi rgyan gyi phung po dang / nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i phung po dang / me tog thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / bdug pa thams cad dang / phreng ba
310b6(phal chen): thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad dang / gos thams cad dang / gdugs thams cad dang / rgyal mtshan thams cad dang / lha'i ba dan thams cad dang /
310b7(phal chen): rol mo brdung ba thams cad dang / rol mo dkrol ba thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yul thams cad dang / bu mo bye ba brgya stong grangs med pa dag kyang nye bar bstan nas/ tshong dpon
311a1(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di dag las khyer la sbyin pa mang po ni byin cig/ bsod nams mang po ni gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs
311a2(phal chen): pa rnams la ni mchod cig/ sems can mang po ni sbyin pas bsdu ba'i dngos pos yongs su bsdus te/ gtong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la khod cig/ 'jig rten na sbyin pa la slobs shig/
311a3(phal chen): gtang bar dka' ba yongs su gtang ba ni ston cig /rigs kyi bu khyod la kho bos ji ltar yo byad kyi rnam pas bstud pa 'di bzhin du sbyin pa'i bsam pa dang ma bral ba'i sems can
311a4(phal chen): tshad med pa dag gis bsam pa'i rgyud kyang gtong bas yongs su bsgo ba byed do/ /sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge ba'i bshes
311a5(phal chen): gnyen rnams la'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang kho bo ni sems
311a6(phal chen): can 'dod pa'i dga' bas myos pa/ yul gyi longs spyod la yongs su chags pa rnams la yul de dag ni mi sdug par byin gyis rlob bo/ /khro bas non pa dang / nga rgyal can dang /
311a7(phal chen): rgyags shing dregs pa dang / rlom pa tshar gcod pas 'dul ba rnams la ni gtum zhing srin po ltar mi sdug la/ 'jigs pa'i lus sha za zhing khrag 'thung ba'i tshul dang ldan
311b1(phal chen): bar bstan te/ rlom pa dang snyems pas 'khrug pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byed do/ /le lo can brtson 'grus bor ba'i sems can rnams la ni me dang / chu dang / rgyal po dang / rkun po dang /
311b2(phal chen): gnod pa'i 'jigs pa yongs su bstan cing skyo bar byas te/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa la 'god par byed do/ /de ltar thabs de dang de dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi phyogs dang
311b3(phal chen): mi mthun pa rab tu gzhom pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi tshogs bsags pa dang / sgrib pa'i ri'i g.yang sa'i lam thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba dang / sgrib pa
311b4(phal chen): med pa'i chos la gzud pa'i phyir mi dge ba thams cad las rnam par bzlog ste/ dge ba thams cad phun sum tshogs pa la yang dag par 'god pa byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho bos ni/
311b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sprin gyi dra ba 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' dbang po ltar nyon mongs pa'i lha ma yin rab tu 'joms pa/ chu ltar 'gro ba
311b6(phal chen): thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi me'i phung po zhi bar byed pa/ me'i phung po ltar 'gro ba thams cad gyi srid pa'i chu skems pa/ rlung ltar 'dzin pa'i mngon par chags pa thams cad kyi
311b7(phal chen): ri rnam par 'thor ba/ rdo rje ltar bdag gis 'du shes sra ba'i brag rab tu rnyil ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ 'dzam
312a1(phal chen): bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi yul ma ga d+ha'i snying po byang chub na/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma zhes bya ba 'dug gi /de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang
312a2(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ lha lha chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag
312a3(phal chen): 'tshal te/ lha lha chen po la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang du bltas te/ lha lha chen po'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor
312a4(phal chen): bzang / mthar gyis yul ma ga d+ha'i snying po byang chub tu sa'i lha mo brtan ma gang na ba der song ba dang / de 'gro ba'i tshe sa'i lha mo brgya stong phrag bcu gcig la gcig 'di skad
312a5(phal chen): ces 'dzer to/ /sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'ong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can/ sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i sgo
312a6(phal chen): nga'i sbubs 'dral bar 'gyur ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'ong ngo / /chos kyi rgyal po'i rigs su byung ba/ chags pa med cing dri ma med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i go 'phang dam
312a7(phal chen): pa 'thob par 'gyur ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'ong ngo / /ye shes kyi mthu bo che rdo rje'i mtshon cha can dpa' bo phas kyi rgol ba'i 'khor thams cad rab tu 'dul ba zhig 'di nas
312b1(phal chen): tshur 'ong ngo zhes nas/ de'i mod la lha mo brtan ma la sogs pa sa'i lha mo brgya stong phrag bcus sa chen po rab tu bskyod de/ 'brug sgra zab mo lta bu'i sgra chen po grag par byas nas/ stong
312b2(phal chen): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'od chen pos snang bar byas te/ lus rin po che'i rgyan dang lhab lhub thams cad kyis shin tu brgyan nas/ glog gi phreng ba'i tshogs nam
312b3(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings las 'gyu zhing snang ba lta bu sha stag tu byas te/ shing thams cad kyi myu gu ni skye bar byed/ me tog gi shing thams cad ni kha 'bu bar byed/ chu klung gi rgyun thams cad ni
312b4(phal chen): 'bab par byed/ mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / lu ma thams cad ni rgyas par byed/ spos chu'i char pa ni rab tu 'bab par byed/ me tog gi sprin rab tu 'thor ba'i rlung chen po ni ldang bar byed/
312b5(phal chen): sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni rab tu sgra sgrog par byed/ lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang dang / rgyan gyi tshogs mang po ni rab tu 'khrol bar bed/ ba lang dang / khyu mchog dang /
312b6(phal chen): glang po dang / stag dang / ri dwags kyi dbang po ni rab tu sgra 'byin par byed/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang / 'byung po'i dbang po rnams ni 'brug sgra 'byin par byed/ ri'i dbang
312b7(phal chen): po chen po rnams ni phan tshun thug par byed/ gter gyi tshogs bye ba brgya stong ni mngon du 'byung bar byed cing / sa'i 'og nas 'thon to/ /de nas sa'i lha mo brtan mas/ tshong dpon
313a1(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod 'dir 'ongs pa legs so/ /sa'i phyogs 'di ni sngon khyod kyi gnas su gyur te/ kho mo'i mngon sum du dge ba'i
313a2(phal chen): rtsa ba bskyed pa yin na/ de'i rnam par smin pa'i phyogs 'ga' tsam blta bar 'dod dam/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag
313a3(phal chen): 'tshal te/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /
313a4(phal chen): 'phags ma/ 'tshal lo/ /de nas sa'i lha mo brtan mas rkang pa'i mthil gyis sa chen po la brdabs te/ rin po che'i gter bye ba brgya stong grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa bstan nas
313a5(phal chen): 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ rin po che'i gter bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di dag kyang / khyod kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /khyod kyi sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /khyod kyis ci dgar spyad
313a6(phal chen): pa'o/ /khyod kyi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'o/ /khyod kyi bsod nams kyi stobs kyis bsrungs pa'o/ /'di las long ste/ khyod kyis ci dgos pa de dag gyis shig/
313a7(phal chen): rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can thob pa ste/ de ltar kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
313b1(phal chen): thar pa 'di dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad tshun chad du byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su 'brang zhing / rtag tu srung ba la zhugs pa ste/ de tshun chad du/ rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni byang
313b2(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i sems kyi spyod pa la rnam par spyod do/ /ye shes kyi yul la 'jug go/ smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor khong du chud par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag
313b3(phal chen): pa rjes su rtogs par byed do/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi tshul gyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad dang / sems rgya chen pos rgyas par 'gengs
313b4(phal chen): so| |byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyis dbang bsgyur ba dang / zhing gi dra ba thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan pa yang dag
313b5(phal chen): par mnod pa dang / dus thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yang dag par bstan pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul thams cad dang / mdo sde yang dag par brjod pa'i chos kyi sprin
313b6(phal chen): gyi tshul thams cad dang / chos snang ba chen pos snang bar bya ba'i tshul dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad
313b7(phal chen): yang dag par bstan pa'i tshul yang rjes su rtogs par byed do/ /yang dag par 'dzin to/ /yang dag par nod do/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub
314a1(phal chen): par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di yang bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol de'i yang pha rol gcig tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya
314a2(phal chen): bar bskal pa snang bas rnam par brgyan pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzang po las thob ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka'
314a3(phal chen): ba'i snying po can 'di la yongs su dpyod dpyod/ rnam par dpyod dpyod/ shin tu dpyod dpyod/ yang dag par 'phel bar byed de/ shin tu rgyas par byed byed pas/ bskal pa bzang po
314a4(phal chen): la thug gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang ma bral lo/ /de srid kyi bar gyis kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ sangs
314a5(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig bsnyen bkur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa'i
314a6(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa yang mthong ste/ kho mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon sum du mthong ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i
314a7(phal chen): rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zham ring du 'brang ba/
314b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi rjes su 'brang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug par dka' ba la rab tu zhugs pa/ sems kyi skad cig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par
314b2(phal chen): 'gengs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa dri ma med pa'i snying por gyur pa/ sangs rgyas
314b3(phal chen): byung ba thams cad du rtag tu mngon par bsgrubs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las tha mi dad pa'i pho nyar gyur pa/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song /
314b4(phal chen): rigs kyi bu/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi yul ma ga d+ha zhes bya ba na/ grong khyer ser skya'i gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'dug gi /de'i gan du
314b5(phal chen): song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ sa'i lha mo
314b6(phal chen): brtan ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i
314b7(phal chen): drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang / sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i gdams ngag rjes su dran par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka'
315a1(phal chen): ba'i snying po can de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa de rab tu goms par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi tshul
315a2(phal chen): de'i rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba de la rnam par dpyad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba de la
315a3(phal chen): rnam par blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho de la 'jug par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes tha dad pa de la
315a4(phal chen): yid ches par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes shin tu sbyangs pa de rjes su rtogs par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye
315a5(phal chen): shes rgya mtsho de la 'bab par bya ba byed cing / grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas gang na ba der phyin te/ grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas la g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/ shar
315a6(phal chen): phyogs logs kyi grong khyer gyi sgo nas song ste/ nyi ma nub nas ring po ma lon pa zhig tu grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i dbus shig na/ byang chub sems dpa'i gdams ngag
315a7(phal chen): mthun par len pa de/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa mthong bar 'dod cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen yod na sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'thob par 'gyur bar nges pa'i blo
315b1(phal chen): gros dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi mig kun tu lta ba'i yul gyi rang bzhin gyi byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa/ phyogs thams cad du mngon par gzhol zhing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba'i sems
315b2(phal chen): kyis mos pa dang / ye shes chen po'i snying por gyur pa'i 'du shes kyi sems dang ldan pa/ dmigs pa thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi mig dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi
315b3(phal chen): tshul thams cad du ye shes rgya mtsho 'byams klas pas rgyas par 'gengs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mig gis/ phyogs thams cad du shes bya'i rgya mtsho la rnam par blta ba/ ye
315b4(phal chen): shes chen po'i mig 'thob par bya ba la rab tu gzhol zhing bsam pa rtse gcig tu bzhag nas 'dug 'dug pa dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa de/ grong khyer chen po ser
315b5(phal chen): skya'i gnas kyi steng gi nam mkha'i dbyings la/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs dpe med pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa zhig na/ rin po che'i seng ge'i khri chen po spos zhim po thams cad kyi pad+mo'i
315b6(phal chen): snying po can zhig la/ lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa/ skra 'jam zhing mang la mthon mthing du 'dug pa/ mig dkar nag 'byes pa/ gzugs bzang ba shin tu mdzes pa/
315b7(phal chen): blta na sdug pa/ lus rgyan dang lhab lhub thams cad kyis klubs shing brgyan pa/ kha dog bsgyur ba'i gos bgos pa/ tshangs pa'i gtsug tor gyi cod pan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
316a1(phal chen): gyis brgyan pa thogs pa/ lus la rgyu skar dang / gza' dang / skar chen dang / skar ma'i tshogs thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur pa 'dug par mthong
316a2(phal chen): ngo| |des sems can gyi khams yangs par mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba nas/ sems can ji snyed cig yongs su dgrol ba de dag thams cad kyang /
316a3(phal chen): de'i ba spu'i sbubs su chud par mthong ngo / /ji snyed cig mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du bkod pa dang / ji snyed cig nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / thams cad mkhyen pa
316a4(phal chen): nyid du yongs su smin par bya ba de dag thams cad kyang de'i ba spu'i sbubs su chud par mthong ngo / /lus mngon par bsgrub pa dang / gzugs mngon par bsgrub pa dang / kha dog mngon
316a5(phal chen): par bsgrub pa'i thabs sna tshogs kyis ji snyed cig yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang de'i ba spu'i sbubs su chud par mthong ngo / /nga ro mngon par bsgrub pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan
316a6(phal chen): lag mngon par bsgrub pa dang / skad kyi tshul sna tshogs yongs su sbyar ba ji snyed cig gis yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang / de'i ba spu'i sgo nas rjes su brjod pa thos so/ dus
316a7(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub pa dang / bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
316b1(phal chen): gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis rnam par 'phrul ba'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub
316b2(phal chen): sems dpa'i yongs su lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyes bu seng ge chen po'i rnam par
316b3(phal chen): bsgyings pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba ji snyed cig gis/ des sems can yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang / de'i ba spu'i sbubs su chud par mthong
316b4(phal chen): ngo| |des thabs sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho de dag mthong zhing thos nas dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la/ tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo
316b5(phal chen): dpyid dang ldan pa de la lus thams cad kyis phab nas phyag 'tshal te/ langs nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/
316b6(phal chen): mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha mo/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
316b7(phal chen): bskyed de/ de ltar bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad 'byung bar yang dag par mthong bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi
317a1(phal chen): phyag tu bdag nyid por ba lags na/ lha mo shul gang la brten na/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu'i sar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i shul
317a2(phal chen): bdag la bshad du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ da ltar khyod dge
317a3(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyis non te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig mnyan par 'dod pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la nan tan du byed pa legs so/ /legs
317a4(phal chen): so| |rigs kyi bu/ khyod ni de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la nan tan du byed pas/ gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar
317a5(phal chen): 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo thob
317a6(phal chen): pa ste| bsam pa mi mnyam pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /mi dge ba'i las kyi lam la zhugs pa rnams la snying rje'i sems dang
317a7(phal chen): ldan pa'o/ /dge ba'i las kyi lam la zhugs pa rnams la dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /sems mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par ldan pa'i sems can rnams la mi gnyis
317b1(phal chen): pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams la rnam par sbyang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /nyam nga bar gyur pa rnams la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /
317b2(phal chen): dma' ba la mos pa rnams la yangs pa la mos pa yongs su bskyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /dbang po zhum pa rnams la brtson 'grus chen po'i shugs rnam par spel ba'i sems dang
317b3(phal chen): ldan pa'o/ /'khor ba la mngon par mos pa rnams la 'khor ba'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo las rnam par bzlog pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mngon par mos
317b4(phal chen): pa'i sems can rnams la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam la dgod pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar kho mo de lta bu'i sems dang yid la bya bar ldan la/ byang
317b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di dang yang ldan pas/ sems can gang
317b6(phal chen): ji snyed cig mun nag smag tu gyur pa'i nam la/ mi ni nyal bar gyur/ 'byung po'i tshogs ni rgyu bar gyur/ rkun chom mang pos ni rgyas par gyur/ sems can mi srun pa'i tshul
317b7(phal chen): can ni phyogs su rgyu bar gyur/ sprin stug po nag pos kun nas khebs par gyur/ dud pa dang / rdul gyi tshogs kyis ni kun nas 'grigs par gyur/ rdzi char mi bzad pas ni
318a1(phal chen): rab tu gtags par gyur/ zla skar gyi tshogs ni mi snang bar gyur/ mig gis bya ba'i mthu ni med par gyur pa'i mun pa la/ sems can gang ji snyed cig rgya mtsho la
318a2(phal chen): spyod dam/ thang la spyod dam/ ri la spyod dam/ nags tshal gzhan na spyod dam/ yul gzhan na spyod dam/ grong gzhan na spyod dam/ phyogs gzhan na spyod dam/ phyogs mtshams
318a3(phal chen): gzhan na spyod dam/ lam gzhan na spyod kyang rung ste/ rgya mtsho la spyod spyod pa las gru bub par gyur pa'am/ thang la spyod spyod pa las nyam nyes pa'am/ ri la spyod spyod pa las
318a4(phal chen): g.yang sa chen por lhung bar gyur pa'am/ 'brog dgon pa la spyod spyod pa las kha zas kyis phongs par gyur pa'am/ nags tshal thibs por sba'i zang zing la thogs pa'am/ tshul
318a5(phal chen): ma yin pa'i nyam nyes shig tu gyur tam/ yul gzhan na spyod spyod pa las chom pos bcom pa'am/ grong gzhan na spyod spyod pa las mi srung pa'i tshul can gyis gtses
318a6(phal chen): pa'am| phyogs gzhan na spyod spyod pa las 'brog rmis pa'am/ phyogs mtshams gzhan na spyod spyod pa las mgo rmongs pa'am/ lam gzhan na spyod spyod pa las nye zhor
318a7(phal chen): gyur kyang rung ste/ rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni sems can de dag la/ thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas skyabs su gyur par byed pa ste/ 'di ltar rgya mtsho chen po la spyod pa rnams kyi rlung
318b1(phal chen): sprin nag po gtor ba dang / chu'i rnyog pa dang ba dang / rlung mi bzad pa'i dkyil 'khor bzlog pa dang / rlabs kyi shugs chen po zhi bar bya ba dang / klong gi 'jigs pa las thar par bya ba dang /
318b2(phal chen): phyogs bstan pa dang / chu'i lam legs par dmigs pa dang / 'gram bstan pa dang / rin po che'i gling du phyin par bya ba'i phyir lam yongs su ston te/ yongs su sbud pa'i gzugs
318b3(phal chen): dang | ded dpon gyi gzugs dang / rta'i rgyal po rngog chen gyi gzugs dang / glang po'i rgyal po'i gzugs dang / rus sbal gyi rgyal po'i gzugs dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po'i gzugs
318b4(phal chen): dang | nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i gzugs dang / mi'am ci'i rgyal po'i gzugs dang / lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po'i gzugs dang / rgya mtsho'i lha'i gzugs dang / mnyan pa'i
318b5(phal chen): gzugs kyis skyabs su gyur par byed do/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang 'di ltar/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad las yongs su bzlog pa'i phyir skyabs su
318b6(phal chen): gyur par shog cig ces yongs su bsngo'o/ /thang la spyod pa'i sems can mun pa chen po shin tu gnag pa'i nam la/ sa gzhi 'od ma dang / tsher ma dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mos
318b7(phal chen): gang ba/ sbrul gdug pa gtum po shin tu mang ba/ thag thug dang mi bde ba'i lam can/ rdul dang phyag dar shin tu 'thul ba/ rdzi char drag pos gtags pa/ tsha ba dang / grang
319a1(phal chen): ba'i sdug bsngal yod pa/ sbrul dang gcan zan gyis bag tsha ba yod pa/ thod mi dang chom po rgyu bar gyur pa zhig la/ mgo 'khor bar gyur ba'i sems can
319a2(phal chen): rnams la nyi ma'i gzugs dang / zla ba'i gzugs dang / skya rengs 'char ba'i gzugs dang / skar mda' chen po'i gzugs dang / glog gi phreng ba 'byung ba'i gzugs dang / rin po
319a3(phal chen): che'i 'od kyi gzugs dang / gza'i 'khor gyi gzugs dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs kyi gzhal med khang gi 'od kyi gzugs dang / lha'i gzugs dang / byang chub sems
319a4(phal chen): dpa'i gzugs kyis skyabs su gyur par byed do/ /sems dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ nyon mongs pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par bsal ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi skyabs
319a5(phal chen): su shog cig par bskyed do/ /ri'i g.yang sa la spyod cing 'chi bas 'jigs skrag pa rnams kyi srog dbyung ba dang / grags pa 'dod pa'i dbang du gyur pa dang / snyan pa dang / sgra'i
319a6(phal chen): rgyal mtshan 'dod pa dang / longs spyod tshol ba dang / 'dod pa'i zil gyis non pa dang / yo byad yongs su btsal ba la brtson pa dang / 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa 'dod
319a7(phal chen): cing brtson pa dang / bu dang chung ma gtong mi phod pas thogs par gyur pa dang / lta ba'i thibs por 'khyams pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis
319b1(phal chen): gtses pa rnams la yang / thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas skyabs su gyur par byed de/ 'di ltar ri'i phug dang / bya skyibs mngon par bsgrub pa dang / shing tog dang / rtsa ba bzar rung ba mngon
319b2(phal chen): par bsgrub pa dang / chu'i lam dang / chu mig mngon par bsgrub pa dang / tsha ba dang / grang ba'i gnyen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam bstan pa dang / ka la ping+ka'i sgra
319b3(phal chen): skad bsgrag pa dang / rma bya'i rgyal po skad 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang / sman 'bar bas snang ba'i gzugs dang / ri'i lha'i 'od kyi gzugs dang / ri'i phug dang / sul dang / ltongs su rlag
319b4(phal chen): ste sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa'i sems can rnams kyi mun pa'i rab rib rnam par bsal ba dang / sa'i gzhi mnyam par mngon par bsgrub pas skyabs su gyur par byed de/
319b5(phal chen): sems kyang ji ltar bdag gis sems can ri la spyod pa 'di dag yongs su bskyabs pa de bzhin du/ 'khor ba'i ri'i lam rgyud g.yang sa la gnas shing / rga shi'i gdon gyis zin
319b6(phal chen): pa de dag gi skyabs su yang bdag 'gyur bar shog cig par bskyed do/ /nags tshal thibs po'i dra bas thogs pa'i sems can mtshan mo mun pa'i mun nag gis chod de/ shing
319b7(phal chen): dang shing phran 'dzings pa'i gseb shin tu nyam nga ba dang / chu dang / rtswa dang / sdong po dang / 'khri shing gis lam chod pa dang / shing dang / shing phran sna tshogs kyi nags tshal
320a1(phal chen): thibs po'i nang du phyin te/ stag gi sgra thos pas skrag pa'i snying can/ don ma grub pas sems 'khrugs par gyur pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / mi dga'
320a2(phal chen): ba sna tshogs kyis nyams mi bde ba/ nags tshal stug po nas 'byung ba'i phyogs mi shes pa rnams la/ kho mo ni bde bar 'gro ba'i lam yongs su ston par byed do/ /sems kyang 'di
320a3(phal chen): ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ sems can lta ba thibs po sna tshogs la gnas pa/ sred pa'i dra bas 'khris par gyur pa/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa rnams sdug
320a4(phal chen): bsngal thams cad las yongs su 'grel par shog cig par bskyed do/ /'brog dgon pa la spyod pa'i sems can mun pa'i nang na 'thoms pa rnams kyang thabs kyi sgo sna tshogs
320a5(phal chen): kyis bde ba yongs su bskyed cing lam bstan te/ de dag 'jigs pa med pa dang / bde ba la rab tu bkod nas /sems kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ sems can 'khor ba'i
320a6(phal chen): 'phrog dgon pa na 'thoms pa/ ngan song thams cad kyi lam du zhugs pa rnams/ sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su bkrol te/ shin tu phun sum tshogs pas bde ba'i thams
320a7(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa'i lam la rab tu dgod par bya bar shog cig par bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ yul dang ljongs la chags pa'i sems can mngon par chags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sdug
320b1(phal chen): bsngal nyams su myong bar gyur pa rnams la yang kho mo ni skyo bar bya ba'i thabs sna tshogs kyis yul la mngon par chags pa de las gyen du bskyod pa byed de/ sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa
320b2(phal chen): pa 'dis sems can thams cad phung po la mngon par chags pa las gyen du bskyod de/ gnas med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod par bya bar shog cig par bskyed do/ /
320b3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni grong na spyod pa'i sems can khyim dang / gnas kyi 'ching pas glags pa rnams/ mtshan mo mun pa shin tu gnag pas chod pa'i nang na/ khyim gyi don sna tshogs
320b4(phal chen): nyams su gnod pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams kyang skyo bar 'gyur ba'i sgo sna tshogs kyis skyo bar byas te/ chags pa med pa'i sems yongs su bskyed nas/ chos kyi sbyin pas
320b5(phal chen): yongs su bzung ste/ tshim par byas nas rten pa med pa'i chos la bkod de/ sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ sems can skye mched drug gi grong la gnas pa rnams
320b6(phal chen): 'khor ba'i lam gyi rgyud kyi spyod yul las gyen du bskyod de/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul la dgod par bya bar shog cig par bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang yang
320b7(phal chen): mtshan mo mun pa shin tu gnag pa'i nang na/ shar phyogs la sogs pa'i phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams re rer phyogs bslad par gyur pa/ sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la mi mnyam
321a1(phal chen): pa'i g.yang sar 'du shes pa dang / sgang bu la gshong du 'du shes par gyur te/ phyogs kyi lam dang / sa tshod la mgo 'khor bar gyur pa de dag la'ang / kho mo
321a2(phal chen): ni thabs sna tshogs kyis snang bar byas te/ phyir 'byung ba rnams la ni sgo yongs su ston to/ /rgal bar 'dod pa rnams la ni mu stegs yongs su ston to/ /brkyal bar 'dod pa rnams la
321a3(phal chen): ni gru yongs su ston to/ /khyim du 'gro bar 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim yongs su ston to/ /rnam par blta bar 'dod pa rnams la ni phyogs yongs su ston to/ /sa'i gzhi mtho ba dang /
321a4(phal chen): dma' ba yongs su ston to/ /sa'i gzhi phyogs mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang / gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyang yongs su ston to/ /lam gyis dub pa rnams la grong dang /
321a5(phal chen): grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor kyang yongs su ston to/ /tsha ba dang / skom pas mnar ba rnams la yang mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / lu ma dang /
321a6(phal chen): rdzing dang / rdzing bu dang / chu klung dang / nags tshal dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / kun dga' yid du 'ong ba yongs su ston to/ /sdug pa dang bral zhing phrad par 'dod pa rnams
321a7(phal chen): la| pha dang / ma dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / mdza' bo dang / blon po dang / gnyen bshes dang / yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su ston te/ sems
321b1(phal chen): kyang ji ltar bdag gis sems can mtshan mo mun pa mun gnag gis chod pa/ mig rab rib kyis nyams pa/ phyogs bslad pa/ lam 'khor ba rnams la/ gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs
321b2(phal chen): rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir snang ba bskyed de/ 'od byas pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis yun ring po nas 'khor ba'i mun ba na gnas pa'i sems can yang dag pa nyid kyi phyogs la
321b3(phal chen): bslad pa/ ma rig pa'i mun par 'thoms pa/ ye shes kyi mig mi shes pa'i ling tog gis chod pa/ 'du shes dang / sems dang / lta bas phyin ci log tu gyur pa/ mi rtag pa la
321b4(phal chen): rtag par 'du shes pa/ sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa/ bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa/ mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa/ bdag dang / sems can dang /
321b5(phal chen): srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa dam po la gnas pa/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la gnas pa/ rgyu dang 'bras bu la mgo 'khor ba/ mi dge ba'i las kyi
321b6(phal chen): lam gyi phyogs su zhugs pa/ srog gcod pa/ ma byin par len pa/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa/ brdzun du smra ba/ phra ma zer ba/ ngag rtsub po 'byin pa/ tshig kyal pa smra ba/
321b7(phal chen): chags sems dang ldan pa/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa/ log par lta ba can/ phar mi shes pa/ mar mi shes pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer mi shes pa/ dbang po
322a1(phal chen): mi shes pa/ skyes bu dam pa mi shes pa/ chos ma yin pa la chags shing zhen pa/ mi tshul pa'i 'dod pas zil gyis non pa/ log pa'i chos kyis yongs su
322a2(phal chen): 'khris pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo nub par bya ba la zhugs pa/ bdud kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' la gnod par
322a3(phal chen): byed pa/ theg pa chen po la zhe sdang ba/ byang chub kyi sems la mos pa spong bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' la mi snyan du brjod pa/ snod ma bskams par snying ring ba/ gnod
322a4(phal chen): pa ma byas par dgrar len pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ skyes bu dam pa ma yin pas spyod pa'i chos kyi spyod yul can/ mchod rten dang dge 'dun gyi dngos po la
322a5(phal chen): 'khu ba/ pha ma la log par sems pa/ mtshams med pa'i las byed pa/ g.yang sa chen po la mngon par bltas pa'i sems can rnams kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa/ shes rab
322a6(phal chen): kyi snang ba chen pos bsal te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul nas/ theg pa chen po kun tu bzang pos stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi
322a7(phal chen): sa'i lam yongs su ston par gyur cig / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas
322b1(phal chen): gyi ye shes kyi spyod yul dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul dang / stobs bcu yongs su grub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzungs kyi stobs dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mchog tu gyur pa yongs su
322b2(phal chen): ston par shog cig/ yongs su bstan nas kyang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas la rab tu dgod par shog cig par bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni sems can yun
322b3(phal chen): ring po nas na zhing nad kyis yongs su skyo ba/ lus nyam chung ba dang / rgas pa/ rga ba'i zil gyis non pa dang / mgon med pa dang / phongs shing dbul pa dang / log par ltung ba dang /
322b4(phal chen): yul gzhan du phyin pa dang / phyogs log par zhugs pa dang / btson ra na 'dug pa dang / chad pas bcad pa dang / nyes pa byung ste rgyal pos gsad par bkri ba rnams kyang srog
322b5(phal chen): dang bral gyi 'jigs pa las yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar kho mo ni sems can nad pa rnams kyi nad thams cad ni thabs thams cad kyis gso bar nan
322b6(phal chen): tan du byed do/ /rgas pa dang / rga ba'i zil gyis non pa rnams la ni/ bsnyen bkur ba dang / rim gro dang / yo byad kyis mi phongs par yongs su sdud par byed do/ /mgon med
322b7(phal chen): ba'i sems can rnams la mgon byed do/ /phongs shing dbul ba rnams ni nor dang gser gyi phung pos yongs su sdud do/ /log par ltung ba rnams ni don mthun pas yongs su sdud
323a1(phal chen): do| |yul gzhan du phyin pa rnams ni rang gi yul du phyin par byed do/ /phyogs log par zhugs pa rnams ni phyogs ma nor bar 'dzud
323a2(phal chen): do| |btson ra na 'dug pa rnams ni btson ra nas thar bar byed do/ /chad pas bcad pa ni chad pa'i sdug bsngal las grol bar byed do/ /nyes pa byung ste rgyal pos gsad par
323a3(phal chen): bkri ba rnams ni srog gi dbugs phyin pa thob par byed de/ sems kyang bdag ji ltar sems can 'di dag 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa sna tshogs las yongs su skyob cing mgon byed
323a4(phal chen): pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis 'di rnams bla na med pa'i chos kyi yongs su bsdu bas yongs su bsdus te/ nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya'o/ /skye ba dang / rga ba
323a5(phal chen): dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa las yang dag par bzla bar bya'o/ /ngan song dang /
323a6(phal chen): log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gzugs la rab tu dgod par bya'o/ /chos rin po che sbyin pa'i yongs
323a7(phal chen): su bsdu bas yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/ /kha na mtho ba med pa'i las la rab tu dgod par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa yang dag par bskul bar bya'o/ /
323b1(phal chen): rga shi yongs su med pa'i dbyings shin tu rtogs pa las rab tu dgod bar bya bar bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni sems can log pa'i lam la zhugs pa/ lta ba'i rnam pa thibs po sna
323b2(phal chen): tshogs la mngon par zhen pa/ log par lta ba'i spyod yul can/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las nya ma nga bar 'gyur ba la yongs su spyod pa/ brtul zhugs dang dka' thub sna tshogs
323b3(phal chen): la gnas pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin yang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa/ lus gdung ba dang / yongs su gdung ba la rab tu brtson pa/
323b4(phal chen): mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / lu ma dang / rdzing bu dang / chu klung dang / ri'i gzar dang / phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal ba la mos pa/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang
323b5(phal chen): du gyur pa rnams la yang / thabs sna tshogs kyis mgon du gyur par byed de/ da dag sdig pa'i lta ba'i rnam pa dang / ngan song thams cad kyi g.yang sar ltung ba'i lam las rnam par
323b6(phal chen): bzlog go/ 'jig rten pa'i yang dag par lta ba la rab tu bkod cing / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa la yang yongs su 'god do/ /sems kyang ji ltar bdag gis sems can
323b7(phal chen): 'di dag nyam nga ba'i nan tan dang sdug bsngal las yongs su 'grol ba de bzhin du/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i pha rol
324a1(phal chen): tu phyin pa'i lam la bkod de/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir mi ldog par byas la/ kun tu bzang po'i smom lam chen pos/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
324a2(phal chen): la dgod par bya'o/ /sems can gyi khams thams cad ma dul gyi bar du/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa las kyang mi g.yo bar bya bar bskyed do/ /de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid
324a3(phal chen): dang ldan pas/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i phyogs sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul
324a4(phal chen): ba'i sgo 'di brnan te/ bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di
324a5(phal chen): dag smras so/ /gti mug ma rig mun nag bsal don du/ /sems can phan phyir kho mo chos ston te/ /dus la bsdad cing 'gro ba bde bar byas/ /'di ni rnam thar tshul mchog zhi ba
324a6(phal chen): yin| |kho mos byams yangs shin tu sbyang ba byas/ /bskal ba mtha' yas sngon chad shin tu bsgoms/ /des ni 'jig rten rgyas bkang snang bar byed/ /nor bzang brtan pas tshul
324a7(phal chen): 'di shes par gyis/ /kho mo'i snying rje rgya mtsho tshad med de/ /'di las dus gsum rgyal ba 'jig rten 'byung / /de ni 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byed/ /nor bzang brtan
324b1(phal chen): pas tshul 'di shes par gyis/ /'jig rten bde ba mngon par bsgrub pa dang / /ma byas 'phags pa'i bden pa mngon bsgrub cing / /des ni kho mo dga' mgur rangs par byed/ /rgyal sras
324b2(phal chen): khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis/ /sangs rgyas stobs rnams yongs su sbyong byed cing / /nyan thos ye shes rnam thar 'bras bu dang / /'dus byas skyon las rtag tu phyir phyogs kyi/ /rgyal
324b3(phal chen): sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis/ /kho mo'i mig ni rgya che yongs su dag/ des ni phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mang po mthong / /zhing dbyings de dag kun gyi rang byung rnams/ /byang chub
324b4(phal chen): shing dbang drung na bzhugs pa mthong / /sangs rgyas sku ni mtshan gyis yongs brgyan cing / /'od bzang rnam pa sna tshogs kun 'gyed de/ /ba sbu kun nas 'od zer mang 'gyed pa'i/ /sangs
324b5(phal chen): rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa kho mos mthong / /zhing dbyings de dag kun gyi sems can rnams/ /shi 'pho skye ba'i sgor yang kun mthong ste/ /byis pa de dag 'gro rgyud rgya mtsho na/ /'khor
324b6(phal chen): zhing rang rang las kyang myong bar byed/ /kho mo'i rna ba rgya mtsho rnam dag ste/ /der ni sgra rnams ma lus yongs su 'du/ /'gro ba kun gyi sgra skrad rgya mtsho dag/ kun kyang thos nas dran pas
324b7(phal chen): yongs su 'dzin/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra skad thams cad kyis/ /dpe zla med pa'i gsung ni rab brgyan te/ /des ni rgyal ba 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de dag kho mos thos shing dran
325a1(phal chen): pas 'dzin/ /kho mo'i sna'i mthu yongs su rnam dag ste/ /chos tshul rgya mtsho dag la thogs pa med/ /rnam thar gnas rnams kun tu rab 'jug pa'i/ /tshul ni rgyal
325a2(phal chen): sras khyod kyis shes par gyis/ /kho mo'i lce ni rgya che rab tu yangs/ /srab cing mdog dmar rin chen 'od du dag/ sems can bsam pa ji bzhin des shes byed/ /rgyal sras khyod
325a3(phal chen): kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis/ /kho mo'i chos lus shin tu rnam dag ste/ /dus gsum kun tu 'od gsal rab tu gnas/ /gzugs lus sems can bsam pa ji bzhin te/ /
325a4(phal chen): de dag kun gyi dad pa'i dbang du mthong / /kho mo'i sems ni chags med zag pa med/ /sgra dbyangs sprin gyi nga ro ji bzhin te/ /de yi khongs su mi mchog kun chud kyang / /de la kho
325a5(phal chen): mo rnam par rtog pa med/ /zhing gi dbyings kyi sems can bsam mi khyab/ /de dag sems kyi rgya mtsho kho mos shes/ /de dag dbang po bsam pa rab shes kyang / /de la kho mo
325a6(phal chen): rnam par rtog pa med/ /kho mo'i rdzu 'phrul rab yangs shin tu grub/ /des ni bsam yas zhing yang rab tu bskyod/ /lus kyi 'od dang mthu yang de bzhin te/ /des ni sems
325a7(phal chen): can gdul dka' shin tu 'dul/ /kho mo'i bsod nams rnam yangs yongs su dag /kun tu rgyan byed zad pa med pa'i mdzod/ /des ni rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa byed/ /
325b1(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'ang yin/ /kho mo'i shes rab rnam yangs shin tu dag/ des ni chos mang rgya mtsho rab tu shes/ /'gro ba kun gyi the tshom yongs su gcod/ /rgyal sras khyod
325b2(phal chen): kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis/ /dus gsum kun la kho bo zhugs gyur pas/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho kun kyang mthong zhing shes/ /de dag smon lam la yang rab tu zhugs/ /tshul 'di dpag
325b3(phal chen): yas rab tu rdzogs pa yin/ /rdul mang kun la zhing rnams rgya mtsho mthong / /de dag dus gsum 'jug pa'ang de bzhin te/ /de dag kun gyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong / /'di ni kun tu gnas
325b4(phal chen): ba'i chu la byis/ /rnam par snang mdzad byang chub sangs rgyas te/ /phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing rnams yongs bkang zhing / /rdul sbubs kun gyi byang chub shing drung na/ /zhi ba'i chos rnams gsung
325b5(phal chen): du sgrog pa ltos/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ /mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha mo khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
325b6(phal chen): tu zhugs nas ji srid cig lags/ de ltar khyod tshul 'di lta bus/ sems can gyi don bgyi ba la sta gon du zhugs pa'i rnam par thar pa de ni khyod kyis brnyes nas ji srid cig lags/
325b7(phal chen): de skad ces smras pa dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ sngon 'das pa'i dus ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra
326a1(phal chen): ba snyed kyi bskal pa'i yang pha rol gcig tu bskal pa rab tu zhi ba'i 'od ces bya ba/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag lnga brgya skyes pa byung ste/ de'i 'jig rten gyi khams
326a2(phal chen): ni rin chen dpal 'byung ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de'i gling bzhi pa 'bring po rin chen zla ba sgron ma'i 'od ces bya ba de na/ rgyal po'i gnas pad+mo'i 'od ces
326a3(phal chen): bya ba yod de/ rgyal po'i gnas der/ rgyal po chos rab mu stegs zhes bya ba chos dang mthun pa'i rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba/ gling bzhi la dbang ba/ rin po che bdun dang
326a4(phal chen): ldan pa byung ste/ des sa chen po de yang ri dang rgya mtshor bcas pa'i mthas gtugs par chos kyis rgyas par byas nas/ bde bar gnas par byas so/ /rgyal po chos rab mu stegs
326a5(phal chen): de'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ de srod la 'dod pas myos shing dga' bar rtse rtse bas dub nas nam gyi gung la btsun mo'i 'khor gyi gnas su phyin te nyal lo//
326a6(phal chen): de nas rgyal po'i gnas pad+mo'i 'od de'i shar phyogs kyi nags tshal chen po zhi ba'i dpal 'byung ba zhes bya bar rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan pa'i lhun can/ sangs
326a7(phal chen): rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba'i byang chub kyi shing chen po'i drung du de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa
326b1(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ de'i mthus 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dpal 'byung ba thams cad ni 'od chen po kha dog du ma can gyis rgyas shing gang bar
326b2(phal chen): gyur to/ /rgyal po'i gnas pad+mo'i 'od ces bya ba de na/ mtshan mo'i lha mo zla ba shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'dug 'dug ste/ de rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba'i gan du song
326b3(phal chen): nas| rgyan dkrol ba'i sgras sad par byas te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /'di ltar rgyal po'i btsun mo/ shes par gyis shig/ nags tshal chen po zhi ba'i dpal 'byung bar de bzhin gshegs
326b4(phal chen): pa| chos thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so/ /de nas des rgyal po'i btsun mo de'i mdun du/ sangs
326b5(phal chen): rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam rgya cher bshad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ rgyal po'i
326b6(phal chen): btsun mo de yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis snang bar gyur te/ bsam pa thag pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas/ des de bzhin
326b7(phal chen): gshegs pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun du bcas pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro cher byas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi
327a1(phal chen): rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba zhes bya ba de/ gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni de ltar mi blta ste/ kho mo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi
327a2(phal chen): blo gros zla ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni mos pa'i sems bskyed pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba
327a3(phal chen): snyed tshun chad du nam yang ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung bar ma skyes te/ sems can dmyal bar ma yin no/ /byol song gi skye gnas su ma yin no/ /yi dwags su ma yin no/ /nam yang
327a4(phal chen): rigs dma' bar ma skyes so/ /nam yang dbang po dang mi ldan par ma gyur to/ /nam yang sdug bsngal bar ma gyur te/ de ltar kho mos rtag par lha'i nang du lha'i bdag nyid che ba nyid
327a5(phal chen): thob| mi'i nang du ni/ mi'i bdag nyid che ba nyid thob ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang yang ma bral lo/ /dus ngan par yang ma skyes
327a6(phal chen): so| |rigs kyi bu/ de ltar kho mos sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu lam bde zhing mnyam pa nas nye zho med par
327a7(phal chen): phyin kyang / de tsam gyis kho mo'i byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po yongs su grub par ma gyur te/ ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bskal pa de dag ni 'das/ bskal pa bzang po 'di'i
327b1(phal chen): snga rol gyi ni bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu'i thog ma la bab pa de'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid rdul gyi dri ma med pa zhes bya bar/ bskal pa mya ngan med cing rdul dang bral ba zhes bya
327b2(phal chen): ba byung ste/ rigs kyi bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid rdul gyi dri ma med pa'i dpal de ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par dag par gyur te/ der sangs rgyas lnga brgya byung ngo / /sangs
327b3(phal chen): rgyas lnga brgya po de dag gi thog ma la de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med par skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur
327b4(phal chen): ba| lha dang mi'i ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ri rab rgyal mtshan spyan yangs shing zhi ba'i dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe kho mo yang tshong dpon snyan pa rnam
327b5(phal chen): par grags pa'i bu mo shes rab snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba gzugs mdzes shing bzang la/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog shin tu mdzes shing rgyas pa dang ldan pa zhig tu gyur te/ mtshan
327b6(phal chen): mo'i lha mo zla ba shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba de yang smon lam gyi dbang gis/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal po'i gnas rgyal mtshan sna tshogs
327b7(phal chen): su| mtshan mo'i lha mo mig rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ des kho mo mtshan mo mi nyal tsam zhig na/ pha ma nyal bar gyur pa dang / khyim de'ang yongs su bskyod de/ 'od chen po
328a1(phal chen): snang bar byas nas rang gi gzugs bstan te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa brjod nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas nas zhag bdun
328a2(phal chen): lon te/ snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa de bstan to/ /de nas kho mo pha ma dang / gnyen bshes kyi tshogs chen po dang 'grogs te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo shin tu rnam par dag pa'i zla ba'i
328a3(phal chen): 'od sngon du bdar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar phyin to/ /de nas kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal
328a4(phal chen): mthong ma thag tu/ ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba 'dul zhing sangs rgyas mthong bar byed pa zhes bya ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi dbyings ye shes kyi snang ba'i dkyil 'khor ces
328a5(phal chen): bya ba'ang thob par gyur to/ /de thob pas kyang kho mos bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag kyang rjes su dran par gyur to/ /kho mo'i byang chub kyi sems de yang
328a6(phal chen): mngon du gyur te/ de ltar kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos bstan pa thos te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam
328a7(phal chen): par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di yang thob par gyur to/ /de thob pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra
328b1(phal chen): ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang zhing / bdag nyid kyang
328b2(phal chen): de dag thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug par shes so/ /'jig rten kyi khams de dag tu sems can ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i mig lam du snang ste/ de dag
328b3(phal chen): gi sgra skrad rnam pa tha dad pa'i brda yang rab tu shes so/ /sems dang / bsam pa dang / dbang po dang / mos pa yang rab tu shes so/ /sngon gyi mtha'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyi drung du
328b4(phal chen): yongs su smin par gyur pa'ang rab tu shes so/ /de dag la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par 'gyur ba'i lus kyang yongs su ston to/ /kho mo'i rnam par thar pa de yang sems kyi skad cig re
328b5(phal chen): re la rnam par 'phel te/ rnam par thar pa'i sems de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so/ /
328b6(phal chen): de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so/ /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi
328b7(phal chen): khams brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so/ /de bzhin du sems kyi skad cig re re zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod
329a1(phal chen): du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar dag kyang lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams
329a2(phal chen): cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang ste/ bdag nyid kyang de dag gi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug par shes so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang len
329a3(phal chen): to| |'dzin to/ /yongs su 'dzin to/ /nye bar 'dzin to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sngon gyi tshul rgya mtsho dang / smon lam rgya mtsho la yang 'jug go/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi
329a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa de dag thams cad kyang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par sgrub bo/ /sems can ji snyed cig 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
329a5(phal chen): mtsho de dag tu skyes par gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang ste/ sems can de dag gi bsam pa dang / dbang po dang / mos pa'i bye brag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi bre brag
329a6(phal chen): tu de dag yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir lus byin gyis rlob ste/ de ltar kho mo'i rnam par thar pa de ni sems kyi skad cig re re la yang / chos kyi dbyings 'byams klas pa
329a7(phal chen): rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par 'phel lo/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi
329b1(phal chen): snang bas/ 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dang dbus med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam
