329b2(phal chen): gyis byung ba/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i tshul 'byams klas pa 'dal ba la 'jug par dbang bsgyur ba/ byang chub sems dpas yang dag par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes rdo rje'i dpal
329b3(phal chen): gyis rnam par rtse ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad yang dag par gzung ba la smon lam chen pos byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams
329b4(phal chen): klas pa thams cad sems kyi skad cig gcig gis yongs su dag par bya ba'i bsod nams kyi rgya mtsho chen po yongs su grub pa/ sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can gyi khams thams
329b5(phal chen): cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i ye shes dbang bsgyur ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i
329b6(phal chen): ye shes kyi nyi ma'i mig dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad la theg pa chen po rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i mthu dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi the tshom dang / nem nur dang /
329b7(phal chen): yid gnyis kyi rab rib rnam par sel ba'i blo gros kyi zla ba dang ldan pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad la mngon par chags pa las gyen du bskyod pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par
330a1(phal chen): dag pa| chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rdul gyi cha shas la rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa la dbang bsgyur ba/ dus gsum gyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la
330a2(phal chen): ye shes dbyer med pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/ spyod yul la 'jug pa'am/ rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba yongs su bstan par nus re skan/ song /
330a3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu/ yul ma ga d+ha 'di nyid kyi snying po byang chub la kho mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed bskyed pa/ yang dang yang bskul bskul ba'i mtshan
330a4(phal chen): mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba
330a5(phal chen): dang | ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /
330a6(phal chen): khyod sku shin tu rnam par dag pa mthong / /mtshan gyis rnam brgyan ri bo ji bzhin du/ /'jig rten kun las mngon 'phags 'jig rten du/ /phun sum tshogs sku 'jam dpal bzhin
330a7(phal chen): du mdzes/ /khyod kyi chos sku shin tu rnam dag ste/ /dus gsum kun tu mnyam zhing rnam mi rtog/ der ni 'jig rten ma lus kun 'dus te/ /'byung zhing rnam par 'jig kyang chags mi
330b1(phal chen): mnga'| |lam rgyud 'byams klas thams cad kun tu yang / /khyod kyi sku ni gzugs brnyan rnam par phye/ /skar chen zla skar rgyu skar tshogs bzhin du/ /spu rtse kun la'ang khyod ni bdag gis mthong //
330b2(phal chen): khyod kyi thugs yangs shin tu rnam dag ste/ /phyogs rnams kun gyi nam mkha'i dbyings su rgyas/ /der ni mi mchog kun kyang yongs su 'du/ /khyod la ye shes mi rtog dam pa mnga'/ /zhing gi
330b3(phal chen): rdul snyed rnam pa sna tshogs sprin/ /khyod kyi spu rtse kun nas mngon 'thon pa/ /rgyal mang sna tshogs char pa mngon 'bebs shing / /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhabs drung rgyas par 'gengs/ /
330b4(phal chen): 'gro ba kun snyed lus rnams mtha' yas pa/ /khyod kyi spu rtse kun nas mngon 'thon cing / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rgyas par yongs bkang nas/ /sna tshogs thabs kyis sems can rnam
330b5(phal chen): par spyod/ /spu rtse kun la bsam yas zhing gi rnams/ /sna tshogs rgyan ldan rnam pa tha dad mthong / /lam rgyud sems can khyod kyis rnam sbyangs pa/ /ji snyed de dag bsam bzhin kun
330b6(phal chen): kyang byung / /gang zhig khyod kyi mtshan thos dga' gyur pa/ /de dag thob bya legs thob legs par 'tsho/ /sems can gang gis khyod kyi sku mthong ba/ /byang chub lam la mngon du bltas
330b7(phal chen): par 'gyur/ /de ltar thos nas rab tu sems dga' la/ /mthong ba tsam gyis nyon mongs zhi mdzad pas/ /bskal pa bsam yas ngan song gnas kyang rung / /khyod kyi zhal blta'i don du mos
331a1(phal chen): par bgyi/ /zhing rnams stong gi rdul snyed lus byas te/ /de snyed bskal pa brgyud de khyod 'dra ba'i/ /spu gcig khyod kyi yon tan legs brjod kyang / /legs pa'i mthar
331a2(phal chen): phyin nam du'ang mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid
331a3(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ dge
331a4(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur bya bas ma ngoms bzhin du/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i drung nas song ngo // //bam po dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi
331a5(phal chen): bu nor bzang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa/ thog ma byang chub tu zhugs pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa ni khong du chud par byed/ byang chub sems
331a6(phal chen): dpa'i snying po yang dag par byung ba la ni rjes su dpyod/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho la ni yongs su 'jug/ byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam ni yongs
331a7(phal chen): su sbyong / byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor ni yongs su gnon/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rgya cher byed/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba rgya mtsho ni rjes su
331b1(phal chen): 'brang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i snang ba chen po rgya mtsho la ni rnam par blta/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la gzhol ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'i sprin ni rgya cher byed/
331b2(phal chen): mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ zhing thams cad du phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlabs pas mngon
331b3(phal chen): par bsgrub cing / mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od gang na ba der song ste/ mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi
331b4(phal chen): bos phyag 'tshal te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od la/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal
331b5(phal chen): dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji
331b6(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i sa la spyod pa dang / ji ltar 'byung ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyid pa ma 'tshal to/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar khyod bla na med pa yang
331b7(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la spyod pa dang / 'byung ba dang / yongs su 'grub pa 'dri ba legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu
332a1(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yongs su grub pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
332a2(phal chen): cad mngon du gyur par mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mtshan sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnam par blta ba'i mig rnam par dag pa dang /
332a3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho tshad med
332a4(phal chen): pa la chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshad kyis 'jug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo nas 'od zer rgya mtsho sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa dang /
332a5(phal chen): sems can sna tshogs kyi don du bkye ba la 'jug pa dang / ba spu'i bu ga re re nas 'od 'phro ba rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa rgya mtsho ston pa dang / sems kyi skad
332a6(phal chen): cig re re la sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rgya mtshos chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bkang zhing / sems can 'dul ba'i byin gyi rlabs la 'jug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
332a7(phal chen): pa'i gsung sems can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang ldan pas dus gsum du byung ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra sgrogs pas/ mdo sde thams cad kyi sprin gyi 'brug
332b1(phal chen): sgra 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas gyi mtshan rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su
332b2(phal chen): bstan pas sems can 'dul ba la 'jug pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yongs su grub
332b3(phal chen): pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni de'i mthus
332b4(phal chen): dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la'ang 'jug go /'khor
332b5(phal chen): gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dang / ting nge 'dzin mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dang / sngon gyi tshul rgya mtsho dang / mtshan rgya mtsho la'ang 'jug go/ de bzhin
332b6(phal chen): gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor ba rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe tshad sna tshogs dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam pa
332b7(phal chen): tha dad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sku la'ang 'jug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la dngos por mngon par
333a1(phal chen): zhen pa yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bzhud pa 'gags pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni bzhud pa med
333a2(phal chen): pa'o| |rang bzhin gyis byung ba med pas na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni byon pa med pa'o/ /mi skye ba'i chos nyid dang mnyam pa'i sku mnga' ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni
333a3(phal chen): ma skyes pa'o/ /mi skye ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni ma 'gags pa'o/ /sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bur mthong zhing rnam par dmigs pa'i phyir/ de
333a4(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni bden pa ma yin pa'o/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi don du byung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni brdzun pa ma yin pa'o/ /shi 'pho dang skye ba
333a5(phal chen): las rnam par 'das pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni 'pho ba med pa'o/ /chos kyi rang bzhin gyis 'jigs pa med pa'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs
333a6(phal chen): pa de dag ni 'jig pa med pa'o/ /ngag gi lam thams cad las yongs su 'das pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad ni mtshan nyid gcig pa'o/ /chos kyi
333a7(phal chen): mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi mthar thug pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni mtshan nyid mi mnga' ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khong
333b1(phal chen): du chud par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor snang
333b2(phal chen): bas shin tu rgya che bar byed do/ /shin tu yangs par byed do/ /khong du chud par byed do/ /rtogs par byed do/ /mnyam par byed do/ /mngon par bsgrub bo/ /gzhi snyoms par byed do/ /rab
333b3(phal chen): tu 'jug go/ rnam par 'phel bar byed do/ /nges par sems so/ /nye bar rtog go/ dran par byed do/ /spyod yul du byed do/ /brtan par byed do/ /snang bar byed do/ /rab tu brjod do/ /rnam
333b4(phal chen): par spyod do/ /rnam par 'byed do/ /tshogs su byed do/ /yid ches par byed do/ /yongs su rtog pa thams cad rgyu ba med pa'i snying rje chen po de la gnas te/ sems can thams cad yongs su
333b5(phal chen): bskyab pa la yang dag par spyad par sems rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang po bsgom mo/ /yid kyi las thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / ye shes kyi stobs dang mthus sems
333b6(phal chen): can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba la dga' ba'i bde ba la sems rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgom mo/ /'khor bar log par zhugs pa la btang snyoms su byas te/
333b7(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan gsum pa bsgom mo/ /sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i
334a1(phal chen): phyir| bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgom mo/ / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs par bya ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho thams cad mngon
334a2(phal chen): par bsgrub pa la mkhas par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par rtse ba'i ye shes
334a3(phal chen): thams cad mngon par shes par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad mngon par bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir/ sgo kun nas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug
334a4(phal chen): pa'i ye shes kyi tshul yongs su spyod zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di bsgom mo/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar kho
334a5(phal chen): mo rnam par thar pa 'di sgom zhing thabs sna tshogs kyi sems can yongs su smin par byed de/ 'di ltar nub mo zhi bar gyur pa'i tshe/ dga' ba la mos par gyur pa'i sems can rnams
334a6(phal chen): kyi mi sdug pa'i 'du shes bskyed do/ /mi dga' ba'i 'du shes dang / yongs su skyo ba'i 'du shes dang / gegs su 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang / 'ching ba'i 'du shes dang / srin mo'i 'du
334a7(phal chen): shes dang / mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang / rje med pa'i 'du shes dang / gzhan la rag las pa'i 'du shes dang / rga
334b1(phal chen): shi'i 'du shes dang / 'dod pa'i yul dang / longs spyod thams cad la dga' ba med pa'i 'du shes bskyed de/ sems can de dag kyang sems de la yongs su bsgoms pas/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba
334b2(phal chen): thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pas chos la mos pa'i dga' ba la 'jug cing khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo / /de dag dgon pa la gnas pa'i tshe 'di chos dang mthun pa'i dad pa
334b3(phal chen): yongs su bskyed do/ /sgra chen po 'jigs pa mi snyan pa'i sgra skad thams cad kyang zhi bar byed do/ /mtshan mo zhi bar gyur pa las sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo yang yang dag par ston to/ /spang ba dang
334b4(phal chen): mthun pa'i rkyen kyang nye bar ston to/ /khyim gyi sgo'ang rnam par 'byed do/ /lam yang yongs su ston to/ /snang bas kyang mngon par byed do/ /mun pas chod pa'ang rnam par sel to/ /'jigs pa'ang med
334b5(phal chen): par byed do/ /rab tu byung ba la yang yang dag par bsngags par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi legs pa'ang brjod do/ /chos kyi legs pa dang / dge 'dun gyi legs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen
334b6(phal chen): gyi legs pa'ang brjod do/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba la'ang bsngags pa byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho mo rnam par thar pa 'di la sgom zhing / sems can rnams kyi chos ma
334b7(phal chen): yin pa'i 'dod chags kyi zhen pa rnams kyi chos ma yin pa'i 'dod chags kyi yongs su rtog pa rnams kyang med par byed do/ /tshul ma yin pa'i 'dod pas non pa rnams dang / log par yongs su
335a1(phal chen): rtog pa'i spyod yul can rnams kyi yongs su rtog pa de dag dang / yid la bya ba de dag kyang med par byed do/ /sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skye ba dang /
335a2(phal chen): sdig to'i yongs su rtog pa skyes par gyur pa rnams kyang med par 'gyur ba'i rkyen nye bar bsgrub bo/ /dge ba'i yongs su rtog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa dang /
335a3(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su 'byung ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa dang ldan pa dang / byams pa'i tshul dang ldan pa dang / sems can rnams la snying rje chen pos rgyas par
335a4(phal chen): 'gengs pa dang ldan pa dang / lha dang mi'i bde ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i yongs su rtogs pa bskyed pa dang / skyes nas kyang tshul sna tshogs kyi rkyen nye
335a5(phal chen): bar sgrub pa byed pa nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mthun pa'i rkyen kyang nye bar sgrub pa byed de/ rigs kyi bu/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan
335a6(phal chen): zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyis byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
335a7(phal chen): rnams mtha' yas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rab tu thob pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis rnam par spel ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
335b1(phal chen): kyi ye shes kyi mthus sems kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ gnas thams cad du sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang ldan
335b2(phal chen): pa| thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ zhing rgya mtsho thams cad du zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad mthong
335b3(phal chen): bar bya ba la zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yang dag par gzung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i
335b4(phal chen): mun pa rnam par sel ba/ 'khor ba'i bde ba la dga' zhing sred pa zad cing mthar phyin par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du snang ba skyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa de dag
335b5(phal chen): gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus de skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ 'di nyid nang dang yang rgyang mi ring ste/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po byang chub kyi g.yas rol gcig nas mtshan
335b6(phal chen): mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'dug go/ de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i lam la brtson par bya ba dris
335b7(phal chen): shig| de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam
336a1(phal chen): par gnon pa 'di nyid brnan te bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ dus rnams kun tu byung ba'i bde gshegs
336a2(phal chen): rnams| |mngon du bya bar mos pa'i sems ldan pa/ /de dag mig yangs rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /des ni sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bar 'ong / /rgyal ba'i sku gsal dri ma med la ltos/ /
336a3(phal chen): mtshan gyis yongs su brgyan pas shin tu mdzes/ /rgyal ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa chos dbyings rnams/ /skad cig re res rgyas 'gengs de la'ang ltos/ /byang chub shing drung sangs
336a4(phal chen): rgyas gdan rab la/ /bde gshegs rnam par snang mdzad mngon sangs rgyas/ /chos dbyings yangs pa rgyas pa khyab mdzad cing / /'gro ba'i bsam pa ji bzhin 'khor lo bskor/ /
336a5(phal chen): rgyal bas chos nyid lus med rab zhi ba/ /gnyis med rang bzhin med pa thugs chud nas/ /gzugs sku bzang po mtshan gyis brgyan pa yis/ /'gro ba ma lus bkang zhing ston
336a6(phal chen): pa mdzad/ /sangs rgyas sku ni rgya che bsam mi khyab/ /chos kyi dbyings kun yongs su rgyas bkang zhing / /de ni kun tu mnyam par snang ba ste/ /rgyal ba thams cad kun tu ston pa mdzad//
336a7(phal chen): zhing rnams kun gyi rdul rab phra ba snyed/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor mnga' ba'i sangs rgyas sku/ /kha dog bzang po gzhan dang gzhan snang bas/ /chos dbyings rgyas par skad
336b1(phal chen): cig re res 'gengs/ /rgyal ba'i ba spu'i sgo nas 'od zer sprin/ /rgya che bsam yas mi zad mngon 'byung ba/ /de dag 'gro ba ma lus 'gengs byed cing / /srog chags rnams kyi nyon mongs
336b2(phal chen): gdung ba sel/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa rgya mtsho mi zad pa/ /rgyal ba'i spu yi 'khor nas yongs bton cing / /chos dbyings yangs pa rgyas par kun bkang ste/ /srog chags rnams
336b3(phal chen): kyi sdug bsngal ngan song sel/ /sangs rgyas gsung snyan rab tu sgrog mdzad pa/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho sgra 'od can/ /chos char chen po rab tu 'bebs pa mdzad/ /srog
336b4(phal chen): chags byang chub bsam pa yongs su skyed/ /bskal pa rgya mtshor spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /'dis ni sngon chad yongs su gzung mdzad pa/ /de dag kun gyis rgyal ba rnam snang mdzad/ /zhing rnams
336b5(phal chen): kun tu gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid mthong / /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten kun tu byung / /sems can re re kun la'ang mngon par bzhugs/ /mos pa'i tshul bzhin spyod yul
336b6(phal chen): gzhan dang gzhan/ /de dag kho mos kun tu shes mi nus/ /rgyal sras dam pa thams cad ma lus par/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i spu gcig rtse las 'byung / /rnam par de la
336b7(phal chen): gang rnams bsam yas pa/ /de dag thams cad kho mos shes mi nus/ /kho mo'i 'dab na gnas pa'i lha mo 'di/ /'jig rten mgon la mngon 'gyur rab tu dga'/ /ming du snang ba
337a1(phal chen): 'od 'phro mig ces bya/ /de la byang chub spyod pa ci 'dra dris/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od
337a2(phal chen): kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od la/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ /yang dang
337a3(phal chen): yang bltas te mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi
337a4(phal chen): byin gyis brlabs pa/ dge pa'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig la nan tan du bya ba'i sems yang dag par skyes pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sman pa la nad pa lta bu'i 'du
337a5(phal chen): shes kyis yongs su spyad pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba yid la byed pa ma 'khrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta
337a6(phal chen): ba la sgrib pa'i ri thams cad rnam par gtor ba'i glags rnyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba la sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su
337a7(phal chen): bskyab pa'i snying rje chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa thob pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i ye shes
337b1(phal chen): snang ba rab tu thob pa'i sems dang ldan pa de/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba gang na ba der song ngo / /de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig
337b2(phal chen): 'gro bar rnam par snang bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang / de bas kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs las byung bas yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/
337b3(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba tshogs chen po las byung bar byin gyis brlabs so/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba rnam par gnon pa chen por byin gyis brlabs
337b4(phal chen): so|| dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba brtson 'grus kyi las 'jug par dka' bar byin gyis brlabs so/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba bsdad cing shin tu legs
337b5(phal chen): par byin gyis brlabs so/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba phyogs mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug par byin gyis brlabs so/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du
337b6(phal chen): 'gro ba yun ring por gnas pas byung bar byin gyis brlabs so/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba don mtha' yas pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnam par dmigs pa 'byung
337b7(phal chen): bar byin gyis brlabs so/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba lam gyi rgyan mtha' dang dbus med pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su gnon par byin gyis brlabs so/ /dge ba'i
338a1(phal chen): bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba sgo kun nas rnam par gnon bas byung bar byin gyis brlabs so/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba g.yo ba
338a2(phal chen): med par 'ong pas rnam par gnon par byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs kyi brtson 'grus la rab tu brtson pas/ dge ba'i
338a3(phal chen): bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / smon lam chen po rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrub pa'i rnam par gnon pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / sems can gcig gi
338a4(phal chen): don du phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par sdug bsngal nyams su blangs pa'i zhe non pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la
338a5(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sgra sgrog cing / yun ring por gnas pa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / brtson 'grus chen po'i go bgos pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro
338a6(phal chen): ba dang / phyogs rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa thams cad du shugs kyis 'gro bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / ba spu'i sbubs gcig tu phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par
338a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa la gnas pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas nas kyang / sems kyi skad
338b1(phal chen): cig re re la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'gengs pa la gnas par bya bas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam
338b2(phal chen): par 'phrul pa'i rgyan dang / lam yongs su gnon par zhe non pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi rgyun du zhugs pa'i lam yongs su
338b3(phal chen): gnas pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad la dmigs pa las ma g.yos par chos kyi dbyings kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pas/
338b4(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro bas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba gang nas ba der phyin pa dang / des mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu
338b5(phal chen): dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la/ seng+ge'i khri me tog gi snying po can la 'dug cing / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
338b6(phal chen): kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba yangs shing dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan la mnyam par bzhag pa mthong ngo / /de'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas/ sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu
338b7(phal chen): phyin pa'i spyod pa mngon par ston pa'i sprin sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba/ sems can thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba /sems can thams cad kyis blta na nyams
339a1(phal chen): su bde ba/ sems can thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'ang mthong ste/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan gdags shing
339a2(phal chen): rtsod pa med par bya ba dang / dngos po thams cad la phangs par rtsi ba med par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la sbyor ba mtshungs pas yongs su gtang bar bya ba dang / sems
339a3(phal chen): can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems su bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la brnyas pa med par yongs su gtang ba dang / nang dang phyi'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtang ba
339a4(phal chen): dang / dka' ba chen po yongs su gtang bar bstan pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du sems can gyi bsam pa ji bzhin gyi sbyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ sems
339a5(phal chen): can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa dang mthun pa'i sgras/ sbyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su ston pa'i sprin dang / dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub sems
339a6(phal chen): dpa' rnams gtang bar dka' ba yongs su gtong ba'i sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sprin 'thon nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas par gtogs pa'i sems
339a7(phal chen): can thams cad kyis rnam par dmigs par gyur pa mthong ngo / /'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob
339b1(phal chen): pas / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i skye ba sna tshogs su sprul pa'i lus kyi sprin mngon par 'thon te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i
339b2(phal chen): sems can thams cad la rgyas par khyab par byas nas/ mngon sum du brtul zhugs thams cad kyi yi dam las mi g.yo bar yongs su ston pa dang / sems can gyi khams dang mnyam
339b3(phal chen): pa'i dka' thub dang / brtul zhugs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs rab tu ston pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du gnas pa med pa dang / yul thams cad la ltos pa med pa dang / 'khor ba
339b4(phal chen): thams cad du gnas pa las phyir phyogs pa dang / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa rgud pa'i sgor gzhol ba yongs su ston pa dang / mi sdug pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu ston pa dang / 'jig
339b5(phal chen): rten gyi sdug pa'i 'du shes kyi phyin ci log rnam par bzlog pa dang / mi rtag pa dang g.yo ba dang 'jig pa dang / 'gyur ba'i chos nyid yongs su ston pa dang / 'du byed thams cad kyi chos nyid
339b6(phal chen): sdug bsngal zhing / bdag med pa yongs su ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la gnas pa dang mi 'bral bar mos par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims shin
339b7(phal chen): tu dag par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la yang dag par bskul ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi sgras/ tshul khrims kyi spyod pa yongs
340a1(phal chen): su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po yongs su ston par byed cing / sems can thams cad yongs su
340a2(phal chen): smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i lus kha dog sna tshogs su sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te/ yan lag dang nying lag thams
340a3(phal chen): cad kyang nyams su bzod pa sems can thams cad la yongs su ston pa/ sems can thams cad kyis lus la gnod par mtho ba tsams kyang nyams su bzod par byed pa dang / sems
340a4(phal chen): can thams cad kyis tshul dang mi 'dra ba'i tshig gis spyo ba dang / brgyad pa dang / smad pa dang / bskyung ba dang / brdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa nyams su bzod par byed pa yongs su ston pa
340a5(phal chen): dang | sems can thams cad kyis mi sgul ba yongs su ston pa dang / rim gror byas pa dang / rim gror ma byas pa thams cad kyis mtho ba dang / dma' bar mi 'gyur ba yongs su ston
340a6(phal chen): pa dang / sems can thams cad la nga rgyal med pa yongs su ston pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la bzod pa mi zad pas/ ye shes mi zad pa yongs su ston pa dang / sems
340a7(phal chen): can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir/ bzod pa'i spyod pa yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus dbyibs mi sdug cing kha dog mi
340b1(phal chen): mdzes pa'i gzugs rnam par zlog par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog rnam par dag pa bla na med pa yongs su ston cing / sems can yongs su smin
340b2(phal chen): par byed pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i skye ba sna tshogs kyi lus kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng sna tshogs su sprul pa'i sprin 'thon
340b3(phal chen): te| sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par khyab par byas nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs chen po la/ brtson 'grus kyis sngon du 'dor ba yang dag par
340b4(phal chen): ston pa dang / bdud kyi dkrugs ma thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / byang chub tu brtsams pa mi 'khrugs mi zlog pa'i brtson 'grus dang / sems can thams
340b5(phal chen): cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rab tu bsgral ba'i brtson 'grus dang / mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba'i lam thams cad rnam pa bzlog pa'i brtson
340b6(phal chen): 'grus dang / mi shes pa'i ri rnam par gtor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya bas yongs su mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus dang /
340b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par blang ba dang / yongs su gzung ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rab tu gzhom zhing rnam par gtor
341a1(phal chen): ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bas mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing /
341a2(phal chen): thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i brtson 'grus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa bla na med pa yongs su ston cing / sems can yongs su smin
341a3(phal chen): par byed pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas/ lus sna tshogs kha dog dang / dbyibs rnam pa tha dad par sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te/ thabs sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams
341a4(phal chen): kyi dga' ba yongs su skyed pa dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par zlog pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad rnam par smod pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa'i chos nyid 'jig rten du sgrog pa
341a5(phal chen): dang / dbang po bsdams pa la sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa bla na med pa yang dag par bsngags pa byed pa dang / 'dod pa'i 'jig rten bdud kyi yul
341a6(phal chen): 'jigs pa dang bcas par yongs su ston pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang bral ba rnams la 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa dang dga' ba'i yul thams cad yongs su ston pa dang / chos
341a7(phal chen): la mos shing dga' ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / mthar gyis bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo mngon par sgrub pa dang / sems can thams
341b1(phal chen): cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par bsal ba la nges par rtogs pa'i sems yongs su brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su
341b2(phal chen): ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yongs su ston par byed cing / sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba yongs su
341b3(phal chen): bskyed pa dang / spro ba 'phel bar bya ba dang / nyams bde ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / yid mi bde ba bzlog pa dang / sems skyon med pa yongs su bsgrub pa dang / sems las su rung bar bya
341b4(phal chen): ba dang / bsam pa rnam par sbyang ba dang / dbang po gsal bar bya ba dang / lus kyi bde ba yongs su skyed pa dang / chos la dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba byed cing sems
341b5(phal chen): can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas skye ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i lus kyi sprin sna tshogs 'thon te/ zhing thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa'i sems
341b6(phal chen): can thams cad kyi yid bzhin du bstan pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gan du 'gro bas skyo ba med pa yongs su ston pa dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen
341b7(phal chen): la rim gro bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bas skyo ba med pa yongs su ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba yang dag par blang zhing yongs su bzung
342a1(phal chen): bas skyo ba med pa'i brtson 'grus yongs su ston pa dang / sangs rgyas mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i tshul yang dag par brjod pa dang / chos kyi
342a2(phal chen): sgo rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par 'byed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang / rang bzhin dang / tshul mngon par brjod pa dang / chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi sgor yongs su ston
342a3(phal chen): pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dri ba dang / the tshom rgya mtsho rnam par sel bas shes rab kyi yul yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lta ba'i ri shin tu 'joms pa'i
342a4(phal chen): shes rab rdo rje yongs su ston pa dang / sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pas sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par sel ba'i shes rab kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
342a5(phal chen): 'char ba yongs su ston pa byed cing / sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba yongs su skye bar bya bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas
342a6(phal chen): kha dog dang dbyibs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus mang po 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te/ bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can
342a7(phal chen): thams cad la mngon du gnas shing sgra skad sna tshogs kyis yongs su sbyang ba bstan pas/ 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa mngon par ston pa dang /
342b1(phal chen): 'jig rten pa'i bya ba thams cad rab tu rgyu ba dang / khams gsum pa 'byung ba thams cad yongs su bstan pa dang / khams gsum pa thams cad las 'byung ba'i phyogs yang dag par brjod
342b2(phal chen): pa dang / lta ba'i mya ngan mi bzad pa thams cad las 'byung ba'i phyogs yang dag par bstan pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyi khyad par yongs su brjod pa dang / nyan thos dang /
342b3(phal chen): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i lam las yongs su bzla ba yang dag par ston pa dang / rim gror byas pa dang / rim gror ma byas pa la byams sdang gis gos pa med pa yongs su ston pa dang / 'khor
342b4(phal chen): ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo la mi gnas pa yang dag par ston pa dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas la sogs pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyu ba rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang /
342b5(phal chen): snying po byang chub tu song zhing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa byed cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems can yongs su smin pa byed pa mthong
342b6(phal chen): ngo | |ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te/ sems can gyi 'jig rten thams cad
342b7(phal chen): la mngon sum du gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam yongs su brjod pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par dag pa'i mthar thug pa'i
343a1(phal chen): smon lam gyi khyad par yongs su brjod pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba yongs su brjod pa dang / de
343a2(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing rim gror bya ba rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su brjod pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa rgyun
343a3(phal chen): mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su
343a4(phal chen): ston pa dang / zhing thams cad du phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par gnas shing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam rnam par dag par bya bar yongs su brjod pa rgyun mi
343a5(phal chen): 'chad pa yang dag par ston pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang dag par brjod pa dang / dus gsum gyi
343a6(phal chen): tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang / zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang
343a7(phal chen): dag par ston pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa yongs su bstan pas sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu 'god pa mthong ngo / /
343b1(phal chen): ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyis 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang mnyam pa'i lus kyi sprul pa'i sprin mang po 'thon te/ sems can thams cad la mngon par gnas
343b2(phal chen): shing | thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs kyi stobs mu med pa yongs su ston pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyi stobs mi zad pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / chud mi za ba'i
343b3(phal chen): chos can yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i stobs phyir mi ldog cing phyir mi ldog la/ thug pa med pa dang / rgyun med pa dang /
343b4(phal chen): bla na med pa yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams
343b5(phal chen): kyi stobs bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri mas nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa
343b6(phal chen): yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par 'thor ba yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
343b7(phal chen): snying rje chen po'i stobs bskal ba thams cad du gnas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas skyo ba med pa yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs sangs rgyas
344a1(phal chen): kyi zhing thams cad yongs su bskyod cing bskul bas/ sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed pa yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
344a2(phal chen): stobs bdud dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa yongs su ston pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i ye shes kyi stobs chen po 'jig rten du rab tu brjod
344a3(phal chen): pa byed cing / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang lus kyi sprul pa rgya mtsho
344a4(phal chen): kha dog mtha' yas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang mnyam pa'i sprin/ phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i sems can gyi khams su rgyas par 'gengs pa 'thon te/ sems
344a5(phal chen): can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pa yongs su ston pa dang / sems can gyi khams
344a6(phal chen): rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / sems can
344a7(phal chen): thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho yongs su shes pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa
344b1(phal chen): dang | sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i dus las mi 'da' ba'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du grags par sgrog pa'i ye
344b2(phal chen): shes yongs su ston pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtshos rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
344b3(phal chen): rgya mtsho thams cad 'du ba dang / 'jig pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gzhi dang / dbyibs dang / rgyan rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes yongs su ston
344b4(phal chen): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa rnam par sprul te/ spyan sngar phyin nas mchod cing rim gro byed pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin yang dag par 'dzin pa'i ye shes
344b5(phal chen): yongs su ston pa byed cing / de ltar ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su ston pas sems can rnams kyi dga' ba skyed pa dang / sems rab tu dang bar byed pa dang / rab tu dga' ba
344b6(phal chen): skyed pa dang / mos pa 'phel bar byed pa dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par zlog pa dang / sems rnam par sbyong ba dang / sems skyon med pa skye bar byed pa dang / dbang po gsal bar byed pa dang /
344b7(phal chen): mos pa'i stobs yongs su skyed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir mi ldog par byed pa mthong ngo / /pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pas 'jig rten du ji ltar sems
345a1(phal chen): can yongs su smin par gyur pa mthong ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i tshul gyis mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i
345a2(phal chen): mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i thog ma sems bskyed pa'i tshogs dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'i thabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du phyin
345a3(phal chen): cing mchod pa dang rim gro byas pa'i tshul dang / dge ba'i chos spyad pa'i thabs ji snyed pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pas gtang bar dka' ba yongs su btang ba dang /
345a4(phal chen): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs pa'i thabs dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po dang / 'khor mang po dang longs spyod kyi dbang chen po yongs su btang ste/ mngon
345a5(phal chen): par byung ba'i thabs ji snyed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dka' ba'i spyod pa brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub chen po'i dkyil 'khor la bzod pa mngon par bsgrubs pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang /
345a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par blangs pa'i sbyor ba la mi g.yo bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yi dam brtan pa'i chos rgya mtsho
345a7(phal chen): sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi nyes byas dang / ngan du smra ba dang / nyes par spyod pa thams cad bag la zha bar byed pa'i sbyor ba dang / lus dang sems kyi gnod pa nyams su
345b1(phal chen): bzod par byed pa'i sbyor ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i chos nyid la bzod pa dang / chos thams cad la yid ches pa'i bzod pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges
345b2(phal chen): par rtogs pa'i bzod pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rtsom zhing sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus ji snyed cig yod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i brtson
345b3(phal chen): 'grus ji snyed cig yod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ji snyed pa thams cad dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
345b4(phal chen): la brtson par bya ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pas rnam par
345b5(phal chen): 'phrul pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho la 'jug pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ji snyed pa thams cad dang / shes rab kyi pha
345b6(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs ji snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab chen po'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par spyad pa'i tshul ji snyed cig yod pa dang / shes rab chen po'i
345b7(phal chen): sprin yongs su 'du ba'i tshul ji snyed cig yod pa dang / shes rab kyi gter chen po'i tshogs ji snyed cig yod pa dang / shes rab kyi rgya mtsho chen po la rnam par dpyad pa'i tshul dang /
346a1(phal chen): sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / thabs chen po la mkhas pa'i tshul gyi sbyor ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / thabs chen po la mkhas pa yongs su dag par bya ba
346a2(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i lus ji snyed cig yod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i pha rol phyin pa
346a3(phal chen): yongs su grub pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor
346a4(phal chen): ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par bya ba'i tshogs chen po ji snyed cig yod pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rkyen du gyur pa ji snyed cig yod pa
346a5(phal chen): dang | stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho chen po ji snyed cig yod pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bstan pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin
346a6(phal chen): pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyor ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i tshul
346a7(phal chen): ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi
346b1(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa 'byams klas pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul
346b2(phal chen): rnam par dmigs par bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byams klas pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rgyas
346b3(phal chen): par 'gengs pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya chen po ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i lhun ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol
346b4(phal chen): tu phyin pa yongs su grub par bya ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa'i rnam par rab tu phye ba la 'jug pa 'byung bar yongs
346b5(phal chen): su bsgrub pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i chos rnams dang / chos yongs su bsdu ba dang / chos kyi ye
346b6(phal chen): shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / las kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / zhing gi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / bskal pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / dus kyi ye shes kyi rjes
346b7(phal chen): su 'brang ba dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub
347a1(phal chen): sems dpa'i sems yongs su 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub
347a2(phal chen): sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang
347a3(phal chen): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnam par 'byed pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems
347a4(phal chen): dpa'i chos rgya mtsho'i tshul gyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos gangs chen mtsho'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi rgyud kyi
347a5(phal chen): ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi gter gyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi lugs kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba ji
347a6(phal chen): snyed cig yod pa dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med
347a7(phal chen): pa'i dmigs pa can de dag thams cad de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas mngon par 'thon te/ sems can gyi lus kyi sprin kha dog sna tshogs can du mngon par mched cing
347b1(phal chen): sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /'di lta ste/ 'og min dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / ma dros pa dang / mi che ba'i gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha lta bu'i lus kyi
347b2(phal chen): sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /de bzhin du 'bras bu che ba dang / bsod nams 'phel ba dang / sprin dang bral ba'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon
347b3(phal chen): par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /dge rgyas dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge ba chung ba'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs
347b4(phal chen): su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /kun snang dang ba dang / tshad med snang ba dang / snang ba chung ngu'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /
347b5(phal chen): tshangs chen dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun ris kyi lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /dbang sgyur gyi lha'i
347b6(phal chen): rgyal po/ lha mo'i tshogs dang / lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'/ lha
347b7(phal chen): mo'i tshogs dang / lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po/ lha mo'i tshogs dang /
348a1(phal chen): lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po/ lha mo'i tshogs dang /
348a2(phal chen): lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /lha'i rgyal po brgya byin/ lha mo'i tshogs dang / lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta
348a3(phal chen): bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /dri za'i rgyal po gnas srung po dang / dri za'i bu dang / dri za'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du
348a4(phal chen): mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /grul bum gyi rgyal po 'phags skyes po dang / grul bum gyi bu dang / grul bum gyi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du
348a5(phal chen): mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang dang / klu'i bu dang / klu'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can
348a6(phal chen): yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po ngal bso po dang / gnod sbyin gyi bu dang / gnod sbyin gyi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing
348a7(phal chen): sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po dang / mi 'am ci'i bu dang / mi'am ci'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can
348b1(phal chen): yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po blo gros bzang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bu dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can
348b2(phal chen): yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /nam mkha' lding gi dbang po shugs drag stobs chen dang / nam mkha' lding gi bu dang / nam mkha' lding gi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par
348b3(phal chen): 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang / lha ma yin gyi bu dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing
348b4(phal chen): sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje dang / gshin rje'i bu dang / gshin rje'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su
348b5(phal chen): smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /mi'i dbang po dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
348b6(phal chen): de bzhin du 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /nyan thos dang /
348b7(phal chen): rang sangs rgyas dang / drang srong thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /rlung dang / chu dang / me'i phung po'i lha lta bu'i
349a1(phal chen): lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /rgya mtsho dang / chu klung dang / ri dang / nags tshal dang / lo tog dang / sman dang /
349a2(phal chen): shing dang / sa'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /bza' shing gi ra ba dang / grong khyer dang / snying po byang chub dang / nyin
349a3(phal chen): bar dang / mtshan mo dang / nam mkha' dang / phyogs dang / rkang gis 'gro dang / lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin
349a4(phal chen): par byed pa mthong ba nas/ de bzhin du lag na rdo rje lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul 'byams klas pa thams
349a5(phal chen): cad du sems can thams cad la mngon par gnas shing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i bar du mthong ste/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang
349a6(phal chen): ba'i sems thog ma bskyed pa'i tshogs la sogs pa/ sngon gyi tshe rabs la yongs su bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de rgyun ma chad pa'i tshul ji snyed pa dang /
349a7(phal chen): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bsngags pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / shi 'pho dang / skye ba yongs su bzung ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab
349b1(phal chen): chags pa dang / lus yongs su bzung ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / ming gi 'khor lo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen
349b2(phal chen): gyi gan du 'gro ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / sangs rgyas byung ste bsnyen bkur ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / chos kyi tshig
349b3(phal chen): dang | yi ge blangs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa
349b4(phal chen): dang | ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / ting 'dzin thob pas sangs rgyas mthong ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / zhing
349b5(phal chen): mthong ba'i mig gis rgyas par bkang ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo 'dab chags pa dang /
349b6(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings khong du chud pa'i ye shes gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags
349b7(phal chen): pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i sems can pha rol gyi shi 'pho dang skye ba shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / lha'i rna ba
350a1(phal chen): yongs su dag pa rtogs par byed pa'i shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sems la rnam
350a2(phal chen): par lta zhing dbyings la 'jugs pa'i sgo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / thog ma lha'i mig la zhugs pa'i sgo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa
350a3(phal chen): dang / thog ma lha'i rna ba rnam par dmigs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / thog ma sems can pha rol gyi sems shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing
350a4(phal chen): 'dab chags pa dang / thog ma bdag dang sems can pha rol gyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / thog ma dngos po med
350a5(phal chen): pa la rab tu gnas te/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i rkyen gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / rdzu 'phrul chen po'i rnam par gnon pas phyogs
350a6(phal chen): rgyas par 'gengs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /
350a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
350b1(phal chen): gyi rnam par 'phrul pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang
350b2(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i yongs su gnon pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ming du bya ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa
350b3(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam la 'jug pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i byang
350b4(phal chen): c hub sems dpa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sprul pa'i lus kyi sprin du
350b5(phal chen): mngon par 'thon te/ sems can rnams la chos 'chad pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yongs su ston pa dang / rjes su brjod pa dang / rab tu 'byed
350b6(phal chen): pa dang / shin tu rgya cher byed pa dang / 'grang ba dang / nges par ston pa dang / rnam par rig par byed pa dang / nye bar bsgrub pa mthong ste/ la la la ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor shin tu
350b7(phal chen): 'khrugs pa'i sgra skad kyis chos ston pa mthong ngo / /la la la ni chu'i phung po rab tu rlob pa'i sgra skad kyis/ la la la ni me'i me lce shin tu rlob pa'i sgra skad kyis/ la la la ni rgya
351a1(phal chen): mtsho'i 'brug gi sgra skad kyis/ la la la ni sa yongs su g.yos pa'i sgra skad kyis/ la la la ni ri chen po phan tshun thug cing 'thab pa'i sgra skad kyis/
351a2(phal chen): la la la ni lha'i grong khyer g.yos pa'i nga ro snyan pa'i sgra skad kyis/ la la la ni lha'i gzhal med khang thug cing 'khrol ba'i sgra skad kyis chos ston pa mthong ngo / /la la la ni lha'i
351a3(phal chen): dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni klu'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni dri za'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni lha ma yin gyi
351a4(phal chen): dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni mi'am ci'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la
351a5(phal chen): la ni mi'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni tshangs pa'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni lha mo'i glu dbyangs kyis/ la la la ni lha rdzas kyi rol mo legs par blangs pa'i dbyangs
351a6(phal chen): kyis| la la la ni nor bu rin po che'i sgra dbyangs kyis/ la la la ni sems can gyi ris thams cad kyi skad sna tshogs kyis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam
351a7(phal chen): par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa'i yul/ sems can rnams la rab tu brjod pa mthong ngo / /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin gyis byang chub sems dpa'i sgra skad
351b1(phal chen): sna tshogs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku'i sprin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rnam pa tha dad pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag gi tshul gyis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga'
351b2(phal chen): ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa'i yul/ thog ma sems bskyed pa dang bcas pa yongs su byung ste/ grub cing yang dag par 'dus pa dang bcas/ rnam par thar
351b3(phal chen): ba'i rnam par rtse ba dang bcas pa/ sems can thams cad la rnam par dmigs par byed pa mthong ngo / /de'i sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sprin re res kyang / sems kyi skad cig re re la
351b4(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rnam par sbyong ba mthong ngo / /sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa dag kyang ngan song
351b5(phal chen): gi sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par 'grel ba mthong ngo / /sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa la rab tu 'god pa mthong ngo / /sems
351b6(phal chen): can rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang 'khor ba rgya mtsho las gyen du bskyod pa mthong ngo / /sems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs
351b7(phal chen): rgyas kyi sa la rab tu 'god pa mthong ngo / /sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi sar 'dzud pa tshong dpon gyi bu
352a1(phal chen): nor bu bzang gis mthong ngo / /thos so/ /rnam par dpyad do/ /zhugs so/ /khong du chud do/ /nges par rtogs so/ /rjes su shes so/ /rjes su 'brangs
352a2(phal chen): so| |rjes su zhugs so/ /mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis brlabs te/ de ni mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
352a3(phal chen): thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i byin dang / sngon bskal pa
352a4(phal chen): mnyam par spyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems
352a5(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa kun tu bzang po'i snod du gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba'i shugs drag po gangs chen mtsho snang ba chen po
352a6(phal chen): rab tu thob pa/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa des/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i mdun
352a7(phal chen): du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod
352b1(phal chen): do| |rgyal ba'i chos rnams shin tu zab/ /de la khyod kyis bskal pa tshad med bslabs/ /bsam pa ji bzhin gzugs rnams kyis/ /'gro ba kun kyang 'jig rten rim pas bstan//
352b2(phal chen): bdag med mgon med log pa yi/ /'du shes rtag tu 'khrul pa mkhyen gyur nas/ /rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du ma yis/ /lus dang dbang phyug ston mdzad 'gro ba 'dul/ /shin tu rims bral
352b3(phal chen): rab tu zhi/ /chos sku gnyis med rnam par dag pa mnga'/ /'gro ba ma lus gnyis gnas pa/ /sprul pa'i sprin sgra 'brug gis rnam par 'dul/ /phung po khams dang skye mched la/ /khyod ni
352b4(phal chen): nam yang mi gnas mi rten te/ /yan lag kun rgyas gzugs mchog dang / /dbang phyug yongs su bsgrags pas 'gro ba 'dul/ /phyi dang nang las rnam par grol/ /gnyis las byung ba'i
352b5(phal chen): mtsho las 'phags gyur kyang / 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i/ /gzugs brnyan 'gro ba'i rgyud du rab tu ston/ /khyod la g.yo ba mi mnga' ste/ /nam yang rlom sems g.yo ba'i
352b6(phal chen): spros mi mnga'/ /'jig rten spros mos byis pa rnams/ /chos kyi rang bzhin bstan cing 'dul ba mdzad/ /ting 'dzin rgya mtsho kun spyod pas/ /bskal pa mang por rtse gcig thub bzhugs kyang //
352b7(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs mchod don du/ /spu rnams rtse las sprul pa'i sprin kyang 'gyed/ /sangs rgyas stobs la 'jug pa'i tshul/ /skad cig re rer mtha' yas thugs su chud/ /sems
353a1(phal chen): can bsdu ba'i sbyor ba rnams/ /so so'i rkyen bzhin go bar bgyi bas bstan/ /khyod kyis srid pa'i rgya mtsho dag /las kyi rnam bris sna tshogs gzugs
353a2(phal chen): gzigs shing / /chos kyi sgrib pa med pa'i lam bstan te/ /sems can kun kyang rnam par sbyong ba mdzad/ /khyod sku mtshan bris rnam dag kyang / /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dam pa
353a3(phal chen): yis| |sems can bsam pa'i dbang tshul du/ /khyod ni lha mo'i sku gzugs ston/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par
353a4(phal chen): snang ba la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha mo khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas
353a5(phal chen): ji srid cig lags/ lha mo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs shing dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan 'di thob nas
353a6(phal chen): ni| ji srid cig lags/ de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ dran pa bskal
353a7(phal chen): pa mang 'das pa/ /zhing gi rdul snyed de yi snga rol na/ /zhing ni rin chen mdog bde byung / /de yi bskal pa zhi ba'i dbyangs zhes bya/ /gling bzhi bye ba khrag khrig ste/ /brgya stong phrag
353b1(phal chen): bcu rnams kyis yongs su gang / /tshad med rin chen ri bo 'dra/ /gling bzhi'i bar ma bzang po rnam par bkram/ /rgyal po'i pho brang bye ba brgya/ /stong phrag bcu rnams yongs su tshang ba ste/ /
353b2(phal chen): rgyal po'i pho brang mdangs dga' ba/ /dbus na gnas pa spos kyi rgyal mtshan 'od/ /der ni phyogs kyi dbang po sa yi bdag /'khor los bsgyur ba mngon par gzugs bzang byung / /
353b3(phal chen): mtshan rab sum cu gnyis dang ldan/ /de yi lus kyang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan/ /pad+mo'i sbubs nas rdzus te byung / /gser gyi mdog bzang 'od 'byung lus dang ldan/ /'dzam bu'i
353b4(phal chen): rgyal mtshan thams cad du/ /mkha' las 'gro zhing 'od kyis de 'gengs so/ /de yi bu ni stong tshang ste/ /kun kyang yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan/ /blon po mkhas shing gsal
353b5(phal chen): ba dang / /mdzangs shing yid gzhungs bye ba shin tu mang / /btsun mo bye ba phrag bcu tshang / /lha mo ji bzhin dga' ba'i tshul la mkhas/ /de dag phan sems bde sems kyis/ /rgyal
353b6(phal chen): po de la nye ba'i yid du gnas/ /rgyal po de ni sa chen de/ /ri dang khor yug kun gyi mthas klas pa'i/ /gling bzhi phun sum tshogs pa dag /kun kyang chos kyi stobs kyis gnas par
353b7(phal chen): byed| |kho mo 'khor los bsgyur ba yi/ /btsun mo tshangs pa'i sgra skad rin chen lus/ /gser gyi mdog 'chang dri med 'od/ /dpag tshad stong du 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs/ /nyi
354a1(phal chen): ma nub par gyur nas kyang / /rgyal po sras dang 'khor bcas gzims gyur nas/ /rol mo'i dbyangs kyang zhir gyur te/ /kho mo mal na bde bar nyal nyal na//
354a2(phal chen): nam gyi phyed tsam gung zhig la/ /sangs rgyas dpal gyi rgya mtsho byung bar gyur/ /de tshe rgyal bas rnam 'phrul ba/ /phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste bstan pa mdzad/ /rgyal ba'i 'od
354a3(phal chen): zer rgya mtsho des/ /zhing gi rdul snyed 'jig rten khyab par gyur/ /rnam 'phrul sku rnams sna tshogs kyis/ /phyogs bcu thams cad ma lus rgyas par bkang / /sa rnams ri dang
354a4(phal chen): bcas par g.yos/ /rgyal ba byung zhes sgra yang yongs su brjod/ /lha dang lha min mi dang klu/ /kun kyang rgyal ba byung bas rab tu dga'/ /sangs rgyas ba spu'i sgo kun nas/ /sprul
354a5(phal chen): pa'i rgya mtsho mang po mngon par byung / /des ni phyogs bcu rgyas bkang nas/ /'jig rten bsam pa bzhin du chos kyang bstan/ /rnam 'phrul mtha' yas de dag kyang / /rgyal bas
354a6(phal chen): thams cad bdag gi rmi lam bstan/ /zab mo'i 'brug sgra thos gyur nas/ /khong du chud pas kho mo dga' yid gyur/ /mtshan mo'i lha mo stong snyed kyang / /kho mo'i steng gi bar snang
354a7(phal chen): mkhar gnas shing / /rgyal ba'i legs pa brjod byas nas/ /kho mo sad par smra zhing brjod/ /lha yi blo gros btsun mo longs/ /khyod kyi rgyal po'i khams su rgyal ba skyes/ /
354b1(phal chen): bskal pa rgya mtsho brgya dag tu/ /de 'dra'i phun sum tshogs pa rnam dag dkon/ /kho mo dgar gyur sad par gyur/ /'od gsal dri med rnam dag mthong / /'od bzang de ni ga las blta
354b2(phal chen): blta na| |byang chub shing rgyal drung gi rgyal ba mthong / /mtshan nyid sum cu gnyis kyis brgyan/ /ba spu kun nas 'od zer rgya mtsho bkye/ /ri rab ji bzhin mngon par 'phags/ /rgyal
354b3(phal chen): ba g.yas g.yos kun tu'ang de bzhin no/ /mthong nas kho mo rab dga' ste/ /de 'drar 'gyur bar sems kyang yongs su bskyed/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul yang mthong nas/ /kho mos smon lam
354b4(phal chen): shin tu rgya chen btab/ /kho mos rgyal po bzhes su gsol/ /de yi 'khor dang bud med tshogs kyang bslang / /sangs rgyas 'od yangs mthong gyur nas/ /kun kyang bde ba'i lus su gyur/ /rgyal po de
354b5(phal chen): dang lhan cig tu/ /bzhon pa bye ba srog chags khrag khrig gis/ /yongs su bskor te dpung bcas pa/ /rgyal ba'i spyan sngar kun kyang dong / /lo grangs stong phrag nyi shur yang / /kho mos rgyal
354b6(phal chen): ba de la mchod bkur byas/ /rin chen bdun yang yon du phul/ /rgya mtsho yongs dang bcas pa'i sa yang gsol/ /mdo sde rgya mtsho yon tan sprin/ /smon lam mtsho las yongs su byung
354b7(phal chen): ba'i rgyan/ /kun kyang de bzhin gshegs las byung / /bsam pa ji bzhin 'gro bar de bzhin bstan/ /mtshan mo'i lha mo ji snyed cig /de tshe snying brtser kho mo phan bstan pa/ /de 'drar gyur
355a1(phal chen): te myos gsal zhes/ /kho mo mos pa yongs su skyes par gyur/ /kho mo'i smon lam de 'dra'i sems/ /thog ma byang chub mchog tu skyes par gyur/ /'khor ba'i
355a2(phal chen): rgya mtsho gnas pa'i tshe/ /srid pa'i rgya mtshos de ni zhig ma gyur/ /sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig la/ /kho mos dad pa bskyed de mchod pa byas/ /'khor ba'i lha dang mi dbus su/ /yul gyi dga'
355a3(phal chen): dang bde la mngon par smon/ /rgyal ba'i dang po dpal gyi mtsho/ /de yi 'og ma yon tan sgron ma ste/ /rgyal ba gsum pa rin chen dpal/ /sangs rgyas bzhi pa nam mkha'i shes rab
355a4(phal chen): bo| |rgyal ba lnga pa me tog mchog / rgyal ba drug pa chags med zla ba'i blo/ /rgyal ba bdun pa 'od rgyal chos kyi zla/ /brgyad pa ye shes dkyil 'khor snang ba'o/ /rin chen 'od 'phro ri
355a5(phal chen): sgron te/ /rgyal ba dgu pa de tshe byung bar gyur/ /bcu pa dus gsum 'od dbyangs te/ /de dag kho mos dad pas mchod/ /bcu po de la sogs pa dag /mi yi dbang po dam pa kun
355a6(phal chen): mchod de/ /tshul gyi rgya mtsho 'dir zhugs pa'i/ /mig ni de srid yun gyis thob ma gyur/ /de 'og zhing gi mtshams sbyor ba/ /rin chen thams cad 'od ces bya ba byung / /bskal pa lha
355a7(phal chen): yi dpal zhes bya/ /sangs rgyas lnga brgya de la byung bar gyur/ /thog ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor byung / /gnyis pa nyi ma'i sgron ma mngon par skyes/ /snang ba'i rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas
355b1(phal chen): gsum| |de yi 'og tu rin chen ri bo'o/ /me tog 'od 'phro rgya mtsho sgron/ /me yi dpal dang lha yi dpal gyi mchog /snang ba'i rgyal po 'od kyi dpal/ /bcu pa ye shes kun snang rgyal
355b2(phal chen): po'o| |bcu po de la sogs pa dag / mi yi dbang po de dag kho mo yis/ /phung po'i gnas la dad dga' zhing / /gnas med chos la gnas kyi blos mchod do/ /de 'og de yi mtshams sbyor
355b3(phal chen): ba| |'jig rten khams bzang byung bar gyur pa ni/ /pad+mo'i sgron ma sprin gyi dpal/ /de tshe bskal pa tshangs pa'i 'od ces bya/ /de la rgyal ba tshad med de/ /de dag 'khor dang bcas pa kho mos
355b4(phal chen): mchod| |rgyal ba de dag thams cad las/ /rim gro chen pos kho mos chos kyang thos/ /rgyal ba'i dang po rin chen ri/ /de yi 'og ma yon tan rgya mtsho ste/ /rgyal ba chos dbyings dbyangs kyi
355b5(phal chen): dpal| |chos rab rgya mtsho sgrog pa bzhi pa'o/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan gzungs kyi 'od/ /chos stobs 'od dang nam mkha'i blo gros te/ /chos 'od ri bo spo mthon dang / /de dag tha ma'i
355b6(phal chen): mtshan ni sprin dpal lo/ /bcu po de la sogs pa dag /mi yi dam pa de dag kun mchod de/ /rgyal ba'i rgya mtsho 'dir zhugs pa'i/ /chos nyid de ni dag ma gyur/ /de yi 'og tu de bzhin
355b7(phal chen): gshegs/ /nyi ma'i sgron ma dpal gyi dpal zhes bya/ /zhing ni sangs rgyas yod pa ste/ /de la bskal pa zla ba'i dpal byung ngo / /de la stobs bcu byung ba ni/ /bye ba brgyad cu yongs su
356a1(phal chen): tshang ba ste/ /de dag kun la'ang mchod pa'i sgo/ /rgya che mtha' yas yid 'ong du ma byas/ /thog mar byung ba dri za'i rgyal/ /de yi 'og tu sangs rgyas shing rgyal
356a2(phal chen): te| |rgyal ba gsum pa yon tan ri/ /de yi 'og tu rin chen spyan gshegs so/ /rnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyan/ /chos kyi rgya mtsho sangs rgyas gzi brjid dpal/ /'jig rten
356a3(phal chen): dbang po 'od bzang dpal/ /kun gyi tha ma chos 'od rgyal po'o/ /bcu po de la sogs pa dag /bde gshegs de dag thams cad mchod byas kyang / /chos kyi rgya mtshor 'jug pa
356a4(phal chen): yi| |ye shes kho mos thob par ma gyur to/ /de yi 'og tu zhing dag pa/ /rdo rje'i rang bzhin mi phyed gzi brjid brtan/ /kun tu 'od sprin ming ldan byung / /rgyan gcig kun nas mdzes
356a5(phal chen): par gnas pa'o/ /de la sems can dag pa mang / /nyon mongs dri mas nyon mongs shin tu nyung / /bskal pa rab zhi blo gros 'od/ /sangs rgyas stong rnams byung bas rnam par brgyan//
356a6(phal chen): rgyal ba'i dang po rdo rje gtsug /gnyis pa chags med stobs mnga'i mtshan ldan pa/ /rgyal ba chos dbyings gzugs brnyan dang / /phyogs rnams kun tu sgron ma gsal ba'i bdag/
356a7(phal chen): rgyal ba lnga pa thugs rje'i 'od/ /rgyal ba drug pa brtul zhugs rgya mtsho'o/ /bde gshegs bzod 'khor sgron ma dang / /brgyad pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba ste/ /snang ba rgya mtshos
356b1(phal chen): brgyan pa dang / /de dag tha ma zhi ba'i rgyal po'o/ /bcu po de la sogs pa dag /mi yi dam pa de kun kho mos mchod/ /chos nyid nam mkha' mnyam pa 'di/ /rang bzhin yongs su kun nas
356b2(phal chen): dag pa ste/ /de la gnas shing zhing gi rnams/ /'byams klas kun tu spyod spyad ma dag go /de yi 'og tu mdangs dga' ba'i/ /zhing gi spos sgron sprin gyi dpal zhes bya/ /kun nas nyon mongs
356b3(phal chen): yongs su dag / de yi bskal pa legs par byung zhes bya/ /rgyal ba bye ba de tshe byung / /de dag kun gyis de tshe bskal pa brgyan/ /mgon po de dag chos gsung ba/ /kho mos dran pa'i stobs kyis
356b4(phal chen): yongs su bzung / /rgyal ba'i dang po grags yangs te/ /chos kyi rgya mtsho shugs drag dpal gyi rgyal/ /chos dbang rgyal po yon tan sprin/ /chos kyi dpal dang lha yi cod pan no/ /ye shes
356b5(phal chen): 'od 'phro gzi brjid dpal/ /rkang gnyis dam pa bdun pa de yin no/ /rgyal ba brgyad pa nam mkha'i dbyings/ /dgu pa kun tu 'byung ba'i sgron ma ste/ /de dag tha ma'i sangs rgyas ni/ /mdzod spu'i
356b6(phal chen): dpal gyi 'od kyi blo gros te/ /rgyal ba mi mchog de dag la/ /mchod pa byas kyang chags med de ma sbyangs/ /de yi 'og ma rgyan rab can/ /rin chen sna tshogs kun tu gnas pa ste/ /'jig rten
356b7(phal chen): rnam par phye ba'i mtha'/ /rin chen rgyal mtshan blo gros mchog /de tshe'i bskal pa snying po tshogs/ /de la sangs rgyas brgya phrag lnga byung ste/ /rnam thar chags med 'di 'dod cing / /rang byung
357a1(phal chen): de dag thams cad kho mos mchod/ /thog ma'i mtshan ni yon tan 'khor/ /zhi ba'i dbyangs dang rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs/ /nyi ma'i gzi brjid dpal gyi bdag/
357a2(phal chen): mtshan gyi sprin sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba dang / /chos dbang rgyal po yon tan bdag /bsod nams ri rab zhi ba 'od kyi rgyal/ /bcu po de la sogs pa dag /rgyal ba de dag kun kyang kho mos
357a3(phal chen): mchod| |rgyal ba'i lam ni der sbyangs te/ /de la rgyal ba kun kyang yang dag gzhol/ /'on kyang da dung rgyal ba yi/ /tshul 'dir 'jug pa'i bzod pa ma thob bo/ /de 'og yid 'ong 'od ldan
357a4(phal chen): pa| |yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten khams byung ste/ /zhing dbyangs phreng ba'i blo gros can/ /sems can nyon mongs nyung ba'i gnas yin no/ /bskal pa bde zhing mngon dga' ste/ /de la
357a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu byung / /mi mchog de kun kho mos mchod/ /rgyal ba mchog gi lam yang rnam par sbyangs/ /rgyal ba'i dang po me tog brtsegs/ /rgya mtsho'i snying po yang dag
357a6(phal chen): 'byung ba'i mchog / lha dbang gtsug phud rin chen gtso/ /gser gyi ri bo rin chen brtsegs pa dang / /chos kyi rgyal mtshan nor gyi dpal/ /de dag kun gyi tha ma ye shes blo/ /bcu
357a7(phal chen): po de la sogs pa dang / /lha dang mi gtso de dag kho mos mchod/ /de 'og mtshams sbyor zhing 'byung ba/ /sprul pa bzang po'i rgyal mtshan sgron ma ste/ /bskal pa stong gi dpal
357b1(phal chen): zhes bya| |de la sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig drug / zhi ba'i rgyal mtshan zhi gnas dpal/ /zhi ba'i sgron ma sprin gyi rgyal po'i dpal/ /snang ba'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang / /rnam par sprin mched nyi ma'i
357b2(phal chen): gzi brjid dang / /chos kyi sgron ma dpal gyi ri/ /'od 'phro'i dpal dang lha yi snying po'i dpal/ /de dag tha mar byung ba ni/ /seng+ge'i sgra sgrog mkhas pa sgron ma'o/ /bcu po de la sogs pa dag/
357b3(phal chen): bde gshegs zla ba de dag kho mos mchod/ /'on kyang tshul mtsho 'dir 'jug pa'i/ /bzod pa kho mos thob par ma gyur to/ /de 'og mtshams sbyor zhing byung ba/ /kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes
357b4(phal chen): bya ba ste| |bskal pa gnas med rnam par brgyan/ /de la sangs rgyas bye ba sum cu drug /dang po yon tan kun tu sprin/ /de yi 'og ma sangs rgyas nam mkha'i thugs/ /sangs rgyas legs
357b5(phal chen): byung rnam brgyan dang / /rgya mtsho'i chos kyi sprin sgra sgrog pa'i dbyangs/ /rgyal ba chos dbyings gsung dbyangs dang / /sprul pa'i sprin sgra snyan pa'i dpal mnga' dang / /sangs rgyas phyogs
357b6(phal chen): kun gzi brjid dang / /chos kyi rgya mtsho yongs byung sgra dbyangs dang / /yon tan rgya mtsho dpal gyi sgron/ /rgyal ba'i nyi ma dgu pa byung bar gyur/ /de dag kun gyi tha ma ste/ /rin chen dpal sgron
357b7(phal chen): yon tan dpal mchod do/ /rin chen dpal sgron yon tan dpal/ /rkang gnyis dam pa byung bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /kho mo lha mo zla bzhin te/ /mi yi dam pa byung tshe mchod pa byas/ /rgyal ba des
358a1(phal chen): ni kho mo la/ /mdo sde smon lam rgya mtsho 'byung ba'i rgyan/ /gnas med rgyan kyang rab tu bshad/ /thos nas kho mos dran pa'i stobs kyis bzung / /kho mos mig yangs
358a2(phal chen): der thob ste/ /ting 'dzin zhi dang gzungs kyi stobs kyang thob/ /skad cig re rer zhing brgyud pa'i/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho mang po'ang kho mos mthong / /byams tshul kun tu snang ba'i sprin/ /byang
358a3(phal chen): chub sems rab mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ /snying rje'i snying pos brgyan pa yang / /sangs rgyas stobs kyi tshad du yangs par skyes/ /'gro ba phyin ci log gyur te/ /rtag dang bde dang gtsang
358a4(phal chen): dang bdag zhen pa/ /gti mug ldongs gyur ma rig bsgribs/ /nyon mongs 'khrugs shing log par 'du shes pa/ /lta ba'i rnam par stug la spyod/ /lam gyi 'gro rgyud nyam ngar sred
358a5(phal chen): dbang gyur/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bye brag tu/ /las kyis rnam par bris pas kun byung ba/ /'gro rgyud kun gyi shi 'pho'i sgor/ /skye bar 'gyur bas kun tu skyer gyur cing / /skye dang rga shi
358a6(phal chen): gnod pa rnams/ /lus dang sems kyi nyams su myong gyur pa/ /mthong nas de dag phan bde'i phyir/ /zhing rnams 'byams klas thams cad kyi/ /stobs bcu gang las byung ba yi/ /
358a7(phal chen): bla na med pa'i sems kyang kho mos bskyed/ /de las smon lam sprin byung ba/ /'gro ba kun la bde bar gzhol ba'i mchog /tshogs rnams dbyung ba mtha' yas dang / /lam tshul
