387b4(phal chen): rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ zab mo blta dka' khong du chud dka' ste/ /dus gsum dbyings kun tha dad tshul ldan la/ /chos
387b5(phal chen): 'od dkyil 'khor kun tu 'od 'byung ba'i/ /kho mo'i tshig 'di nor bzang mnyan par gyis/ /sangs rgyas yon tan 'dod pas byang chub tu/ /kho mos thog ma ji ltar sems bskyed dang //
387b6(phal chen): ji ltar kho mos rnam thar 'di thob pa/ /de dag rnam par phye ba'i tshul 'di nyon/ /'di nas sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul snyed kyi/ /bskal pa gcig nas gcig brgyud pha rol tu/ /'jig rten khams
387b7(phal chen): yangs dri ma'i skyon med pa/ /rnam snang rgyal mtshan sgron ma'i dpal byung ste/ /bskal pa rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor byung / /de la sangs rgyas rigs ni rgyun ma chad/ /de tshe ri
388a1(phal chen): rab rdul phran rab snyed kyi/ /stobs bcu skyon med mang po byung bar gyur/ /de la bde gshegs thog mar rin chen 'od/ /kun tu 'phro dpal yon tan dpal
388a2(phal chen): rgyal byung / /rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal mtshan ri rab dpal/ /yon tan seng+ge'i dbang po rgyal ba bzhi/ /rgyal ba bzhi pa'i rgyal po skye bcil dang / /grags pa'i ri bo yon tan ri rab dpal//
388a3(phal chen): rgyal ba nyi ma zla zhal bcom ldan 'das/ /bcu po 'di dag tshul 'di thog ma'o/ /rgyal ba nam mkha'i gzhi dang kun nas 'od/ /phyogs su yongs byung dran pa rgya mtsho'i sgo/ /rgyal ba
388a4(phal chen): mngon 'phags 'od mnga' ri rab dpal/ /bde gshegs chos kyi 'od 'phro ri bo dpal/ /thugs rje che mnga' dgu pa pad+mos 'phags/ /sangs rgyas bcu pa chos dbyings me tog
388a5(phal chen): ste| / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yongs su brjod pa las/ /tshul 'di bcu pa gnyis pa 'di yin no/ /'od dpal rgyal po ye shes blo gros dang / /sna tshogs don dbang dpal gyi blo gros
388a6(phal chen): lha| |rgyal ba shugs kyi rgyal blo ye shes dpal/ /snang ba'i rgyal po 'od kyi rgyal mtshan dpal/ /rgyal ba rnam par gnon pa'i lha stabs dang / /de bzhin chos dbyings pad+mo bcu pa
388a7(phal chen): ste| |rgya chen yongs su bstan las tshul 'di ni/ /tshul 'dir bcu pa gsum pa bstan pa'o/ /rin chen 'od 'phro ri dpal bcom ldan 'das/ /de yi 'og ma yon tan rgya mtsho dpal//
388b1(phal chen): chos kyi 'od dang pad+mo snying po dpal/ /'gro ba'i zla ba spyan tshul bde bar gshegs/ /spos kyi 'od dang rin chen ri rab dpal/ /rgyal ba dri za lus 'od rgyal po dang / /rin chen snying po
388b2(phal chen): rgyal dpal gzi brjid ldan/ /rgyal ba bcu pa zhi ba'i gzugs rtsi stabs/ /de yi 'og ma rgyal ba rgya chen blo/ /rin chen 'od dang nam mkha'i sprin gyi dpal/ /rgyal ba dam pa'i mtshan
388b3(phal chen): gyi dpal gyur dang / /brtul zhugs dkyil 'khor rang gi lus kyi 'od/ /mthu chen brtul zhugs ri rab dpal mnga' dang / /rgyal ba yon tan khor yug dpal gyi rgyal/ /bcom ldan
388b4(phal chen): mi pham brtul zhugs rgyal mtshan dang / /shing gi ri bo rgyal ba de dag bcu/ /rgyal ba sA la'i rgyal po dpal gyi mchog /'jig rten dbang po'i lus ni snang ba'i 'od/ /mngon par 'phags
388b5(phal chen): 'od dpal gyi bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje 'od dang sa yi gzi brjid dpal/ /rgyal ba zab chos 'od kyi rgyal po dpal/ /chos kyi rgya mtsho dbyangs kyi blo gros dang / /ri rab rgyal mtshan
388b6(phal chen): dpal dang blo gros snang / /rgyal ba bcu pa rin chen rgyal po dpal/ /tshangs pa'i 'od dang rgyal ba nam mkha'i dbyings/ /de bzhin chos kyi dbyings ni gzugs brnyan dpal/ /snang
388b7(phal chen): ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyi bcom ldan 'das/ /tha dad phyogs mkhyen ye shes blo gros dang / /nam mkha'i sgron ma mngon par dga' ba'i dpal/ /rnam par snang mdzad 'od
389a1(phal chen): dpal bde bar gshegs/ /bsod nams rab tu snang dpal zhi ba'i dpal/ /bcu pa snying rje chen po sprin gyi dpal/ /de bzhin nyi 'od stobs snang blo gros/
389a2(phal chen): dang / /rgyal ba 'gro ba thams cad mngon gzugs dang / /de tshe rgyal ba mngon 'phags 'od mnga' 'byung / /de yi 'og ma zhi ba'i sku yi 'od/ /chos 'phags bde gshegs de
389a3(phal chen): bzhin byung bar gyur/ /de yi 'og ma rlung gi drag shul dpal/ /dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan rin chen lus kyi dpal/ /dus gsum snang ba'i 'od ni bcu pa'o/ /smon lam rgya mtsho rab
389a4(phal chen): tu snang dpal dang / /gnyis pa dgongs pa rdo rje ri bo dpal/ /rgyal ba gsum pa seng+ge ri rab dpal/ /dran pa'i rgyal mtshan rgyal po chos dpal blo/ /shes rab sgron ma 'od kyi rgyal
389a5(phal chen): mtshan dpal/ /de yi 'og ma rgyal ba rgya chen blo/ /rgyal ba chos dbyings tshul gyi ye shes stabs/ /chos kyi rgya mtsho blo gros ye shes dpal/ /chos 'dzin pa dang rin chen sbyin dpal
389a6(phal chen): dang / /rgyal ba yon tan khor yug dpal gyi sprin/ /bzod pa'i sgron ma dpal dang gzi brjid ldan/ /shugs 'ong zhi gnas dbyangs kyi rgyal ba dang / /zhi ba'i rgyal mtshan 'gro ba'i
389a7(phal chen): sgron ma dpal/ /sangs rgyas smon lam chen po shugs kyi dpal/ /bcom ldan gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal mtshan stobs/ /rgyal ba ye shes 'od 'phro rgya mtsho dpal/ /rgyal ba chos
389b1(phal chen): dbang blo gros chags pa med/ /'gro skad rgya mtsho dbyangs kyi blo gros dang / /thams cad dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra skad dpal/ /dbang sgyur mchod sbyin grags pa'i mchod sdong blo/ /phyogs
389b2(phal chen): yul 'gro ba mngon sum bcom ldan 'das/ /sems can bsam par mnyam pa sku yi dpal/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas gnas dang bcas pa'i dpal/ /rgyal ba rang bzhin lus
389b3(phal chen): dpal bzang po dang / /der ni rgyal ba de la sogs pa byung / /de dag byung nas 'gro ba'i sgron ma mdzad/ /bskal pa ri rab shin tu phra rdul snyed/ /bdag gis rgyal ba rgya mtsho de dag
389b4(phal chen): mchod/ /bskal pa sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul snyed po/ /de dag tu ni rgyal ba gang byung ba/ /bde gshegs de dag thams cad bdag gis mchod/ /rnam par thar ba'i tshul ni 'di la
389b5(phal chen): zhugs/ /rnam par thar pa'i tshul 'di sgom byed cing / /bskal pa mtha' yas bdag gis sngon spyad kyi/ /khyod kyis thos nas nan tan myur gyis shig /tshul 'di ring po mi thogs thob
389b6(phal chen): par 'gyur/ /rigs kyi bu/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon du gyur pas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba ston pa 'di shes par zad na/ /kho mos
389b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dang dbus med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho la mos pa sna tshogs kyis yang dag par gnas pa/ bsam pa sna tshogs kyi lus dang
390a1(phal chen): ldan pa/ dbang po rgya mtsho sna tshogs yongs su grub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / smon lam sna tshogs shin tu rtogs pa de dag
390a2(phal chen): gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song / rigs kyi bu/ snying po byang chub 'di nyid na/ kho mo dang rgyang mi ring ba zhig na mtshan mo'i lha mo sgra rgya mtsho rab tu
390a3(phal chen): zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba/ pad+mo'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan pa zhig la 'dug cing / mtshan mo'i lha mo grangs med pa brgya stong phrag
390a4(phal chen): bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba 'dug gi / de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba
390a5(phal chen): dris shig / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mtshan
390a6(phal chen): mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal la/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ mtshan mo'i lha
390a7(phal chen): mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi drung nas song ngo / / //
